story:
The device located in the shoe ensures that no one is aware of its real functions. Children may feel uncomfortable with wristbands, watches or collars with GPS, but shoes are an element of clothing that will not be taken away from home.

 

Use them to go to school, on field days, on vacations and wherever you want.

 

 

 

 

Safety shoes for children with real-time satellite tracking.
Anccor Shoes are manufactured with high quality fabrics and materials.

story:
We are a post-graduate University group of students who want to make a difference encompassing the culture of sharing. To make a positive impact on campus.

 

Our campaign is to have umbrella stations around University allowing students, at a small cost to 'hire' an umbrella for a certain number of hours to allow them to get home, or to a next class without getting caught in the rain. As students ourselves we are always getting caught in the rain and as the campus is big we will end up getting wetter walking back to our accommodation to get an umbrella. Therefore, we thought of this idea to help ourselves and our peers out when the weather takes an unexpected turn, which is quite often in Liverpool. 

Contributors will help us achieve our goal of making our business a reality. 

 

We need £596 for our start-up costs. This breaks down too:

- Umbrellas - £1 = £560 to buy = £560

- Baskets - £3 = £10 to buy = £30

-Poster - £100 = £0.06 = £6

So, overall we are looking for an investment of £596 so we are able to buy all the essentials to start our business. If our goal is not met we aim to donate the money to a local Liverpool homeless charity.

The risk with our campaign is lack of funding, if our goal is not met we will not be able to buy all the essentials to start up. Also, we face admin issues as we want to integrate our usage system into an existing platform at University which may prove tricky.

If you cannot donate, we would be happy if you could spread the word of our campaign to friends or family so we can get as many people as possible to see our campaign and possibly donate.

story:
A Cleaner Greener Future

We set out to create a company that is first and foremost a positive eco-friendly and sustainably sourced company. 

After years of surfing and shaping boards the traditional way, we realized that we were doing it all wrong. Almost every board on the market today is made out of petroleum products, fiberglass, and resins. All of these damage and pollute the earth. These boards easily dent, delaminate, and often have short life spans leading them to be thrown away within only a few years. Realizing this, we wanted to create a board that would not only outperform standard boards but would also impact the world in a positive way. What we ended up with was beyond anything we could have ever dreamed of. 

 

 

 

The Boards

All of our boards are 100% sustainable and Eco-Friendly. They are stronger, more buoyant, and last up to 5 times longer than standard foam boards while remaining extremely lightweight. There are a few other companies out there that claim to create Eco-Friendly boards by using recycled foam and super sap resins, but in reality, they are just continuing to use the same toxic products that continue to pollute and harm the earth. Our boards are the FIRST AND ONLY TRULY ECO-FRIENDLY BOARDS. They are made with naturally grown bamboo, plant-based cloths, and a plant-based epoxy. 

After the bamboo is responsibly grown and harvested, it is then pushed through a cutting dye to produce long thin strips. These strips are then trimmed to form equal width and length sizes and glued together to form flat sheets of bamboo. 

The frame for the board is then cut from the sheet and assembled. Most of the shape of the board (except the rails) is created from our patent-pending frame designs that have been designed over years of prototyping and testing rounds. 

We then glue a sheet onto the bottom of the bamboo frame.

After the bottom has dried and trimmed we build up the rails by gluing small strips of bamboo to created the rail shape.

Then we glue on the top sheet and hand shape it all down to the finished board design. This process creates a massive pocket of trapped air inside the center of the board which allows the board to be ultra light and extremely buoyant. 

Finally, we coat the board in a plant-based epoxy and plant cloth to create a long-lasting waterproof seal. 

We use a similar process to create all our other products including: 

Skimboards - Made from 2 opposing grain sheets

Handplanes - Made from 3 opposing grain sheets

Glasses - Made from a single sheet

Deck Traction Pads - Made from natural cork

 

The Clothing

 

While we put a large emphasis on our boards (and rightly so) we also offer other amazing eco-friendly products like our clothing. All of our clothing is made out of eco-friendly bamboo and coconut fiber.

Bamboo Clothing

Our bamboo clothing is mixed of approximately 95% bamboo fiber and 5% spandex. This mix allows for ultra comfort while remaining extremely breathable. If you have never owned a piece of bamboo clothing you are missing out because not only is it extremely comfortable it is also UV protectant. These attributes make it great for athletic, pleasure, or beach wear.

Coconut Clothing 

Our coconut clothing is made with a similar mix of approximately 95% coconut fiber and 5% spandex. It breathes and feels similar to our bamboo cloth except when using coconut we get a much denser packed fiber. This densely packed fiber makes it much better suited to clothing that will last a long time without breaking down. These attributes make it great for beach and swimwear.

 

Sustainability

 

Bamboo

We chose bamboo because it is one of the fastest growing plants on the earth while also exhibiting extraordinary strength to weight ratios. This makes it a positive material for the earth and as a building block for the development of extraordinary products. Our bamboo is grown naturally without any pesticides or cutting down of local forests. The harvesting process is also plant friendly because instead of cutting down the plant and killing it as you do with trees, we simply trim the bamboo without harming the plant core. It is a great relationship because by trimming the plants they are not harmed and typically grow back to their pre-harvest size within a year. Within 3-5 years the pole will harden and can be harvested again. This process will last the lifetime of the plant which is around 100 years. During the growing process, these plants convert large amounts of CO2 from the atmosphere into usable oxygen and usable plant material. Pair that with the fact that we plant a tree for every board we sell and you can see how quickly of a positive impact we can make together.

Cork

Cork is one of the most amazing and underused natural materials on the earth. It requires little to no alterations and produces products that are waterproof, supple, and when ground into smaller pieces can be molded into thousands of possible creations. Our cork products start out their life growing on the beautiful hillsides of Portugal. Every 10 years the cork oak trees bark is harvested. This harvesting does not harm the trees and instead only removes the outer bark. The amazing thing about the cork tree is that it can have its bark completely removed and remain unharmed. The harvested cork bark is then taken and stamped out into wine stoppers. The excess scraps from this process are ground into smaller pieces and molded into deck pads. It is an amazing process that requires little to no additional additives. We like to joke that we are picking deck pads from a tree just like you would apples from an apple tree.

Coconut

Our coconut products start out their lives in the trees high above the jungle. Once the coconuts reach maturity they are carefully harvested so as to leave the tree completely unharmed. The coconuts are then used either in food production for their sweet meat or their delicious coconut water. We then take the husks, which used to be thrown away, and create beautiful products. This is an awesome process because it takes something destined for a landfill and turns it into something extraordinary instead. While you may think of coconut fiber as a hard course material, we have created a process that makes it as comfortable and soft as cotton. 

Trees and Supersoil/Particle Board

For every board that we sell we have made a promise to plant a tree. There are many places in the world where deforestation and unsustainable harvesting of trees is causing the extinction of animals and their habitats which leads to erosion and ultimately the destruction of our planet. The first step in healing this broken system is to replant and replace everything taken.

All of the extra bamboo, unusable pieces, and dust that are created during the harvesting and shaping of our boards are collected up and made into either super soil (a composted mixture of bamboo and cow dung) or particle board (a mixture of bamboo pieces and plant-based epoxy) which we then donate to local communities. This along with our solar power factory is all part of our push for a carbon negative zero waste production process.

 

The Plan

Phase 1 - Idea Creation (3 Months)

When we came up with this idea we spent about 3 months researching and developing how we could actually take it from the initial idea through development and into production. Countless hours were spend and many miles were traveled to find the correct materials and the correct personnel to make our dream a reality.

Phase 2 - Design and Development (8 Months)

We then spend the next 8 months with the best and brightest engineers, shapers, and surfers on the planet designing and prototyping our products. Everyone really came together and pushed through long weekends and countless hours spent refining designs to create the perfect products. 

 

Phase 3 - Fundraising (2-3 Months) 

This is where we are today. We need your help in funding our project so that we can continue our dream and start producing products on a commercial scale.

Phase 4 - Manufacturing (5 Months)

After obtaining funding from you we are going to move quickly into our new factory and get to work producing products. We will continually update you with videos and updates on our progress. Based on our current timeline we plan on having our first set of boards shipping out in March of 2019. We have confidence that we can achieve this goal because between our engineers and management staff we have over 15 years of experience bringing products to market. 

 

Support Us

While we are extremely excited to get up and running, we know that without your help we will not be able to make the positive impact we set out to. 

So please help us in any way you can. Whether that’s buying a board, joining us on one of our tree planting trips, or simply helping us get the word out; we would appreciate every little bit you could do for us. Thank you for taking the time to view our campaign and we hope you join us in creating a sustainable future we can all be proud of.

story:
Where is The Jam?

Where is the Jam? is an idea which wants to help people to know places before visiting them. This idea born a Year Ago when we have to throw a party to a boss that was going into a long trip, The problem was that the day we have to do it was a Wednesday. We were searching for a good place to go for more than two hours. Finally, we surrender and went to our boss's house to watch movies... a lame farewell.

With where is the Jam? you will always know how a place is going, what they are doing there and additional information about this places. Also, you could look at photos and videos of this place in real time. You will not give a bad farewell again.

If we suceed, we will develop a free app around the world suited to every one that wants to hang out despite the day. Also, we could help new business to shine, showing the people the magic of new business.

To develop this idea we will have to achieve at least 20.000 USD (Just to pay a company to make the App) The other 10.000 Will be used in marketing campaigns. (We will always upload an excel tab with every expense and billing information.)

If we can´t achieve this goal, we will try to make the app with someone that could give us a lower price. If we can´t also achieve this, we will use the money into the development of a new idea with the help of every donor. 

Risks:

  1. Not achieving the first stage users.

How to solve them:

1. There is some risk in the development of this APP. First of all we need to reach every place than we can and let them know about the app, this to register them to the app. At least at the beginning, we have to move very fast this app because if it doesn´t have the correct amount of places the user will get bored about it. 

To solve this issue we are working right now with people that works in different type of places promoting them. They will let us make a connection between many places and Where is the Jam.

Other ways to help:

  • You can always share our campaing to every one you know, the more people that know us easier will be to achieve the market.
  • You can give us ideas that you would like to have in this site. We are just people helping people.

story:
SOLAR PANEL BACKPACK 10 W

The Impact

Solar power is arguably the cleanest, most reliable form of renewable energy available, and it can be used in several forms to help power your home, business or travels.

Solar power is the energy source of the future. The third generation solar panel is very efficient in transforming the solar energy into power. An ideal way of collecting solar energy is to carry the solar panel on your back while walking and we believe it will be an appreciated companion for any user!

 

 

  • Third Generation Solar Panel 10 W
  • Anti-theft lock
  • Water resistant Fabric 600D
  • External USB port
  • Unique laptop compartment
  • Bottle holder
  • Adjustable chest buckle
  • Capacity 20L
  • Secret pocket for documents
  • Quick access side pocket
 

 

 

 

Anti-theft lock for a safe travel without having to be concerned about unwanted incidents.

 

 

NOTEBOOK POWERBANK 9000Am

The JO & LYD NoteBook Powerbank is the perfect accessory for your Solar Panel Backpack. It can store all that solar energy without slowing your down.

 

Combine your Solar panel Backpack with our Notebook Powerbank and you will have the perfect combination for all meetings and travels. Keep the Notebook Powerbank connected to your Solar panel Backpack while on the go, and you will always make sure to keep your smartphone or tablet charged at all times!

The Notebook Powerbank by JO & LYD, is the perfect meeting partner, topped up with a notebook, card holder and a stand for your telephone to make video calls or watch a video while making notes. At the same time, you can charge your telephone whenever it is running out of power.​​

The Powerbank has a battery with a capacity of 9000 mA and you can keep track of the battery level while charging. Just attach your Powerbook with the micro USB cable located inside the backpack​.

 

The Notebook Powerbank includes:

  • Notebook 80 sheets
  • 2 micro USB cables
  • Powerbank battery 9000mAh

 

All the products will be sent as traceable parcels with a tracking number.

story:
Short Summary

 

  • Sabreena is a seasoned yachtswoman who happens to be Transgender, she has spent the last 3 years training and preparing by sailing on the Great Lakes in the State of Michigan.
  • Project REVOLUTION’s Mission is three fold, the first being to break the World Record for Fastest Around Alone in an Open 40, Second is for Sabreena to shatter the glass ceiling in the sailing world by not only claiming the World Record but to be the First Transgender Woman to Sail Solo Nonstop Around the World. Third is to change the conversation about Transgender, to send a message that is loud and clear, that Transgender people are just people, who have dreams and aspirations like everyone else, that they just want to be respected and appreciated for the courage it takes to be who they are and for the passion with which they pursue their dreams.
  • By donating to Sabreena’s Campaign you are helping her to do what all her critics have already told her can not be done, the cost of pursuing this challenge can be overwhelming financially, Public Relations is near the top of that list. To achieve her dream she needs representation which she now has, but has been difficult to cover in terms of dollars, having her PR Team she has now allows her to focus on her sailing and training while her PR Team of Amy Taeuber and Sophie Taeuber of The PR Bible reach out to media and sponsors, without their vast wealth of contacts and networking experience Sabreena would not be able to make the inroads that her PR Team has access to.

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • At present we need $6000 to cover Public Relations expenses for the next 6 months until we have the sponsors required to financially handle the costs going forward, without that support Sabreena’s Mission can not go forward. One of the cool ideas we want to offer is when you make a donation of $20 or more your name will be a part of a wrap around Sabreena’s Boat and your names will make the historic and record breaking journey around the world, the names will be seen in images taken of Sabreena and her boat while in Sydney and underway from start to finish.

The Impact

  • We live in a time where we thought we had made significant inroads, but due to recent political upheaval Transgender people have now been placed in great danger by a reckless and bigoted Government  that has gone out of its way to harm Transgender people like Sabreena by stripping them of the protections they fought so long and hard for, violence against them has not only been tolerated it has been encouraged. By donating to Sabreena and her quest, we are hoping that her journey will swing the pendulum back the other way to a conversation about love, acceptance and tolerance for others deemed different. By showing her remarkable courage and commitment to not just her dream but to her community, she will be telling them that if you have a dream, believe in that dream and work hard that it can come true, that no matter what the coomunity’s enemies say otherwise. It will hopefully show to not just Sabreena’s detractors but the Transgender Community’s as well that there nothing to fear from her or her community, that in fact Transgender people are brave, courageous, loving and compassionate human beings who deserve to be accorded the same respect that is demanded of them by their enemies.
  • Think about how hard this challenge is that Sabreena has chosen to take on, over 200 people have sailed solo nonstop around the world, of those 200 or so people only 12 have been girls/women, and no Transgender man nor woman has so much as attempted to do what Sabreena is trying to accomplish, make no mistake this is a goal that has brought even the toughest of people to strife.

Risks & Challenges

 

  • Solo Sailing is a dangerous endevour that requires total focus and an unwavering commitment from the moment Sabreena unties from the pier until she is safely moored once more upon her return. There are any number of hazards involved with sailing solo nonstop around the world, from submerged objects, to rogue waves, equipment failures, the list goes on. To mitigate the risk Sabreena has the most capable Project Adviser anyone could ask for in Bruce Arms of Gold Coast Queensland Australia. Bruce is an accomplished solo sailor in his own right and was responsible for Jessica Watson becoming the youngest to have ever sailed solo nonstop around the world in 2010. It was Bruce’s meticulous attention to every detail that allowed the then 16 year old Jessica to achieve her dream, it was his forward thinking that allowed Bruce to prepare Jessica for every eventuality including the things no one would remotely think of and it is that same attention to detail that Bruce will bring to bear to ensure Sabreena is as safe as possible and to give her the best shot at being safe and successful.
story_txt:
Short Summary
 

Sabreena is a seasoned yachtswoman who happens to be Transgender, she has spent the last 3 years training and preparing by sailing on the Great Lakes in the State of Michigan.
Project REVOLUTION’s Mission is three fold, the first being to break the World Record for Fastest Around Alone in an Open 40, Second is for Sabreena to shatter the glass ceiling in the sailing world by not only claiming the World Record but to be the First Transgender Woman to Sail Solo Nonstop Around the World. Third is to change the conversation about Transgender, to send a message that is loud and clear, that Transgender people are just people, who have dreams and aspirations like everyone else, that they just want to be respected and appreciated for the courage it takes to be who they are and for the passion with which they pursue their dreams.
By donating to Sabreena’s Campaign you are helping her to do what all her critics have already told her can not be done, the cost of pursuing this challenge can be overwhelming financially, Public Relations is near the top of that list. To achieve her dream she needs representation which she now has, but has been difficult to cover in terms of dollars, having her PR Team she has now allows her to focus on her sailing and training while her PR Team of Amy Taeuber and Sophie Taeuber of The PR Bible reach out to media and sponsors, without their vast wealth of contacts and networking experience Sabreena would not be able to make the inroads that her PR Team has access to.


 
What We Need & What You Get
 
At present we need $6000 to cover Public Relations expenses for the next 6 months until we have the sponsors required to financially handle the costs going forward, without that support Sabreena’s Mission can not go forward. One of the cool ideas we want to offer is when you make a donation of $20 or more your name will be a part of a wrap around Sabreena’s Boat and your names will make the historic and record breaking journey around the world, the names will be seen in images taken of Sabreena and her boat while in Sydney and underway from start to finish.

The Impact

We live in a time where we thought we had made significant inroads, but due to recent political upheaval Transgender people have now been placed in great danger by a reckless and bigoted Government  that has gone out of its way to harm Transgender people like Sabreena by stripping them of the protections they fought so long and hard for, violence against them has not only been tolerated it has been encouraged. By donating to Sabreena and her quest, we are hoping that her journey will swing the pendulum back the other way to a conversation about love, acceptance and tolerance for others deemed different. By showing her remarkable courage and commitment to not just her dream but to her community, she will be telling them that if you have a dream, believe in that dream and work hard that it can come true, that no matter what the coomunity’s enemies say otherwise. It will hopefully show to not just Sabreena’s detractors but the Transgender Community’s as well that there nothing to fear from her or her community, that in fact Transgender people are brave, courageous, loving and compassionate human beings who deserve to be accorded the same respect that is demanded of them by their enemies.
Think about how hard this challenge is that Sabreena has chosen to take on, over 200 people have sailed solo nonstop around the world, of those 200 or so people only 12 have been girls/women, and no Transgender man nor woman has so much as attempted to do what Sabreena is trying to accomplish, make no mistake this is a goal that has brought even the toughest of people to strife.


Risks & Challenges
 
Solo Sailing is a dangerous endevour that requires total focus and an unwavering commitment from the moment Sabreena unties from the pier until she is safely moored once more upon her return. There are any number of hazards involved with sailing solo nonstop around the world, from submerged objects, to rogue waves, equipment failures, the list goes on. To mitigate the risk Sabreena has the most capable Project Adviser anyone could ask for in Bruce Arms of Gold Coast Queensland Australia. Bruce is an accomplished solo sailor in his own right and was responsible for Jessica Watson becoming the youngest to have ever sailed solo nonstop around the world in 2010. It was Bruce’s meticulous attention to every detail that allowed the then 16 year old Jessica to achieve her dream, it was his forward thinking that allowed Bruce to prepare Jessica for every eventuality including the things no one would remotely think of and it is that same attention to detail that Bruce will bring to bear to ensure Sabreena is as safe as possible and to give her the best shot at being safe and successful.

story:
The versatile design with adaptable binding fits people with shoe size 5 to 13 (US),          34 - 46 (EU), and weight up to 160 kg.      

 

Rhythmic motion of the whole body while walking ensure normal lungs ventilation and improve blood circulation in all organs including the central nervous system. Therefore, walking is the best type of physical exercises.


                  The invention of the wheel.

It was the invention of the wheel, which happened 3500 years BC, that changed the whole development of human civilization. The wheel allowed a man to move heavy weights and transport himself.                                                                                                                                              Another great invention made by Galileo Galilei in 1583 – a pendulum,            was mostly used in watch design. People learned to measure exact time.

However, the evolution gave a human being such precious gift as legs, which move in accordance with physical properties of a pendulum, and their potential is not fully unlocked yet. The thing is that only insignificant friction force resists free continuous movement of a pendulum and rotation of a wheel.

When developing KineticStep, the key task was to give a man a chance to walk as easily and efficiently as a wheel rolls. However, having solved the main biomechanics problem – optimization of transportation of the general center of man's mass, the design based on pendulum mechanism interaction also revealed a number of positive effects applicable in medicine. Load on legs joints and spinal column reduced significantly. Ability to walk without knees bending promises possibility of exoskeleton efficient use in case of knee joint injuries or diseases.

Kinetic Step will help you to remain active regardless of your age and life conditions.
Take care of your nearest and dearest.

Since we often face various leg injuries and strained muscles, then in many cases use of Kinetic Step may help you to remain active and accelerate the process of healing and rehabilitation.

                                   Review.Doctors:

It seems promising to examine the effect of KineticStep exoskeleton use by the patients with degenerative dystrophic diseases of large joints of the lower limbs, which allows changing biomechanics of movements, and thus redistributing load on articular surface, and thereby mitigate the process progression.   It would be interesting to use KineticStep for treatment of elderly patients with fractures of long pipe bones of the lower limbs after surgeries. Such patients require early locomotive rehabilitation. Combined use of KineticStep exoskeleton and external supports may help making such patients more active. 

Roman Alfimov: 
Candidate of Medical Science, 
doctor of the highest qualification grade, 
Chief of Trauma Unit, 
Teaching Hospital. 

The problem of functional interrelations of the nervous system and muscles is a key problem of rehabilitation medicine. ORTHOSTEP changes radically walking stereotypes: the artificially created way of walking (Pinocchio walk cycle) with unbending knees (hence the name: ORTHO - straight, STEP – a manner of walking) changes oscillation trajectory of the general center of mass from vertical to horizontal.    If a human balance system functions incoherently (for any reason), then phasic muscles are involved in upright pose in addition to postural muscles, which requires much greater and inexpedient consumption of energy. Walking in ORTHOSTEP exoskeleton correctly and properly from physiological point of view resets the balance-controlling system, which is an absolute necessity in rehabilitation medicine, especially in neurorehabilitation and orthopedic rehabilitation.            Having insufficient observation materials, we however reserve the right to warn elderly people and people having locomotive system problems that ascending on any platforms, heel, etc. reduces steadiness of human body and increases risk of falling.

R.Gorovaya, Board Certified
in Therapeutic Exercise and Sports Medicine,
Center of Rehabilitation Medicine – 
Pyatigorsk, and Medical Rehabilitation Center (South)
under the supervision of V.I. Dikul,
member of the Academy of Sciences.

                                 

We walk less, we use vehicles, which completely deprive us of active life style and physical exercises (other than riding a bicycle) and often pollute the environment. Kinetic Step may be used for walking as an alternative to vehicles; it may cut costs of transportation and solve traffic jam problems in the cities.

The industrial prototype will use high-tech materials, its design and mechanism structure will be improved.

                         

Recreational Physics

An example of a non-winding toy with its legs joined in a system of pendulums, which is able to walk without energy consumption, overcoming only the force of friction, as a rolling wheel.

   

To walk like that, in order to free up a leg and make a step, a toy has to swing from side to side. However, a human being does not swing from side to side when walking. Therefore, exoskeleton's extendable platforms help to walk effortlessly.  

 
                         

An Interesting Example

Even without an exoskeleton, you can feel that our legs are able to interact as a system of two physical pendulums.

To do that, we have to remember our childhood and walk on road curbstones letting a straight swinging leg fall freely below the supporting leg. Although, to walk on the curbstones, you have to keep your balance on a straight line and it is a bit difficult to move a leg to start stepping, it will be interesting to feel the difference with the usual way of walking.

          

We have travelled a long and hard way from the idea, the concept of pendulum mechanism system, its theoretic development to creation of an operational prototype of the exoskeleton, which has fully proved the correctness of our theory and performed greatly. We managed to find a simple and elegant solution to a complicated problem. Kinetic Step was well received by engineers and favorably reviewed by doctors. To achieve the success, we created more than one design of the exoskeleton based on different principles – pneumatic, hydraulic, and mechanic. Funds will be used for minor improvement of mechanism functioning through use of high-tech materials. Our final product will also look stylish. We will do our best to fulfill orders before the due date and try to deliver Kinetic Step by Christmas (December 25). I’d like to thank everyone, who helped working on this project. A. Guskov

Our team:

 

                        Questions and answers:

  • If you reduce load significantly, your leg muscles may become weaker or even atrophy?

I completely agree with you. If a physically health persons indulge in their laziness and wish to be even less active, they may end up exactly like that. Everything depends on our aims. Kinetic Step gives unbelievable abilities to those, who want to maintain and strengthen their health, in addition to usual walks, which are important and good for your health.
- For instance, healthy people will spend the same amount of energy and strength as required for usual walking, but they will be able to walk 2-3 times longer distances and significantly reduce the load on leg joints and spinal column through prevention of body mass lifting up and dripping by 5cm with each step.

  • Is it difficult to learn walking with Kinetic Step?

For the vestibular system, it is the same usual walking, and you get used to it in 5 minutes. You don't need any special learning or training, as you need for a bicycle or Segway, etc.

  • Can I order a Kinetic Step if I live outside the US?

We will deliver Kinetic Step to any country, if it is not prohibited by the local legislation.

  • How expensive is the delivery?

Kinetic Step will be delivered free of charge to those, who place orders.

  • How fast can you walk using Kinetic Step?

The optimal speed with minimum energy consumption is the same as walking: 4-5 km/h. If you make even a small effort, you can increase speed up to 9–10 km/h.

  • What does your guarantee cover? Where can I buy spare parts for the exoskeleton, if I need them?

We give a full one-year guarantee. All spare parts will be available through the Customer Support Service at           http://kineticstep.com/.

 

        What do we have in common?

Mass media about us.

Young developing company, KineticStep strives giving   Young developing company, KineticStep strives giving   people an ability to walk effortlessly and efficiently.

  The expansion gave a tellurian being such changed present as legs, that pierce in suitability with earthy properties of a pendulum, and their intensity is not entirely unbarred yet.

   The design exoskeleton based on pendulum mechanism interaction also revealed a number of positive effects applicable in medicine. 

           KineticStep Revolution in the world of movement. 


         When developing KineticStep, the key task was to give a man a chance to walk as easily and efficiently as a wheel rolls. 

       A unique exoskeleton that helps to overcome knee problems: KineticStep 

Bring a small miracle into your life.

Andrey Guskov, a military engineer, currently employed by «Continental», international human rights awareness organization. Deputy Chairperson of the Juvenile Board for .  In 2017, played a small role of Podporuchik Ubeiko, in the miniseries based on the novel by Aleksey Tolstoy called “Road to Calvary” A friendly parody of invention.       https://youtu.be/fnB03hH_zS4

story:
The 411

Picture this - two girls from Los Angeles, taking part in a global road rally in order to raise money for charity, barreling through the deserts of Kazakhstan in a glorified tin can moonlighting as an actual car.  

The Mongol Rally is a worldwide rally put on by The Adventurists.  We will be driving from London to Siberia across deserts and mountain ranges, driving on roads ranging from pavement to not-an-actual-road.  No Google Maps, no route, no back-up - just the delusion of a good idea, a language barrier and a prayer. 

As you can imagine, driving 10,000 miles across 1/3 of the globe involves a few expenses.   From visas and insurance to petrol and unexpected costs, there's quite a bit that goes into pulling off this bucket of adventure.  That's where you come in.

 

What We Need & What You Get

Let's break it down.

Your donation here will help with fees and expenses we need in order to make this happen. Right now, these are anticipated costs:

  • $1000 (plus any extra we can get) for Cool Earth
  • $700 for visas
  • $1000 for our car, plus insurance
  • $1500 to have our car shipped back to Europe and scrapped

We've got a whole slew of fun perks, listed to the right for you to check out.

The Impact

Since we have the privilege of traipsing across so much of the planet that we live in, it only seems fair to give back to it and try to leave it just a tiny bit better. 

In hopes of doing so, we have chosen Cool Earth as our charity.  Cool Earth works alongside rain forest communities to halt deforestation and its impact on climate change.  From setting up an in-country team to working directly with communities and local NGOs to develop their capacity, Cool Earth's partnerships are community-led and adaptable to each location.

FUN FACT - Over the years, The Adventurists have raised over $8M for Cool Earth!

Risks & Challenges

Because of the current political climate, we might have to make adjustments to our route.  We will not travel anywhere that doesn't feel safe.  To ensure our safety, we will:

  • Be traveling with a caravan of other Rallyers.
  • Sign up with the STEP Program so that we are registered with the closest Embassy or Consulate
  • Live-blog through our Mongol Rally page.  You can follow along to see where we are!  Once that site is live, we will update this page with a link.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, no problem!  There are still a few ways you can help:

  • Share this page on your socials and be sure to tag us @herworldisopen, @shelleycarling and @kyndylmiller.  Tell everyone you know.  Tell your parents, children, aunts, uncles, neighbor, that guy at the grocery store, your yoga instructor, piano teacher, classmates, co-workers, roommates, lovers and everyone else you come across.  Shout it from the rooftops! The more people that know, the more help we can get.
  • Check out our website www.herworldisopen.com for a list of items we might need.  Have an old sleeping bag laying around?  We'll take it!
  • Keep an eye out for our events.  We can always use your support as an audience member.

story:
ABOUT

We are going to shake the foreign currency exchange industry! Stop overpaying in commissions and grey charges - you deserve the best value of your money.

With one finger click, get the real-time exchange rates from any types of financial institutions. Not happy with available options? Do not worry - let's find some real people. Click, Post, Exchange your money at the best rate - enjoy being a local in any corner of this World! 

At the end of the trip there is always leftover cash, so why not to check if anyone needs it? Perhaps it is someone from your own country with whom you can exchange not only cash, but useful travelling tips.

INSIDE LOOK

 

 

WHO WE ARE? 

Apart from being a team with IT and Financial Management backgrounds, we are travellers. Travelling is part of our DNA that is why we are making smart solutions for real needs.

 

WHERE ARE WE NOW?

We have developed a working prototype, which needs to be tuned and uploaded to Google Play and Apple App Store

 

MILESTONES

50 most visited countries in both hemispheres immediately after the launch. The whole World within a year

 

WHY INDIEGOGO?

For the people, funded by people. Seeing and selecting the Best Exchange Deals will be always FREE

 

THE STORY BEHIND

My name is Ilia, and I am one of the team members. 

Sometime ago, I went on a honeymoon to Thailand with my wife. I had to constantly exchange currency or withdraw cash that we brought for living. There was always a challenge of finding the best exchange rate in order to save on commission.

One day, I met this guy through the social media group who was exchanging international currency among visitors. He would check the official rate from the bank and later exchange at a better rate. In addition, he was very mobile. He would bring me money right at my hotel door.

So, I thought if there are people like him, why we could not make them a designated dealers and proceed with the secure, transparent and well-advertised transaction with one click of our finger. And this is how Alphachange was born. I believe that people should have a choice. That is why our App gives you choice - if you like to change your money at the bank - Alphachange will show you all available rates on the map around you, want to exchange with peers - see available options or create your own deal! 

Saving is easy in the 21st century with the use of modern technology!

REWARDS

Alphachange T-Shirt 

Developer Hoody​

Apart from being a team with IT and Financial Management backgrounds, we are travellers. Travelling is part of our DNA that is why we are making smart solutions for real needs.

 
WHERE ARE WE NOW?
We have developed a working prototype, which needs to be tuned and uploaded to Google Play and Apple App Store MILESTONES
50 most visited countries in both hemispheres immediately after the launch. The whole World within a year WHY INDIEGOGO?
For the people, funded by people. Seeing and selecting the Best Exchange Deals will be always FREE THE STORY BEHIND
My name is Ilia, and I am one of the team members. 
Sometime ago, I went on a honeymoon to Thailand with my wife. I had to constantly exchange currency or withdraw cash that we brought for living. There was always a challenge of finding the best exchange rate in order to save on commission.
One day, I met this guy through the social media group who was exchanging international currency among visitors. He would check the official rate from the bank and later exchange at a better rate. In addition, he was very mobile. He would bring me money right at my hotel door.
So, I thought if there are people like him, why we could not make them a designated dealers and proceed with the secure, transparent and well-advertised transaction with one click of our finger. And this is how Alphachange was born. I believe that people should have a choice. That is why our App gives you choice - if you like to change your money at the bank - Alphachange will show you all available rates on the map around you, want to exchange with peers - see available options or create your own deal! 
Saving is easy in the 21st century with the use of modern technology!
REWARDS
Alphachange T-Shirt 

Developer Hoody​

Broadhead Truly Self Fletching. Precision. Strong. 100% Spin Tested. [StormAero.com]

Not Fancy, But Doing The Right Job!

'Got Fletching?'

 

[Made by 30+ years of CNC Masters & Aerodynamic Researchers]

What We Promise

  • We are people who live the adventure! We came up with what we always have dreamed of!
  • We put our heart on to this business and will keep our promises.
  • This is Highly Precision (+-0.0002" Tolerance, 100% Spin Tested) & Strong Broadhead(Arrowhead), which will TRULY SELF FLETCHING.
  • Get the 1st chance to experience about the best Self Fletching Broadhead
  • Get 1st Right to become Major Distributors. (Only eligible to be person who buy 200+ qty at one time buy)

  • 40% Saving from Market Price. (40% cheaper from E-Commerce Online Site)

  • $5,000 Packaging Development. 
  • $8,000 Overhead Cost (Shipping, Labor, Office Supply) to serve Big Perks Fans.

The Impact

We are thinking of its material could be either Gold or Titanium, inside of very special appreciation(certification) letter in it. Yes, it is COLLECTIBLE, and EVENTFUL!

Risks & Challenges

We have studied & researched in below industry very deep! Aerodynamic, Archery, Precision Mold, CNC Machining, Printing & Packaging.

  • Aerodynamic (10+ years) - Hope not this expert area "catch our tail". Tested Immediate Fletching with prototype, compared with normal broadhead. (See our test video at https://youtu.be/xsg1OcaOwaE)
  • Archery (15+ years) - We only enjoyed as "hobby level", we may need your help on getting better.
  • Precision Mold (30+ years) - We are leader in Precision Mold industry, with Micro precision & Metal science. This is why we could come up with any material like Stainless Steel, Tungsten, etc. 
  • CNC Machining (30+ years) - CNC Machining is our most proud area. +- 0.0002" within an axis, and we could do more, if we need to, and thousands of experience to make Precision Part, even we OEM manufactured for OEM CNC precision machine ITSELF!
  • Printing & Packaging (10 + years) - We do know and understand classic printing to digital printing technology. And we worked with Rewarded Graphic Designer to come up with our marketing collateral for us. This means yours also will be "pop" like us!

Other Ways You Can Help

Whoever letting us to connect to right distributorship, we will "Remember & Reward" your contribution. 

  • We wish to serve all of our distributors, serve like you serve your customers! We honor your first lead of distributorship, so we will "Remember & Reward" of your first lead! Ask us about our distributorship program. 
  • Just let us know, you are interesting to be Distributorship, & "Remember & Reward" program.

story:
• The idea came from years of using traditional beach diving equipment. The traditional gear is very task specific and lacks flexibility in its applications. We found that as a problem and more so a need for change to advance the sport.
  • The FreeFloater allows easy gear storage, acts as a float with its buoyant bag material, has an insulated fish compartment, dry storage, a fresh water supply and a fish ruler. These features make our product more versatile and applicable to more than just diving. Jake actually made this solution for himself with a boogie board and a cooler just to solve his troubles on the water temporarily. We really believe in the product and more so the solution. Jake is a consumer in the customer segment we are targeting so we know that others like him would love the FreeFloater.
  • Your contributions will be foundation for our progress towards a finished product from this point forward. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Here's the breakdown: 

  • The $10,000 we are seeking will be used to create the product and fund the initial round of manufacturing. Any additional funds will be allocated towards furthering the research and development of our product as well as marketing and branding the product. We really believe in the FreeFloater and know it can change the way we enjoy the water today. 
  • For contributions in the amount of $10: backers will be added to our email list and will receive a lobster gauge as well as a FreeFloater sticker pack. 
  • For contributions in the amount of $50: backers will receive all the benefits of a $25 contribution plus 25% off the purchase of a FreeFloater.
  • For contributions in the amount of $100: backers will receive all the benefits of a $50 contribution plus they will be entered into a FreeFloater giveaway.
  • For contributions in the amount of $10,000: backers will enjoy a trip to sunny South Florida for a weekend beach dive extravaganza !
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, we will bring the product to the market as best as possible. Ultimately we will find a way to make this dream come true. 

The Impact

  • Our product revolutionises beach diving. The FreeFloater allows consumers to approach the water hands-free with all their equipment strapped onto the bag. The FreeFloater also provides users with more options through features like an insulated fish compartment, a fresh drinking beverage supply, dry storage, a fish ruler, a dive flag, and buoyant bag material.
  • With this product on the market, consumers will have more options and be able to get more use out of just one product versus multiple products (float, flag, cooler).

Risks & Challenges

  • One risk may be the bag's design. This idea is very realistic, we just need some R&D along with long hours devoted to perfecting the design and test the function of the product. Overall, we feel confident in the product we have created. Regardless of risks, our team is made up of open-minded scholars ready to overcome any obstacles in our path.
  • If needed, we will rework our design to optimise user experience & customer satisfaction.

The FreeFloater allows easy gear storage, acts as a float with its buoyant bag material, has an insulated fish compartment, dry storage, a fresh water supply and a fish ruler. These features make our product more versatile and applicable to more than just diving. Jake actually made this solution for himself with a boogie board and a cooler just to solve his troubles on the water temporarily. We really believe in the product and more so the solution. The $10,000 we are seeking will be used to create the product and fund the initial round of manufacturing. Any additional funds will be allocated towards furthering the research and development of our product as well as marketing and branding the product. We really believe in the FreeFloater and know it can change the way we enjoy the water today.

For contributions in the amount of $10,000: backers will enjoy a trip to sunny South Florida for a weekend beach dive extravaganza !
If we don't reach our entire goal, we will bring the product to the market as best as possible. Ultimately we will find a way to make this dream come true.

Our product revolutionises beach diving. The FreeFloater allows consumers to approach the water hands-free with all their equipment strapped onto the bag. With this product on the market, consumers will have more options and be able to get more use out of just one product versus multiple products (float, flag, cooler).

Overall, we feel confident in the product we have created. Regardless of risks, our team is made up of open-minded scholars ready to overcome any obstacles in our path.
If needed, we will rework our design to optimise user experience & customer satisfaction.

story:
About this project

*NOTE* Nespresso is a registered trade mark owned by Société des Produits Nestlé SA. "Our brand SIPPY is not connected or associated in any way to Nestle S.A. or Nespresso"

Coffee Aficionados Rejoice! For Sippy is here to save your day. 

Start the day with a coffee to get your active lifestyle going. Whether you're out and about on foot, bike, car, train, or any other transportation, Sippy can brew you an instant espresso with a press of a button.


Sippy - the espresso maker on the go from Fikra Design brews a full bodied espresso whatever the situation, every time. A fab addition to any occasion, whether it be a full packed day out of the office, a camping trip, group hike or whenever you fancy getting your caffeine / decaf fix!

The beauty of Sippy is that it is completely mechanical and does not have any electronic or moving parts, therefore the use of a battery or charging is not needed ever!

The perfect travel companion, which can be carried in any handbag, backpack or suitcase.

No espresso machine in site? Well, Sippy can now become your best buddy on any trip out of the office or home.

Brew an instant espresso with a press of a button and even mix it up by adding milk to make your favourite latte / cappuccino.

In less than 1 minute, you will have yourself a full bodied aromatic espresso with a delicious, rich velvety 'creme' top.


All you need is hot water, a CO2 cartridge and your favourite espresso capsule (compatible with Nespresso capsules).

Looks great in any setting and can feature at home or at the office.

Carrying Sippy looks good and is a breeze due to its light and compact body.

Having a sleek pen like profile allows the water to flow through the body, under compressed CO2 gas to maximise the aromatic flavour of your espresso and in turn creating a rich velvety 'creme' top.

Easy open / close screw top body gives quick access to the CO2 chamber (holds 1 x 12g CO2 Cartridge, enough for 5-6 espressos).

A small and discreet release valve is located below.

Can't leave home without my Sippy!!


In our workshop:


Compatible coffee capsules for Sippy:


Compatible CO2 Cartridges for Sippy:

Sippy takes 1 cartridge at a time - 12gram non threaded CO2 cartridge which can be purchased online or through your local supermarket / DIY store.

1 cartridge is enough for approximately 7 - 8 espressos sized between 25 to 35ml.


TIMELINE,

APR, MAY, JUN - indiegogo campaign.

JUN- Order raw materials.

JUN - Drawings to be drafted for manufacturing.

JUL, AUG - Production.

SEP - Sippy to be shipped to all indiegogo backers.

We are seeking the help of the indiegogo community to bring Sippy into your hands. We need funding to purchase tooling for mass production, which will drive costs down for each Sippy manufactured and make it affordable for consumers.

Thanks so much for your support and generosity.

Risks and challenges

We have tried to keep the project as simple as can be. Designing Sippy has been fairly interesting and didn't unfold without it's challanges. The risks and challenges for the project are fairly low as we have already gone through the stages of motion for production and ironed out any problems with the product.

When going through the full production run, we will need to keep on top of quality control, which I will be overseeing personally, to ensure that every Sippy is up to the highest quality standards and meets every backers expectation.

story:
We believe that you should always be comfortable, wherever you go.  Over the past year we have worked hard to design and develop the Air Lounge.  Whether you are relaxing on the beach, hiking through the mountains, or just hanging out by the pool with friends, the Air Lounge is the perfect solution for quick, easy, comfort on the go. Relax anywhere, adventure everywhere.  

 

Check it out in action with no wind.

Any Model. Any Color. 

Air Retention Mechanism

The Air Retention Mechanism technology reduces the amount of air leaked while inflating the Air Lounge. This makes it easy to inflate with no wind!

 

***All features mentioned above come equipped on all models***

 

 

Check out the King Special Feature in action:

 

If you have any other questions shoot us a message at info@air-lounge.us

1. Can I buy more than one Air Lounge per model?

Of course! Just choose the model or bundle you want to get and we will send out a survey following the campaign in which you can add additional items to your order.

2. When can I choose the color of my Air Lounge?

You will be able to choose your color during the survey that will be sent out after the campaign has ended.

3. Is it possible to buy replacement inlays?

Yep! You can add replacement inlays to your order in the survey phase that will be sent out after the campaign.

4. Which accessories are included?

You will get:

1x Backpack to carry your Air Lounge

1x Anchor peg to secure your Air Lounge on windy days

1x User Manual

5. Do you ship worldwide?

Yes. As soon as we have shipped your order, we will send you your tracking number to check the status of your shipment. Shipments that cannot be delivered due to an inaccurate address (including failure to update an old address) will have additional costs to be reshipped.

Please be aware that our prices do not include VAT, GST, duties or any other applicable country tax. As these can vary widely from country to country, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST for each location through Indiegogo.

Due to the size of the packaging, we cannot ship to PO Boxes.

6. Can the Air Lounge be used to float?

The Air Lounge is not a swimming aid and not certified to be used on water.

7. Why order now?

We are offering incredible discounts on all pre-orders of Air Lounge’s in return for your support. We will process shipments in the order that we receive them. Backers who pre-order through this campaign will receive their Air Lounge from our very first production batch that has been fully tested.

I am Jessica Breed, the founder of Kidventurez and the lead Vagabond Adventurer.  Every possible moment my sons and I get out of the house and off the grid together. These trips have created a million beautiful memories. We are on a mission to help other families create their perfect trip, get outside, experience adventure together, and explore together!

 

 

Kidventurez lets families instantly design their perfect trip

story:
Most bags are just big open spaces that don't help you get organized and stay organized. Even bags with many different compartments are often just confusing and end up adding more stress to your trip. And none of the options make it very easy to access anything during travel.

 

The Halton Commuter backpack is the most innovative, organized, and stress free bag on the market. With it's ability to completely unzip for easy packing and access, and the option to hang to easily see all your items, it becomes the most versatile, useful backpack ever. After trying the Commuter backpack you will find it difficult to live without.

 

Risks and challenges

We have worked tirelessly to find the best partners in manufacturing, marketing, and distribution to give our customers the best possible experience with Halton. We recognize that there are often unexpected events in life and we are committed to doing right by our customers should any such event occur. We will do all that we can to ensure it’s successful production and delivery, and keep you informed along the way. Thank you so much for your support!

story:
The unique patented  design allows the user to wear the hood as if it were stitched into whatever top garment you choose. Comfortable and warm dual chest/back flaps fit flush underneath your shirt and provide EXTREME warmth while the outer nylon shell provides a second barrier that tightens down on the outer jacket. 

Even keeps sand and dirt out with goggles! We here at Exteme Hood have been testing this product for over 20 years and have not found anything that competes with the Extreme Hood's ability to provide warmth inside and out.

Other shells and masks may minimally protect against wind but seep snow and water into your jacket making your inner clothing wet and uncomfortable. If you fall in deep snow, skiing or snowboarding,cross country or you simply are out in the elements for extended periods of time for work or pleasure:

"Extreme Hood - it'll stop the cold for Good"

Our campaign needs $28,000 for materials, sewing and shipping of our first major run - 500 blue (400 regular+100 large) and 500 grey (400 regular+100 large).  We have produced 5 small sample runs to date with this manufacturer.

 

Our expected list price is set at $128, but for this campaign the cost is $88.  

Many friends have asked for headphones, communications, emergency transponders and that would be great, we absolutely agree, but first things first.  If we get 10 times more than our goal we will pole each buyer for their top 3 wishes and choose a winner.  That perk may have to be sent after initial ExtremeHood delivery.

While I cannot predict the future, I can state this product has been tested by me and my family and close friends for over 20 years and is durable, reliable and folds into a great bundle you can throw like a football. 

 

So please help us extend ExtremeHood to a larger, warmer group of family and friends.

 

 

Sincerely,

 

Michael A. Nevins

Chief Scientist

ExtremeHood
story_txt: The unique patented  design allows the user to wear the hood as if it were stitched into whatever top garment you choose. Comfortable and warm dual chest/back flaps fit flush underneath your shirt and provide EXTREME warmth while the outer nylon shell provides a second barrier that tightens down on the outer jacket. Even keeps sand and dirt out with goggles! We here at Exteme Hood have been testing this product for over 20 years and have not found anything that competes with the Extreme Hood's ability to provide warmth inside and out.Other shells and masks may minimally protect against wind but seep snow and water into your jacket making your inner clothing wet and uncomfortable. If you fall in deep snow, skiing or snowboarding,cross country or you simply are out in the elements for extended periods of time for work or pleasure:"Extreme Hood - it'll stop the cold for Good"Our campaign needs $28,000 for materials, sewing and shipping of our first major run - 500 blue (400 regular+100 large) and 500 grey (400 regular+100 large).  We have produced 5 small sample runs to date with this manufacturer. Our expected list price is set at $128, but for this campaign the cost is $88.  Many friends have asked for headphones, communications, emergency transponders and that would be great, we absolutely agree, but first things first.  If we get 10 times more than our goal we will pole each buyer for their top 3 wishes and choose a winner.  That perk may have to be sent after initial ExtremeHood delivery.While I cannot predict the future, I can state this product has been tested by me and my family and close friends for over 20 years and is durable, reliable and folds into a great bundle you can throw like a football.  So please help us extend ExtremeHood to a larger, warmer group of family and friends.  Sincerely, Michael A. NevinsChief ScientistExtremeHood

story:
We are Reigh (they, them) and Katie Ring (she/her), and we are so grateful you are ready to make Golden Gaze Bed & Breakfast come to life!

Our vision is simple: Sustainability, accessibility, and inclusivity. 

We want to create the type of deeply healing, eco-friendly vacation retreat that we have always been looking for. Golden Gaze is a unique, adults-only, farm-to-table B&B in Western Canada's beautiful mountain ranges, that will invite a deeper connection both to yourself and the world around you.

We will create a uniquely restorative environment, by combining:

  • Nourishing features like a farm-to-table, homemade breakfast and snacks
  • Optional packages for self- and relationship- coaching using the Enneagram
  • Sustainable dome style cabins to feel truly a part of nature
  • Relaxing and nature inspired amenities (see below)

Whether you're interested in a romantic getaway, or looking for a place to reconnect with yourself, search no further than Golden Gaze B&B for the refreshing oasis of your dreams.

​Our vision for Golden Gaze stands upon 5 core values:

Because our B&B would be built upon the above values and Anti-Oppression practices, we would be diligent in maintaining a healthy, beneficial relationship to the Ktunaxa people Indigenous to the area as well as other locals, to ensure we are helpful and in good standing with our new community and environment.

To read how we will embed these core values into the creation of Golden Gaze, CLICK HERE!

 

We are Reigh (they, them) and Katie Ring (she/her), the future owners and Golden Gays of Golden Gaze! Dreaming of a world that is more inclusive, accessible, and sustainable, we decided to build it ourselves.

We have been married since 2014 and have a sweet love story, plus a little bit more about each of us and the expertise that we would bring to Golden Gaze, which you can read here!

 

 

 

Amenities:

  • Four- 1-Bed/1-Bath, king sized bed cabins of Green Magic Home Dome Houses 
  • Roheenee's Hippie Haven, a designated smoking space
  • ​Woodburning sauna
  • Lake for canoeing, swimming, and ice skating
  • Mini-market with artisans from QTBIPOC and other local crafters
  • Hammocks at each unit and across the property
  • Yoga/Meditation Sanctuary 
  • Farm-to-table style breakfast
  • Midday munchies served daily
  • Botanical facial steam bar
  • Outdoor gazebo perfect for lounging or outdoor events
  • Luxury spa level, artisan crafted toiletries
  • Fully physically accessible cabins, communal spaces, and amenities 
  • Charcoal grill 
  • Wine and bevies for purchase in communal space
  • Homemade meal kits for purchase
  • Communal dining and lounge space, available for event rental
  • Wifi access
  • Block off days for our sober guests

 

Local Activities:

  • Water-Rafting
  • Hiking
  • Canoe/Kayaking
  • Horseback Riding
  • Parasailing 
  • Skiing/Snowboarding
  • Wildlife interactive centers
  • Mountain biking, and a new adaptive, inclusive trail
  • Read more about what Golden has to offer here!
     

We are seeking $300,000 CAD of funding to be able to secure a loan with traditional funders, but have a total need of $2.5 Million CAD, ($1.9 Million USD or roughly 0.0009% of Jeff Bezos' net worth.)

We believe in having community investment for the future we would like to see, especially for a place that was intentionally built with community accessibility over profit in mind.

In short, if only 30k people gave $10 CAD today, we could begin construction on this oasis! 

For transparency, we encourage everyone to check out our financial breakdown, which includes  expenses for construction, fixtures, furniture, and all other costs we have predicted. Please click here. 

                                        

                         

 

Because Golden Gaze is in the concept stages, we are offering a mix of perks that are redeemable once we reach our goal, and once we are built. Prices listed in $CAD

 

  • Redeemable upon meeting funding goal:
    • Personalized postcard from Golden, B.C. to say thank you and encourage you to come visit when you can!
    • Various guided meditations and Enneagram coaching packages with Katie Ring; a certified Deep Coaching Practitioner, with 15 years of Enneagram experience.
  • Redeemable later:
    • Be the among first to enjoy Golden Gaze with pre-paid bookings!
    • Opportunity to rent out the whole place for a private getaway, wedding, or retreat!
    • Luggage tag for 10% off all future stays
    • The opportunity to name a section of Golden Gaze--from a garden bed to our private lake, be a part of the legacy we are building!

If we aren't successful:

  • If we aren't lucky enough to fund Golden Gaze through this campaign, funds will be returned to backers, so there's very low risk to investing today.
  • If your money is returned, we hope you consider redistributing it to an Anti-Oppression related cause, mutual aid, or grassroots organization in your local community.
     

There aren't a whole lot of vacation spots owned and operated by Queer and/or Racialized people. Most of the hospitality industry, especially in the travel & tourism sector, has been dominated by people with more social power. 

While we know we can create an environment that would be safe for everyone to enjoy and thrive in, we haven't received the same treatment in return from the majority of vacation rental spots we've been to.

We have been inspired by the way a few select B&B and hostel owners have created warm and nurturing environments for us as a couple over the years and have had enough experiences to know that they were the exceptions to the rule.

Vacations should be restorative, and full of opportunities to feel treated and cared for. We want to make a place where anyone can come and feel treated well, which is why we are also explicitly affirming for Queer/Trans, Racialized, Disabled, Fat and/or Polyam folks, so everyone feels freer to connect deeply to themselves, their partner(s), and the natural world around us.  

Supporting our vision for Golden Gaze B&B means you're supporting a place of healing, transformation, and connection for everyone. It means you're investing in Queer and Black businesses, and helping create a world that is a healthier, more vibrant place for everyone to enjoy and thrive in. 

 To make Golden Gaze come to life it will have to be because people believe in it and want to see more places like this exist. We know we aren't alone! There are thousands of Queer, Racialized, and/or Disabled folks who have a dream just like ours.  When our campaign is successful, we commit to helping those with similar dreams come to life in return, and have already been cross-promoting other community oriented projects, artisans, and healers.
 

As any new business or enterprise comes with risks and challenges, we are prepared to face whatever may try and get in the way of realizing our dream.

While owning a business that involves housing people might have other maintenance challenges down the road, there are very few challenges we foresee impacting our ability to open an amazing and affirming B&B.

The biggest challenge we have anticipated is the initial funding--which is why you are here! As a young, Queer, Interracial couple, who has predominantly worked in the non-profit and hospitality industries, we have gained the years of experience necessary to manage a successful business, and gained none of the financial capital that is typically rewarded to people who pursue more capitalism-driven industries and/or those who have other privileges that involve wealth. 

Second, is securing the land. The location of Golden, B.C. is idyllic, and tourism has seen a noticeable increase (~7% annually) in the last few years. While there are many beautiful properties available in Golden, B.C, we have our eyes set on a 40+ acre property just a short drive from Golden. We have the funds secured to pay for a down-payment on this land, but didn't want to purchase a property without knowing if we'd be able to fund the remainder of building. Once we reach our funding goal, we will be able to go forward with land acquisition. There are many properties available nearby, so we are confident this will not be a problem in going forward with this location. But just in case, we are encouraging people to back the vision, not the specific location in case we have to move our project elsewhere in the mountains. 

The last challenge is delayed paperwork. The housing we would provide would be made of sustainable resources using Green Magic Homes, creating both a unique looking, eco-friendly, and long-lasting environment. With sustainability being a top priority, our utilities will be run on renewable energy sources to ensure a more cohesive relationship with our environment. Green magic homes is certified to build in 30+ countries, including the USA, Mexico, and many South American and European nations. The permit process for Canada has been slower due to Covid-19, but they are confident they will have the final necessary approvals to build soon. Should there be any further delays, we will diligently update our backers. Because we would be the first in Canada to build Green Magic Homes, this gives you the opportunity to be among the very first to stay in this unique housing! To read more about Green Magic Homes projects and building certifications, click here. 

Understandably, not everyone is in the position to help out from a financial perspective.

One of the best things you can do is help us spread the word and reach more people than we would have on our own. 

Consider sharing this cause to your social media and/or people in your circles to encourage investment in Queer and Racialized people's dreams and futures!

Link here: https://linktr.ee/GoldenGazeBnB

If only 250k people gave 10$ CAD today, roughly the equivalent of 0.0009% of Jeff Bezos' net worth, we could be funded outright, be able to avoid using traditional funders like banks and be up and running in less than one year. 250k people is less than how many attended the USA's 45th President's inauguration, so we know how few of people we need to reach to make this dream come to reality! Please help us by spreading the word! 

Thank you to all who read about, contributed towards, and encouraged the Golden Gaze dream. We can't wait to host you with all of our gratitude. 

--Reigh and Katie Ring

Illustrations by Ellen Flocke

story:
Eco Earth Citizen

The Eco Earth board game is just the beginning. We are willing to create a website platform for everyone who stand in aware of global warming. We believe that there are many benefits of reducing greenhouse gas emissions. Government, business, community, households and individuals are all helping. Everyone’s efforts can make a difference.

It is now more profitable than ever to be green. The profit we can make from the solutions is greater than the profit from the problems. We reverse global warming then we make the profit, because it’s less expensive, more beneficial and more jobs.

There are 4.6 billion people are aware of global warming. The median of people perceiving it as a threat were 47%. If we were one nation, we would be bigger than 28 nations in the Europe union. We would also be bigger than 31 developed countries together.

They estimate that, right now, more than 7,000 cities from 133 countries and 6,000 companies with at least $36 trillion in revenue have pledged to take climate action, but this is far beyond that target. Global greenhouse gas emissions need to drop by 55% by 2030, according to the UN. With over 500,000 publicly traded companies worldwide, there are many more that can take steps that cumulatively would have a significant impact on the gap.

We need do something together.

We will create a platform for everybody to talk and discuss then action. This place can create green projects come to life and will help achieve our target.

Our goal is to let 4.6 billion people get involved and create new green businesses, new green jobs, new projects and perform the duties of a good citizen in the Eco Earth community.

Now is the moment to let ecoearthcitizen.com come to life.

Welcome to join us.

 

Climate change is real

According to Climate NASA, there are more than nine evidences for rapid climate change:

Global Temperature Rise

Warming Oceans

Shrinking Ice Sheets

Glacial Retreat

Decreased Snow Cover

Sea Level Rise

Declining Arctic Sea Ice

Extreme Events

Ocean Acidification

We cannot wait for someone do it for us. We need to do it ourselves and do it together, because this is our home, a beautiful planet.

 

Board Game

The Eco Earth board game is a knowledge for climate change and to learn how to solve the problems. The more you help the more prizes you’ll get the more prizes you get the faster you’ll win!

Ages 8+ 

2-4 players

Suitable for children, adults, travelers, parties, communities, schools, public places………. etc.

Contents:

1 Game board, 1 spinner, 4 characters, 8 problem cards, 8 solution cards, 8 action cards, 4 clime change cards, 20 citizen board meeting projects, carbon credit award pack, and game guide. 

Game board

 

8 Problem Cards

Cover

 

Problem 1

Over the last 250 years we have burned over 1.4 trillion tons of carbon into the atmosphere.

Problem 2

We look at the rising seas and melting Polar Caps. Those are evidence of climate change.

 

Problem 3

The impacts of the climate change: Substantial melting of the ice sheets, rise in sea level, permanent droughts in mid-latitudes and the list goes on.

 

Problem 4

Catastrophe would be melting the major ice sheets: the Greenland ice sheet and the West Antarctic sheet, as all the major coastal cities of the world are flooded.

 

Problem 5

When the ice sheets melt, we get less land. We’ve got environmental refugees.

People leaving the tropics because it’s getting too hot for human habitation, it’s getting too hot for agriculture.

 

Problem 6

When the world gets less land, less food, less water and more people, that’s a recipe for national security disaster.

 

Problem 7

The threshold is somewhere around six to seven hundred parts per million CO2. That’s warm enough to melt all the ice land and ice in the planet and we have about 80 meters higher sea level.

 

Problem 8

Scientist’s predictions are coming true sooner than expected. We are tragically suffering through severe storms, droughts, floods and fires, these would be more intense and unpredictable.

 

8 Solution Cards

Cover

 

Solution 1

 

The current climate crisis is a problem we’ve created, but it is also a problem we can fix. There are only two things we can do about the atmosphere: 1. Stop putting greenhouse gases in the air. 2. Bring CO2 down.

Solution 2

To stop putting greenhouse gases in the air, we can do it by conservation, energy efficiency and clean energy.

Solution 3

To bring CO2 down, we can do by through photosynthesis, whether it’s on land, on farms, on forest, phytoplankton, kelp in the oceans.

Solution 4

The purpose of Drawdown: If we had modelled the 80 solutions would scale to the point where could reverse global warming within 30 years going from reduce to reverse.

Solution 5

If we increase the rate that we’re scaling some of the solutions, then we could achieve Drawdown at 2050.

Solution 6

If we were to see ourselves as helpers who could help the helpers heal this planet, we begin to realize that all of us are somehow connected to little bits of the solution.

Solution 7

When we talk about transforming the climate. This cannot happen overnight, but we do have to start now. Now is the time. You and me, everybody.

Solution 8

We will create an Eco Earth Citizen for everybody to join and have your say for all the solutions we can do straight away.

 

8 Action Cards

Cover

 

Action 1

Support Reforest. Redwoods can absorb more carbon than any other forest type on the planet. Redwoods store carbon by absorbing carbon from carbon dioxide out of the air into its needles, trunk, roots and branches.

Action 2

Use renewable energy like solar, wind, rain, tide, waves, geothermal heat and rocket math heater in four important areas: electricity generation, air and water heating/cooling, transportation and off-grid energy services.

 

Action 3

Grow our own food. One urban farm sequesters the CO2 of 7 family cars.

Action 4

Growing kelp or seaweed which sequester five times more carbon than land-based plants. Those are zero inputs, no need of fresh water, no need to be fed, no need of fertilizer and land. This is one of the most sustainable businesses.

Action 5

Grow all kinds of seaweed in 500,000 km2 ocean could feed the world and create 50 million jobs and sequester the equivalent carbon of 20 million cars. There are 10,000 edible plants in the ocean.

Action 6

Direct air capture machine. Direct air capture is a machine that takes in ambient air and extracts the CO2 from the air. 

Action 7

It is now more profitable than ever to be green. The profit we can make from the solutions is greater than the profit from the problems. We reverse global warming then we make the profit, because it’s less expensive, more beneficial and more jobs.


Action 8

Be an Eco Earth Citizen now.

4 Climate Change Cards

Cover

Climate Change 1

You always support Action 1

Collect $500 carbon credit from bank when someone action Action 1

Climate Change 2

You always support Action 3

Collect $500 carbon credit from bank when someone action Action 3

Climate Change 3

You always support Action 5

Collect $500 carbon credit from bank when someone action Action 5

Climate Change 4

You always support Action 8

Collect $500 carbon credit from bank when someone action Action 8

 

.... and much more.

 

 

Risk & Challenges

Although this is our first time to participate in the Indiegogo campaign, we have enough confidence. the product design is straight forward and production is no stranger to us. We believe that our experienced team can well mitigate all potential risks in this journey. 

When do we start shipping?

Estimated delivery of our first products will be shipped from our local factory in January 2020.

Do you offer Warranty ? 

Yes, we offer 1 years Limited warranty against factory defects. 

Why is my board game spec’d with a component that differs from that listed on your site?

The board game is still in its prototype stage, so some components are subject to change if we find better, more suitable replacements. Once past this stage, we will continue to reserve the right to switch components for ones equal or higher in value. The purpose of this is to ensure that the customer continues to get the best value board game for the price. 

Additional questions? 
Contact us at hello@ecoearthcitizen.com
