Global greenhouse gas emissions need to drop by 55% by 2030, according to the UN. With over 500,000 publicly traded companies worldwide, there are many more that can take steps that cumulatively would have a significant impact on the gap.We need do something together.We will create a platform for everybody to talk and discuss then action. This place can create green projects come to life and will help achieve our target.Our goal is to let 4.6 billion people get involved and create new green businesses, new green jobs, new projects and perform the duties of a good citizen in the Eco Earth community.Now is the moment to let ecoearthcitizen.com come to life.Welcome to join us. Climate change is realAccording to Climate NASA, there are more than nine evidences for rapid climate change:Global Temperature RiseWarming OceansShrinking Ice SheetsGlacial RetreatDecreased Snow CoverSea Level RiseDeclining Arctic Sea IceExtreme EventsOcean AcidificationWe cannot wait for someone do it for us. We need to do it ourselves and do it together, because this is our home, a beautiful planet. Board GameThe Eco Earth board game is a knowledge for climate change and to learn how to solve the problems. The more you help the more prizes you’ll get the more prizes you get the faster you’ll win!Ages 8+ 2-4 playersSuitable for children, adults, travelers, parties, communities, schools, public places………. etc.Contents:1 Game board, 1 spinner, 4 characters, 8 problem cards, 8 solution cards, 8 action cards, 4 clime change cards, 20 citizen board meeting projects, carbon credit award pack, and game guide. Game board 8 Problem CardsCover Problem 1Over the last 250 years we have burned over 1.4 trillion tons of carbon into the atmosphere.Problem 2We look at the rising seas and melting Polar Caps. Those are evidence of climate change. Problem 3The impacts of the climate change: Substantial melting of the ice sheets, rise in sea level, permanent droughts in mid-latitudes and the list goes on. Problem 4Catastrophe would be melting the major ice sheets: the Greenland ice sheet and the West Antarctic sheet, as all the major coastal cities of the world are flooded. Problem 5When the ice sheets melt, we get less land. We’ve got environmental refugees.People leaving the tropics because it’s getting too hot for human habitation, it’s getting too hot for agriculture. Problem 6When the world gets less land, less food, less water and more people, that’s a recipe for national security disaster. Problem 7The threshold is somewhere around six to seven hundred parts per million CO2. That’s warm enough to melt all the ice land and ice in the planet and we have about 80 meters higher sea level. Problem 8Scientist’s predictions are coming true sooner than expected. We are tragically suffering through severe storms, droughts, floods and fires, these would be more intense and unpredictable. 8 Solution CardsCover Solution 1 The current climate crisis is a problem we’ve created, but it is also a problem we can fix. There are only two things we can do about the atmosphere: 1. Stop putting greenhouse gases in the air. 2. Bring CO2 down.Solution 2To stop putting greenhouse gases in the air, we can do it by conservation, energy efficiency and clean energy.Solution 3To bring CO2 down, we can do by through photosynthesis, whether it’s on land, on farms, on forest, phytoplankton, kelp in the oceans.Solution 4The purpose of Drawdown: If we had modelled the 80 solutions would scale to the point where could reverse global warming within 30 years going from reduce to reverse.Solution 5If we increase the rate that we’re scaling some of the solutions, then we could achieve Drawdown at 2050.Solution 6If we were to see ourselves as helpers who could help the helpers heal this planet, we begin to realize that all of us are somehow connected to little bits of the solution.Solution 7When we talk about transforming the climate. This cannot happen overnight, but we do have to start now. Now is the time. You and me, everybody.Solution 8We will create an Eco Earth Citizen for everybody to join and have your say for all the solutions we can do straight away. 8 Action CardsCover Action 1Support Reforest. Redwoods can absorb more carbon than any other forest type on the planet. Redwoods store carbon by absorbing carbon from carbon dioxide out of the air into its needles, trunk, roots and branches.Action 2Use renewable energy like solar, wind, rain, tide, waves, geothermal heat and rocket math heater in four important areas: electricity generation, air and water heating/cooling, transportation and off-grid energy services. Action 3Grow our own food. One urban farm sequesters the CO2 of 7 family cars.Action 4Growing kelp or seaweed which sequester five times more carbon than land-based plants. Those are zero inputs, no need of fresh water, no need to be fed, no need of fertilizer and land. This is one of the most sustainable businesses.Action 5Grow all kinds of seaweed in 500,000 km2 ocean could feed the world and create 50 million jobs and sequester the equivalent carbon of 20 million cars. There are 10,000 edible plants in the ocean.Action 6Direct air capture machine. Direct air capture is a machine that takes in ambient air and extracts the CO2 from the air. Action 7It is now more profitable than ever to be green. The profit we can make from the solutions is greater than the profit from the problems. We reverse global warming then we make the profit, because it’s less expensive, more beneficial and more jobs.
Action 8
Be an Eco Earth Citizen now.4 Climate Change CardsCoverClimate Change 1You always support Action 1Collect $500 carbon credit from bank when someone action Action 1Climate Change 2You always support Action 3Collect $500 carbon credit from bank when someone action Action 3Climate Change 3You always support Action 5Collect $500 carbon credit from bank when someone action Action 5Climate Change 4You always support Action 8Collect $500 carbon credit from bank when someone action Action 8 .... and much more.  Risk & ChallengesAlthough this is our first time to participate in the Indiegogo campaign, we have enough confidence. the product design is straight forward and production is no stranger to us. We believe that our experienced team can well mitigate all potential risks in this journey. When do we start shipping?Estimated delivery of our first products will be shipped from our local factory in January 2020.Do you offer Warranty ? Yes, we offer 1 years Limited warranty against factory defects. Why is my board game spec’d with a component that differs from that listed on your site?The board game is still in its prototype stage, so some components are subject to change if we find better, more suitable replacements. Once past this stage, we will continue to reserve the right to switch components for ones equal or higher in value. The purpose of this is to ensure that the customer continues to get the best value board game for the price. Additional questions? Contact us at hello@ecoearthcitizen.com

story:
Who Are We and What Do We Do?

Move It or Lose It was founded in 2016 with the goal to provide a simple fun way to incentivize people to get off the couch, get out and live their lives in a safe, healthy way. Our products are designed to promote safe driving, healthy competition and physical fitness, and provide incentive for people to continue practicing those habits.

With our first product, the Drive It to Win mobile app, you compete against other drivers for a chance to win cash and prizes. Our app calculates the ideal time it takes for your chosen route. All you have to do is get there closer to the ideal time than the other competitors and you could win!

Compete against anyone, anywhere, anytime!

Target times are based on speed limits and current traffic conditions and there is no phone interaction required while driving. Paying attention to your driving and driving safely, with traffic, results in your best chance of winning. If you're speeding and day dreaming that's a sure fire way to come in last!

Learn more at www.driveittowin.com

Why Help Us?

By contributing to our campaign, you'll be helping us to bring fun back to the morning commute and help relieve the stresses associated with it.

In addition, you'll be helping us turn more commuters into safer drivers and hopefully reduce the number of traffic related injuries and deaths.

What We Need

We need your help in two ways:

  1. Your funding contributions will be used to complete our security testing, add customer retention features (to keep users coming back and driving safe), and to finish development of our IOS version and backend administration features.
  2. We need your feedback. We need a select group of early users who are passionate about our cause and will test the app and help shape it prior to our full launch.

What You Get

  • All Backers get the satisfaction of knowing that you're contributing to making our roadways safer!
  • All contributions get you early access to the app. You can  compete in unlimited events during beta testing to prefect your skills and be ready to blow away the competition when we go live!
  • Basic Tester Package contributions will get you 1 Entry Fee Tokens, a $1 value, which can be used to compete towards winning cash prizes when we go live!
  • Premium Tester Package contributions will get you 10 Entry Fee Tokens, a $10 value, which can be used to compete towards winning cash prizes when we go live!
  • Bronze Tester Package contributions will get you 60 Entry Fee Tokens, a $60 value, which can be used to compete towards winning cash prizes when we go live!
  • Silver Tester Package contributions will get you 250 Entry Fee Tokens, a $250 value, which can be used to compete towards winning cash prizes when we go live!
  • Gold Tester Package contributions will get you 550 Entry Fee Tokens, a $550 value, which can be used to compete towards winning cash prizes when we go live!

NOTE: Cash prizes are not available in Arizona, Delaware, Iowa, Louisiana and Montana. Some additional country restrictions may apply. 

Current Project Status?

We are currently about 90% through our android development, which is fully funded, and we expect to be completed in late May 2017. IOS development is at about 75% and expected to complete in Late June. With your help, we can quickly get through our security testing and get the app in your hands so you can provide feedback for the finishing touches.

Risks & Challenges

We've come a long way since the original idea was hatched. We want to make sure that our app is fair and safe for everyone. Our biggest risk right now getting the right business logic and fraud prevention measures in place to ensure no one can "cheat the system".

Other Ways You Can Help

We welcome any level of contribution you can provide. We understand that not everyone is in a position to contribute monetarily. If you believe in our cause and in our product, whether you contribute funding or not, please help us get the word out and share this campaign with your friends and family.   The more people we can reach, the safer our roads will be.

story:
Summary

We started KOLD Products, LLC with a couple simple ideas in mind when we wanted to create a reusable water bottle. We wanted to help the environment, keep our water cold the entire day (or longer), have a design that's appealing and easy to customize, and have an  easy carrying option. 

After 3 years, we believe it has finally arrived. This is the first product we've come up with, but we so many other things ideas for future products that are going to be line with our simple principals. 

Our campaign is going to fund patents, trademarks, and designs for our future innovations that are going be environmentally conscious, made with the highest quality materials, and fairly priced for everyone.    

What We Need & What You Get

We need your help and support! First, help us save the environment! Second, as in all start ups, we need get our feet off the ground. We all have to start somewhere, and this is our beginning point. 

In return for your support, we will get in return a high quality bottle or tumbler with our complete gratitude.

If we reach our goal, we will begin our new designs and products that are sure to astonish.

The Impact

50 BILLION water bottles are used each year around the world. Too many bottles end up in our oceans, landfills, and our streets. Using a reusable bottle is an easy way to do your part.  

Supporting us not only protects the environment, it shows that we can move on from plastic water bottles.

We have been doing for 3 years now. We have changed our design several times, but after getting input from customers, we come up with what you see today. This is truly the highest quality and design you'll find.

We wouldn't promote KOLD if we didn't think it was good for the earth, and designed with consumer's input.

 

The Bottle & Challenges We Overcame

One biggest challenge was finding technology that prevents temperature change for what you put in the bottle. After extensive research, we found that vacuum insulation was the best way. With vacuum insulation, air is removed between the bottle walls. With no air, the transfer of heat or cold doesn't penetrate the inside of the bottle. That keeps everything inside the temperature consistent. 

We also had to overcome a problem of odor and taste transfer. We know people don't just want to put water in the bottle. There coffee, soup, juice, etc. We searched for just the right steel to prevent the odor and taste sticking to the bottle. We found it in 18/8 stainless steel. Other bottles just don't keep this simple concept in mind.

The design of bottle and lid was also a challenge. We knew that we wanted to make it easier to customize without making additional purchases. That why we came up with one bottle that includes 5 different colored sleeves. You choose your color for the day, and switch it out whenever you want.

The carabiner lid is our signature lid. We knew we wanted diverse ways to carry a bottle. The more options in ways to carry the bottle, the more likely people are going to use it. The carabiner lid let you clip your bottle onto a backpack, purse, or anything you can think of.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help us out with this campaign, we understand. We are working to have our products at a price everyone can easily afford. But if you can't get a bottle, please help by RECYCLING AND ENJOY THE OUTDOORS!

story:
Short Summary

The bidet (also called a Lota) is, for all intents and purposes, superior to toilet paper when it comes to cleaning yourself in the bathroom. The facts are clear:

  • Using a bidet is more hygienic than using toilet paper
  • Using a bidet is eco-friendly
  • Using a bidet is cost-effective

  Introducing the GoLota:

Product Features:

The GoLota features a collapsable silicone top that allows it to fold small enough to fit in the smallest of spaces.  Supported by its sturdy base, the GoLota can hold up to 2 liters of water.  The GoLota will come with a carrying case that will allow it to be separated from your belongings and make it convenient to carry.

 

 

               

 

The Impact

The majority of people in the world use water when they go the bathroom. However, there are still countries, such as the United States, where bidets are little-heard-of. This needs to change, and we believe that GoLota can be the way forward. Convenient and collapsible, GoLota offers all the benefits of a bidet, in addition to being perfect for travel.

What We Need & What You Get

We have come to you, in order to raise the funds that we need to bring GoLota to market. Our current goal is $10,000, and every dollar that we raise toward that goal helps us tremendously. To say thank-you, we have put together some enticing rewards for our contributors, including major discounts on GoLota itself!

                                

Other Ways You Can Help

We would love everyone's help - which doesn't all have to be monetary.  Please share our project via social media to your friends and family to let them know of our product and vision.

story:
Help me create the perfect vacation spot

My name is Herb Reinhard. For over twenty years I have dreamed of an organic farm where people can vacation with their families and have a great time.

I have worked hard in the last six years to save money for the farm. I recently sold a successful remodeling business and was able to buy the perfect farm!

The farm has million dollar views and has water so clean, you can drink right out of the creeks on the farm. ( By the way, there are two creeks like that on the farm.) It is located on the northern most Fjord in northern Patagonia. 

I know it might sound like  a cliché, but Patagonia is truly a magical place. It is one of the last unspoiled areas in the world and it is incredibly beautiful. It really should be on your bucket list to visit.

This is what you see from the farm.

Looking over the farm. Makes you  just want to sit down and relax.

The farm also is right on the water so boating and fishing is available at the farm. There is about 750 feet of shoreline. At the top of the farm is a national forest that goes up to the top of a snow capped mountain. It is  near a valley called Cochamo valley which is known as the Yosemite of Chile. When you come to vacation, we can take you there!

Less than twenty miles from the farm are two national parks, Alerce Andino and Hornopiren.  There is also a private park called Parque Tagua Tagua in the area. I'm not great at photography, but I have a few pics of the area for you here. If you look up any of these parks or Cochamo valley on Instagram, you can get  better pics of the area.

Nearby Puelo River. Beautiful and great for catching salmon and trout.

Did I mention the fishing in the area? Within a few miles of the farm is Puelo river. It is known for it's great trout and salmon fishing. There are numerous lakes in the area, that are good for fishing. And of course salt water fishing is also available right at the farm!

One of the first views as you enter Cochamo Valley.

 

Another of the many great views in Cochamo valley.

 One of the lakes near our farm, called Lago Tagua Tagua, is turquoise blue and has a 90 foot waterfall flowing into it that you can kayak under.

Now I want to raise money to build cabins and develop the farm. I want to buy a boat, build a zipline on the farm, buy horses (so you can go horseback riding), other animals and so much more.

If we raise enough money, I would love to have a helicopter and a ride in it would be included with your vacation. In addition, I think it would be really cool to raise enough money to get a submarine for you to take an underwater tour in. I also would love to be able to put on shows in the evening. I think it would be neat to have drama productions, music, maybe a mystery dinner theater, and have movie night under the stars. I want to provide the greatest vacation you have ever had!

A giant Alerce tree in Cochamo valley.

If you can help me raise the money I need, you can get a vacation at a large discount. Help me make my dream come true and I want to share this great place with you!

Do you want to see the farm and surrounding area right now?

To see the farm and area on google earth, go here .

We need to raise at least $75,000 and you can get a great vacation for contributing toward our goal!

I set the initial goal at $75,000 because it will take that much for me to be able to build one cabin and provide what I need to start hosting people at our farm. I made it a fixed goal rather than flexible, because I don't want to take anyone's money unless I know I can deliver on my promises.

I would really like to raise more than that so that I can develop even more things for people to enjoy while vacationing at our farm. I want to be able to serve the best food to my guests.  I want to take people fishing, hiking, horseback riding, sightseeing and much more!

Our featured perk is for you to be able to become a founding member of God's Country. It costs less than $50 and has great benefits! As a founding member you get

-A t-shirt with our logo

-A 2019 calendar, (The calendar will feature views from our farm and surrounding area, Chilean holidays, joke of the week, and quote of the month.)

-$300 off any vacation you book with us 

- Your name on our founding wall to see when you come down

-You will get access to the founding member web page with our latest recipes and how we do things, like build a zip line or ninja course.! 

Any perk that is priced higher than $50 will also include a founding membership. So don't be afraid to choose a higher priced perk if you want to!

Another perk will be a vacation for four people that will be all-inclusive except for the airfare. We will pick you up at the airport and bring you to our farm. We will provide all lodging, food and entertainment for 7 days. We will try to plan things for you that you like to do.

For instance, if you like to fish, your wife likes to relax, and your kids like to hike, we will do our best to accommodate each person in your family to do what they love! We will even provide some child care services if you and your wife just need some alone time. Our goal is to make this the greatest vacation of your life.

When I say we provide your food, I mean that we do all of the cooking. Personally, I love to cook and I have a lot of specialties that I'm confident you will love.These vacations are at a huge discount! (Shoot, buy ten, they make great Christmas gifts!)

I want to build very nice two bedroom, two bath cabins for people to stay in.

I want to raise natural fresh organic food for people to enjoy while they are on the farm. I want to tailor your vacation to your interests while you are here!

If camping and hiking are what you love to do, there is an option for that! You can choose a very reasonably priced vacation to go camping for a week. These vacations are initially for two people, but you can add extra people for only $275 per extra person. We will pick you up at the Puerto Montt airport and bring you to our farm. We will provide you with a tent, sleeping bags, backpacks and other items for camping.

We will also provide your food for the week, but in this option, you can either choose trail type of food or food that you can cook over a campfire. You can stay at the farm or we will take you to your choice of excursions for you to go hiking.

There are two national parks within 15 miles of our farm, there is Cochamo valley nearby which is called the Yosemite of Chile, and Tagua Tagua Park is also nearby. It is a private park that requires advance notice to visit. The whole area is breathtakingly beautiful!

If you are not able to fund a full vacation at this time, you can donate a lessor amount for a huge discount on a vacation later. This discount will not have an expiration date.

We need to enjoy real food again!

I think we have gotten too far away from where our food really comes from. It is my opinion that many of the diseases like cancer and heart disease happen to us because of our American diet. Our food is so full of chemicals and too processed for our bodies to be truly healthy!

By supporting my campaign, you can help me to teach people how good real food can taste. I want to provide a place where people can get back to nature and enjoying all of God's creation in it's purest form. I want to provide food grown right on the farm.

I make the best homemade salsa and guacamole. When you taste it, I think you'll agree!

I've built and sold one successful business. Now I want to build a business of helping people to have a lot of fun, while getting healthy again.

A piece of my delicious fruit pizza sweetened with maple syrup and honey.

Your help with my campaign will make it possible for you and others to enjoy the beauty of nature and to eat some of the healthiest food there is.

Just to prove I was there.

I know I have my work cut out for me.

It will take a couple months of work to build the cabins and get the farm ready. As I mentioned before, I recently sold my remodeling business. I have built houses before and have worked in the construction industry for over 30 years. I am not afraid of working long hours to make sure everything is ready in time.

I am well qualified to build the cabins and other buildings needed. It is my plan to have the farm ready to start hosting vacations by November or December of 2018. That works well because the seasons in Chile are reversed from our seasons. November would be late spring there.

I hope to be able to fulfill all of the vacations for my supporters within the first year. As soon as I know for sure that I can have some cabins ready, I will start scheduling vacations.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to contribute at this time, you can still help. It would help me a lot if you would refer your friends to my campaign! The more people know about this, the more people that can enjoy the beauty of our farm!

Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools listed here. Lets make our farm a place you and your friends can enjoy for a long time!

 

 

FAQ

Is  Chile a safe country for Americans? Chile is quite safe. It is a first world country and the most prosperous country in South America. Crime rates are generally lower than those in the US. The people are very helpful and friendly toward North Americans.

Do I need to be able to speak Spanish? No, we will pick you up at the airport and take you to our farm. Though the native language is Spanish, Chileans work very hard to try to understand what you are trying to say. We can help translate for you if you need to communicate with someone.

Can I buy more than one founding membership? Yes, you will get all of the perks listed for each membership. However, we can only honor one discount per vacation, but you can give or sell your discount to someone else!

What is the best way to get there? I like to use Latam airlines. It is a South American airline and flies out of Miami, Chicago and Washington D.C. The best rates are midweek. If this works best for you, we can adjust your vacation to go from midweek to midweek. Let us know if you need help booking a flight.

What does a plane ticket cost to get down there? Tickets are usually around $1000, give or take $300. When you know the week you want to fly, Latam's website will give you the whole week at a glance so you can pick the days of travel that work best for your budget and schedule. 

Can I pick when I want to come for vacation? For the most part, though it will be subject to availability. We will try to accommodate all of the vacations during the first year. Our plan is to have the first cabins ready by December of 2018. The seasons are reversed in Chile, so December is early summer there.

What is the weather like? The winter months are June, July and August. During those months the temperature can get down to freezing, but it doesn't stay cold for long. The ground doesn't freeze and it stays green year round. The area is a rainy area with more rain in the cooler months. January is the warmest and driest month. It can get up to 85 degrees, but it is seldom real hot. Mornings are usually cool, so bring a light jacket or sweatshirt even in the warmer months.

Is there a hospital near by? Yes, the area is lightly populated, but there is a small modern hospital in Puelo about six miles from the farm. Puerto Montt has a larger hospital, but it is about 2 hours away by car.

If I have additional questions, how do I contact you? You can email me at herbreinhard@godscountry.farm .I will try to respond to all emails within 24 hours. Occasionally, it may take up to 48 hours, but I will respond!

What if I want a refund? If you have made your purchase within the last 10 days, please contact IGG to obtain a refund. If it has been more than 10 days since your purchase please contact us via our email at herbreinhard@godscountry.farm .
story_txt: Help me create the perfect vacation spotMy name is Herb Reinhard. For over twenty years I have dreamed of an organic farm where people can vacation with their families and have a great time.I have worked hard in the last six years to save money for the farm. I recently sold a successful remodeling business and was able to buy the perfect farm!The farm has million dollar views and has water so clean, you can drink right out of the creeks on the farm. ( By the way, there are two creeks like that on the farm.) It is located on the northern most Fjord in northern Patagonia. I know it might sound like  a cliché, but Patagonia is truly a magical place. It is one of the last unspoiled areas in the world and it is incredibly beautiful. It really should be on your bucket list to visit.This is what you see from the farm.Looking over the farm. Makes you  just want to sit down and relax.The farm also is right on the water so boating and fishing is available at the farm. There is about 750 feet of shoreline. At the top of the farm is a national forest that goes up to the top of a snow capped mountain. It is  near a valley called Cochamo valley which is known as the Yosemite of Chile. When you come to vacation, we can take you there!Less than twenty miles from the farm are two national parks, Alerce Andino and Hornopiren.  There is also a private park called Parque Tagua Tagua in the area. I'm not great at photography, but I have a few pics of the area for you here. If you look up any of these parks or Cochamo valley on Instagram, you can get  better pics of the area.Nearby Puelo River. Beautiful and great for catching salmon and trout.Did I mention the fishing in the area? Within a few miles of the farm is Puelo river. It is known for it's great trout and salmon fishing. There are numerous lakes in the area, that are good for fishing. And of course salt water fishing is also available right at the farm!One of the first views as you enter Cochamo Valley. Another of the many great views in Cochamo valley. One of the lakes near our farm, called Lago Tagua Tagua, is turquoise blue and has a 90 foot waterfall flowing into it that you can kayak under.Now I want to raise money to build cabins and develop the farm. I want to buy a boat, build a zipline on the farm, buy horses (so you can go horseback riding), other animals and so much more.If we raise enough money, I would love to have a helicopter and a ride in it would be included with your vacation. In addition, I think it would be really cool to raise enough money to get a submarine for you to take an underwater tour in. I also would love to be able to put on shows in the evening. I think it would be neat to have drama productions, music, maybe a mystery dinner theater, and have movie night under the stars. I want to provide the greatest vacation you have ever had!A giant Alerce tree in Cochamo valley.If you can help me raise the money I need, you can get a vacation at a large discount. Help me make my dream come true and I want to share this great place with you!Do you want to see the farm and surrounding area right now?To see the farm and area on google earth, go here .We need to raise at least $75,000 and you can get a great vacation for contributing toward our goal!I set the initial goal at $75,000 because it will take that much for me to be able to build one cabin and provide what I need to start hosting people at our farm. I made it a fixed goal rather than flexible, because I don't want to take anyone's money unless I know I can deliver on my promises.I would really like to raise more than that so that I can develop even more things for people to enjoy while vacationing at our farm. I want to be able to serve the best food to my guests.  I want to take people fishing, hiking, horseback riding, sightseeing and much more!Our featured perk is for you to be able to become a founding member of God's Country. It costs less than $50 and has great benefits! As a founding member you get-A t-shirt with our logo-A 2019 calendar, (The calendar will feature views from our farm and surrounding area, Chilean holidays, joke of the week, and quote of the month.)-$300 off any vacation you book with us - Your name on our founding wall to see when you come down-You will get access to the founding member web page with our latest recipes and how we do things, like build a zip line or ninja course.! Any perk that is priced higher than $50 will also include a founding membership. So don't be afraid to choose a higher priced perk if you want to!Another perk will be a vacation for four people that will be all-inclusive except for the airfare. We will pick you up at the airport and bring you to our farm. We will provide all lodging, food and entertainment for 7 days. We will try to plan things for you that you like to do.For instance, if you like to fish, your wife likes to relax, and your kids like to hike, we will do our best to accommodate each person in your family to do what they love! We will even provide some child care services if you and your wife just need some alone time. Our goal is to make this the greatest vacation of your life.When I say we provide your food, I mean that we do all of the cooking. Personally, I love to cook and I have a lot of specialties that I'm confident you will love.These vacations are at a huge discount! (Shoot, buy ten, they make great Christmas gifts!)I want to build very nice two bedroom, two bath cabins for people to stay in.I want to raise natural fresh organic food for people to enjoy while they are on the farm. I want to tailor your vacation to your interests while you are here!If camping and hiking are what you love to do, there is an option for that! You can choose a very reasonably priced vacation to go camping for a week. These vacations are initially for two people, but you can add extra people for only $275 per extra person. We will pick you up at the Puerto Montt airport and bring you to our farm. We will provide you with a tent, sleeping bags, backpacks and other items for camping.We will also provide your food for the week, but in this option, you can either choose trail type of food or food that you can cook over a campfire. You can stay at the farm or we will take you to your choice of excursions for you to go hiking.There are two national parks within 15 miles of our farm, there is Cochamo valley nearby which is called the Yosemite of Chile, and Tagua Tagua Park is also nearby. It is a private park that requires advance notice to visit. The whole area is breathtakingly beautiful!If you are not able to fund a full vacation at this time, you can donate a lessor amount for a huge discount on a vacation later. This discount will not have an expiration date.We need to enjoy real food again!I think we have gotten too far away from where our food really comes from. It is my opinion that many of the diseases like cancer and heart disease happen to us because of our American diet. Our food is so full of chemicals and too processed for our bodies to be truly healthy!By supporting my campaign, you can help me to teach people how good real food can taste. I want to provide a place where people can get back to nature and enjoying all of God's creation in it's purest form. I want to provide food grown right on the farm.I make the best homemade salsa and guacamole. When you taste it, I think you'll agree!I've built and sold one successful business. Now I want to build a business of helping people to have a lot of fun, while getting healthy again.A piece of my delicious fruit pizza sweetened with maple syrup and honey.Your help with my campaign will make it possible for you and others to enjoy the beauty of nature and to eat some of the healthiest food there is.Just to prove I was there.I know I have my work cut out for me.It will take a couple months of work to build the cabins and get the farm ready. As I mentioned before, I recently sold my remodeling business. I have built houses before and have worked in the construction industry for over 30 years. I am not afraid of working long hours to make sure everything is ready in time.I am well qualified to build the cabins and other buildings needed. It is my plan to have the farm ready to start hosting vacations by November or December of 2018. That works well because the seasons in Chile are reversed from our seasons. November would be late spring there.I hope to be able to fulfill all of the vacations for my supporters within the first year. As soon as I know for sure that I can have some cabins ready, I will start scheduling vacations.   Other Ways You Can HelpIf you are unable to contribute at this time, you can still help. It would help me a lot if you would refer your friends to my campaign! The more people know about this, the more people that can enjoy the beauty of our farm!Be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools listed here. Lets make our farm a place you and your friends can enjoy for a long time!  FAQIs  Chile a safe country for Americans? Chile is quite safe. We can help translate for you if you need to communicate with someone.Can I buy more than one founding membership? Yes, you will get all of the perks listed for each membership. Let us know if you need help booking a flight.What does a plane ticket cost to get down there? Tickets are usually around $1000, give or take $300. When you know the week you want to fly, Latam's website will give you the whole week at a glance so you can pick the days of travel that work best for your budget and schedule. Can I pick when I want to come for vacation? For the most part, though it will be subject to availability. Mornings are usually cool, so bring a light jacket or sweatshirt even in the warmer months.Is there a hospital near by? Yes, the area is lightly populated, but there is a small modern hospital in Puelo about six miles from the farm. Puerto Montt has a larger hospital, but it is about 2 hours away by car.If I have additional questions, how do I contact you? You can email me at herbreinhard@godscountry.farm .I will try to respond to all emails within 24 hours. Occasionally, it may take up to 48 hours, but I will respond!What if I want a refund? If you have made your purchase within the last 10 days, please contact IGG to obtain a refund. If it has been more than 10 days since your purchase please contact us via our email at herbreinhard@godscountry.farm .

story:
OnPark Find 3 is designed to ride smoothly through your city and conquer every obstacle. OnPark Find 3 is an electric longboard with dual brushless hub motors, whose speed is up to 31 MPH within 23 KM on a single battery, so boring routines will become exhilarating adventures.

 

  • High-Quality & Quickly Disassemble Samsung Battery
  • Best skateboard deck material - bamboo and two layers of glass fiber
  • 2.4G RF Wireless Smart Remote Control
  • 100 mm Swappable Dual Hub Motors
  • 8-inch Wide Bridge
  • Multi-colored LED Light for Night Riders

 

 

 

The swappable function makes it easy to change the battery after the battery life ends. On the other hand, it also makes it possible to travel in a long distance if you carry a back-up battery during your trip. 

We select a high-quality Samsung 25R high-rate battery that has 1000 cycles of battery life. The capacity is 5A/h, and means you can use up the battery 1000 times but still has the most capacity of your battery.

 

Powered by a high-performance 1360W hub motor, OnPark Find 3 gives you strong brake, fast acceleration, and steep hill climbing. The hub motor can store electricity when it's on the downhill and convert part of the potential energy to electric energy and avoid damage to the motor caused by overload. 

Reaching a speed of 15 mph and climbing 30° hills, OnPark  Find 3 is perfect for users looking for a powerful yet affordable way to get around.

 

The integrated sensor system allows you to quickly accelerate, brake in an instant and even go reverse. As soon as you step off your OnPark Find 3 the sensors will activate the braking system instantaneously to make sure that you are safe and to keep your board within reach. Just by slowing down, our regenerative braking automatically adds an average of a 10% range.

On OnPark Find 3 hub motor is chosen over belt motor for several reasons. As most electric skateboard users know, belt motor can provide more torque which can generate higher acceleration. However, the belt motor needs frequent maintenance and makes loud noise during cruising. The hub motors are quieter and more energy-efficient. 

Those motors on OnPark Find 3 are also swappable. When the outside layer wears out, you can easily change it without changing the entire motor which is much more expensive. We also include a different size spare pair of wheels in the package.

 

 

 

OnPark Find 3’s electric skateboard deck is made of bamboo and two layers of glass fiber which is the best skateboard deck material in the industry. The combination makes a balance between flexibility and strength. The shape of the deck is designed for more comfort and stability. It is extremely flexible and suitable for all kinds of riding conditions.

Differing from a traditional skateboard -which cannot change speed,  OnPark Find 3 has four modes:  Novice, Standard, Advanced and Pro, which make switching speeds possible. Making this skateboard suitable for beginners, enthusiasts and professional riders. OnPark Find 3 is simple to use, efficient, and exhilarating to ride.

Onpark Find 3 was joined the fixed speed cruise function - free your hands.

On our LED display system, you can display the driving speed,  skateboard power, remote control power, real-time current, single mileage, total mileage, riding mode, break mode, and signal connection status in real-time.

 

Creative structural design not only means you can ride the OnPark Find 3 smoothly and safely at high speeds, a clever melding of sci-fi looks and it’s slim, fashionable appearance clearly displays its reliability, carefully conceived quality and oozes futuristic character.

 

 

OnPark Find 3 is ready to go everywhere. Its IP55 water & dustproof design shrugs off rain, puddles, dust, and sand.

All the electronics and batteries are completely integrated into the sealed container making sure it reaches IP55 waterproof grade, so you can safely ride the skateboard on the road where there are 5 cm puddles.

We have selected the brushless motor with excellent heat dissipation structure and sealed it with covers, which can greatly reduce the bearing, motor, and control board contact with water and dust contact. The good performance in reducing the working temperature of the motor will greatly extend motor life as well.

Your safety is our first concern. The hi-power LED headlights and taillights of OnPark Find 3 ensure that you are visible at night to traffic and pedestrians. And it'll be much easier for you to ride at night in a dimly lit sports venues, alleys or tunnels. Make yourself the spotlight in the public with these colorful lights.

We have designed a USB charging port on the battery to charge your mobile phone or a variety of electronic devices.

 

 

 

The board is lightweight, yet strong enough to carry a weight of up to 264lbs/ 120kg.

story:
Introducing PYK - The Multi-Tool Designed To Make A Difference.

 

PYK lets you safely interact with shared surfaces.

 

PYK is a first-in-class 15+ function touch tool, designed to help you safely complete every day tasks. Whether it's interacting with doors & buttons in public places or opening boxes and popping tops around the house, PYK is the only tool you need... 

 

 

Use PYK's myriad of integrated tools to interact with shared touch points and germ-riddled surfaces - no more touching dirty buttons or doors. PYK's naturally anti-microbial brass finish means it will keep itself clean too, effectively fighting bacteria & viruses on its surfaces.

 

 

No more using keys, sleeves or elbows to push public buttons

 

Avoid touching public surfaces used by hundreds or thousands of people every day. PYK's hands free touch tool is great in places like:

 

  • offices & co-working spaces
  • public transport
  • restrooms
  • lifts & elevators
  • pedestrian crossings
  • supermarkets & shopping centres
  • ATMs & check-outs

 



PYK is also compatible with most touchscreens

 

Perfect for use when out shopping for essentials, visiting public restrooms or interacting with lifts and buttons on public transport - PYK's uses are endless! Plus, thanks to the integration of a 15+ function multi tool, PYK is sure to be a lifesaver in more ways than one!

 

 

DETAILS

 

PYK is proudly designed and distributed from our studio in Melbourne, Australia. Its design pays homage to some of the best EDC multi tools on the market, but has elevated its function from just a tool to an essential daily companion.

 

 

Assured in its purpose, PYK combines stark architectural elements with a minimalist ambiance. There are no fancy bells or whistles here, every edge and face serves a function.

 

PYK has been thoughtfully designed to be seamlessly integrated into your every day carry. It fits perfectly to your keys or lanyard without adding extra bulk, each edge precision honed to create a minimal yet functional tool. Finding your keys too bulky already? Use the PYK's bag / belt hook to securely fasten it to your person.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

 

 

Measuring 85mm from end to end, the PYK has been designed to be sleek and unobtrusive during daily use. Precision machined and featuring a brushed finish, the PYK's sharp contours are contrasted by its bevelled edging. We've also made it 5mm thick making PYK super strong and up to whatever task life throws its way.

 

LYMB CO prides itself on providing high quality and sustainable products. Stainless steel and brass have been chosen thanks to their qualitative elemental properties as well as their recyclability allowing them to be sourced responsibly and stand the test of time. 

 

MATERIALS

 

The PYK has been crafted in two different metals; S420 (420L surgical grade stainless steel) & CuZn (an antimicrobial brass plated zinc-alloy). The choice is yours depending on which suits your lifestyle. 

 

 

S420 is ideal for those looking for a strong and reliable multi-tool, capable of completing every day tasks whilst being corrosion and tarnish resistant. This means it easy to clean & maintain - just use, clean and forget. Commonly used in surgical tools and blades, 420 stainless steel has a high tensile strength, making it long lasting and durable. 

 

 

CUZN is perfect for use as a touch-tool with its anti-microbial properties.  Interact with doors and public touch points without the use of your hands, and let PYK's brass surface disinfect itself within hours*. Brass is also naturally corrosion resistant and will develop a beautiful patina over time. We have selected a brass alloy with a high zinc content to ensure that the CUZN is strong enough to use as a multi-tool whilst still maintaining its intrinsic anti-microbial properties.

 

WHY BRASS?

 

 

Copper and its alloys (including brass) are naturally anti-microbial materials that have been used for thousands of years for their beneficial properties. It has been scientifically proven that copper kills more than 99.97% of microbes within 2 hours. It is widely used - on door fittings to hospital fixtures -as it is observed by the scientific community to effectively fight the spread of harmful microbes such as bacteria and viruses.

 

How does copper kill bacteria and viruses?
 

When a microbe makes contact with copper surfaces, it absorbs copper's electrically charged ions, which destroy the cells genetic material, killing it and preventing it from mutating or replicating. According to many studies, this process sees the lifespan of microbes on surfaces reduced from several days in most cases to approximately 2 hours.

 

 

This anti-microbial property also extends in what is observed as a "halo-effect", due to the unstable nature of copper ions. Studies show that adjacent surfaces to a copper object exhibit 70% less contamination than would otherwise be expected due to their proximity to copper ions. Copper is safe to touch, being found in many foods we eat, and is actually essential in assisting with the production of red blood cells. Having PYK on your keys or in your bag may help reduce the efficacy of germs and bacteria contaminating your essentials.

 

* DISCLAIMER: We do not claim that PYK will cure, treat, or prevent any specific illness or condition, and encourage the use of good personal hygiene practices as well as following the latest medical advice.

 

15+ FUNCTION MULTI TOOL

 

 

In addition to its uses as a touch tool, PYK has been thoughtfully designed to serve as an all in one multi tool. We researched a wide variety of the most useful everyday tools and combined as many as possible into one slimline package.

 

More than 15 different tools with countless functions have all been incorporated into the PYK's design, meaning it is the only EDC you will ever need. 

 

 

From a flat-head screwdriver to a bottle opener, PYK is sure to come in handy when you are stuck with just your essentials and need to complete a task. PYK has also been designed so that it is travel and aircraft safe, making it the perfect companion on trips.

 

INCLUDED WITH THE PYK:

 

  • Touch Tool / Stylus
  • Door Opener / Utility Hook
  • Bottle Opener
  • 1/4" Hex Socket
  • 3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 6mm Hex Sockets
  • Flathead Screwdriver
  • Pry Bar
  • Safety Box Cutter
  • File /Thread Cutter
  • Key Ring Loop
  • Metric Ruler
  • Pocket / Bag Clip

 

With lots more functions and uses!

 

 

PYK is your new, safe travel companion. Take it with you to work or on a trip to the shops, or just attach it to your keys with its handy key-ring loop.

 

 

MANUFACTURING AND FULFILMENT

 

The PYK has been successfully funded on Kickstarter raising over $5300 AUD

 

The first PYK prototypes (as seen pictured in this campaign) have already been developed. We need your backing to help us cover the tooling costs and minimum order quantities outlined by our manufacturers to bring PYK to life. With your help PYK can change the way we live & interact with the world around us.  See below the timeline outlined for our campaign...

 

 

We have followed the journey of many crowdfunding campaigns and understand that while setbacks and delays are inevitable, transparency and open communication are essential in a positive experience. The schedule outlined above is extremely generous in its time-frames, allowing for further prototyping, delays in manufacturing, and padded out shipping estimates to account for the global situation. 

 

LYMB CO endeavours to stick to this timeline whilst updating backers weekly on progress and developments. We have an ongoing relationship with our manufacturer and are confident in both the quality of their work and their commitment to delivering on time. We will be fulfilling all orders from our studio in Melbourne, Australia, but will be monitoring the response to this campaign to decide if alternative fulfilment is optimal. 

 

 

We hope that you share our belief in the difference that PYK can make to the lives of so many people around the world. With your backing you can help us bring this project to life. Feel free to follow us on social media below where we will be posting regular updates in tandem with the campaign.

 

There is also more information regarding PYK on our website...

http://www.lymbco.com.au

Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/lymbco

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/lymb.co

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgCg4TD3uPa4CXPGLZfqMLQ

public transport
restrooms
lifts & elevators
pedestrian crossings
supermarkets & shopping centres
ATMs & check-outs
 PYK is also compatible with most touchscreens Perfect for use when out shopping for essentials, visiting public restrooms or interacting with lifts and buttons on public transport - PYK's uses are endless! Plus, thanks to the integration of a 15+ function multi tool, PYK is sure to be a lifesaver in more ways than one!  DETAILS PYK is proudly designed and distributed from our studio in Melbourne, Australia. Its design pays homage to some of the best EDC multi tools on the market, but has elevated its function from just a tool to an essential daily companion.  Assured in its purpose, PYK combines stark architectural elements with a minimalist ambiance. There are no fancy bells or whistles here, every edge and face serves a function. PYK has been thoughtfully designed to be seamlessly integrated into your every day carry. It fits perfectly to your keys or lanyard without adding extra bulk, each edge precision honed to create a minimal yet functional tool. Finding your keys too bulky already? Use the PYK's bag / belt hook to securely fasten it to your person. SPECIFICATIONS  Measuring 85mm from end to end, the PYK has been designed to be sleek and unobtrusive during daily use. Precision machined and featuring a brushed finish, the PYK's sharp contours are contrasted by its bevelled edging. We've also made it 5mm thick making PYK super strong and up to whatever task life throws its way. LYMB CO prides itself on providing high quality and sustainable products. Stainless steel and brass have been chosen thanks to their qualitative elemental properties as well as their recyclability allowing them to be sourced responsibly and stand the test of time.  MATERIALS The PYK has been crafted in two different metals; S420 (420L surgical grade stainless steel) & CuZn (an antimicrobial brass plated zinc-alloy). The choice is yours depending on which suits your lifestyle.   S420 is ideal for those looking for a strong and reliable multi-tool, capable of completing every day tasks whilst being corrosion and tarnish resistant. This means it easy to clean & maintain - just use, clean and forget. Commonly used in surgical tools and blades, 420 stainless steel has a high tensile strength, making it long lasting and durable.   CUZN is perfect for use as a touch-tool with its anti-microbial properties.  Interact with doors and public touch points without the use of your hands, and let PYK's brass surface disinfect itself within hours*. Brass is also naturally corrosion resistant and will develop a beautiful patina over time. We have selected a brass alloy with a high zinc content to ensure that the CUZN is strong enough to use as a multi-tool whilst still maintaining its intrinsic anti-microbial properties. WHY BRASS?  Copper and its alloys (including brass) are naturally anti-microbial materials that have been used for thousands of years for their beneficial properties. It has been scientifically proven that copper kills more than 99.97% of microbes within 2 hours. It is widely used - on door fittings to hospital fixtures -as it is observed by the scientific community to effectively fight the spread of harmful microbes such as bacteria and viruses. How does copper kill bacteria and viruses? When a microbe makes contact with copper surfaces, it absorbs copper's electrically charged ions, which destroy the cells genetic material, killing it and preventing it from mutating or replicating. According to many studies, this process sees the lifespan of microbes on surfaces reduced from several days in most cases to approximately 2 hours.  This anti-microbial property also extends in what is observed as a "halo-effect", due to the unstable nature of copper ions. Studies show that adjacent surfaces to a copper object exhibit 70% less contamination than would otherwise be expected due to their proximity to copper ions. Copper is safe to touch, being found in many foods we eat, and is actually essential in assisting with the production of red blood cells. Having PYK on your keys or in your bag may help reduce the efficacy of germs and bacteria contaminating your essentials. * DISCLAIMER: We do not claim that PYK will cure, treat, or prevent any specific illness or condition, and encourage the use of good personal hygiene practices as well as following the latest medical advice. 15+ FUNCTION MULTI TOOL  In addition to its uses as a touch tool, PYK has been thoughtfully designed to serve as an all in one multi tool. We researched a wide variety of the most useful everyday tools and combined as many as possible into one slimline package. More than 15 different tools with countless functions have all been incorporated into the PYK's design, meaning it is the only EDC you will ever need.   From a flat-head screwdriver to a bottle opener, PYK is sure to come in handy when you are stuck with just your essentials and need to complete a task. PYK has also been designed so that it is travel and aircraft safe, making it the perfect companion on trips. INCLUDED WITH THE PYK: 
Touch Tool / Stylus
Door Opener / Utility Hook
Bottle Opener
1/4" Hex Socket
3mm, 4mm, 5mm, 6mm Hex Sockets
Flathead Screwdriver
Pry Bar
Safety Box Cutter
File /Thread Cutter
Key Ring Loop
Metric Ruler
Pocket / Bag Clip
 With lots more functions and uses!  PYK is your new, safe travel companion. Take it with you to work or on a trip to the shops, or just attach it to your keys with its handy key-ring loop.  MANUFACTURING AND FULFILMENT The PYK has been successfully funded on Kickstarter raising over $5300 AUD The first PYK prototypes (as seen pictured in this campaign) have already been developed. We need your backing to help us cover the tooling costs and minimum order quantities outlined by our manufacturers to bring PYK to life. With your help PYK can change the way we live & interact with the world around us.  See below the timeline outlined for our campaign...  We have followed the journey of many crowdfunding campaigns and understand that while setbacks and delays are inevitable, transparency and open communication are essential in a positive experience. The schedule outlined above is extremely generous in its time-frames, allowing for further prototyping, delays in manufacturing, and padded out shipping estimates to account for the global situation.  LYMB CO endeavours to stick to this timeline whilst updating backers weekly on progress and developments. We have an ongoing relationship with our manufacturer and are confident in both the quality of their work and their commitment to delivering on time. We will be fulfilling all orders from our studio in Melbourne, Australia, but will be monitoring the response to this campaign to decide if alternative fulfilment is optimal.   We hope that you share our belief in the difference that PYK can make to the lives of so many people around the world. With your backing you can help us bring this project to life. Feel free to follow us on social media below where we will be posting regular updates in tandem with the campaign. There is also more information regarding PYK on our website...http://www.lymbco.com.auFacebook: http://www.facebook.com/lymbcoInstagram: http://www.instagram.com/lymb.coYouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgCg4TD3uPa4CXPGLZfqMLQ

story:
Meet the World's First AI Drone

"ORCA"

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ORCA is the drone that you've never imagined before.

 Fly Smarter with your AI Friend!

You think you've seen all kinds of drones... and you know they all pretty much do the same things which are not really innovative anymore.

So picture this: a voice-commanded Artificial-Intelligence-enabled AI Drone that you can literally talk to, and direct just by speaking, and which offers incredible 360º Augmented Reality viewing features with an intelligent HUD.

 

 

Control Smarter, Fly Smarter

Simply ask ORCA to bring Flight Info up in HUD Screen

This highly intelligent drone is successfully operated by an Auto-Pilot System that was designated to obey each and every one of your commands. It will recognize and understand your voice and execute the actions that you wish.

All you need to do is command ORCA to fly to a different destination, increase or decrease altitude or come back to your location.

 

 

 

 

 

 

You Can Be The Next Pilot

Enjoy a Pilot's Perspective

ORCA features a 3-sided, Interactive Heads Up Display (HUD) with a 360º AR Screen that shows Information such as GPS, altitude, velocity and various information of internal sensors alongside weather condition via Internet.

You will feel like a True Pilot, enjoying an amazing perspective of everything that ORCA flies above of and captures.

Experience Flying, Droning and Seeing like never before.

 

 

 

360 Degree View

 

 

 

3 Sided HUD

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

An Amazing Experience

That You Can Share

 

 

 

Sharing Your Moment with Your Beloved One is always Priceless

ORCA enables you to grab amazing photos and record memorable videos so that you can relive your experience all the time. 

You do not need to take out SD card from ORCA or to transfer the video for uploading to your Social Media. The videos that ORCA takes will be transferred automatically to your social media when ORCA is located in WiFi zone after your flight.

 

 

 

Control via Internet

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

"ORCA" Features

 

Here is the conceptual design of 'ORCA' that we're targeting to produce. Yet the design does not include any specific standards for drone's flight such as size, weight and a balance of the body. The actual released product could be different from our conceptual design, but we will do our best to offer the best AI drone for you. We will keep you updated even with a minor change. So please keep an eye on our update session.

 

 

 

 

 

 Specifications

Below information is ORCA's goal Specification which can be changed.

 

 

What's in the box

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Three corporations in the US, China and Korea collaborate to manufacture, produce and develop products.
Through close cooperation, we will create value based on customer needs and lead technological innovation.

 

 In Progress

 

 

Timeline

We will be notifying all of our Backers when schedule changes.

 

 

 Our Team

We are FLiFLi. We are passionate about drone, and experts in hardware, software and product design, each highly skilled within their own specializations. We have been working hard with enthusiasm to bridge between the latest AI and AR technology to  our drone with high quality tech  & affordable price to bring a whole new revolution of the drone industry.

 

 

 

 

 

FAQ

 

1. When does shipping begin?

A. The very first order will be shipped from June 2018. (Exact date will be announced soon)

 

 

2. Where do you ship? Any extra shipping charges for certain countries?

A. We ship to Worldwide and we decided to offer Free Worldwide Shipping only for Indiegogo Backers exclusively.

 

3. Do you provide Warranty?

A. Yes, we normally provide 12 months warranty, but we offer extra 12 months warranty for   our Backers in Indiegogo.

 

4. How do I connect ORCA with my smartphone application?

A. There will be exclusive mobile application for your smartphone to connect with ORCA.

 

5. Any type of smartphone is compatible with ORCA?

A. ORCA is compatible with IOS and Android Platform.

 

6. If my WiFi is dead, Will it handover to 4G LTE/5G immediately?

A. Yes, Do not worry If the WiFi signal is weak while flying, it will automatically change the network to 4G LTE/5G immediately. 5G network will be compatible with ORCA when the network deploys.

 

7. I already have my own Bluetooth Joypad, Can I use this to control ORCA?

A. Yes, ORCA is compatible with any bluetooth joypads out in the market, so feel free to connect any bluetooth joypad of your own.

 

8. Is HUD(Head Up Display) eligible for personal own customizing what to include?

A. Yes, but you can only add and remove your HUD(Head Up Display) features not colors and skins. More features will be updated in near furure. so stay tuned. 

 

9. I want to cancel my order. Can I get my refund back?

A. Yes. We follow Indiegogo's Refund Policy during & after the campaign. Which refunds are accepted through your own account in Indiegogo website.

 

10. Why the price gap is so different from the MSRP (Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price)?

A. Since Indiegogo is our very first release platform, which we would like to provide exclusive benefits to all of our Backers, so that is why price is lower than MSRP. Our market price in Amazon and other distributing markets will be $1299.

 

11. Are you willing to have a consistently update software after the distribution?

A. Yes, we are planning to update ORCA's software monthly in regular basis. Also, we are considering to develop fun applications like real life Sim City with 3D Modelling feature within early 2019.

 

12. I can see ORCA needs a Sim Card for LTE use, Do I have to buy my own Sim card? or is it included in the package?

A. Sim card is NOT included in the package which Backers need to get or buy own  Pre-Paid Sim card from any stores (Best buy, Target, Walmart, etc). The approximate data usage would be around 600MB - 700MB per single flight (30minutes).

story:
The BRIIDGS 2-In-1 Travel Backpack + Duffel 

For travelers on the move, and hungry for the next adventure.

A perfect choice for the weekend jet-setter.

 

Never pay baggage fees AGAIN!

BRIIDGS effortlessly fits the carry-on dimension-specs of most airlines while comfortably fitting under your airline seat. Ensuring that you get to your destination while avoiding the hassle of checking-in luggage and waiting at the baggage carousel. 

 

Made to make impressions.  

Our design is built to endure with a water-resistant high-strength polyester material and curated for the style conscious traveler. 

We believe a backpack shouldn't just be an ordinary bag. Your travel accessories should be an extension of your personal style. and the epitome of function.  

Something that leaves a lasting impression on those around you. 

 

In summary: 

Expandable, lay flat main compartment 

Easy access slit for carrying on luggage

Quick access top pocket

Organization pockets for all your accessories 

Large main compartment 

Water-resistant, high strength polyester material 

Padded TSA quick-access laptop pocket (fits up to 17" laptops)

Lockable zippers 

Hideaway & detachable straps 

Expandable pocket for bottle or umbrella 

Water-resistant shoe compartment

Designed in California, built to support refugees.

Our Story

BRIIDGS was built on the belief that traveling should be easy. We set out to create a weekender bag that was built to serve both the frequent flier and the first-time explorer. It fits everything you might need for trip to San Francisco or Las Vegas and is designed to fit as your carry-on of all major airlines, ensuring that you get to your destination while avoiding the hassle of checking-in luggage and fitting under your airline. And while designing amazing backpacks is important, we want to make the travel experience better, for everyone. For every backpack purchase, we donate a bag of goods to displaced persons. Whether it be Hurricane Harvey victims or Syrian refugees, we believe everyone has the right to travel with ease.

Come join us and find your journey.

 

Risks and challenges

We believe communication and planning is key when developing a product. We have spent nearly 2 yearly testing and perfecting our design with 12 prototypes made. Each sample was field tested for durability, functionality, and style over a variety of weekend trips like a trips. We even tested taking two Travel Packs (one backpack + one duffle) on a 2 week trip to Colombia. They held up we great and learned a ton about our product.

A challenge we had with our branding was picking a perfect brand name that resonated with our mission and audience. We decided to go with BRIIDG Supply Co. because we wanted to connect with displaced people on a global level for those that may have lost it all for reasons beyond there control. From victims of the California Wildfires and Hurricane Harvey here at home to the refugees from Syria and the Rohingya people in Bangladesh, we want to bring awareness to the struggles they face while also helping out to the best we can.
