story:
I am Trishie dela Cruz, The Brave Dreamer, and my life purpose is to inspire and give hope to people in the world through my life story. 

Life for me was a struggle but I never stopped reaching for my dreams. That is until fate gave me the chance to travel- and that changed my life. Travel became my life and as I grow older and as my list of destinations grow, I meet more wonderful people and enjoy more experiences. Little by little, I'm starting to understand and connect with the real meaning of LIFE. And I still have a long journey to go. I hope that more people will start their travel journey too by going out of their comfort zones, exploring and finding their purpose.

Being a traveler is easy. But the question is, what makes you different? Who are you? What can you contribute in this world?  I founded a small group of travel enthusiasts and we started a prototype to reinvent the way people  travel in which they will not just do the typical travel to observe and sightsee, but to travel to find purpose in life, learn, and give hope. The first design prototype was for individuals, couples and a small group of people. We followed a design for groups minimum of 30 people where there are activities to boost their SOUL, MIND, BRAIN AND BODY in which they will not just enjoy and learn something valuable but also connect with people.

There are around 200 people who successfully completed the prototypes and around 300 people who attended our events and seminars in under one year. the prototype was really successful! I, as a travel entrepreneur, have been published by some of the world's largest media companies such as BuzzFeed and Huffington Post! Today, the team wants to take it to the next level. We want our voice- our mission and vision: a world with PEACE, HOPE and NO BOUNDARIES, to be heard not just in Manila, not just the Philippines but the whole world! 

I had this idea to expand TRAVEL-REINVENTED to the next level when an investor asked to buy 50% income share of this business. It was a good offer and more than enough money to pay for all the necessities to expand. However, having some experiences in investments, I've realized that having an investor is the same as borrowing money with high interest. My partner and I decided not to have any investors as we don't want to have any debts and obligations. If we can do it ourselves without asking for a huge amount of money from someone, then why not do it just ourselves. Hence, this campaign was born.

Know more about the prototype at www.travelinnovations.org/about watch some of our successful group prototypes below  to have a glimpse on what we are doing in this world :)

I've never asked anyone for anything for myself... But I've learned that asking for help and support is not a bad thing. I am not asking for your money nor donations. I am asking for your support. Support to help me serve my mission and purpose in life and for you to experience what I and my small company could offer. 

Supporting this campaign also means you support in giving HOPE to people. If this campaign succeeds, I will have more privilege to reach more people in the world- to share my life story, inspire them and give hope, that even after all the struggles that I've been through in my life, I still managed to get up and build a beautiful life. If I can and I did, they could too!

"When you buy from a small business, you are not helping a CEO buy their 3rd vacation home. You are helping a little girl get dance lessons, a little boy get his team jersey, a mom put food on the table a dad pay mortgage or a student pay for college" This is true indeed! You are not just supporting me and my team, you will also be able to help our employees feed their family as they would be the one fixing and assisting you on your travel bookings(see "TRAVEL PACKAGE DISCOUNT" perks).  

Not only that, you will not just become an instrument to achieve our mission and vision, you will also be an instrument to help unprivileged children because for every 50$ that this campaign will reach, we will give 1 book to 1 child in an isolated destinations in the Philippines-soon in the whole world- where children don't have access to proper education. 

You can support us by sharing this campaign in your social media accounts or sharing the word to your colleagues, bosses, family and friends. Get the word out and make some noise about this travel innovation! You can support by joining some of our travel events or getting some of our travel-reinvented packages and other perks so we could start changing your life. 

Interested to be part of our team? Tell us why you want to be part of us and what skills you could offer to achieve our mission and vision. Email your answers to jeyvie@dlcbackpackers.com

Taking it to the next level for us means building the legitimacy of the business and reaching more people. It will only happen if we hire professionals or companies who will: 

1.) Process the business papers and permits so we could start paying taxes and fullfil our obligation as citizens. 

2.) Build and design our website and social media accounts so it will look more pleasing and professional. 

3.) Manage our social media and SEO so we could reach more people.

4.) Create an automated software for the manual system that we are currently using to process all projects/events and as well as the quotations and bookings of our clients. 

Our minimum estimated cost for these is 10,000.00$ that includes 5% Indiegogo cut and other fees and as well as the actual booking costs of the raffle draws(see perks). Sometimes, there are things that you really can't achieve or it is not yet the right time; if we don't reach our campaign's goal, we will still use whatever amount of funds we were able to raise for improvement of the business. The business will still continue its operations and you can still book with us your future travels! 

 If in case we reached more than the campaign's goal,funds will proceed on the following:

5.) Renovate our proposed office so we could have a decent space where we could accept and assist clients physically

6.) Future company improvements hoping that one day, I will be able to reach my dream for my team- to bring the whole team in other country and hold an event there.  

If you own a company providing these services or you are a professional freelancer whose expertise are one of these, feel free to send me a proposal with rates on my personal email patriciadlc018@yahoo.com

Love reading? Interested about my life? Read my Life in Details by clicking this link

GET 75% Off in Travel and Business E-books bundle above plus 1 raffle entry coupon(WIN A TRIP FOR 2) by availing our featured perk! 200 slots only!  Click this link to browse all the eBooks and its contents.

 

FREEBIE ALERT! FREEBIE ALERT!! As a token of appreciation in giving time to watch and read our story, I am giving away a TRAVEL LIKE A PRO SCRAP BOOK PRINTABLE  worth 15$ for FREE! Download the file through this link.

***

PERKS FAQS: PLEASE CLICK HERE

***

Tourism is one of the fastest growing sector in the world. One of the milestone of this prototype is to be able to reach almost 10,000$  gross income in 1 month last May 2017 (see table below) given the fact that it was started 2 years ago and without capital and without any marketing services. Last March 2017, we decided to re-sell the system that we are using to those who dream to start their own travel agency business. As of today, we have over 40 system franchisee distributors and they earn up to a huge 20% net income for every travel-reinvented package they could sell. You can start your own travel agency business too by availing the "TRAVEL AGENCY BUSINESS" perk! Know more about this perk offer by reading the PERKS FAQS.

On the other hand, if you believe in our potential, we still give an opportunity to investors to invest in this travel innovation business. We could share 5% of the overall net income of the company for 7 years with maximum of 500% ROI contract. We are also selling this business.  More details and statistics on this link. 

For interested parties, please don't hesitate to contact us or send an email at jeyvie@dlcbackpackers.com or at trishie@dlcbackpackers.com
story_txt:
I am Trishie dela Cruz, The Brave Dreamer, and my life purpose is to inspire and give hope to people in the world through my life story. Life for me was a struggle but I never stopped reaching for my dreams. That is until fate gave me the chance to travel- and that changed my life. Travel became my life and as I grow older and as my list of destinations grow, I meet more wonderful people and enjoy more experiences. Little by little, I'm starting to understand and connect with the real meaning of LIFE. And I still have a long journey to go. I hope that more people will start their travel journey too by going out of their comfort zones, exploring and finding their purpose.Being a traveler is easy. But the question is, what makes you different? Who are you? What can you contribute in this world?  I founded a small group of travel enthusiasts and we started a prototype to reinvent the way people  travel in which they will not just do the typical travel to observe and sightsee, but to travel to find purpose in life, learn, and give hope. The first design prototype was for individuals, couples and a small group of people. We followed a design for groups minimum of 30 people where there are activities to boost their SOUL, MIND, BRAIN AND BODY in which they will not just enjoy and learn something valuable but also connect with people.There are around 200 people who successfully completed the prototypes and around 300 people who attended our events and seminars in under one year. the prototype was really successful! I, as a travel entrepreneur, have been published by some of the world's largest media companies such as BuzzFeed and Huffington Post! Today, the team wants to take it to the next level. We want our voice- our mission and vision: a world with PEACE, HOPE and NO BOUNDARIES, to be heard not just in Manila, not just the Philippines but the whole world! I had this idea to expand TRAVEL-REINVENTED to the next level when an investor asked to buy 50% income share of this business. It was a good offer and more than enough money to pay for all the necessities to expand. However, having some experiences in investments, I've realized that having an investor is the same as borrowing money with high interest. My partner and I decided not to have any investors as we don't want to have any debts and obligations. If we can do it ourselves without asking for a huge amount of money from someone, then why not do it just ourselves. Hence, this campaign was born.Know more about the prototype at www.travelinnovations.org/about watch some of our successful group prototypes below  to have a glimpse on what we are doing in this world :)





I've never asked anyone for anything for myself... But I've learned that asking for help and support is not a bad thing. I am not asking for your money nor donations. I am asking for your support. Support to help me serve my mission and purpose in life and for you to experience what I and my small company could offer. 
Supporting this campaign also means you support in giving HOPE to people. If this campaign succeeds, I will have more privilege to reach more people in the world- to share my life story, inspire them and give hope, that even after all the struggles that I've been through in my life, I still managed to get up and build a beautiful life. If I can and I did, they could too!
"When you buy from a small business, you are not helping a CEO buy their 3rd vacation home. You are helping a little girl get dance lessons, a little boy get his team jersey, a mom put food on the table a dad pay mortgage or a student pay for college" This is true indeed! You are not just supporting me and my team, you will also be able to help our employees feed their family as they would be the one fixing and assisting you on your travel bookings(see "TRAVEL PACKAGE DISCOUNT" perks).  
Not only that, you will not just become an instrument to achieve our mission and vision, you will also be an instrument to help unprivileged children because for every 50$ that this campaign will reach, we will give 1 book to 1 child in an isolated destinations in the Philippines-soon in the whole world- where children don't have access to proper education. 

You can support us by sharing this campaign in your social media accounts or sharing the word to your colleagues, bosses, family and friends. Get the word out and make some noise about this travel innovation! You can support by joining some of our travel events or getting some of our travel-reinvented packages and other perks so we could start changing your life. 

Interested to be part of our team? Tell us why you want to be part of us and what skills you could offer to achieve our mission and vision. Email your answers to jeyvie@dlcbackpackers.com

Taking it to the next level for us means building the legitimacy of the business and reaching more people. It will only happen if we hire professionals or companies who will: 
1.) Process the business papers and permits so we could start paying taxes and fullfil our obligation as citizens. 
2.) Build and design our website and social media accounts so it will look more pleasing and professional. 
3.) Manage our social media and SEO so we could reach more people.
4.) Create an automated software for the manual system that we are currently using to process all projects/events and as well as the quotations and bookings of our clients. 
Our minimum estimated cost for these is 10,000.00$ that includes 5% Indiegogo cut and other fees and as well as the actual booking costs of the raffle draws(see perks). Sometimes, there are things that you really can't achieve or it is not yet the right time; if we don't reach our campaign's goal, we will still use whatever amount of funds we were able to raise for improvement of the business. The business will still continue its operations and you can still book with us your future travels! 
 If in case we reached more than the campaign's goal,funds will proceed on the following:
5.) Renovate our proposed office so we could have a decent space where we could accept and assist clients physically
6.) Future company improvements hoping that one day, I will be able to reach my dream for my team- to bring the whole team in other country and hold an event there.  
If you own a company providing these services or you are a professional freelancer whose expertise are one of these, feel free to send me a proposal with rates on my personal email patriciadlc018@yahoo.com


Love reading? Interested about my life? Read my Life in Details by clicking this link
GET 75% Off in Travel and Business E-books bundle above plus 1 raffle entry coupon(WIN A TRIP FOR 2) by availing our featured perk! 200 slots only!  Click this link to browse all the eBooks and its contents. FREEBIE ALERT! FREEBIE ALERT!! As a token of appreciation in giving time to watch and read our story, I am giving away a TRAVEL LIKE A PRO SCRAP BOOK PRINTABLE  worth 15$ for FREE! Download the file through this link.***PERKS FAQS: PLEASE CLICK HERE
***Tourism is one of the fastest growing sector in the world. One of the milestone of this prototype is to be able to reach almost 10,000$  gross income in 1 month last May 2017 (see table below) given the fact that it was started 2 years ago and without capital and without any marketing services. Last March 2017, we decided to re-sell the system that we are using to those who dream to start their own travel agency business. As of today, we have over 40 system franchisee distributors and they earn up to a huge 20% net income for every travel-reinvented package they could sell. You can start your own travel agency business too by availing the "TRAVEL AGENCY BUSINESS" perk! Know more about this perk offer by reading the PERKS FAQS.On the other hand, if you believe in our potential, we still give an opportunity to investors to invest in this travel innovation business. We could share 5% of the overall net income of the company for 7 years with maximum of 500% ROI contract. We are also selling this business.  More details and statistics on this link. For interested parties, please don't hesitate to contact us or send an email at jeyvie@dlcbackpackers.com or at trishie@dlcbackpackers.com

story:
OSAA Summary

Ohio Survival & Action Academy is an educational organization that intertwines survivalist skills with military and action hero experiences. OSAA is a veteran-owned business that gives its clients the more enjoyable aspects of military training. We offer obstacle courses, shooting courses, veteran-led war games with paintball, first aid training, and much, much more.

Running daily operations for OSAA is former United States Air Force Staff Sergeant Joshua Hinton. Mr. Hinton served six years active duty and separated in 2013 with an honorable discharge from the armed forces. During his enlistment Mr. Hinton gained experience in leadership, instructing and as a mentor. He also is trained in weapons, hand-to-hand combat and survival skills.

Providing legal counsel and responsible for all business processes will be attorney Daniel Dew. Mr. Dew is a graduate of Cleveland Marshall College of Law. Mr. Dew has advised on public policy at the state and federal levels and previously was responsible for attorney contract negotiations on a $3.5 billion interstate natural gas project.

Mr. Hinton and Mr. Dew grew up together in Central and Northeast Ohio, respectively. Not only did they share a love for the outdoors, sports and competition , but they also share another common bond, family. After years of shared experiences their paths diverged into seemingly opposite directions, only to find that they would merge again later in their adult lives in the form of Ohio Survival & Action Academy. After years of ideas and deliberation they have formed a business plan that has met rave reception from the Small Business Association, a national banking institution and numerous other contacts that they have made on both sides of their respective lives.

Our team  has dedicated themselves to provide our customers with an entertaining, yet informative class schedule. The class structure that they have built includes , but is not limited to: Gun Safety, First Aid, Shooting Course, Custom built rifle, Hand-to-Hand Combat/Self Defense, Battle Strategy, Paintball Wars, Survivalist Training and an Obstacle Course patterned after some of the most exciting aspects of U.S Military obstacle courses.

 

What We Need & What You Get

This campaign is for the final $130,000.00 needed of over $600,000.00 that will be used exclusively for starting and maintaining this new business for its inaugural year. With the help of contributions from individuals, we will be able to break ground on the camp in early spring 2018 and have the camp up and running by Fall of 2018.

By contributing to our campaign some of the perks that we are offering are custom printed t-shirts and hooded sweatshirts with the OSAA logo, an Ohio certified Concealed Carry License course on site (Recognized in Alaska, Arizona, Arkansas, Delaware, Florida, Idaho, Kentucky, Michigan, Missouri, North Carolina, Oklahoma, South Carolina, Tennessee, Utah, Virginia, West Virginia and Wyoming. Honored in Indiana, Montana, New Mexico, South Dakota and Vermont), one day custom rifle build and shoot on site, one individual spot in an upcoming week long course and ten individual spots in an upcoming course for the price of nine! If you are interested in owning a percentage of this up and coming business please contact us via Indiegogo or at our email address experienceosaa@gmail.com .

With all on site perks, participants are required to provide their own transportation arrangements. For overnight courses all food and lodging will also be provided at no extra cost.

If our goal is not met, all funds raised by this campaign will be returned to the contributor and no perks will be awarded.

The Impact

OSAA is dedicated to providing an educational experience to like minded people who are looking to incorporate fun and excitement into learning how to lawfully defend themselves, their loved ones, and their property. Our diverse lineup of courses and entertainment is like no other that is provided in a continuous week-long setting.

Mr. Hinton and Mr. Dew believe that, with their combined areas of expertise in the military and business world, that OSAA will succeed as they have in their respective, yet diverse careers.

Risks & Challenges

Through tireless research and tapping into the minds of successful entrepreneurs, former and current military experts as well as discussions with like minded individuals we believe that we have prepared ourselves to succeed in this endeavor. As with other new businesses there will be hurdles and obstacles to overcome, but we believe that with the team that we have assembled we are prepared to face any of these head on.

Other Ways You Can Help

We here at Ohio Survival & Action Academy look forward to your contributions, but we know that not everyone can contribute. If you know someone who you know would be interested in helping our cause please feel free to spread the word. In our day-in-age where it is common to socialize on social media platforms, please use the tools provided here on Indiegogo to get the word out and we look forward to seeing you at camp!

story:
KOSTA Backpack Introduction

If you were looking for comfortable, stylish and functional backpack, you have found one!

KOSTA bag is bright and multi functional foldable backpack.  

Hydration backpack for active summer (bicycling, running, walking, travelling) and active winter as well!

10 Main Features of KOSTA Bag

  1. Ultra lightweight and durable
  2. Front and back reflective lines
  3. Cool and Stylish
  4. Waterproof
  5. Foldable into a small pocket
  6. Expandable with additional zipper
  7. Water supply system
  8. Easy to access cards/keys/coin pocket on a strap
  9. 6 pockets
  10. Skate holder

Expandable with additional zipper

Need to put your jacket or windbreaker into backpack? No problem. Just open special zipper and enlarge your KOSTA Backpack.

 

KOSTA Bag is Waterproof

Rain is not an obstacle for travel anymore! Keep your things dry even in bad weather!

Easy to access cards/keys/coin pocket on a strap

Need to get the keys or money from the backpack?

Now you do not need to take off a backpack! Just use coin pocket on a strap.

Water Supply System

Many Pockets for All Your Needs

Skate Holder

Don't forget to take your skateboard with you! Just use skateboard holders. 

 
 

History

I had lots of different backpacks but none of them suits all my needs.

And guess what?

I designed a perfect backpack for active lifestyle!

Now I want to share my backpack with you!

Select your Perk and Get your KOSTA Bag in May 2018!

We need the founding to start bulk production because the factory cannot manufacture a small amount of backpacks with our unique design.

 

KOSTA Backpack Timeline

Risks and Challenges

The funds we are raising will go directly to the manufacturing of the backpack. We do not see any risks during the production, however if some unexpected circumstances occur we will always be 100% transparent with you and do our best to solve all the questions. Our main goal is to deliver you high quality product with great features.

FAQs

Frequently Asked Questions

Is there a water supply system included in the bag?

Yes, we deliver KOSTA backpack with water supply system. However if you do not need it, you can select perk without it.

What are the shipping costs?
Shipping cost depends on your country.

What is the weight of backpack?

The weight of KOSTA backpack is 200 grams.

Is KOSTA Backpack waterproof?

Yes, it is waterproof. However, if you are going to swim with a backpack, it is not a good idea. It will not protect your things.

What payment methods do you accept?

On Indiegogo platform we can only accept payment by Credit Card, no other methods, sorry.

When I get my backpack?

You will receive your backpack in May 2018. 

About Us

This is me and my family and we love active lifestyle!

We invented KOSTA bag especially for people on the move!

Please support our project and get your own KOSTA foldable hydration backpack.

Our Team

   Kostja – idea

   Anna – prototype creation

  Alex – mental and financial support

   Alexey – photo for the project

  Andrey – Video creation

   Amy – manufacturing manager

KOSTA foldable backpack prototype was desinged and will be manufacturing by  Quanzhou Muni Bags Co., Ltd. - a professional supplier of backpacks, cooler bags, hydration packs, outdoor bags, sports bags, etc. 

   Mr. Tracy Yang  Director/CEO of Quanzhou Muni Bags Co., Ltd.

Join us on Facebook - KOSTA Active Lifestyle!

story:
Traquer is an advanced dashboard camera which offers live streaming capability, dual camera setup along with GPS tracking, Wi-Fi Hotspot connectivity & with more 20 plus Advance Features.

Traquer allows you to keep your loved ones and vehicles safe by monitoring the movement & location of your vehicle as well as the passenger through the dual camera and live streaming on your smartphone.

Capture, Record & LiveStream Unexpected Events

When it comes to our loved ones, we always want to ensure their safety especially when riding in the car. That’s why there is Traquer- a unique live-streaming dashcam to keep you and your passenger safe.

Traquer comes with two wide lens cameras. One for the interior and other to cover the outside of the car. These cameras monitor your vehicle's live movements from anywhere in the world using the web or your smartphone.

This multi-functional gadget not only ensures safety but also tracks your vehicle with its built-in GPS.  You will always know about your car’s location to prevent misuse or theft.

 

Upon starting your vehicle, the camera will automatically and continuously record on the included Micro-SD card. Please note that the new record will automatically overwrite the oldest records. 

Keep vigilant eyes on your vehicle with Live Video Streaming in HD Quality

HD Quality Live Streaming allows you to capture everything happening inside & outside of the vehicle.

Two cameras working together to eliminate blind spots in your video recording.  

A picture in picture display will let you have a clear view from inside and outside of your car with live streaming support right to your smartphone.

Get to see everything happening Inside & Outside of your vehicle

Traquer has two cameras that allow you to record videos simultaneously from two different perspectives. One camera captures the road ahead of you while other captures the inside of the car. 

Keep an eye on your kids with Traquer's dual camera while they go to school and friend's house. Commercial users can monitor the behavior of their drivers while interacting with the customers and clients.

Important Note: If you use the Traquer to record the inside of your commercial vehicle then you must have a warning sticker in your car to inform your passengers that they are being recorded.

Track your vehicle location and analyze driving behavior with advanced GPS

Get to know your vehicle location, direction and varied driving events in real time.

You can even set 'geo-fences' wherein you will get instant alerts if your vehicles drive out of the marked zone. Traquer records each and every driving behavior such as Sudden Acceleration, Sudden Breaking, Sharp Turns, Speedometer Record etc. and sends out an alert to your smartphone. 

Traquer Dashcam with Wi-Fi Hotspot, Never lose internet on the Road

Turn on Wi-Fi hotspot to share internet with other smart devices like phone, tablet and laptops.

Bringing Security with Impeccable Ease-of-use

Traquer doesn’t require tampering with your vehicle’s wiring which can void your warranty. Simply plug it into the universal car lighter socket and you are good to go.

Boost connectivity and communication within your vehicle

Listening to your favorite music or taking calls wirelessly becomes a constraint within a vehicle. Every vehicle doesn't have all the modern connectivity & communication solutions which are in vogue at the moment. Similarly having a vehicle from last decade will mean losing on the Bluetooth connectivity or even having modern vehicles will not get you the coveted Wi-Fi hotspot.

Traquer aptly acts as a bridge with which you can connect multiple devices while on a drive.

We had worked on improving the quality of connectivity & communication within vehicles by integrating these three features in the Traquer dashcam.

  1. Bluetooth
  2. Wi-Fi Hotspot
  3. Two-Way Audio Communication

Take Calls & Play Music Wirelessly with Built-In Bluetooth

Connect your mobile with Traquer’s built-in Bluetooth to take calls or play music effortlessly like never before.

Just like a standard mobile you can make or receive calls on Traquer using Bluetooth.

Just Like Your Phone: Traquer also acts as your standard phone as it possesses a SIM card slot in it. This means you can make calls using this unique dashcam without any hassle. It can come in handy in a situation where your phone battery dies and you are required to make an important call on the move. Traquer with a phone like features simply boosts your connectivity options while on the move. 

Wi-Fi Hotspot makes it easier and more convenient to remain connected

Remain connected to the internet on the move with inbuilt Wi-Fi Hotspot. Connect your smartphone, tablet or laptop to access internet within the vehicle without any hassles.

Get phone intercom like feature in your vehicle with Two Way Audio

Talk with driver and passengers with ease and simplicity with interactive two-way communication possible through app-based intercom feature powered by built-in microphone and speaker.

Two-way audio enables you to receive and transmit audio through the Traquer's dual camera setup.  Traquer has built-in speaker and microphone with intelligent noise reduction support allowing you to listen to the clear sound.

You can listen to the passenger's conversation upon pick up and speak with them from your phone while your voice will be heard via dashboard speakers. This will also allow your driver to have a hands free conversation with the caller.

Retrieve your vehicle tracking Data from Cloud with few clicks - Value Added Feature

Access and download your entire vehicle tracking data along with video footage records from the cloud storage to your smartphone or desktop.

Continuously Recording driving footage with 'Loop Recording'

Traquer records continuously and when your card is full, it deletes the old redundant videos automatically. There is no need to delete videos manually. It also has an important video lock feature which helps in keeping important videos locked and safe from deletion.

In case of unexpected acceleration or collision with other vehicles detected by the G-sensor then a sequence of 10 seconds will be automatically saved, locked and secured to your microSD card. G-sensor also enables recording in case of any vibration caused by a forced entry or hit to the car. 

Traquer will automatically record 10 seconds video (5 seconds before and after the collision) upon any hitting detection. It will be enough to provide a video evidence in case of an accident, damage or some other crucial road incidents and it will aid you in making successful insurance claims.

Don't miss out on anything when it goes dark

Once the light is insufficient Traquer will turn to 'night vision' to capture a clear and vibrant driving footage. Its professional 'night vision' lens' allows it to clearly capture anything happening in the dark night.

The exterior camera comes equipped with the low vision light sensor to offer bright visuals of the outside while an interior camera is equipped with the IR dual filter to offer more realistic and credible night vision recordings.  Traquer always maintains the best performance in different light environment day and night.

During Emergency get help from High Quality Driving Footage

Traquer actively records everything in high-quality video resolution, both interior & exterior of the vehicle which can help in evaluating the damage after an accident.

Capturing Incidents with Impressive Battery

Traquer keeps recording for 10 minutes even after the ignition is turned off or there is no power supply to capture everything happening around your car.

Its a 'Smart' Dashcam

Plug it into your car cigarette lighter socket. It will start video recording based on the vehicle ignition status. It will turn on video recording when the ignition is ‘ON’ and vice versa.

Use ‘Auto Power Mode’ to record the video for another 5 minutes using the inbuilt battery then it will automatically move into Sleep Mode.

Traquer Senses and Protects your Vehicle against Misuse & Theft

Equip your vehicle with these cutting-edge road safety technologies to add confidence and assurance to your drive. 

Upon detecting any intrusive motion Traquer will send SMS or Alert Notification to the owner.

Feeling Unsafe? Send out an alert using SOS Button

For Additional safety, each Traquer is built with an SOS feature. 

So if the situation ever feels unsafe, the passenger can send out an alarm.

It will send a distress call to the emergency contact to make them aware of the situation. 

SOS Extension Button: Traquer also comes with an SOS extension button which can be placed anywhere around the back seats so the passengers can reach out to it instantly in case they feel threatened or insecure during the ride. 

Social Media

Like our social media handles and keep yourself in sync with latest Traquer updates.

Project Timeline

One Year Limited Warranty

We offer one year warranty for our Traquer, applicable to both US and International Buyers.

Risks & Challenges

Traquer is currently the world's first live streaming, dual camera dashcam with GPS and Wi-Fi hotspot. There is no risk associated with buying this product, it’s been thoroughly tested on a rough prototype.

This Indiegogo campaign marks a new era for us, our mission is to create such dashcams that allow users to capture splendid moments and boost the security of their vehicle.

We sincerely hope we will get your support to achieve this.
story_txt:
Traquer is an advanced dashboard camera which offers live streaming capability, dual camera setup along with GPS tracking, Wi-Fi Hotspot connectivity & with more 20 plus Advance Features.Traquer allows you to keep your loved ones and vehicles safe by monitoring the movement & location of your vehicle as well as the passenger through the dual camera and live streaming on your smartphone.
Capture, Record & LiveStream Unexpected Events
When it comes to our loved ones, we always want to ensure their safety especially when riding in the car. That’s why there is Traquer- a unique live-streaming dashcam to keep you and your passenger safe.Traquer comes with two wide lens cameras. One for the interior and other to cover the outside of the car. These cameras monitor your vehicle's live movements from anywhere in the world using the web or your smartphone.This multi-functional gadget not only ensures safety but also tracks your vehicle with its built-in GPS.  You will always know about your car’s location to prevent misuse or theft. Upon starting your vehicle, the camera will automatically and continuously record on the included Micro-SD card. Please note that the new record will automatically overwrite the oldest records. Keep vigilant eyes on your vehicle with Live Video Streaming in HD QualityHD Quality Live Streaming allows you to capture everything happening inside & outside of the vehicle.Two cameras working together to eliminate blind spots in your video recording.  A picture in picture display will let you have a clear view from inside and outside of your car with live streaming support right to your smartphone.Get to see everything happening Inside & Outside of your vehicleTraquer has two cameras that allow you to record videos simultaneously from two different perspectives. One camera captures the road ahead of you while other captures the inside of the car. Keep an eye on your kids with Traquer's dual camera while they go to school and friend's house. Commercial users can monitor the behavior of their drivers while interacting with the customers and clients.Important Note: If you use the Traquer to record the inside of your commercial vehicle then you must have a warning sticker in your car to inform your passengers that they are being recorded. Track your vehicle location and analyze driving behavior with advanced GPSGet to know your vehicle location, direction and varied driving events in real time.You can even set 'geo-fences' wherein you will get instant alerts if your vehicles drive out of the marked zone. Traquer records each and every driving behavior such as Sudden Acceleration, Sudden Breaking, Sharp Turns, Speedometer Record etc. and sends out an alert to your smartphone. Traquer Dashcam with Wi-Fi Hotspot, Never lose internet on the RoadTurn on Wi-Fi hotspot to share internet with other smart devices like phone, tablet and laptops.Bringing Security with Impeccable Ease-of-useTraquer doesn’t require tampering with your vehicle’s wiring which can void your warranty. Simply plug it into the universal car lighter socket and you are good to go.Boost connectivity and communication within your vehicleListening to your favorite music or taking calls wirelessly becomes a constraint within a vehicle. Every vehicle doesn't have all the modern connectivity & communication solutions which are in vogue at the moment. Similarly having a vehicle from last decade will mean losing on the Bluetooth connectivity or even having modern vehicles will not get you the coveted Wi-Fi hotspot.Traquer aptly acts as a bridge with which you can connect multiple devices while on a drive.We had worked on improving the quality of connectivity & communication within vehicles by integrating these three features in the Traquer dashcam.
Bluetooth
Wi-Fi Hotspot
Two-Way Audio Communication
Take Calls & Play Music Wirelessly with Built-In BluetoothConnect your mobile with Traquer’s built-in Bluetooth to take calls or play music effortlessly like never before.Just like a standard mobile you can make or receive calls on Traquer using Bluetooth.Just Like Your Phone: Traquer also acts as your standard phone as it possesses a SIM card slot in it. This means you can make calls using this unique dashcam without any hassle. It can come in handy in a situation where your phone battery dies and you are required to make an important call on the move. Traquer with a phone like features simply boosts your connectivity options while on the move. Wi-Fi Hotspot makes it easier and more convenient to remain connectedRemain connected to the internet on the move with inbuilt Wi-Fi Hotspot. Connect your smartphone, tablet or laptop to access internet within the vehicle without any hassles.Get phone intercom like feature in your vehicle with Two Way AudioTalk with driver and passengers with ease and simplicity with interactive two-way communication possible through app-based intercom feature powered by built-in microphone and speaker.Two-way audio enables you to receive and transmit audio through the Traquer's dual camera setup.  Traquer has built-in speaker and microphone with intelligent noise reduction support allowing you to listen to the clear sound.You can listen to the passenger's conversation upon pick up and speak with them from your phone while your voice will be heard via dashboard speakers. This will also allow your driver to have a hands free conversation with the caller.Retrieve your vehicle tracking Data from Cloud with few clicks - Value Added FeatureAccess and download your entire vehicle tracking data along with video footage records from the cloud storage to your smartphone or desktop.Continuously Recording driving footage with 'Loop Recording'Traquer records continuously and when your card is full, it deletes the old redundant videos automatically. There is no need to delete videos manually. It also has an important video lock feature which helps in keeping important videos locked and safe from deletion.In case of unexpected acceleration or collision with other vehicles detected by the G-sensor then a sequence of 10 seconds will be automatically saved, locked and secured to your microSD card. G-sensor also enables recording in case of any vibration caused by a forced entry or hit to the car. Traquer will automatically record 10 seconds video (5 seconds before and after the collision) upon any hitting detection. It will be enough to provide a video evidence in case of an accident, damage or some other crucial road incidents and it will aid you in making successful insurance claims.Don't miss out on anything when it goes darkOnce the light is insufficient Traquer will turn to 'night vision' to capture a clear and vibrant driving footage. Its professional 'night vision' lens' allows it to clearly capture anything happening in the dark night.The exterior camera comes equipped with the low vision light sensor to offer bright visuals of the outside while an interior camera is equipped with the IR dual filter to offer more realistic and credible night vision recordings.  Traquer always maintains the best performance in different light environment day and night.During Emergency get help from High Quality Driving FootageTraquer actively records everything in high-quality video resolution, both interior & exterior of the vehicle which can help in evaluating the damage after an accident.Capturing Incidents with Impressive BatteryTraquer keeps recording for 10 minutes even after the ignition is turned off or there is no power supply to capture everything happening around your car.Its a 'Smart' DashcamPlug it into your car cigarette lighter socket. It will start video recording based on the vehicle ignition status. It will turn on video recording when the ignition is ‘ON’ and vice versa.Use ‘Auto Power Mode’ to record the video for another 5 minutes using the inbuilt battery then it will automatically move into Sleep Mode.Traquer Senses and Protects your Vehicle against Misuse & TheftEquip your vehicle with these cutting-edge road safety technologies to add confidence and assurance to your drive. Upon detecting any intrusive motion Traquer will send SMS or Alert Notification to the owner.Feeling Unsafe? Send out an alert using SOS ButtonFor Additional safety, each Traquer is built with an SOS feature. So if the situation ever feels unsafe, the passenger can send out an alarm.It will send a distress call to the emergency contact to make them aware of the situation. SOS Extension Button: Traquer also comes with an SOS extension button which can be placed anywhere around the back seats so the passengers can reach out to it instantly in case they feel threatened or insecure during the ride. Social MediaLike our social media handles and keep yourself in sync with latest Traquer updates.Project TimelineOne Year Limited WarrantyWe offer one year warranty for our Traquer, applicable to both US and International Buyers.Risks & ChallengesTraquer is currently the world's first live streaming, dual camera dashcam with GPS and Wi-Fi hotspot. There is no risk associated with buying this product, it’s been thoroughly tested on a rough prototype.This Indiegogo campaign marks a new era for us, our mission is to create such dashcams that allow users to capture splendid moments and boost the security of their vehicle.We sincerely hope we will get your support to achieve this.

story:
Shot in Ex-Yu deserted military base / airport in Zaton, Croatia, 2016

Short Summary Of A Journey Of A Lifetime

I am a man who was given a name Nikica by the names of my both grandfathers who were both called Nikola. Just recently St. Nicholas was celebrated in Croatia & he is a protector of travelers too. Due to my name & my vocation as a traveler along with my Twingo, there surely ain’t no end to my voyage!

Twingo is kind of a cult car which was made to last long & very rarely breaks down but even if it breaks down it’s not so expansive to repair it! My Twingo & me are together since the early 2016 & in the middle of the same year it drove me on the long way from Croatia to Bulgaria. On that voyage I made a lot of photos on which we posed together. Some of these photos along with the texts were posted on several web sites & exposed to a large number of people (links to these posts you can find in this document).

I am mostly interested in natural & cultural heritage of the people & the countries I’m planning to visit. Most of all I like combining those two in an unbreakable oneness of unity, cause almost always nature of some place/area defines its people’s culture. But the process can be completely the opposite: Culture effects the nature too!

So, I’ll be visiting the local traditional & underground events of art & culture like: concerts, parties, exhibitions, celebrations, street parades, etc. I will also try to get involved in those happenings contacting & meeting the people in charge – the organizers of all these activities to participate directly & actively in them. I hope in collaborating with other artists on the way… In every activity I which I manage to get involved, I will try my best to document it with photos & videos!

I’ll be exploring the natural beauties everywhere around & learning about the local naturally growing wild plants & mushrooms & picking them if it would be the right time. In these activities my Twingo will surely help me by driving me here & there, from the sea level to the high mountain peaks, from the ferry boats in urban environments to the off road sights of the natural jewels! I’ll also be volunteering in projects if I sense & recognize that somewhere my help is needed! As usual, I will surely continue to play music in the streets of many different cities I visit!

Every day I’ll try my best to record & edit videos, shoot photos & write texts & report about everything happening to me. These reports will be visible on several pages where I regularly interact with public every day & there you will be able to follow my travel progress! I can assure you that you’ll be witnessing one unique, unusual & exciting travel experience!

Why did I decided to travel with my personal car – Renault Twingo? Mainly cause of the practical reasons: Till now, I had only positive experiences with it. It took me everywhere I wanted to go. The longest distance was my trip to Bulgaria in 2016 when I passed the Croatian coastline of Dalmatia & several islands, Monte Negro, Kosovo, Macedonia, Bulgaria, Serbia & back home – altogether approx. 3 700 km – on this distance it broke down only once & it was the gas pump & when we changed it, Twingo was ready to fly again! It gives me a higher level of independence in moving around, carrying all of my work equipment (drums, laptop, photo-video gadgets…) & other luggage. It’s giving me the opportunity to give someone a lift if needed. I’ll be also offering a lift over the car sharing apps & sites!

I calculated that I will pass 10 648 km in total starting from Croatia & passing through Slovenia, Italy, Monaco, France, Spain, Morocco (where I’ll stay the longest – 54 days), Portugal, than again Spain & France, towards the North to Belgium, Netherlands, Germany, Czech Republic, Austria, Slovenia again & back home. The trip will last for 163 days what is approx. 4,5 months during which I will need to eat something & sleep somewhere – so that’s another reason for asking for your help! I calculated that my travel expanses will be in total of 12 535,23 €.

To achieve all of this I need your help – every donation is very welcomed & appreciated!

Itinerary

Start from Opatija (Croatia) → Venezia (Italy) → Bologna (Italy) → Genova (Italy) → Monaco → Marseille (France) → Montpellier (France) → Perpignan (France) → Barcelona (Spain) → Valencia (Spain) → Murcia (Spain) → Almeria (Spain) → Malaga (Spain) → Tanger (Morocco) → Larache (Morocco) → Rabat (Morocco) → Casablanca (Morocco) → Settat (Morocco) → Safi (Morocco) → Agadir (Morocco) → Marrakesh (Morocco) → Beni-Mellal (Morocco) → Fes (Morocco) → Taounate (Morocco) → Chefchaouen (Morocco) → Tetouan (Morocco) → Cadiz (Spain) → Sevilla (Spain) → Lagos (Portugal) → Lisboa (Portugal) → Caceres (Spain) → Madrid (Spain) → Zaragoza (Spain) → Pau (France) → Bordeaux (France) → Poitiers (France) → Pariz (France) → Bruxelles (Belgium) → Amsterdam (Netherlands) → Dusseldorf (Germany) → Hannover (Germany) → Berlin (Germany) → Dresden (Germany) → Praha (Czech Republic) → Wien (Austria) → Graz (Austria) → Ljubljana (Slovenia) → coming back to Opatija (Croatia)

“Wind In The Beard”, wind power plant on the island Pag, Croatia, 2016

What I Need - Financial back-up:

10 684 km x 0,3 €/km + 360 € (ferry Spain-Morocco-Spain) = 3 565,20 € for gas & other road expanses

163 days x 20 €/day = 3 260,00 € of pocket money

163 days x 25 €/day = 4 075,00 € for accommodation

Altogether: 10 900,20 € + 15 % (insurance if anything goes out of the plan) = 12 535,23 €

I'm actually asking 7 000,00 € of the whole amount of my travel expanses but every cent exceeding the amount will be spent in achieving many of the goals of this voyage, for example for car breakdowns, designing & publishing the book, editing & publishing the DVD documentary, etc.

What You Get / What Do I Offer - In Return?

To Donors:

  • As I am a president of NGO Akt (https://www.facebook.com/udruga.akt/) where many of our members produce different handmade accessories (woolen clothes - caps, scarfs, sweaters, gloves, socks, jewelry, bags...), there will be a rich perk program for donors! (more info under "perks") For almost each donation, a handmade item will be sent to your home address!
  • Some of the perks will be in the form of a copy of the book & / or a copy of a DVD documentary about the voyage which will be sent to your home address for free!
  • Every donor will be listed in my Google Contacts (if wanted) & will be receiving a newsletter of every step of my voyage (optional).

To Sponsors:

PLATINUM SPONSORSHIP - 1 000,00 €

GOLDEN SPONSORSHIP - 700,00 €

SILVER SPONSORSHIP - 500,00 €

BRONZE SPONSORSHIP - 300,00 €

If you choose to be a sponsor, goodwill about your sponsorship will be heard far & wide!

If you choose to be a donor, you will be able to experience & live through all of my adventures like you are travelling with me cause I'll do my best to give you the best materials to enjoy in them & you'll be the first to know about them! (& don't forget to see the perks!)

In both cases, if you become a sponsor or a donor, you will enable my goals come true! These goals are not only of my personal growth to gain experience in life cause due to my acts along the way you will also enable connecting of people, nations & mixing of their cultures reaching a higher mutual respect. I'll be spreading only the messages of love, peace, unity & respect. I'll put a special accent on ecology (even thou Twingo is powered by gas) & respecting the natural wealth all around us, together with all the other living creatures by promoting the vegetarian diet. The journey will have educational & artistic purpose too! As I said before, I'll get involved in the local artistic programs as much as possible & surely be studying about the new edible & medicinal species of plants & mushrooms & be presenting them to the world!

Some similar records I did already & you can check them out on the following links:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YnpJg7KKYoA

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0906dIcV-PQ

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cN1VXEEU36w

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Aw6-BGlEwws

https://bit.ly/2GzZG9D

https://bit.ly/2EKWvu1

https://bit.ly/2Sf4D9h

https://bit.ly/2V5c5Wr

Risks & Challenges

I'm always trying to think positively but there are always possibilities of troubles. The first way to cope with troubles & problems is to not to think about them cause your thoughts can materialize! So, I have no particular plans for coping with any particular problem cause there's not gonna be any! If still any problem / trouble turns up, I won't approaching it as it is a problem or a trouble! It's just a test.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't back me up with the financial resources, you can help me in many different ways:

1. You can share this campaign among your friends who maybe have some spare finances & are ready to support these kind of adventures.

2. You can host me somewhere on my journey if I'm passing close / through your town.

3. Engage me to make photography on some event in your town or to record a video, to perform music on a festival or whatever goes through your mind! Present me your idea, so that I can see if I like it & would want to join your project!

4. Maybe you have some other idea which can help me on my voyage & in the same time I can help you with something else?!

Feel free to contact me: careass@gmail.com // +385 92 372 0382

Thanks in advance for everything

you do to help me!

story:
LITE NIGHT LIGHT - a LED Light Stick that fits in your pocket, suitable for all occasions

The Lite Nite Light is both robust, portable, safe, and decorative.

A transparent 10cm stick consisting of an energy efficient bright LED light array. The light can be powered by any power bank or mains charger.

 

The USB stick and cover conveniently fits into any pocket or bag. The device can be attached to any USB power bank or USB charger to provide instant panoramic warm white light for any situation. 

 

The USB stick consist of light emitting diodes (LED) fitted in a transparent case with keyhole at the end and a male USB attachment and dust cover.

 

The light stick can be attached to any USB charger or power bank to provide a clear warm white panoramic light equivalent to approximately 40 W tungsten light bulb/ 280-300 lumen.

 

On/off and dimmer sensor can be operated on both sides of the light stick.

The Lite Nite Light has a low power consumption of 2.2W.

The low energy consumption gives an operating temperature of 40 deg C maximum in constant normal use.

30 hours of constant use for a typical 25,000 mph power bank .  Lite Nite Light has a multiple of instant and continuous uses both indoor and outdoors.

A universal, decorative, safe, mobile and convenient source of light.

 

Timeline

Risks and challenges

Technical Challenge: This is our first Indiegogo project and Team faced numerous challenges due to technical difficulty to make LITE LIGHT NITE bright enough for outdoor use as well as a acceptable operating temperature. We spent more time than we initially expected during the R&D stage thus technical bugs are mostly eliminated and functions are ready for our backers.  

Funding:  Even though we had successfully fund this project in other crowdfunding site, due to inexperience in setting our target, the amount raised are not sufficient for us to move forward with mass production. We are hoping to raise sufficient fund this time so that we can move forward to bring more LIGHT to this unprecedented time.

Who are We:  Techpower x Ezlife Team is made up of specialists from different sectors with expertise in developing, design, production and marketing. We are passionate individuals that wish to incorporate design, technology and environmental friendly elements in our projects.

Design: Techpower x Ezlife aims to create our product user friendly. Therefore, LITE NIGHT NITE fits in any interior settings and outdoor environment. The size of LITE NIGHT NITE is optimal and brightness of the LED light has been maximized.

Delivery: We expect to release the product by the end of April 2021. The release date would be obeyed unless severe technical or logistical issue.

We are hoping to raise sufficient fund this time so that we can move forward to bring more LIGHT to this unprecedented time.Who are We:  Techpower x Ezlife Team is made up of specialists from different sectors with expertise in developing, design, production and marketing. We are passionate individuals that wish to incorporate design, technology and environmental friendly elements in our projects.Design: Techpower x Ezlife aims to create our product user friendly. Therefore, LITE NIGHT NITE fits in any interior settings and outdoor environment. The size of LITE NIGHT NITE is optimal and brightness of the LED light has been maximized.Delivery: We expect to release the product by the end of April 2021. The release date would be obeyed unless severe technical or logistical issue.

story:
After having loved ones lose their homes and nearly their lives in California wildfires, hurricane Katrina, and multiple car accidents, we spent years studying what would be necessary to be prepared for almost any disaster situation. Combining Richard's experience using his engineering degree while working for the Dept. of Defense and my passion and years of research into preparedness, we have used every tool and connection at our disposal to design and compile the "72". We have consulted with paramedics, doctors, Special forces members and fellow preparedness minded individuals to come up with the most complete high quality yet affordable emergency bag on the market. 

The "72" is designed to be stored in your car or left at your office where you can have fast access to it in the event of an emergency. If you or another is endangered, you may have only seconds to get access to necessary supplies for survival.

Check out our Rewards below and join us in bringing the RediBags 72 to your car, home, and office! Snag these deals at a steep discount when you join us here on Indiegogo. Doing so allows us reach our Minimum Order Quantities and give you the best price possible. 

As with any project, we can plan and forecast but we have to be prepared for unexpected delays we may run into. Designing a high quality multi-compartment bag and assembling this great kit of survival tools is a complex project.Throughout the process we commit to being open, honest, and transparent about our progress. Check out our projected timeline below to see the details!

RISKS AND CHALLENGES:

The RediBags™ "72" represents my first experience launching a product and first Indiegogo project. That being the case, I run the risk of having issues arise that I haven't had to address before. Thankfully, my business partner, Richard Rhett, has successfully funded two separate crowdfunded campaigns and has run his own company for 4 years so he's an invaluable resource.

When we set out to build the "72" we decided to do it right or not to do it at all. One of our biggest challenges will be overseeing the production of the backpack. We have already received samples from a manufacturer, however as is the case whenever you're manufacturing and importing a product, there is the risk of miscommunication and delays. We are confident we have mitigated those risks as much as humanly possible but they are still real.

 

Jarred and Richard appreciate your support and feedback in this campaign. We look forward to helping families across the United States prepare for the unexpected!

story:
We at ELV are passionate about providing a highly comfortable experience to our customers.

 

This Retractable ID Badge Holder secures all your keys, ID badges and other important tools in one place.

Experience superior versatile functionality with a hook design that lets you attach not just keys & ID cards but also small tools like pliers, nail clippers, pocket knives, flashlights, screwdrivers, bottle openers, multi-tools and more! Our retractable badge holder is engineered with a 24" high grade plastic laminated steel cable that extends & glides smoothly for easy access and won't wear out with regular daily use.

 

We know that quality matters for active daily use. That’s why we’ve engineered this cord for superior durability and supreme satisfying smoothness every time you pull, with strongly-wrapped steel wire and smooth-gliding plastic laminate coating. Our Metal Keychain also features a built-in clip to conveniently attach to your belt or pants.

Designed with a durable metal casing that’s impact-resistant and weatherproof for use in any active indoor or outdoor environment:

Residential construction sites

Industrial manufacturing plants

Commercial & retail spaces

Bars & restaurants

Offices & classrooms

Hiking & camping

Hunting & fishing

It is crafted from high-quality zinc alloy that holds up under the toughest conditions. The carabiner has a key ring attachment for extra carrying capacity!

 

Always have a backup plan with this heavy duty zinc alloy carabiner – included for you at no additional cost! This gunmetal gray carabiner comes designed with a key ring attachment or can be used on a backpack to carry water bottles, travel pouches, neck pillows and any extra supplies. Never run out of options with this awesome 2-for-1 combination carrying set!

Carry with Confidence!!!

Assembly

story:
My name is?

Hello my name is Niko Katušić and I'm a junior student at RIT Croatia college. I started working when I was 14 years old and evolved from my first job of washing cars to a being a student supervisor in a rent a car agency. I'm a positive person and I really like to put all my creativity into work.  Recently I manged two small businesses so that I can pay my own tuitions for the college. Being the president of Student Government and keeping the chair position at Ritz gala dinner event I’m working and managing 30 students. Some of my strengths are leadership, problem-solving and entrepreneurship spirit. Also I’m a member of Eta Sigma Delta Honour society for best students in hospitality Management.

Location???

Dubrovnik is a well known tourist destination situated in Croatia. Every year we are counting more then million tourists. Being in the centre of tourism I have a new idea of creating facilities which can be used as new accomodation for any traveler willing to explore and spend more time with family and friends.

Tiny House Resort is...

Place where big is actually small. Trying to live in houses of 20, 40 or 50 square meters and traveling with just one suitcase. Sounds good? Actually it is, being in accomodation made 100% of eco-friendly materials and at the same time enjoying the new definition of luxury resort.

It is important because…

This project is important for me because it is something new, different and eco-friendly. I want to create an entire village of tiny houses that are eco certified. As I'm a hospitality student by implementing my idea I'm creating a new definition of traveling and being involved into exploring new places. This kind of concept drives you into the direction where you need just one suitcase to travel and to stay in a tiny place which is an game changing process. Being in the open and actually playing, resting or even exploring keeps you away from every day routines that we have in hotels or normal apartments. I'm thinking big and starting my project in Dubrovnik as a test model but after a few years it can be transformed into a franchise business with a lot of opportunities for sea side places or ski resorts. 

Donate?

Every dollar donated is like one step ahead for me and my dream come true. By opening a tiny house resort my idea is to employee just students and to provide an opportunity for others to learn and be involved in the tourism industry. My moto is going beyond expected every single day. So brining up this project is all about experience and learning processes.

 

What We Need

We need 54,000 dollars to start with the Tiny House Village resort. For each Tiny house we need 7,000 and a plan is to start with a 6 small houses. Each house will be produced with an eco-friendly materials and the specific cost for the house frame is 5,000 dollars and for furniture 800 dollars per each house. So after that we can install eco-toilets and solar panels with a cost of 1,200 dollars. With 12,000 dollars we need to adjust the property, plant trees, create lounge and hanging areas, outdoor fireplace and other details such as electricity panels, boilers and so on.

What You Get

Help create an entire Tiny House Village resort by purchasing our coupons. Imagine being the first to stay in the beautiful Dubrovnik oasis in a tiny house. Being the first to experience new definition of traveling and hospitality service. Start now because there is limited number of coupons.

Your name will be written on the walls of each Tiny House to keep you a part of our community.

If our goal of 54,000 dollars is not reached after our campaign, we will use that money for developing just one house which will be used as a model to keep going with our dream and living small by presenting it to the local government and other potential investors.

The Impact

Being involved we are creating a new hospitality concept which can accommodate more and more tourists who are interested in exploring and keeping nature safe. Tiny House Village resort is used as a model of brining awareness how big hotels have an impacts on the environment. Living small can provide the same level of luxury but with a big difference in price. Being affordable families, friends, couples can enjoy the peaceful atmosphere and something new that is not existing. By traveling with a one suitcase we are inviting you to have fun on your vacation through group games, exploring safaris and involving you in real life culture assignments. We are creating a new unique experience by simply caring about you and your preferences.

Risks & Challenges

The challenge we are facing is connecting luxury and nature. WI-FI, air-condition or television are commodities that people use every single day but our risk is how to implement those in our houses and stay eco-friendly. One of the ideas is to create one logging place such as a camp fire and display them all there and every other Tiny house should be technology free so that guests can enjoy life without every technology.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you find this concept good or you can see potential in it please share, like or just tell your friends. Because one dollar for you might be a small step but for us it is a giant one and one more step to achieving our goal.

Thank you for reading this proposal and hopefully you are one of our future guests in our Tiny House Village resort.

Because it is all about experience.

story:
Who are we?

We are a group of professional dancers, cameraman and a blogger from Riga, Latvia. Together we’re going to travel around the European countries with a caravan bus and perform Street Dancing showcases.

What is Dancing Europe?

The “Dancing Europe” project was started in 2009. We were 13 people from Latvia and Estonia back then and had been traveling around the Europe for 44 days. The money we earned sometimes covered gasoline, food and other expenses to keep on going, sometimes it was way not enough. But since then, we already had 5 dancing trips around Europe and this year, after 4 years break, we want to continue traveling the world, performing on the streets and spreading the street dance culture where it belongs – back to the streets.

What are our goals?

Founded by professional dancers, the “Dancing Europe” project is all about culture. Our goals are to improve dance and street art culture in Europe, support cultural exchange, popularize the healthy lifestyle and to motivate and encourage younger generation as well as explore European street art culture.

What is our travel route?

This year we are planning to visit:

  • Riga, Latvia (start) →
  • Lithuania →
  • Poland   →
  • Berlin, Germany  →
  • Vaduz, Lichtenstein  →
  • Zurich & Geneva, Switzerland  →          
  • Lyon, France  → Barcelona, Spain  →
  • Andorra la Vella, Andorra  →
  • Marseille, St.-Tropez, Cannes & Nice, France →
  • Monte Carlo, Monaco  →
  • Florence & Venice, Italy →
  • Vienna, Austria →
  • Czech Republic   →
  • Poland →
  • Lithuania →
  • Riga, Latvia (finish)

Saw your country or city on the list? Text us and stay tuned! We are always happy to connect with wonderful people!

What are our travel expenses? 

With the approximate 6300 Eur of total expences, we need your help and support to get the caravan designed for 7 persons and a gasoline for 19 days to get through 13 countries, 16 cities and a total distance around 8000km and perform on the streets.

  • Caravan rent– caravan price is 110 euros per day.
  • Road Taxes – main road taxes between European cities.
  • Gasoline – considering that average price of Diesel in Europe is 1.5 euro  per liter and average Caravan consumption is 15 liters per 100 km.
  • Food – average amount of money for food for 7 persons in 19 days
  • Preparation expenses - all the expenses that need to be done before the trip in Riga (speaker, costumes, camera rent, European Wi-Fi adapter, etc.)
  • Indiegogo platform fees & taxes

Reaching the necessary amount of money, we will be able to make best of ourselves and give maximum energy to public without thinking how to make ends meet. Having you by our side, we’re going to make an unforgettable adventure for everybody!

What else do we need?

  • Some trip necessary resources (water, energy drinks, food, snacks, clothes, video/photo equipment)
  • Media support
  • Typography service for banners-stickers and flyers printing
  • Music speaker

story:
Hey guys and gals, friends classmates and teachers.

My girlfriend and I finally plan on returning to Canada!!! Hooray!

I know right! Well we plan on visiting friends in Vancouver, then go to the Niagara Falls (my Gf always wanted to go there) , and on the way we'll drop by Toronto to meet up with you guys.

Can't wait to introduce her to everyone. After our stay in Toronto we'll return to Vancouver and settle there for good with a down-payment Bros and gals, traveling is expensive lol, and Im broke haha. So hope ya'll can pitch in :) BTW the donations cover the flight tickets, hotel fees, food and the big down payment.

 

Thank you guys for chippin in

story:
Ride de Vuelta is one of the first premier inclusive adventure travel companies that focus on providing snowboard and surf classes, courses and tours to the general public but with a focus on people with different disabilities.  Mick Jackson who is from California and the founder of Ride de Vuelta has been to Chile several times during his snowboard career.  As of three years ago, Mick decided to move to Chile after meeting Carolina Gonzalez, a former special education teacher from the Institution of Teresiana in Santiago. They decided to combine both of their passions of snowboarding and teaching people with disabilities to create Ride de Vuelta with the ambition to provide everyone equal opportunities to learn these incredible sports and to experience amazing places in Chile while providing absolute quality and safe services.

With the Southern Hemisphere snow season right around the corner, we have discovered an innovative snowboard rig from Dutch start-up Prodaptive that can transform access to the winter sport. The state-of-the-art Twinrider rig offers people without use of their lower body full control of their snowboard, providing them with a truly independent riding experience.

We look to incorporate this innovative tool into our service in 2015 to provide people with disabilities the opportunity to experience something they never thought possible. 

These rigs will allow Ride de Vuelta to break barriers and enable people to build self-esteem by achieving demanding goals, learning from adversity and being part of a group effort.  We have already seen firsthand how people’s lives can change with this leaning experience and with these products and your support we can trigger a paradigmatic change allowing more people with disabilities to enjoy Chile’s the slopes and debunking myths that a person's disability prevents them from learning how to ride. 

We all can do it!

What We Need 

Ride de Vuelta requires $10,000 US to purchase two adaptive snowboards for the upcoming snow season.  One is for adults and the other is for children ages 9+. We want to be the first to provide this wonderful learning opportunity in Chile.  Let's make it happen!

What You Get

Perks you ask? Set your faces to stunned!

1.)  $10.00: Free tip on how to snowboard or surf.

2.)  $25.00: A photo of the first day with the lucky person riding the product.

3.)  $50.00:  A photo of the first day with lucky person riding the product along with a signature from one of our professional Chilean snowboard athletes.

4.)  $100.00: A Ride de Vuelta T-shirt and a Thank You card.

5.)  $250.00:  We will provide 2 trips free for 2 people with different disabilities to use the product and send you a signed photo of them using the product.

6.)  $500.00:  One free snowboard trip with Ride de Vuelta and a Ride de Vuelta T-shirt.

7.)  $1,000.00:  2 day snowboard course in Chile with Ride de Vuelta  and a Ride de Vuelta T-shirt.

Impact

The impact will be ferocious. There are very few opportunities for people to utilize adaptive sports equipment in Chile and it is Ride de Vuelta's vision that everyone has the opportunity to participate.  We aim to make it happen by being the first in Chile to provide this adaptive snowboard machine for peope with disabilities and demonstrating that everyone has the ability to join in.

OUR STORY

Mick Jackson, California native and founder of Ride de Vuelta, visited Chile several times during his snowboarding career and as of 2012 calls the South American nation his home.  After meeting Carolina Gonzalez, a special education teacher at the Teresiana Institute in Santiago, they decided to combine their passion for snowboarding, surfing and teaching people with disabilities to set up Ride de Vuelta in 2014. Their goal is to promote social inclusion by providing unified opportunities to experience these incredible sports and to experience amazing places in Chile. 

Over the past year Ride de Vuelta has had the privilege of working with many amazing people with and without disabilities and has seen how these sports can dramatically improve the quality of ones' life. 

We have provided an abundant amount of pro-bono snowboard classes, courses and tours for people with disabilities throughout Chile in a unified environment with family and friends.  We have even given lessons to Paralympian Athletes such as   gold medalists Juan Carlos Garrido.

We are also in the process of organizing Chile’s very first snowboard championship forpeople with disabilities with the participation of professional snowboard athletes.

Not only this, Ride de Vuelta is also developing a program to take students from low income families to the mountains for one weekend during the season each month to teach them how to snowboard along with many other activities.  

Ride de Vuelta has even been feature in various newspapers and on the radio and is constantly in the process of discovering new ideas to provide everyone the opportunity to learn how to snowboard along with the therapeutic advantages involved.

Our Challenge
One of the biggest challenges we face is that there is very little funding and support these types of initiatives.  However, our objective is to demonstrate the emotional benefit gained by participating in something was never thought possible and to encourage those around to do the same in order to strengthen understanding, community and appreciation for diversity.

Other Ways You Can Help

All support is very much appreciated and if you can help with fundraising today please help us get the word out on social media by using the share functions to the top left.
