These rigs will allow Ride de Vuelta to break barriers and enable people to build self-esteem by achieving demanding goals, learning from adversity and being part of a group effort.  We have already seen firsthand how people’s lives can change with this leaning experience and with these products and your support we can trigger a paradigmatic change allowing more people with disabilities to enjoy Chile’s the slopes and debunking myths that a person's disability prevents them from learning how to ride. 
We all can do it!
What We Need 
 Ride de Vuelta requires $10,000 US to purchase two adaptive snowboards for the upcoming snow season.  One is for adults and the other is for children ages 9+. We want to be the first to provide this wonderful learning opportunity in Chile.  Let's make it happen!
What You Get
Perks you ask? Set your faces to stunned!
1.)  $10.00: Free tip on how to snowboard or surf.
2.)  $25.00: A photo of the first day with the lucky person riding the product.
3.)  $50.00:  A photo of the first day with lucky person riding the product along with a signature from one of our professional Chilean snowboard athletes.
4.)  $100.00: A Ride de Vuelta T-shirt and a Thank You card.
5.)  $250.00:  We will provide 2 trips free for 2 people with different disabilities to use the product and send you a signed photo of them using the product.
6.)  $500.00:  One free snowboard trip with Ride de Vuelta and a Ride de Vuelta T-shirt.
7.)  $1,000.00:  2 day snowboard course in Chile with Ride de Vuelta  and a Ride de Vuelta T-shirt.
    Impact
The impact will be ferocious. There are very few opportunities for people to utilize adaptive sports equipment in Chile and it is Ride de Vuelta's vision that everyone has the opportunity to participate.  We aim to make it happen by being the first in Chile to provide this adaptive snowboard machine for peope with disabilities and demonstrating that everyone has the ability to join in.

OUR STORY
Mick Jackson, California native and founder of Ride de Vuelta, visited Chile several times during his snowboarding career and as of 2012 calls the South American nation his home.  After meeting Carolina Gonzalez, a special education teacher at the Teresiana Institute in Santiago, they decided to combine their passion for snowboarding, surfing and teaching people with disabilities to set up Ride de Vuelta in 2014. Their goal is to promote social inclusion by providing unified opportunities to experience these incredible sports and to experience amazing places in Chile. 
Over the past year Ride de Vuelta has had the privilege of working with many amazing people with and without disabilities and has seen how these sports can dramatically improve the quality of ones' life. 
We have provided an abundant amount of pro-bono snowboard classes, courses and tours for people with disabilities throughout Chile in a unified environment with family and friends.  We have even given lessons to Paralympian Athletes such as   gold medalists Juan Carlos Garrido.
We are also in the process of organizing Chile’s very first snowboard championship forpeople with disabilities with the participation of professional snowboard athletes.
Not only this, Ride de Vuelta is also developing a program to take students from low income families to the mountains for one weekend during the season each month to teach them how to snowboard along with many other activities.  
Ride de Vuelta has even been feature in various newspapers and on the radio and is constantly in the process of discovering new ideas to provide everyone the opportunity to learn how to snowboard along with the therapeutic advantages involved.

Our Challenge

One of the biggest challenges we face is that there is very little funding and support these types of initiatives.  However, our objective is to demonstrate the emotional benefit gained by participating in something was never thought possible and to encourage those around to do the same in order to strengthen understanding, community and appreciation for diversity.
 Other Ways You Can Help
All support is very much appreciated and if you can help with fundraising today please help us get the word out on social media by using the share functions to the top left.

story:
Everytime while traveling I have the same problem, WHERE TO FIND SPACE FOR THE TRAVEL PILLOW. Normal sleeping pillow have one basic job to get you comfortable to your destination and later you don't need it but you have to carry it all the time. NEVER MORE.

We decided - no more compromises between space in a bag and comfort during traveling. We knew there have to be a way to take our staff and still have enough space for our sleeping pillow.

We use special designed bag, which is filled with yours clothes into a travel pillow. We invented MOOCHA. The most versatile sleeping pillow ever. With MOOCHA you will have the sleeping pillow, additional space and a small bag still with you.

We invite you to spend some time reading our story.

We are team of 2 young travellers and we woke up many times while backpacking with brocken neck.  But we don't have enough space in our backpacks for a pillow. And than  when we spend some time on city tour and we don't want to carry out bigpack with us, while we need only small bag for water, cellphone and some private staff. 

So we try to find a sollution, but there was no, even in the shop  or internet. No  product which will help us to have enough space  in our bags for gifts for our family and friends and still have  the place for pillow. So we decided to design and produce our own versatile pillow. And that's how MOOCHA born.

MOOCHA: light weight

                     compact

                     small packing

                    can take up to 11l of staff

                     versatility / make size that fits to you

                    possible to wash

 

We invented an prototype. And we started  travel with MOOCHA.

 

And we travel a lot.  Now we never leave out house without MOOCHA. We can say it is a big difference to travel with MOOCHA and of course much comfortable. Now decided to make one also for kids, because kids like to travel too and they like to sleep well while on trip of course.

 

MOOCHA: travel simpicity + minimalism

Space is always premium. No traveler enjoys the stress of not having enough space for gifts for family and friends. We have alleviated this problem by creating a filling sleeping pillow. 

Please join us. We need your help to improve MOOCHA into superMOOCHA. The design is perfectly shaped, the last step is to improve the material to be stronger and more comfortable for yours ultimate trips and for youngest travelers. Maybe we make our own design, everything depends on you.  

But nothing makes us more happier than seeing something we created benefiting lives of others. If we met you at the airport with MOOCHA you get a coffee from us.

story:
Hello! Meet our ZOOCORO family! 
 

PLAYBULB powered ZOOCORO is made up of Bluetooth speaker lights with a stylish design coming out of lovely animals and cartoon characters. It has four kinds of lighting effects with thousands of colors. The color and color effects can be changed by gently tapping it via the included shake button. At the same time it supports intelligent functions such as wireless charging, light brightness adjustment, time switch etc. In addition, the full interest and originality of ZOOCORO  can open the imagination of children.

 

 

 

 

 

 

16 million colors

Wireless Charging

 

APP Control


Tap To Change Color

 

Bluetooth Speaker

 

Set Timer

 

Group Control

You can group multiple ZOOCORO (up to 5) together to share the same color and lighting effect. Maximize color fun with more ZOOCORO!

 

PLAYBULB X gives you full control for ch­anging colors and activating special lig­hting effects. It is available as a FREE download through the Apple App Store and Goog­le Play.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

​

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

When we plan and design PLAYBULB, we didn’t plan just one product. We planned platform for the future of home lighting with a new definition - Smart & Fun.  When you back PLAYBULB, you are not backing a single product, you are backing whole series of PLAYBULB products. You are helping us to make our vision come true. 

 

 

 

About MIPOW

MIPOW, an authorized manufacturing licensee of Apple Inc., is a global leader in premium mobile device accessories and smart lighting solutions. We bring together a unique blend of industrial and electronic design, precision engineering and high quality manufacturing to create products with wide appeal to today's mobile generation. Our main products are:

  • Smart Lighting - PLAYBULB (Lighting product with mobile app control)
  • Smart Power (portable batteries/chargers)
  • Smart Audio (headsets and speakers using Bluetooth® wireless technology) 

Our functional and fashionable designs have won broad market acceptance as well as many prestigious awards including:
European Red-Dot Design Awards, International Forum iF Design Awards, GOOD DESIGN Awards and Macworld Asia The Best Awards. 

MIPOW takes pride in its innovation and holds 48 patents with more to come. These and many other accomplishments have positioned MIPOW amongst the leaders in product excellence. For more information about PLAYBULB products, please visit www.mipow.com 

 

 

Thank You for your support!

We appreciate your support in helping us achieve our dreams. We can’t wait to get these products in your hands.

We’re always working on innovative products at MIPOW. Here’s how you can stay in touch with future product launches, news and promotions: 

Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram

story:
What would you do with an old hotel that stands at the highest mountain-port in the Pyrenees (southern Europe) at 2400m high (8,000 ft) and needs a complete refurbishment after 30 years of running it during the winter seasons under severe weather conditions and with low year-long profitability?

What would you do it there is also an increasing demand for practising all year long countless types of mountain sports that provides excellent aerobic conditions and high altitude acclimatization like sky-running, ski touring, mountaineering and climbing, road and off-road mountain biking, swimming in altitude and alike?

Hi, my name is Pierino and I'm a confirmed entrepreneur expert in marketing and strategy that loves disruptive business models. I'm passionate of nature, photography, adventure sports and traveling.

I want to completely refurbish this 100-room hotel and turn it into the most energy efficient and sustainable construction with key improvements in all areas including water collection and re-use, thermal insulation, electricity efficiency, and the set up of top renewable energy technology. I’m talking about turning this energy and resources-glutton building, into a water supply and energy independent hotel (known as a “passive building”), dropping its environmental footprint from current untenable levels to nil, but keeping higher than expected comfort standards. The project will be a prototype that can be replicated to any other mountain guesthouse.

The site is perfect for outdoor activities. In summer there is off-road biking, trekking or trail racing (GR11.7 crossing right there and GR7 not far away), high performance mountain cycling like the “Purito” race (currently the hardest in the Pyrenees), and the possibility to organise the most exciting competitions in this mountain range, not to forget high-altitude accommodation for any mountaineer willing to acclimatize and train before any serious climb. Any mountain geek will be delighted with the calmness and enchantment of the area. In winter it sits on top of the biggest skiing resort in this range and one of the biggest in Europe, and is perfect for ski touring, snowshoes hiking, excursions in snowmobiles or even snow driving and watching the car races on ice Trophy “Andros” in the nearby Andorran Circuit for speed lovers. Great fun!

At 2400m high with snow up to second floor during the winter, log fires and spectacular views, the hotel will deliver an outstanding mountain experience. However this isolation means the building has been damaged by use and extreme weather conditions. It urges an entire refurbishment and a new market orientation.

This fundraising part will cover the first stage of the project: completing the draft that will pre-design the future premises and confirm the final project’s projection. Then another fundraising campaign will be launched to get the necessary funds to start with the retrofit works.  Seen the complexity of the project is clear that I will carry it out with a team of experts in each field, contacts that I already have: a team of architects specialized in energy renovation and bioclimatic architecture, an expert in organizing sports events and an expert group in hotel operation.

So this is my project, my visions and my legacy. Turning a unique high mountain old hotel into a reference in mountain sports following an energy efficiency and sustainability retrofit program. Besides it will also offer new and outstanding outdoor activities so that anybody can discover new experiences and, of course, the magic of this place. Your very welcome contribution will prevent the building to become another mountain wreck before long.

story:
Product Introduction

 

▲ JNA BP-501 quick access backpack

▲ Backpack back (backpack mode)

▲ Backpack back (handbag mode)

Strap can be hidden, backpack = handbag

For different occasions, the backpack match the clothes or with the environment changes, backpack = handbag, no matter what occasion, let you ease.

Handbag mode, easy to carry, also could place in the cabin or luggage, simple and stylish.

▲ Backpack front (handbag mode)

▲ Backpack back (handbag mode)

Backpack  detail

In order to "daily use," we designed many details around the backpack under the principle of "quick access." The purpose was for the convenience and safety of the backpack.

Backpack Compartments

Compartment A 

Backpack has three main pockets, with variety of different function bag, for the frequently used were pencil bag / wallet bag / mobile bag , Compartment A material containing foam could fully protect the items and make the backpack stylish.

▲ Compartment A for Mobile phone, keys, wallet, and pens.

Compartment B

Five small pockets for 3C products and a 15" laptop packet in compartment B. You can put 2~3 clothes and 1 shoes in compartment B as well.

Five small pockets for 3c products：10" ipad, power bank, earphone, calculators, keys,....etc.

▲Lay flat access for compartment B

▲ Many small pockets in compartment B.

▲ Red piping for pockets intensity. Holds up to a 15" Laptop in compartment B.

▲ Capacity in compartment B ：One Laptop, a pair of shoes, two tops, and one pant.

Compartment C

▲ Over 15" Laptop in compartment C. You don't have to worry about changing backpacks when you changing laptops with larger size.

▲ Zippers with double sliders is easy for accessing. compartment C is with large opening for all kinds of stuffs.

Hidden packet

Hidden pocket capacity：more capacity after putting in a wallet and a mobile phone simultaneously. This design which closing human's back, it is not only for quick access, but also preventing to be stolen.

▲ Hidden pocket for mobile phone ,wallet and other valuables.

Cable hole for wired earphone

You can enjoy music when your phone is in hidden pocket, you can pull out your earphones from the cable hole. Don't worry about losing your phone and enjoy music at the same time.

▲ Hidden pocket with wired earphone cable hole for enjoy music easily all the time.

Anti-thief zippers with double sliders

Compartment B and C are with zippers with double sliders, you can open them from two sides. You can use an additional lock for locking the zipper heads and make sure your personal goods not be stolen.

▲ Compartment B and C are with zippers with double sliders, zipper heads can be locked. (The lock is not included in this project)

USB external charging port

Simply connect the power bank from inside, and connect your mobile phone to the USB external charging port. Charging is so easily while traveling.

▲USB external charging port, charging is so easily all the time. 

 

▲ USB cable inside can be taken off by yourselves when you want to wash the backpack. USB cable  is removable if it is broken.

Phone suction cups

Free your hands without taking off the backpack. We designed 11 suction cups and elastic band to fix your phone. The phone suction cups is a sweet design for freeing your hands sometimes.

▲ Phone suction cups, fixed phones anytime.

Side pocket

Side pocket is perfect for water bottle, umbrella, keys, and coins.......,etc. The mesh bag design is perfect for coins. The height of side pocket is around 15 cm.It fits most of the water bottles around 600 cc. We add the drawstring on the mesh bag, all sizes of water bottles can be fixed safely.

▲ Side pocket with mesh for water bottles ,umbrella, and coins

Luggage band

This band on the back is for your luggage when you are traveling. It can fixed your backpack and luggage perfectly.

▲ Luggage band

Water resistant materials

Water resistant materials (nylon) .

▲ Water resistant materials (nylon)

Air permeability on the back and straps.

comfortable and ventilate mesh weave for back materials and straps. Straps are widen and thicken.

▲Air permeability materials on the back, widen air permeability straps, feel comfortable all the time.

▲ Strap pocket is also suitable for notebook or magazines.

▲ Materials   Stiff, wear-resistant

Not only convenient, but also secure

We designed the BP-501 quick access backpack for grabbing stuffs quickly on one shoulder, not only considering about the convenience, but also considering about the security of anti-theft. We designed the hidden pocket and anti-theft zippers with double sliders (compartment B/C) that you can put your phones, wallet, passports and valuables when you are taking the subway or traveling.

▲ Compartment A：Quickly grabbing phone, keys, wallet and pens.

▲ Compartment B：Quick access for Laptop.

▲ Hidden pocket：Quickly grabbing phone, wallet, passport and valuables.

Cross-Body 

BP-501 not only is a backpack, but also is a cross-body pack . Just switch the strap buckle and cross your body.

Expandable space 

BP-501 has a expandable space in compartment A that  could expand from 14cm to 18cm .

Height Comparison

▲ Adjustable straps, suitable for everyone are different heights.

Our Story

We spent around ten months to design JNA BP-501 quick access backpack, from the draft, survey, samples, testing, modification to completion. We collected more than one thousand questionnaires to know what functions that every users wanted, we organized the most necessary items to be our design. We are appreciated for every questionnaires.

We care about the global environment and we were struggles for selecting martials. "Don't use animals skin, use the materials which have least impact for environment" is our principles. We don't want to lose the durability and quality, and we want users can afford it with reasonable price. It is a challenge for every decision. It is a hard start, but we will try our best to do it.  

Note:

We used microfiber on handle, brand tag, piping on compartment A . We don't use PU materials. No worries about oxidization. Microfiber breathe very well, it close to leather. It is fade proof and don't worries for shedding. The costs is three times than PU materials.

▲ Paper pattern

▲ Strictly load testing（10 kg stuffs inside the backpack/drop height：30 cm/ 400 times consecutively/Passed)

▲ Intensive sewing on the connections between straps and backpack, it makes the load capacity stronger.

▲ Intensity for the last stitch on the small pockets inside the backpack.

▲ Stitching for twice on small pocket sides. One is with back inside, one is red outside.

▲ All the samples.

In order to design the best backpack, we modify our products many times. Every step is for perfect quality. We hope you will be satisfied when you get this backpack.

Features

  • Different style：backpack, briefcase style carry
  • Space：Compartment*3( A,B,C)、hidden pocket*1、side pocket, straps pocket.
  • Laptop pocket：15" Laptop for compartment B，over 15" Laptop for compartment C.
  • Hidden pocket：for phone, wallet and valuables. We designed cable hole for wired earphones.
  • Anti-theft zippers with double sliders：For compartment B and C. Opening from two sides and lockable.
  • Strap pocket：You can put straps inside or books, magazines, T-shirts....,etc.
  • USB external charging：Easy for charging anytime.
  • Phone suction cups, fixed your phone easily anytime.

Specification

  • Brand：JNA
  • Model：BP-501 quick access backpack
  • Capacity：20L（±5%）
  • Weight：1000 g（±5%）
  • Material：nylon / 500D Polyester/ microfiber leathers
  • Material on back：Air Mesh
  • Dimension：waist：length 35cm* width 14cm * height 47 cm
  • Capacity for Laptop：length 29cm* width 4cm * height 43 cm (under 17" Lapptop)
  • Design by Taiwan/Made in China

Project Progress

We designed the "JNA BP-501 quick access backpack" as a result to combine convenient, easy store,  creative, secure, strong and fashionable. We would like to use the crowdfunding platform to share this amazing innovation so that more people can enjoy the pleasure of travel and a better lifestyle. 

According to the goods need two months for production, and shipping oversea for one month , below is our projected progress. We will do our best to keep to this schedule on time and notify any issues or delays if it occurs.

About Us

JNA established in 2013.Taipei,Taiwan.

We care about user experience and we insist to launch good quality and unique design products.
We hope that every customer can feel the excellence and uniqueness of our products. Our design ideas are more integrated with the concept of caring for the environment.

The "JNA" is created by three English letter which means “ Joyful”, ”Nature”, ”Active”.

Our goal is to provide high quality and innovation products to all the buyers. Your satisfaction is our best achievement. We will constantly improve our products and look forward to matching your need.

We design the best products for you. 

We need your strength to help us achieve the plan!

Hope you will like it.

This design which closing human's back, it is not only for quick access, but also preventing to be stolen.▲ Hidden pocket for mobile phone ,wallet and other valuables.Cable hole for wired earphoneYou can enjoy music when your phone is in hidden pocket, you can pull out your earphones from the cable hole. Don't worry about losing your phone and enjoy music at the same time.▲ Hidden pocket with wired earphone cable hole for enjoy music easily all the time.Anti-thief zippers with double sliders Compartment B and C are with zippers with double sliders, you can open them from two sides. You can use an additional lock for locking the zipper heads and make sure your personal goods not be stolen.▲ Compartment B and C are with zippers with double sliders, zipper heads can be locked. (The lock is not included in this project)USB external charging portSimply connect the power bank from inside, and connect your mobile phone to the USB external charging port. Charging is so easily while traveling.▲USB external charging port, charging is so easily all the time. 

 
▲ USB cable inside can be taken off by yourselves when you want to wash the backpack. USB cable  is removable if it is broken.Phone suction cupsFree your hands without taking off the backpack. We designed 11 suction cups and elastic band to fix your phone. The phone suction cups is a sweet design for freeing your hands sometimes.▲ Phone suction cups, fixed phones anytime.Side pocket Side pocket is perfect for water bottle, umbrella, keys, and coins.......,etc. The mesh bag design is perfect for coins. The height of side pocket is around 15 cm.It fits most of the water bottles around 600 cc. We add the drawstring on the mesh bag, all sizes of water bottles can be fixed safely.▲ Side pocket with mesh for water bottles ,umbrella, and coinsLuggage bandThis band on the back is for your luggage when you are traveling. It can fixed your backpack and luggage perfectly.▲ Luggage bandWater resistant materialsWater resistant materials (nylon) .▲ Water resistant materials (nylon)Air permeability on the back and straps.comfortable and ventilate mesh weave for back materials and straps. Straps are widen and thicken.▲Air permeability materials on the back, widen air permeability straps, feel comfortable all the time.▲ Strap pocket is also suitable for notebook or magazines.▲ Materials   Stiff, wear-resistantNot only convenient, but also secureWe designed the BP-501 quick access backpack for grabbing stuffs quickly on one shoulder, not only considering about the convenience, but also considering about the security of anti-theft. We designed the hidden pocket and anti-theft zippers with double sliders (compartment B/C) that you can put your phones, wallet, passports and valuables when you are taking the subway or traveling.▲ Compartment A：Quickly grabbing phone, keys, wallet and pens.▲ Compartment B：Quick access for Laptop.▲ Hidden pocket：Quickly grabbing phone, wallet, passport and valuables.Cross-Body BP-501 not only is a backpack, but also is a cross-body pack . Just switch the strap buckle and cross your body.Expandable space BP-501 has a expandable space in compartment A that  could expand from 14cm to 18cm .Height Comparison▲ Adjustable straps, suitable for everyone are different heights.Our StoryWe spent around ten months to design JNA BP-501 quick access backpack, from the draft, survey, samples, testing, modification to completion. We collected more than one thousand questionnaires to know what functions that every users wanted, we organized the most necessary items to be our design. We are appreciated for every questionnaires.We care about the global environment and we were struggles for selecting martials. "Don't use animals skin, use the materials which have least impact for environment" is our principles. We don't want to lose the durability and quality, and we want users can afford it with reasonable price. It is a challenge for every decision. It is a hard start, but we will try our best to do it.  Note:We used microfiber on handle, brand tag, piping on compartment A . We don't use PU materials. No worries about oxidization. Microfiber breathe very well, it close to leather. It is fade proof and don't worries for shedding. The costs is three times than PU materials.▲ Paper pattern

▲ Strictly load testing（10 kg stuffs inside the backpack/drop height：30 cm/ 400 times consecutively/Passed)
▲ Intensive sewing on the connections between straps and backpack, it makes the load capacity stronger.▲ Intensity for the last stitch on the small pockets inside the backpack.▲ Stitching for twice on small pocket sides. One is with back inside, one is red outside.▲ All the samples.In order to design the best backpack, we modify our products many times. Every step is for perfect quality. We hope you will be satisfied when you get this backpack.Features
Different style：backpack, briefcase style carry
Space：Compartment*3( A,B,C)、hidden pocket*1、side pocket, straps pocket.
Laptop pocket：15" Laptop for compartment B，over 15" Laptop for compartment C.
Hidden pocket：for phone, wallet and valuables. We designed cable hole for wired earphones.
Anti-theft zippers with double sliders：For compartment B and C. Opening from two sides and lockable.
Strap pocket：You can put straps inside or books, magazines, T-shirts....,etc.
USB external charging：Easy for charging anytime.
Phone suction cups, fixed your phone easily anytime.
Specification
Brand：JNA
Model：BP-501 quick access backpack
Capacity：20L（±5%）
Weight：1000 g（±5%）
Material：nylon / 500D Polyester/ microfiber leathers
Material on back：Air Mesh
Dimension：waist：length 35cm* width 14cm * height 47 cm
Capacity for Laptop：length 29cm* width 4cm * height 43 cm (under 17" Lapptop)
Design by Taiwan/Made in China
Project ProgressWe designed the "JNA BP-501 quick access backpack" as a result to combine convenient, easy store,  creative, secure, strong and fashionable. We would like to use the crowdfunding platform to share this amazing innovation so that more people can enjoy the pleasure of travel and a better lifestyle. According to the goods need two months for production, and shipping oversea for one month , below is our projected progress. We will do our best to keep to this schedule on time and notify any issues or delays if it occurs.About UsJNA established in 2013.Taipei,Taiwan.We care about user experience and we insist to launch good quality and unique design products.We hope that every customer can feel the excellence and uniqueness of our products. Our design ideas are more integrated with the concept of caring for the environment.The "JNA" is created by three English letter which means “ Joyful”, ”Nature”, ”Active”.Our goal is to provide high quality and innovation products to all the buyers. Your satisfaction is our best achievement. We will constantly improve our products and look forward to matching your need.We design the best products for you. We need your strength to help us achieve the plan!Hope you will like it.

story:
We know that some of the best memories are created after dark. Designed to capture the pulse of nightlife, the Next Selfie Stick has a built-in light, helping you get the most out of your night experience. To activate the flashlight just push the button. With 1000 Lumes, you can be sure that the flash you get from this selfie stick is more than enough life to see it all in your pictures. Night clubs, here we come! Moreover, the flashlight has a two hour battery life with a one-hour charge time w/ USB charger.


Another challenge we are facing today is the constantly dying battery of our smart phones. You may have had the intention of charging your device, and may not realize you didn’t until your phone dies in the middle of a fabulous selfie – don’t let it happen again! The Next selfie stick is promptly equipped with a 2600 mAh power bank to make sure you can charge your devices any time any place. 


The Next Selfie Stick takes the guesswork out of how to capture a group selfie to ensure complete selfie freedom! The sticky mount allows you to attach the Next Selfie Stick to just about anything. Using Bluetooth technology, you can get the perfect picture no matter where you are or who you are with. Even when your phone or GoPro sticks on the window, the lights can be controlled from a 10 meter distance by pushing the button on the remote.


The Next Selfie Stick is demountable since most selfies are taken on the go. We call this the activity mode because in this size the stick is perfect for outdoor activity, city hopping and filming your favorite festival! We specially made this ''activity mode'' to make sure you can bring this selfie stick everywhere with you, even when the normal selfie stick isn't allowed.


It also fits phones of every type – and your GoPro camera – with a strong clamp that holds your phone in place. The material of the clamp is soft, so no worries about scratching the phone while it’s in the holder.


                            

  


 



                             

We did research and talked to a lot of different people and it turned out everybody needs the Next Selfie Stick in their lives! As young people who enjoy having fun, traveling and being active, we’ve been using it every day: while doing sports,hanging out with friends, aimlessly walking in the city, on holidays, on parties, on a motorcycle (as a passenger), even while caving in the mountains. This selfie stick ensures that you can make memories – and be in the shots to prove it! We love selfies!

    

             
             

                           

Let’s face it – until now, a selfie stick wasn’t exactly trendy. The Next Selfie Stick is changing that, both in the way it performs and the design of the stick. It’s simple, sleek look and functions make it a must-have for travel, parties, outdoor activity and more. In fact, it’s lightweight enough to take just about anywhere.

You don’t have to worry about easily damaging the stick – or your phone for that matter. The durability of the aluminum material of the stick makes it extra light and not prone to damage. 

The Next Selfie Stick combines four components together to solve problems we noticed using a regular selfie stick. Taking the selfie technology to the next level! 

Mobile giants like iPhone®, Android® and GoPro® have all done a great job making photos and videos way more accessible for everybody, but they are restricted by battery power, flash-light and sight reach. That’s why we’ve created the Next Selfie Stick – it is for all people who enjoy living their life to the fullest and like capturing their memories especially after dark! 



                 

So, why Indiegogo? Indiegogo rewards innovation. Period. The Next Selfie Stick takes something existing and makes it better. Everyone takes selfies and doing it with a selfie stick has become more common than ever. We just took that concept and improved it –immensely!



After 7 months discussing, sketching, investing & prototyping, we have invented a selfie stick we're proud of. What’s more, it’s the revolution of the selfie stick! The only problem: production is a huge expense… If you like what you see, show us some love and pledge whatever amount you wish to make the Next Selfie Stick a reality. 



                             

The selfies here are a snapshot of who we are: a group of three co-students and friends from Amsterdam, The Netherlands, blessed with a great mentor. Our love for traveling around the world and having fun brought to life the idea of this revolutionary product. We wanted a stick that was better than what we could find. The Next Selfie Stick is that creation. Each one of us has put their own personal touch to the final variant of the product, making all its great features fit perfectly in the active life of the contemporary young generation. 
           



                 


                 




                         


Manufacturing - we have access to professional networks and have confirmed the price and delivery ability with a vastly qualified manufacturer that produces tech products for some of the world's top brands. If this campaign is funded, one of our team members will personally supervise the production process.

Complexity of order fulfillment - everyone knows that Indiegogo projects have had issues fulfilling orders on time. That’s why we've kept the timeline as realistic as possible. We will do everything to match or beat our scheduled delivery date.

Product adjustments - as we continue to test the selfie stick we may need to make some small adjustments to improve the product’s features. These will always be for the benefit of you, the user - and we'll let you know any time we improve something.

Customs - Indiegogo campaigns regularly fulfill orders worldwide without any issues, and we expect this to be the case with ours, too. However, we don't pretend to have intimate customs knowledge of the entire world. We'll work hard to avoid your rewards getting held up at customs, but in the end we can't guarantee you won't experience any delays or additional charges. Shipping costs varies, because we need to make sure to product will arrive everywhere in the world!

With your backing, we’re confident we can make the Next Selfie Stick a HUGE success.

If you'd like to donate, any amount helps - head back up to the top of the page, and look for the big pink 'GET THIS PERK' button on the right-hand side.


        


                      


How long will the battery last?

  • you can use the battery for around the 2 hours.


How often can you charge a phone?

  • you can full charge a phone around the 2 times.


What is the power of the flash?

  • the power of the flash is around the 1000 Lumes


Where will the product been manufactured?

  • the product will be manufactured in china. 


Is there a guarantee on the product?

  • we give a guarantee of 1 year on the technical parts of the product that will also been given by the manufacturer.


What is the expected delivery time?

  • we expect to deliver 6 months after the end of the campaign.


What is the size of the product?

Which devices are compatible?

  • Every kind of phone, camera, GoPro is compatible with the Next Selfie Stick when it is not higher than around 12cm. 

[Website by www.webbro.com]
[Icons used by http://dryicons.com]
[Video by Desley Marcus]

story:
What's it all about?

You step off your flight, eager to get to the next stop on your journey. It doesn’t matter if you were on that plane for one hour or twelve. When it lands, you want off. When that door opens, you want out. The last thing you want to do is worry about missing luggage. Often, however, this is exactly what awaits the weary traveller next. Your bag has been lost or misdirected. Wherever you were going, you’re not getting there on time. You’re delayed.

Unfortunately, losing time is the least of your worries because the real fear is never finding it again. Maybe your bag is on the next flight, maybe your belongings are sitting on a conveyor belt a thousand miles away, or maybe your luggage really is gone. The only thing you know for sure is you don't have your bag, or worse, know where it is. Until now, that is. With the introduction of CarryCado, the whole luggage game is about to change. Put a CarryCado tag in your luggage and track your belongings wherever they go. Your bag's location is now simply a button press away using the CarryCado smart phone app. With the FAA, CAA, and EASA approving the use of Bluetooth Low Power in all flight modes, you'll never not know the location of your bags and suitcases again.

Our team have been lucky enough to have travelled the world and each one of us still gets on the plane and stares out of the window looking at the bags getting loaded thinking "I can't see mine, where is it! Oh no! they have lost it already!!!"  We are based in Scotland which usually means we often make short connections in larger airports before getting on with our journey, and we go through the whole experience again.  I always laugh at people getting off the plane and running to get to the front of the queue to collect their bags, most of whom gather around where the bags come out, pushing and sneaking into gaps. By the time the bags come out most of the passengers are now at the carousel!  

Over the last 18 months we have been focussed on making a product that really makes a difference and we are now ready to take it to the next level.Our team have focussed directly on baggage tracking, we have enhanced the device purely for this purpose, we were not interested in tracking your bike, dog, cat or in fact your partner like some other devices do.  We simply want to tackle this issue and give us more comfort whilst travelling.  Our team have reasons for being passionate about this:

Iain McLean, Founder and App Evangelist


"I have now submitted over 150 apps to the app stores, accumulating somewhere in the region of 100 Million downloads from those apps, I had two apps on the Apple App Store the day it went public and am passionate about getting quality apps into peoples hands.  As an avid traveller, I constantly worry about where my bags are, I've had a few go missing in my time and really want to address this issue and my stress levels!"

Nick Hammond, Lead Developer

"Technology is at the heart of every project that I embark on, looking for the best and most efficient way to solve the problems that get in the way of simply living life. I've been fortunate enough to be able to do a little travelling, but the stresses of airports and in particular keeping track of my young daughter and luggage, does remove some of the fun of 'getting away'.  With CarryCado Tags in my bags, the app on my phone, I can relax that little bit more!"

Jose Morlesin, Platform Developer


"I'm from Spain and have 10 years of experience in software development. I decided to move to Scotland to enjoy the green land and test my skills in another environment. Living abroad, I take a lot of flights to visit family and friends and I would prefer not to worry that my luggage is missing. With CarryCado I can track my bags from my phone and stay much calmer during my travels."

Cassie Morrison, Lead Designer


"Having a passion for all things creative, I began to specialise in designing for mobile devices at university. As lead designer, I have the opportunity to create cutting-edge designs for an ever-changing technological landscape. I'm naturally inquisitive and enjoy discovering new things, so losing time in a new city because my bag has been misplaced or lost, really gets me down. With CarryCado, I can simply get out the airport and start experiencing the next adventure."

Bartosz Arendarski, Android Developer


"The most enjoyable part of my job is real world problem solving. I have worked on many applications that do just that and it brings me huge satisfaction when I learn how people use them. Sometimes in a way that I had never planned for! What I want to achieve with CarryCado is one more thing to let my phone worry about instead of me."

Zhivko Bogdanov, iOS Developer


"Travelling to different countries and experiencing their cultures is one of my great passions and I aim to visit somewhere new every year. Being stuck at the baggage carousel hoping for my bag to arrive, prevents me soaking up the atmosphere and local customs. With CarryCado I can worry less about my luggage and spend more time enjoying the foreign lands."


Our team has been developing apps for more than nine years. We have submitted to the app stores more than 150 apps, which has yielded over 100-million downloads. With your help and our experience and skills we can take CarryCado from the drawing board and into the skies. We're raising £95,000 ($135,000) in startup capital that will cover the costs of manufacturing, tooling, marketing, and distributing the CarryCado device and launching the CarryCado app.

Your contributions are greatly appreciated. Together, we will reclaim our luggage and make sure that it stays in our possession. 


Where do you come in?

We have invested heavily ourselves into researching, developing and testing the technology and services we wish to employ, we now need your help to complete the final part in getting our product to market, and that is product delivery.  We aim to raise capital in order to fulfil our final product delivery status, which includes the following:

  • Our custom design and housing for the CarryCado Tag.
  • Our Packaging and labelling for the product.
  • Our custom luggage tag creation and delivery.
  • Our final testing of the device and service.
  • Our logistics setup with regards to stock and shipment management.

What difference will this make?

With your help, we will aim to deliver our product into stores on a global scale, with a service and app that we have created that brings tracking to you at an affordable, reliable and sustainable way, we aim to be the number one choice for luggage tracking worldwide. We believe your participation will help:

  • Make a more stress free trip to millions of users.
  • Aid in the tracking of lost luggage before it is even reported as missing.
  • Help a company with a track record deliver its full potential.

Is it really all plane sailing (sorry, I just had to)?

Current available solutions have some real technical issues which we believe we have solved by spending over one year developing the product, the technology and the service to ensure it is right for the market.

  • We have designed a lower battery use device that means you won't have to change the battery for up to 2 years!
  • We have enhanced our technology to increase its range, meaning you know your bag is coming out of that conveyer belt before anyone else!
  • Our app informs you where your luggage is when in range, and notifies you when it leaves your presence!
  • Our service is free for everyone for the first 3 months!
  • We have Standard, Premium and Premium+ accounts, from free to low cost annual subscriptions to the Cloud Service!
  • Our package prices are very competitive, making this a perfect travel companion or gift!

I wish I could, but....

We completely understand that you might be a little short of cash right now, but you could help us by asking people to do one of the following:

  • Visit our website at http://www.carrycado.com 
  • Share this right here in Indiegogo.
  • Follow us on twitter @carrycado
  • Just tell your friends and colleagues about us.

Thank you so much for your time, we really appreciate it!

Oh no! they have lost it already!!!"  We are based in Scotland which usually means we often make short connections in larger airports before getting on with our journey, and we go through the whole experience again.  I always laugh at people getting off the plane and running to get to the front of the queue to collect their bags, most of whom gather around where the bags come out, pushing and sneaking into gaps. By the time the bags come out most of the passengers are now at the carousel!  
Over the last 18 months we have been focussed on making a product that really makes a difference and we are now ready to take it to the next level.Our team have focussed directly on baggage tracking, we have enhanced the device purely for this purpose, we were not interested in tracking your bike, dog, cat or in fact your partner like some other devices do.  We simply want to tackle this issue and give us more comfort whilst travelling.  Our team have reasons for being passionate about this:
Iain McLean, Founder and App Evangelist


"I have now submitted over 150 apps to the app stores, accumulating somewhere in the region of 100 Million downloads from those apps, I had two apps on the Apple App Store the day it went public and am passionate about getting quality apps into peoples hands.  As an avid traveller, I constantly worry about where my bags are, I've had a few go missing in my time and really want to address this issue and my stress levels!"
Nick Hammond, Lead Developer



"Technology is at the heart of every project that I embark on, looking for the best and most efficient way to solve the problems that get in the way of simply living life. I've been fortunate enough to be able to do a little travelling, but the stresses of airports and in particular keeping track of my young daughter and luggage, does remove some of the fun of 'getting away'.  With CarryCado Tags in my bags, the app on my phone, I can relax that little bit more!"
Jose Morlesin, Platform Developer


"I'm from Spain and have 10 years of experience in software development. I decided to move to Scotland to enjoy the green land and test my skills in another environment. Living abroad, I take a lot of flights to visit family and friends and I would prefer not to worry that my luggage is missing. With CarryCado I can track my bags from my phone and stay much calmer during my travels."
Cassie Morrison, Lead Designer


"Having a passion for all things creative, I began to specialise in designing for mobile devices at university. As lead designer, I have the opportunity to create cutting-edge designs for an ever-changing technological landscape. I'm naturally inquisitive and enjoy discovering new things, so losing time in a new city because my bag has been misplaced or lost, really gets me down. With CarryCado, I can simply get out the airport and start experiencing the next adventure."
Bartosz Arendarski, Android Developer


"The most enjoyable part of my job is real world problem solving. I have worked on many applications that do just that and it brings me huge satisfaction when I learn how people use them. Sometimes in a way that I had never planned for! What I want to achieve with CarryCado is one more thing to let my phone worry about instead of me."
Zhivko Bogdanov, iOS Developer


"Travelling to different countries and experiencing their cultures is one of my great passions and I aim to visit somewhere new every year. Being stuck at the baggage carousel hoping for my bag to arrive, prevents me soaking up the atmosphere and local customs. With CarryCado I can worry less about my luggage and spend more time enjoying the foreign lands."







Our team has been developing apps for more than nine years. We have submitted to the app stores more than 150 apps, which has yielded over 100-million downloads. With your help and our experience and skills we can take CarryCado from the drawing board and into the skies. We're raising £95,000 ($135,000) in startup capital that will cover the costs of manufacturing, tooling, marketing, and distributing the CarryCado device and launching the CarryCado app.



Your contributions are greatly appreciated. Together, we will reclaim our luggage and make sure that it stays in our possession. 



   Where do you come in? We have invested heavily ourselves into researching, developing and testing the technology and services we wish to employ, we now need your help to complete the final part in getting our product to market, and that is product delivery.  We aim to raise capital in order to fulfil our final product delivery status, which includes the following:  Our custom design and housing for the CarryCado Tag. Our Packaging and labelling for the product. Our custom luggage tag creation and delivery.
Our final testing of the device and service.
Our logistics setup with regards to stock and shipment management.



What difference will this make?

 With your help, we will aim to deliver our product into stores on a global scale, with a service and app that we have created that brings tracking to you at an affordable, reliable and sustainable way, we aim to be the number one choice for luggage tracking worldwide. We believe your participation will help:  Make a more stress free trip to millions of users. Aid in the tracking of lost luggage before it is even reported as missing. Help a company with a track record deliver its full potential.    



Is it really all plane sailing (sorry, I just had to)?  Current available solutions have some real technical issues which we believe we have solved by spending over one year developing the product, the technology and the service to ensure it is right for the market.  We have designed a lower battery use device that means you won't have to change the battery for up to 2 years! We have enhanced our technology to increase its range, meaning you know your bag is coming out of that conveyer belt before anyone else!
Our app informs you where your luggage is when in range, and notifies you when it leaves your presence!
Our service is free for everyone for the first 3 months!
We have Standard, Premium and Premium+ accounts, from free to low cost annual subscriptions to the Cloud Service!
Our package prices are very competitive, making this a perfect travel companion or gift!    I wish I could, but.... We completely understand that you might be a little short of cash right now, but you could help us by asking people to do one of the following:  Visit our website at http://www.carrycado.com  Share this right here in Indiegogo.
Follow us on twitter @carrycado
Just tell your friends and colleagues about us.   Thank you so much for your time, we really appreciate it!

story:
Hey everybody, Andy Schulkind and Bob Leonard here. We’re the founders of Stay with Stella. We’re both marketing guys and friends, and go back over ten years.

Based on personal experience and interviews with cat owners, we discovered a demand for a service that matches cat owners who plan to travel and qualified sitters. Our goal is to create a passionate and engaged community of cat lovers.

Right now, we have 300+ members in our community and arranged several sitting gigs. Our goal is to grow to 1,000 members and transition from free to paid membership. 

Our web site includes member intake, profiles and messaging We’ve built a presence on social media, primarily on Facebook (1,200+ likes) and Instagram. Google Ads has been highly effective in generating conversions. We have self-funded the project so far.

The funding we hope raise will be used to support and expand our efforts at reaching critical mass for the community, which will allow us to transition to paid membership.

Our marketing efforts so far have given us a good handle on how to best use the funds we'll raise. Your contribution will help us grow the community. We’re also developing relationships with various media outlets and influencers in the cat space to spread the word.

If you can’t contribute, that’s OK! You can still help by getting the word out to other cat lovers and your friends. Use the Indiegogo share tools.

story:
BagGym is designed to turn any place you want into a gym.

We have experienced many changes in our lives with the pandemic. Activities that were ordinary for us were difficult and inaccessible, like working out at the Gym or traveling. We stayed in our homes for a long time and made an effort to make our lives sustainable with limited opportunities. Think about it, what would it be like if we didn't have to go to the gym again for sports activities after the pandemic? What if you could carry your gym on your back when you had a mobile business or purely for hobby purposes and didn't have to spend thousands of dollars for it? It's nice to even think about it.

We proudly present this project. BagGym. Take your gym(bag) wherever you want.

Where will you go with your BagGym?

You can easily travel with the equipment in the bag and pass the X-Ray devices without any problems.

Now you have the opportunity to set up a gym in your own home, in the hotel and wherever there is a door.

How does that benefit me as a Backer?

Develop your muscles and keep your form while doing dozens of movements using your body weight in a healthy way. 

 

Key Features

  • The front part of BagGym can be completely detached from the bag and can be easily added to any backpack you want. 
  • Possibility to pull-ups wherever you want and whenever you want withoutthe need for any extra equipment.You have all the space you will need in the main bag also. 
  • Using the sports module is quite simple. 
  • Unlike classical methods, drilling any wall and disturbing images on the door frames and walls are history thanks to this project.

 

Dimensions and Components

 

 

Timeline

 

Risks

 

Our manufacturing partner for this product is operating at 100% so we are incredibly confident in our manufacturing timeline.

The global pandemic has put stress on supply chains everywhere, but we have built lots of padding into our schedule. In any case, we are committed to being as transparent as possible and have a wide range of contingency plans for every circumstance. If there are unforeseen problems, we solemnly promise to provide transparency and work with our backers to solve the issue.

story:
DonCierge - Your Digital Concierge

A Digital Concierge that will show your guests around the area and ensure they have the best stay possible

 

DonCierge is a travel website - but not just any travel website: This site is dedicated to your property and what's around it. There's no searching - if your guests need to know something, they just need to Click on Don... he's always there, waiting patiently in top-right-hand corner of the screen. And, he's got lots to show visitors... 

 

"Good morning, I'm DonCierge, your Digital Concierge. How can I help you?"

Let him know what you're looking for and he'll show you all the related attractions and amenities. Attractions can be anything, from the unmissable sites that have people coming to your property in the first place, to local restaurants, emergency services and even where to find church service on a Sunday (or Saturday).

 

With DonCierge, you control everything... 

You can create lots of filters - Best Of, Kid Friendly, Pet Friendly, Eating near the hotel, Best Eateries further afield, for example. You can create as many filters as you like to categorize everything that makes your property and its surroundings unique...

  • You control which attractions to show in each filter
  • You can control where on the map each filter is focused
  • Filters can be near your property or in the next city over - it's all up to you. You know what your guests want to see
  • Your property will always be on the map so guests and potential guests will know exactly where they are staying in relation to all the wonderful attractions nearby   

 

Don Speaks

You can add comments to each filter and DonCierge will read them aloud to your guests (Chrome/Safari only), making your guests feel like they are truly being well cared for. 

 

 

For Hotel, Airbnb or Guest House Owners  

You want your guests to have the best experience possible. A good experience leads to good reviews, return business and referrals.

DonCierge allows you to create a custom page for your property highlighting all the local attractions and amenities. Help your guests have the best stay possible by putting your local knowledge into DonCierge and sharing it.

Help potential guests pick your property by sending them links to your DonCierge page before they book.  

With access to your DonCierge page before arrival, guests can start planning their perfect vacation, using all the knowledge in your head.  

Nobody knows your neighborhood like you. Using DonCierge you can share all that knowledge with every one of your guests

 

All attractions have a pin on the map... guests can use their GPS software on their phones to get driving or walking directions to even the most obscure locations (and back to your property afterwards).

Brochures can show the local parks, but you can create attractions for your favorite places inside those nearby parks or even for those secret spots not listed by brochures! It's the next best thing to showing your guests around yourself.

 

No more guests getting lost!

 

 

Hotel Kiosk

How about a dedicated DonCierge Kiosk in your lobby? Sign up for one of our hotel packages and we will give you instructions on how to set it up as a dedicated page on a computer in your lobby - get a touch screen computer and DonCierge and really make your lobby shine. 

 

 

Airbnb/Hotel Guests

If you want to have the best stay possible, send this campaign link to your hotel or Airbnb asking them to create a DonCierge page. 

Help spread the word about DonCierge...

 

 

FOR SALE

Selling your house? 

Want to make sure you get the best price possible? 

Help potential buyers imagine what it would be like to live in your home by creating a DonCierge page for your property - you've been living there for years and know the neighborhood well. Help buyers love your house like you do by showing off all the things you like about the neighborhood...

  • Local parks
  • Playgrounds
  • Schools
  • Shops
  • Restaurants

Whatever you like... you control what DonCierge will show. 

 

Supported platforms

DonCierge is a website, so it will work in any popular browser. To hear DonCierge talk, your users will have to be on Chrome or Safari. 

 

Sample DonCierge Page

Here's a closer look at the property in the introductory video...

 

 

How To Video

Here's a video detailing what to expect when you create your DonCierge page...

story:
What can the Driftr App do for you?

 

  1. Locate people drifting nearby you in real-time
  2. Get to know the essentials about a driftr by viewing their profile to see their interests, latest checkpoints, future stops and vehicle type. 
  3. Use the chat to organize a meetup and share your location with new friends.
  4. The Stories section directs you to the latest blog posts from fellow vanlifers and provides exclusive content on meetups and events organized within the driftr community.
  5. Search locations visited by driftrs in the past. You can see reviews and even ask questions.
  6. Worried about your privacy? Don't be! With a click of a button, you can be on or off the driftr grid.
  7. Input your entire itinerary from latest checkpoints to future stops so other driftrs can plan meetups with you along the way. 
  8. Hit up the deals section to take advantage of exclusive deals on must-haves for vanlifers and outdoor adventure enthusiasts. 

 

Why Vanlifers Need The Driftr App

 

Vanlife is not just about stopping at the most photogenic places to snap a photo for Instagram, it was built on the idea of connecting like-minded vandwellers and outdoor adventure enthusiasts together in one community.

Being experienced vandwellers ourselves, we realized that life on the road can get lonely. We knew we were missing out on incredible experiences that could be shared with others because we had no means of finding other vanlifers nearby.

To us, the next logical step was to use technology and our mobile phone to quickly and efficiently connect with people in real-time.

Traveling solo or with a partner can be really exciting and life-changing but after a certain amount of time you desire human interaction.  With the Driftr App now we no longer need to dream of what it would be like to organize a surfer beach tailgate or a bonfire party in the bush; it can be done in minutes.

The size of the vanlife community is much larger than we can even imagine. This lifestyle has become a growing trend over the last few years and there are no signs of it slowing down. We want to make the driftr community an inclusive place for everyone passionate about the lifestyle. 

Not only do we want to connect people on the road, our goal is to continue to develop ideas for the driftr app that will focus on the community and lifestyle aspects of vanlife. We hope that people who aren't necessarily vanlifers themselves can also be part of the community within the app by reading the content and connecting with driftrs to learn more about their experiences.

This is what vanlife means to us and we designed the Driftr App with this in mind. 

 

The Driftr Team

The Founders

 

Hi! We are Jelena and Thibaut: your typical millennial couple. You know, the ones that meet on Tinder, spend their second date at a 3 day music festival and eventually buy a used van to renovate into their home on wheels. One of THOSE couples.  

After nearly two years of dating and two years spent daydreaming of owning our own van, we had finally found the ONE. Thibaut and I joined the vanlife community in July 2016 when we adopted our first vanchild, a '93 Renault Trafic named Jean-Claude Van Dinic.

We quickly became addicted to the lifestyle and truly passionate about the community while on the road. However, we realized something quite quickly during our travels. It can get lonely on the road. We would arrive at a certain location and crave cracking open a beer with some new friends to chat about life on the road. But, there was no one around. Sure its great to swipe through photos on Instagram of other people doing the same thing as we were, but we wanted real human interaction. This is how the idea of Driftr App was born.

 

App Developers - Hypercube 

We have teamed up with top-notch app developers in Niš, Serbia who are helping us bring our idea to life. Established in 2013 as Hypercube LLC, they specialize in helping startups like Driftr from all over the world to create their minimum viable product (MVP), prepare it for market launch and aid in scaling. Hypercube has successfully delivered more than 50 projects, creating more than 100 iOS and Android apps with millions of users. Their success is attributed to having a well-rounded team of: 4 iOS developers, 4 Android developers, 1 QA engineer, 1 UI/UX designer, and 1 backend developer. Their diverse skills and experience allows them to take on any new idea and build it from scratch. They have been a tremendous support in helping the Driftr App team determine the possibilities and the best course of action to bring a high-quality, market-ready app to you. However, without fully funding this project, we will not be able to continue with developing the app.

 

    Budget Breakdown 

    The majority of funds will be spent on the development of the Driftr app, and on costs surrounding that development. There are also the mandatory fees to IndieGogo as well as ordering the awesome perks for you!

    Our Goal is to raise $20,000, which gets us an iPhone app. If we raise even more than our goal, 30,000 raised gets us an Android app as well! 

    Typically a project of this magnitude would be well into six-figure range. Due to strategic partnerships and the team’s experience level, we will be able to make the driftr app with much less.

    Funds above $30,000 will be spent on Stage II development, which includes further optimizing the application based on community feedback, improving premium features, readying the app for monetization, and sharing the app with thousands of people around the world.  

     

    Timeline

     

    We have a very ambitious timeline that we have discussed in-depth with the Hypercube team who are determined to bring you the Driftr App just in time for your summer road trip! We will work non-stop to reach this target and ensure we get it to you as quickly as we can. 

    • Run Indiegogo Campaign: Mid-March -  Beginning of May 2017 (~45 days)
    • App Developed: May- End of June 2017 (2 months)
    • Beta Testing: End of June - beginning of July 2017
    • Launch App in the App Store: end of July 2017

     

    Driftr App Partners

     

    We are so incredibly fortunate that so many companies, brands and influencers within the community believe in our vision. Without their support and positive encouragement we could not make this possible. Their donations and support allows us to not only provide vanlifers with incredible perks but also spread the word throughout our community. 

    Perks have been provided by: Riparide, Teton Sports, Mr. Heater, Fatboy - the Original Lamzac, Bio Lite Energy and Proven Overland Magazine.

    Companies, brands and influencers helping spread the word via social media: Hikers Brew Coffee, Advanture.Co, Exploring Alternatives, Go-Van, Moment Lens Co., Will and Bear, Vanlife.tv, Modern Day Mavericks, Wikicahttp://blog.wikicampers.fr/driftr-lapplication-voyageurs-nomades/mpers, Digital Nomads Media

     

    How You Can Help

     

    1. Back the Project

    Make a pledge by clicking the BACK IT button above, and choose whatever reward fits you. Feel the magnitude of your pledge. You aren't just contributing to something that can be of benefit to you; you are also supporting vanlifers all over the world who want to make the community more active and attractive. Note: we cannot develop the app without this funding!

    2. Share Our Story

    Share our IndieGogo Campaign via email, Facebook, Twitter, phone calls, text messages and through old fashioned conversations. The Driftr app will continue to come to life because a community wanted and created its emergence!

    3. Leave Your Mark 

    At the end of the campaign you’ll be able to tell us what kind of features and functionalities you are most looking forward to using and suggesting new ones we may have not thought of just yet. Please do this! We want to use our community feedback as an important pointer as we build the production version of the app!

     

    Risks & Challenges

     

    The app developers at Hypercube are very experienced, but there will always be risks in any app development effort:

    • This is a mobile, web, and server based software project, with all the risks normally associated with software development.
    • There are also various risks in approval and deployment from Apple that are out of our control. We do not anticipate any problems but it’s a process that we do not control.
    • Project costs and schedule estimates are the result of our evaluation of the technical and approval risks and Hypercube's deep familiarity with this type of project. There will, of course, be some unforeseen glitches, which will promptly be reported in the Updates section. We are committed to completing this project once the funding goal has been achieved, and keeping you informed every step of the way.

This is what vanlife means to us and we designed the Driftr App with this in mind. 
 
The Driftr Team
The Founders
 
Hi! We are Jelena and Thibaut: your typical millennial couple. You know, the ones that meet on Tinder, spend their second date at a 3 day music festival and eventually buy a used van to renovate into their home on wheels. One of THOSE couples.  

After nearly two years of dating and two years spent daydreaming of owning our own van, we had finally found the ONE. Thibaut and I joined the vanlife community in July 2016 when we adopted our first vanchild, a '93 Renault Trafic named Jean-Claude Van Dinic.
We quickly became addicted to the lifestyle and truly passionate about the community while on the road. However, we realized something quite quickly during our travels. It can get lonely on the road. We would arrive at a certain location and crave cracking open a beer with some new friends to chat about life on the road. But, there was no one around. Sure its great to swipe through photos on Instagram of other people doing the same thing as we were, but we wanted real human interaction. This is how the idea of Driftr App was born.
 
App Developers - Hypercube 

We have teamed up with top-notch app developers in Niš, Serbia who are helping us bring our idea to life. Established in 2013 as Hypercube LLC, they specialize in helping startups like Driftr from all over the world to create their minimum viable product (MVP), prepare it for market launch and aid in scaling. Hypercube has successfully delivered more than 50 projects, creating more than 100 iOS and Android apps with millions of users. Their success is attributed to having a well-rounded team of: 4 iOS developers, 4 Android developers, 1 QA engineer, 1 UI/UX designer, and 1 backend developer. Their diverse skills and experience allows them to take on any new idea and build it from scratch. They have been a tremendous support in helping the Driftr App team determine the possibilities and the best course of action to bring a high-quality, market-ready app to you. However, without fully funding this project, we will not be able to continue with developing the app.
 

Budget Breakdown 

The majority of funds will be spent on the development of the Driftr app, and on costs surrounding that development. There are also the mandatory fees to IndieGogo as well as ordering the awesome perks for you!
Our Goal is to raise $20,000, which gets us an iPhone app. If we raise even more than our goal, 30,000 raised gets us an Android app as well! 
Typically a project of this magnitude would be well into six-figure range. Due to strategic partnerships and the team’s experience level, we will be able to make the driftr app with much less.
Funds above $30,000 will be spent on Stage II development, which includes further optimizing the application based on community feedback, improving premium features, readying the app for monetization, and sharing the app with thousands of people around the world.  

 
Timeline
 
We have a very ambitious timeline that we have discussed in-depth with the Hypercube team who are determined to bring you the Driftr App just in time for your summer road trip! We will work non-stop to reach this target and ensure we get it to you as quickly as we can. 

Run Indiegogo Campaign: Mid-March -  Beginning of May 2017 (~45 days)
App Developed: May- End of June 2017 (2 months)
Beta Testing: End of June - beginning of July 2017
Launch App in the App Store: end of July 2017

 
Driftr App Partners
 
We are so incredibly fortunate that so many companies, brands and influencers within the community believe in our vision. Without their support and positive encouragement we could not make this possible. Their donations and support allows us to not only provide vanlifers with incredible perks but also spread the word throughout our community. 
Perks have been provided by: Riparide, Teton Sports, Mr. Heater, Fatboy - the Original Lamzac, Bio Lite Energy and Proven Overland Magazine.

Companies, brands and influencers helping spread the word via social media: Hikers Brew Coffee, Advanture.Co, Exploring Alternatives, Go-Van, Moment Lens Co., Will and Bear, Vanlife.tv, Modern Day Mavericks, Wikicahttp://blog.wikicampers.fr/driftr-lapplication-voyageurs-nomades/mpers, Digital Nomads Media


 
How You Can Help
 
1. Back the Project
Make a pledge by clicking the BACK IT button above, and choose whatever reward fits you. Feel the magnitude of your pledge. You aren't just contributing to something that can be of benefit to you; you are also supporting vanlifers all over the world who want to make the community more active and attractive. Note: we cannot develop the app without this funding!
2. Share Our Story
Share our IndieGogo Campaign via email, Facebook, Twitter, phone calls, text messages and through old fashioned conversations. The Driftr app will continue to come to life because a community wanted and created its emergence!
3. Leave Your Mark 
At the end of the campaign you’ll be able to tell us what kind of features and functionalities you are most looking forward to using and suggesting new ones we may have not thought of just yet. Please do this! We want to use our community feedback as an important pointer as we build the production version of the app!
 
Risks & Challenges
 
The app developers at Hypercube are very experienced, but there will always be risks in any app development effort:

This is a mobile, web, and server based software project, with all the risks normally associated with software development.
There are also various risks in approval and deployment from Apple that are out of our control. We do not anticipate any problems but it’s a process that we do not control.
Project costs and schedule estimates are the result of our evaluation of the technical and approval risks and Hypercube's deep familiarity with this type of project. There will, of course, be some unforeseen glitches, which will promptly be reported in the Updates section. We are committed to completing this project once the funding goal has been achieved, and keeping you informed every step of the way.

story:
Short Summary:

Live life as adventure is where we stand for. As our life begins by being in or on the water, we wanted to create gear that goes with the action, keeping our stuff dry and afloat. The how came when meet our friend Jimmy and his factory to develop bags that our not only good looking but effective travel mates during our and hopefully also your adventures.

We have in the meantime successfully tested  the first prototypes and production samples and look forward to share with you all some video footage soon. 

Join the adventure and get your own unique bag(s).  We are looking for adventurers to back our project in order to get the bags into production. Are you one of them? If we fail we will refund the money of course.

story:
MagniCushion is one of a kind, magnetic, and connectible cushion that can be used in various ways like camping to making a safe playground for your child. The idea came from the problems that people who love to hang outdoors facing.  When you are going camping or just simply enjoying outdoors most of the time you can’t carry your comfortable sofa from your home with you. Yes, if you are going by car you can always get some cushion with you -which is not as comfortable as your sofa- with you but if you make your travel by other means it will not be possible. Besides with your camping equipment taking up the most space, you won’t want to. From these problems, MagniCushion has born. Mangicushion is a hand-crafted, high quality, comfortable cushion which has the ability to connect via its magnets.

And we would like to note that we care about your health and apply a proper disinfection process to all MagniCushions before shipping them. They are 100% new type coronavirus (COVID-19) FREE.

 

 

The things you can do with MagniCushions help;

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Extra attributes of MagniCushion which will make you fall in love with it:

 

 

 

 

 

Rewards & Options

MagniCushions comes with 6 different color choices and 5 different sizes of cases. So look to the chart below and combine your own taste of the MagniCushion pack before backing us.

 

 

Also, we offer our backers some interesting additional features as stretch goals. With your help, MagniCushions can be more colorful and more unique.

 

 

Technical

MagniCushions are top quality, hand-crafted cushions. They have sewed by tailors from BPA free recycled polyester fabric. BPA free recycled polyester fabric is usually used for furniture in yachts which is an indicator for both its quality and reliance as a waterproof fabric.

 

Also, MagniCushions are in the ideal size and weight to carrying around. Their size gives them their most featured attribute, practicalness.

 

 

Their inside-sewed magnet and iron combinations are an important factor for MagniCushions. With perfect harmony between neodymium magnets and iron parts, our magnicushions can attach and detach without a single problem.

 

 

Timeline

Our process for MagniCushions has been somewhat eventful. Right after we cemented project bases we had a fall out with our previous employers which we worked as a semi-independent project group. So with those impossibilities, we formed a group of our own fully independently and we continued to work to realize our passion project for all outdoor people.

 

 

Risks and challenges

In order to minimize the risk that comes from creating a new product, we have made all necessary arrangements. We have made several deals with our material suppliers and shipping agency. We have produced our prototypes and made the essential tests. We observed long time results of the product and haven’t faced any problem. We are well prepared for this campaign and we have enough experience to handle this campaign. We will do our best to inform our backers during the process and try to update as much as we can. If there will be any problem please feel free to contact us directly.
