story:
It's Hot Outside... and Only Getting Hotter

2021 is already setting heat records, and 100-degree days are becoming more frequent every year. From the "Heat Dome" over the Pacific Northwest to temperature records shattered around the world, the Earth's climate is entering a new era marked by extreme heat.

 

Is This the Best We Can Do?

When we looked at current solutions to stay cool outside we found zero good options. What the heck, it’s 2021... is there really no good way to stay cool? In 100-degree weather it's going to take more than a sun hat, a bottle of water, and a wicking t-shirt to survive outside.

 

Meet the Honu Cooling Backpack

The Honu Cooling Pack was designed for this hotter reality, standing at the fore of a new wave of climate-adaptive equipment as a new active cooling pack designed specifically for outdoor adventure.

In contrast to passive cooling wearables—wicking fabrics, evaporative bandanas, and ice pack pockets—the Honu Cooling Pack is designed to actively remove heat from the wearer's body by circulating cool water through patented, thermally-conductive polymer tubing integrated throughout the pack. Honu leverages the body’s natural cooling biomechanics to reduce the experience of atmospheric temperatures by up to 20°F.

[Insert "Damn, that's nice!" video]

Honu's active cooling is achieved via a highly flexible and form-fitting network of ThermoCore™ thermoconductive microtubes, which circulate icy cold water from a custom designed reservoir. More than 60 feet of microtubing is built into the body of the pack’s lightweight taffeta nylon mesh, specifically targeting key heat extraction zones.

 

The History Behind The Technology

The ThermoCore™ Active Cooling Technology was originally developed for the U.S. Army and Navy to lower core thermal temperatures in extreme environments. 

Designed to be maximally conductive and work in conjunction with the body’s physiological responses to temperature, the cooling technology performed extremely well in lab testing, achieving twice the heat extraction of other wearable cooling products. But the real proof came from the field, naval shipyard workers were blown away by the cooling capabilities of our cooling shirt.

Made to support up to a half-day of high-exertion activity, the Honu's active cooling system was tested and refined by feedback from professional triathletes and avid hikers in Hawaii's hottest and most demanding environments. In controlled laboratory testing, the Honu achieved 2x the heat extraction of other wearable cooling products.

The Honu uses ice cubes or gel packs to keep the pack’s water reservoir cold. Easy recharge in 30 seconds or less!

 

Hugs Your Body Like a Turtle Shell

Honu is the Hawaiian name for the endangered green sea turtle whose habitat is threatened by the effects of climate change and human activity. The Honu pack was designed by a team of engineers and designers in Hawaii as a personal cooling system that lowers body temperature, increases comfort, and extends the duration of hot-weather outdoor pursuits.

 

Ready, Set, Go! - Ready to go in 30 seconds

Designed to get you up and outside as quickly as possible, the Honu can be prepped and ready to go in under 30 seconds. Simply fill the cooling bladder with ice or gel packs from the freezer, plug in the included power bank, and you’re ready to face the heat. The 3L cooling bladder provides up to 4 hours of maximum cooling duration.

On the leading edge of a new wave in climate adapted equipment, the Honu Cooling Pack is a new breed of active cooling packs designed specifically for outdoor adventures - from mountain biking to hiking, and anything that keeps us active and outside.

 

Designed to keep you outdoors - feeling cooler and adventuring longer.

 

The Honu pack has been many years in the making. What first started as an idea for the US military turned into the pack you see today. Below you will see early prototypes and samples as we've iterated and designed through the past ~10 years to get the Honu pack right!

story:
Why do you need a Retractable Wire-Lock?





Why is RFID-BLOCKING important?

 


























About US:

Little Things Matter Design Studio specializes in designing beautiful and functional products. We try our best to keep prices as low as we can while providing value by raising funds and selling through various online platforms. Because we are just a start up, low on capital funding, we’ve decided to crowdfund our very 1st project “MOBO: The Most Versatile Anti Theft Backpack” on a trusted crowdfunding site Indiegogo.com.

We created the LTM brand to remind ourselves that every little things in life matter.

As our brand implies, when creating a product, we pay special attention to all the little things that are often missed by products created at low cost. Things like stitching, materials selection, functional design, quality, comfort and user experience.

We hope that through our very 1st crowdfunding project, we will be able to raised enough funds to mass produce MOBO and to set up a design studio that has all the necessary equipment and professionals in the field to create even more sleek and useful products for our every day life. Your support means the world to us. Thank you and God bless you.


What We Need & What You Get:

Throughout this campaign that spans 35 days, we hope to raise a minimum of usd20,000. The perks we offer are to the right of this page and on top of that, we are giving away a special membership only to backers of this campaign. The membership will give them 10% discounts on top of any other discounts offered for our future products.

We also set up a referral program for this campaign where backers are rewarded 1 set of MOBO Backpack for every 10 referrals that backed us.


 

Risks & Challenges:

Throughout the creation of MOBO, it would be a lie to say that there are no risks. The Factories that we associate ourselves with are one that manufacture thousands of bags every month, so a waiting list is there which might delay our delivery. On top of that, we have to deal with the shipping courier as well where countless of products are shipped overseas.

With over 10 years of international trade experiences gained from importing Tires for my family business, I am confident that MOBO will reach you in a timely manner.


 

Other Ways You Can Help:

Any and all support is valuable to us and we appreciate it very much. Thank you for your time as it is the single most precious gift that could be received.

story:
Axial fan:

  • Rated Voltage: 5V
  • Rated Speed: 4600RPM
  • Maximum Pressure: 5.38mm H2O (without filter)
  • Noise: 33.5 dBA

Cable:    

  • USB A
  • 1200mm

Compliance:

  • CE
  • FCC

Cartridge material: PET

Filter media:

  • Layer 1: 20 grams per square meter PP non-woven fabric
  • Layer 2: 15 grams per square meter PP melt-blown fabric

 

Shield: Optical grade polycarbonate

Apron:

  • Material 70% Cotton 30% Viscose
  • Treatment: RISAN BC (tm) anti-microbial treatment.

With the help of our fantastic team, we have surpassed most of our hurdles from:

  • Finalizing the ergonomics of the product
  • Tooling
  • Prototyping
  • Testing
  • Sourcing 
  • Material procurement
  • Product 

Our first batch of 500 units is full ready to be shipped. With your support in our campaign, we will be able to go into the next batch of production.

Airodome is designed to help you stay on the go, without being forced into the limitations of traditional equipment we are accustomed to. Your support will go a long way in helping us reshape the community and help keep everyone safe and active.

story:
I'm Luke and I'm an Australian entrepreneur. I spent 6 years in a corporate career in finance while playing around with various projects, successfully exiting 2 of them.

5 years ago I dived headfirst into a new startup called Foddies, which I still own and run to this day. It's a specialty food brand that produces a range of products with distribution across all of Australia. 

But, I also love the Sun. I spend a lot of time in it (safely) but I've had a problem all these years, and so do you.

January, 2020 (the before times)

My partner and I were lying on a couple of deck chairs enjoying some Vitamin D like we usually do. I was lying on my stomach and felt that I had already exposed my face to too much sun, so I threw a corner of my towel over my face to give myself some shade.

It was uncomfortable

I was used to discomfort in my neck when on my stomach but I didn't usually have my face covered. It was hot, and steamy, and I kept exhaling hot air which just made it all so much worse.

There has to be a better way

It was then that the light bulb went off. 

Wouldn't it be cool to have some kind of pillow that you can just stuff your head into, so you could lie with your face straight down. 

A pillow that would keep you cool by blowing cooler, fresh air on your face. 

A pillow that had speakers built into it so I could enjoy my music while enjoying my sun. 

A pillow that let me chuck all my stuff into so I didn't have to juggle my phone/keys/wallet/sunscreen back and forth to the beach.

Beebu

And that's how Beebu was born. Beebu is my better way. Beebu lets you lie, face down, comfortably. It prevents your face from getting hot and stuffy by blowing cool air over it. It lets you listen to some tunes while you're relaxing on the beach and it lets you throw some belongings in to minimise the amount of junk you're carrying along with you.

I want to see Beebu become a reality. I have had some awesome feedback on my idea and I want to help everyone else who has the same problem I do. I have some great ideas about new models and features and just need some help to get started.

Where Am I At?

I've been using my homemade 'prototype' as a proof-of-concept to test whether the idea actually works and is comfortable and, so far, so good. I've gotten a very basic design done up for a functional prototype in order to put some formality around the project but it's not complete and needs refinement on many levels. That's the purpose of this campaign.

Modularity

I've been getting a lot of feedback on this idea from various forums and subreddits online and the consistent feedback I've been getting is about the value of the features. There's been a huge amount of variance in terms of different people seeing different value in different features. 

Some just want the basic pillow with no additional features. Some want the pillow and the speakers to listen to music, some just the fans for the cooling features and some want it all.

The feedback has been awesome and the obvious solution is to make Beebu semi customisable. I always wanted to give people the option to choose different colours and styles, but it seems as though giving people the option to add or subtract features would also be useful.

Obviously this would be subject to manufacturing capabilities and ensuring that it's technically feasible to do this.

Use Of Funds

I'm looking to raise $25,000AUD for this project. The money will be used to:

1. Refine the final design of Beebu

2. Fund production of working, functional prototype

3. Some marketing cash to generate some buzz

Final Design

I want to be really clear to everyone that the (very) basic design I've had done up is not necessarily how the final product will look. I just wanted to give a better idea of what this thing may look like instead of my home-made 'proto-type' that's had a bit of wear and tear. There's no doubt that there will be better ways to design the final product, and that's exactly what this campaign will help to do!

Risk & Challenges

I mentioned earlier that I'm not a product designer or even a manufacturer. My background was in finance before starting my business in food manufacturing and distribution. Obviously not having experience in these two areas will be a challenge for me to commercialise the product. 

But, I also never had any experience in food before I started my current business. I'd not even worked in a cafe. Despite that, I was able to build a business that had a physical presence (before COVID shut everything down) along with an online home-delivery service and a national distribution network.

This meant I had to figure out how to fit out stores, find and manage suppliers, manufacturing partners, logistics challenges (for perishable or frozen product no less!) as well as social media marketing and everything else that goes into running a business. I've even had to fight legal battles over IP and other issues that have popped up over the years: all self-represented!

I guess what I'm trying to say is that I'm confident I can get results, even if I'm new to an industry.

I've already started lining up design and manufacturing partners so that I can get ahead of these challenges. Because the reality is that I'm not going to do everything on my own. But, as I did in my current business, I'll be able to build a team around me to get Beebu off the ground!

So please, if you want to see this product or see a need for it yourself, contribute to my campaign. If you can't afford to, that's cool, but please share it with all your friends and family to help get exposure and get the word out!
story_txt: I'm Luke and I'm an Australian entrepreneur. I spent 6 years in a corporate career in finance while playing around with various projects, successfully exiting 2 of them.5 years ago I dived headfirst into a new startup called Foddies, which I still own and run to this day. It's a specialty food brand that produces a range of products with distribution across all of Australia. But, I also love the Sun. I spend a lot of time in it (safely) but I've had a problem all these years, and so do you.January, 2020 (the before times)My partner and I were lying on a couple of deck chairs enjoying some Vitamin D like we usually do. I was lying on my stomach and felt that I had already exposed my face to too much sun, so I threw a corner of my towel over my face to give myself some shade.It was uncomfortableI was used to discomfort in my neck when on my stomach but I didn't usually have my face covered. It was hot, and steamy, and I kept exhaling hot air which just made it all so much worse.There has to be a better wayIt was then that the light bulb went off. Wouldn't it be cool to have some kind of pillow that you can just stuff your head into, so you could lie with your face straight down. A pillow that would keep you cool by blowing cooler, fresh air on your face. A pillow that had speakers built into it so I could enjoy my music while enjoying my sun. A pillow that let me chuck all my stuff into so I didn't have to juggle my phone/keys/wallet/sunscreen back and forth to the beach.BeebuAnd that's how Beebu was born. Beebu is my better way. Beebu lets you lie, face down, comfortably. It prevents your face from getting hot and stuffy by blowing cool air over it. It lets you listen to some tunes while you're relaxing on the beach and it lets you throw some belongings in to minimise the amount of junk you're carrying along with you.I want to see Beebu become a reality. I have had some awesome feedback on my idea and I want to help everyone else who has the same problem I do. I have some great ideas about new models and features and just need some help to get started.Where Am I At?I've been using my homemade 'prototype' as a proof-of-concept to test whether the idea actually works and is comfortable and, so far, so good. I've gotten a very basic design done up for a functional prototype in order to put some formality around the project but it's not complete and needs refinement on many levels. That's the purpose of this campaign.ModularityI've been getting a lot of feedback on this idea from various forums and subreddits online and the consistent feedback I've been getting is about the value of the features. There's been a huge amount of variance in terms of different people seeing different value in different features. Some just want the basic pillow with no additional features. Some want the pillow and the speakers to listen to music, some just the fans for the cooling features and some want it all.The feedback has been awesome and the obvious solution is to make Beebu semi customisable. I always wanted to give people the option to choose different colours and styles, but it seems as though giving people the option to add or subtract features would also be useful.Obviously this would be subject to manufacturing capabilities and ensuring that it's technically feasible to do this.Use Of FundsI'm looking to raise $25,000AUD for this project. The money will be used to:1. Refine the final design of Beebu2. Fund production of working, functional prototype3. Some marketing cash to generate some buzzFinal DesignI want to be really clear to everyone that the (very) basic design I've had done up is not necessarily how the final product will look. I just wanted to give a better idea of what this thing may look like instead of my home-made 'proto-type' that's had a bit of wear and tear. There's no doubt that there will be better ways to design the final product, and that's exactly what this campaign will help to do!Risk & ChallengesI mentioned earlier that I'm not a product designer or even a manufacturer. My background was in finance before starting my business in food manufacturing and distribution. Obviously not having experience in these two areas will be a challenge for me to commercialise the product. But, I also never had any experience in food before I started my current business. I'd not even worked in a cafe. Despite that, I was able to build a business that had a physical presence (before COVID shut everything down) along with an online home-delivery service and a national distribution network.This meant I had to figure out how to fit out stores, find and manage suppliers, manufacturing partners, logistics challenges (for perishable or frozen product no less!) as well as social media marketing and everything else that goes into running a business. I've even had to fight legal battles over IP and other issues that have popped up over the years: all self-represented!I guess what I'm trying to say is that I'm confident I can get results, even if I'm new to an industry.I've already started lining up design and manufacturing partners so that I can get ahead of these challenges. Because the reality is that I'm not going to do everything on my own. But, as I did in my current business, I'll be able to build a team around me to get Beebu off the ground!So please, if you want to see this product or see a need for it yourself, contribute to my campaign. If you can't afford to, that's cool, but please share it with all your friends and family to help get exposure and get the word out!

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my name is Ben. I recently moved to Virginia from the everGREEN state of Washington, where I worked in the cannabis industry. I now live on 5 acres of land with my Dad and Stepmom. We have all been avid fans of cannabis our entire adult lives. 

We have decided to take our love and share it with others in the form of an outdoor experience where travelers can get away from it all, or just stop for the night on their journey. We will offer a safe judgment-free-environment for people to enjoy the new found liberation of legal cannabis use. 

We want to build 3-5 campsites and two tiny homes to rent out year-round. So far we have carved  walking trails that are just under a mile around the property where you can enjoy a nature walk with a buzz. 

We have a chef on site that can offer a 3 course canna meal infused with canna butter(21 + ID Required); Non infused options are also available. We offer a communal area where you can sit by the pond, have a bonfire, or even watch an outdoor movie.

If you hate living with our fur-child at home, no worries, WE ARE DOG FRIENDLY. After we meet our goal, we expect to be up and running within two months. 

What We Need & What You Get

Our overall goal is $15,000+ This would allow for all the build and requirements/permits needed to run our business. More details below.

Each tiny house has an estimate of 3-5K full build. This will all be hand built by me, my father, and my brother. This is a family business. 

We have the land for 3-5 campsites that will be located off of our 3/4 mile trail which we have already cleared. We hope to equip each with a fire pit. 2K will cover all expenses for campsites

The final 3K will go to an outdoor restroom for the campsites equipped with a shower, toilet, and sink. This will be located in a central location for all the campsites to share.

If we reach the goal (fingers crossed) any over our goal will go to small things needed around the campsites/bnb. This includes but is not limited to, path lighting, projector/speaker (movie set up), outdoor seating, cleaning products, fire wood, upkeep for campsites and path, etc...

Donation Perks

$5 Virtual 5% Discount 

$10 Postcard 5% discount 

$25 Postcard 10% Discount Card

$50 Post Card 10% Discount Card, 1 Free Meal

$75 Post Card 10% Discount Card, 2 Free Meal

$100 Post Card 15% Discount, 2 Free Meal

$150 Post Card 20% Discount, 2 Free Meal

$250 post Card, 2 Free Night ALL INCLUSIVE 

The Impact

If you donate you will be making my dad and my dreams come true of starting a family business where people can be themselves.

We believe a place like this is important. As cannabis culture becomes more accepted we believe there needs to be places that accept people who partake as much as another other form of relaxation. 

This is as nich that, as a budtender in Seattle, I saw people searching desperately for, and is not being adequately met. Weed and nature go together like peanut butter and chocolate or cookies and milk. 

Risks & Challenges

The risks and challenges we face are the stigmas against cannabis, and the law changing. Both are challenges we are prepared to face. 

We have seen weed air bnb places in other states, like Washington, where they were allowed to operate as such. On top of that we are prepared to acquire the proper permits as they become available.

Our plan is to keep in touch with a lawyer to make sure we are in accordance with state law.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our campaigns! 

Book a free tour on our paths!

Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Mention us to your cannabis friendly friends and family!

story:
Bref résumé

 Les contributeurs financent des idées qui leur plaisent et des personnes en qui ils ont confiance. Voici quelques pistes à suivre dans cette section :

  •  Présentez-vous et parlez de votre parcours.
  •  Décrivez brièvement votre projet et pourquoi il est important à vos yeux.
  • Expliquez l'importance du projet auquel les contributeurs vont participer. 

 N'oubliez pas, restez concis mais original. Demandez-vous : si quelqu'un s'arrêtait de lire à cet endroit, serait-il prêt à faire une contribution ?

 Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

 Fournissez plus de détails aux gens :

  •  Expliquez le montant du financement dont vous avez besoin et à quoi il va servir. Soyez clair et précis : les contributeurs ont besoin de vous faire confiance pour vous aider.
  •  Parlez de vos contreparties uniques. Suscitez l'intérêt de vos visiteurs !
  •  Décrivez où les fonds iront si vous n'atteignez pas complètement votre objectif.

 L'impact

N'hésitez pas à expliquer votre projet plus en détail et indiquez aux visiteurs en quoi leur contribution fera la différence :

  •  Expliquez pourquoi votre projet est précieux pour le contributeur et pour le monde.
  •  Mettez en avant vos expériences réussies sur des projets tels que celui-ci (si vous en avez).
  •  Rendez votre projet concret aux yeux des visiteurs et suscitez la confiance.

 Risques et défis

 Les gens apprécieront la transparence de vos propos. Soyez ouvert et démarquez-vous en exposant les risques et les obstacles auxquels vous allez peut-être faire face pour atteindre votre objectif.

  •  Expliquez pourquoi vous pensez être en mesure de relever ces défis.
  •  Décrivez comment vous comptez résoudre ces éventuels problèmes.

 D'autres façons d'aider

 Certaines personnes ne peuvent pas contribuer mais cela ne veut pas dire qu'elles ne peuvent pas aider :

  •  Demandez aux gens de passer le mot et de faire de la publicité autour de votre projet.
  •  Rappelez-leur d'utiliser les outils de partage Indiegogo !

Et le tour est joué.

story:
Short Summary

  • We all love dogs right?! We all have dogs and that's why our group loves them just as much.
  • We want to make it easy for all dog lovers to pick up their dogs waste by being comfortable doing it.
  • You by contributing will help the environment, yourself and your best friend.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • All the funding will go back into getting you guys your gloves as soon as possible. The quicker we receive the funding the quicker the gloves are sent out !

  • Environmentally friendly which is made with nontoxic material that decomposes over time. Approved by dogs and dog owners as seen on the video. The glove shape of the waste bag itself makes clean up quick and very easy. 

  • Even if we don't reach our goal everyone will get their orders fulfilled. 

The Impact

  • Environmentally safe waste gloves and much easier than a regular waste bags.
  • We love our animals like family and thoughts of providing these to the public makes our group work even harder.
  • Cheap and affordable so you can buy for the whole year if you would like.

Risks & Challenges

  • Handling challenges and obstacles is a strong point on our time, so basically bring them on!
  • With a strong and smart team like ours we will work together to make this product a reality for every dog and animal lover out there.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you cant donate or buy our doggygloves and you like the product you can always sure it on facebook, instagram or even show others physically .
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools! Every USEFUL! 

Thank You very much, Your helping us more than we are helping you!

story:
CONCEPTO DE LA CHIBI GUÍA

Esta “pequeña guía” es la auto edición número diez, tras haberla “abandonado” diez años, la estoy dejando “lista”, reordenándola o reescribiéndola, en apenas diez días. Como dice mi hija Ainoa, soy de mapa y no de brújula, necesito tenerlo todo organizado para ponerme a escribir, pero una vez empiezo, no paro hasta terminarlo.

Divido en tres grandes apartados todo lo que quiero “indicarte” sobre Japón: la información previa que puedes leer tranquilamente en casa, pero después no necesitas llevártela, la que sí creo que me llevo siempre, por lo menos, en el móvil y las fichas con la información de mi propio viaje. Como un antes, durante y después.

En este caso concreto, lo que tienes entre manos, la primera parte o chibi guía está planteada como simple lectura, FAQ o preguntas o información variada, pero también puedes captar mi percepción o disfrutar de algún cuento o anécdotas a modo de “guía narrativa” aunque yo prefiero pensar que simplemente te acompaño, como si fuera tu guía acompañante mientras descubres o recuerdas este mundo fascinante que es Japón. Vamos, como si te lo contara mientras nos estamos tomando un té en una cafetería. De tú a tú si me lo permites.

La segunda parte o chibi diario, más que soltarte el “rollo” de alguno de mis viajes, lo enfoco en lo que necesito en el día a día una vez he empezado mi viaje, un resumen o esquema a lo que poder echar mano rápidamente.

Y, la última parte o chibi agenda, te propongo como Life coach, una serie de preguntas y ejercicios para que tú mism@ aprendas a “pescar”, a organizarte, cumplas tu sueño, vayas a Japón y entonces nos cuentes tu propia experiencia a los demás.

Yo, al querer profundizar un poco más y esperando no ser demasiado “densa”, lo veo como un viaje al exterior para llegar a mi interior. Aprovecho para revisar mis valores, a conectar mi parte más occidental con la oriental o a aceptar el yin y yang de ambas culturas en mí y encontrar mi equilibrio… mi centro.

Te invito a mi portal a Japón y ahora también, si quieres, el tuyo. ¿Te apetece atravesar el precioso torii de Miyajima y pasar a otra dimensión realmente deslumbrante?

 

¿QUIÉN SOY?

En resumen, soy la “friki” que vive siempre de su PASIÓN y con mi entusiasmo me encanta contagiarte de esa energía para que tú también cumplas tus sueños.

Comparto ahora solo cuatro pinceladas para que tengas una idea desde donde escribo.

Aficionada desde mi infancia a los “dibujitos animados chinos”, me gustaba copiarlos, me encantaban las canciones y empecé a estudiar el idioma. Traductora desde 1998 para Planeta de Agostini y TVE 2 (Marmalade Boy o La Familia Crece), para otras cadenas (One Piece, Detective Conan, Sailor Moon Stars, Doremi, etc) y últimamente para Netflix (Evangelion, Aggretsuko, Rilakkuma, Saint Seiya, alguna película de Miyazaki del estudio Ghibli o la americana The Midnight Gospel).

Administradora única del portal de información y agencia de viajes www.portaljapon.com donde coordino viajes conscientes en grupo desde 2001.

Escritora para revistas del sector como las antiguas Neko, Dokan o Minami 2000, o ponente para charlas, conferencias o talleres sobre mis traducciones o viajes. Organicé mi propio evento y todavía hoy colaboro con otros tantos. Me publicaron un par de libros de Japonés con Yumiko (aunque me marearon, no me pagaron y entonces supe lo que eran los ataques de ansiedad y me costó superar las pocas ganas de escribir).

A día de hoy, sigo formándome e integrando en mi vida el coaching, el reiki, la meditación, la inteligencia emocional, la PNL, las constelaciones familiares o todo aquello que me beneficie en mi constante desarrollo personal.

Por cierto, Chibi deriva de una de las primeras palabras que aprendemos en japonés: chiisai, que significa “pequeñ@/s”. Cuando empecé a estudiar en la EOI de Barcelona, me llamaban la “pequeña jugadora de voleibol” y claro, cuando la gente me ve lo entiende al comprobar mis apenas metro y medio de estatura.

Después mis compis empezaron a llamarme Chiisai, y al chatear por internet, simplemente Chii y todo lo que empecé a organizar eran chibi jornadas, chibi día, chibi tours, chibi guía, chibi viajeros. Los “chibis” son también esos dibujos japoneses más pequeños y cabezones. Podemos ver una muestra de cómo lo hemos importado con todo lo de Harry Potter de Primark. Me parecen adorables.

Así que en “mi mundo” me conocen por mi “apodo”, pero cuando me di cuenta que también incluye la palabra “chi”, energía, lo extendí al resto de gente. Tengo mi nombre más occidental, guerrero y yang junto al que es más oriental, relajado y yin. Aless o Chii. ¿Cómo prefieres llamarme?

 

CROWFUNDING o CHIBI MECENAZGO

CHIBI GUÍA, DIARIO Y AGENDA PORTAL JAPON

¿Para qué usar una plataforma de crowdfunding?

  • Para llegar a cuanta más gente posible la información que recopilo de Japón en la versión alfa de la chibi guía, diario y agenda. Desde 10 de marzo 2020.
  • Ofrezco, a cambio, lo que yo puedo a nivel personal e individual, con mis 20 años de experiencia, organización y saber. A modo de recompensa por tu aportación.
  • Así podría dar un paso más y hacer una versión beta o ya definitiva de la guía para junio 2020, con fotos, mapas y demás ya que necesitaría ayuda externa para ello para tema maquetación, por ejemplo. Según lo que hayas aportado, cada uno de los que me leéis, podré hacer más o más y más y más y mucho más.
  • Para chibis (si eres chibi veteran@ y ya hayas viajado conmigo) siempre tendrás una hora, sesión o noche extra… y alguna cosilla más, como sabes. ^____^

 

10 euros:

Envío de algunas páginas de la chibi guía, diario y/o agenda solo en pdf, mapas, más actualizaciones.

 

15 euros:

Envío de algunas páginas de la chibi guía, diario y/o agenda solo en pdf, mapas, más actualizaciones. Más la chibi guía en papel, versión alfa. Entrega en mano o más gastos según lugar de envío.

 

50 euros:

  • de algunas páginas de la chibi guía, diario y/o agenda solo en pdf, mapas, más actualizaciones. Más la chibi guía en papel, versión alfa. Entrega en mano o envío a España.
  • Y una hora o día o noche a elegir:
  • Una hora de asesoramiento online vía skype, whatsapp o presencial para tu viaje a Japón.
  • Una excursión en Japón de mediodía o una de día completo, más gastos de entradas, transporte y dietas.*
  • Una sesión de reiki, preferentemente presencial.
  • Una noche, por persona, en uno de nuestros chibi pisos en Tokio.

 

100 euros:

  • de algunas páginas de la chibi guía, diario y/o agenda solo en pdf, mapas, más actualizaciones. Más la chibi guía en papel, versión alfa. Entrega en mano o envío a España.
  • Y dos horas o excursiones o noches a elegir:
  • Dos horas de asesoramiento online vía skype, whatsapp o presencial para tu viaje a Japón.
  • Dos excursiones en Japón de mediodía o una de día completo o una de mediodía para dos personas, más gastos de entradas, transporte y dietas.*
  • Dos sesiones de reiki, preferentemente presencial.
  • Dos noches para una persona o una para dos personas, en uno de nuestros chibi pisos en Tokio.
  • O se puede combinar una hora de asesoramiento más una excursión o una noche, etcétera.

 

200 euros:

  • de algunas páginas de la chibi guía, diario y/o agenda solo en pdf, mapas, más actualizaciones. Más la chibi guía en papel, versión alfa. Entrega en mano o envío a España.
  • Y cuatro horas o excursiones o noches a elegir:
  • Cuatro horas de asesoramiento online vía skype, whatsapp o presencial para tu viaje a Japón.
  • Cuatro excursiones en Japón de mediodía o dos de día completo o dos de mediodía para dos personas, más gastos de entradas, transporte y dietas.*
  • Cuatro sesiones de reiki, preferentemente presencial.
  • Cuatro noches para una persona o dos para dos personas, en uno de nuestros chibi pisos en Tokio.
  • O se puede combinar, por ejemplo, una hora de asesoramiento más una excursión más una sesión de reiki o una noche.

 

  • Posibles horarios de asesoramiento online o reiki: cuando a los dos nos convenga.
  • Para las noches en los chibi pisos de Tokio según fecha deseada y disponibilidad en el momento de la petición.
  • Posibles fechas para excursiones más gastos de entradas, transporte y dietas: entre 17 de marzo a 13 de abril, 1 de julio a 15 de septiembre y 5 a 25 de noviembre 2020 y otras fechas a negociar, a priori, hasta finales de 2023.

Se puede pedir:

  • en el aeropuerto y traslado en el transporte elegido.
  • por Tokio, Kioto, alrededores, zonas de interior.
story_txt:
CONCEPTO DE LA CHIBI GUÍA
Esta “pequeña guía” es la auto edición número diez, tras haberla “abandonado” diez años, la estoy dejando “lista”, reordenándola o reescribiéndola, en apenas diez días. Como dice mi hija Ainoa, soy de mapa y no de brújula, necesito tenerlo todo organizado para ponerme a escribir, pero una vez empiezo, no paro hasta terminarlo.Divido en tres grandes apartados todo lo que quiero “indicarte” sobre Japón: la información previa que puedes leer tranquilamente en casa, pero después no necesitas llevártela, la que sí creo que me llevo siempre, por lo menos, en el móvil y las fichas con la información de mi propio viaje. Como un antes, durante y después.En este caso concreto, lo que tienes entre manos, la primera parte o chibi guía está planteada como simple lectura, FAQ o preguntas o información variada, pero también puedes captar mi percepción o disfrutar de algún cuento o anécdotas a modo de “guía narrativa” aunque yo prefiero pensar que simplemente te acompaño, como si fuera tu guía acompañante mientras descubres o recuerdas este mundo fascinante que es Japón. Vamos, como si te lo contara mientras nos estamos tomando un té en una cafetería. De tú a tú si me lo permites.La segunda parte o chibi diario, más que soltarte el “rollo” de alguno de mis viajes, lo enfoco en lo que necesito en el día a día una vez he empezado mi viaje, un resumen o esquema a lo que poder echar mano rápidamente.Y, la última parte o chibi agenda, te propongo como Life coach, una serie de preguntas y ejercicios para que tú mism@ aprendas a “pescar”, a organizarte, cumplas tu sueño, vayas a Japón y entonces nos cuentes tu propia experiencia a los demás.Yo, al querer profundizar un poco más y esperando no ser demasiado “densa”, lo veo como un viaje al exterior para llegar a mi interior. Aprovecho para revisar mis valores, a conectar mi parte más occidental con la oriental o a aceptar el yin y yang de ambas culturas en mí y encontrar mi equilibrio… mi centro.Te invito a mi portal a Japón y ahora también, si quieres, el tuyo. ¿Te apetece atravesar el precioso torii de Miyajima y pasar a otra dimensión realmente deslumbrante? ¿QUIÉN SOY?En resumen, soy la “friki” que vive siempre de su PASIÓN y con mi entusiasmo me encanta contagiarte de esa energía para que tú también cumplas tus sueños.Comparto ahora solo cuatro pinceladas para que tengas una idea desde donde escribo.Aficionada desde mi infancia a los “dibujitos animados chinos”, me gustaba copiarlos, me encantaban las canciones y empecé a estudiar el idioma. Traductora desde 1998 para Planeta de Agostini y TVE 2 (Marmalade Boy o La Familia Crece), para otras cadenas (One Piece, Detective Conan, Sailor Moon Stars, Doremi, etc) y últimamente para Netflix (Evangelion, Aggretsuko, Rilakkuma, Saint Seiya, alguna película de Miyazaki del estudio Ghibli o la americana The Midnight Gospel).Administradora única del portal de información y agencia de viajes www.portaljapon.com donde coordino viajes conscientes en grupo desde 2001.Escritora para revistas del sector como las antiguas Neko, Dokan o Minami 2000, o ponente para charlas, conferencias o talleres sobre mis traducciones o viajes. Organicé mi propio evento y todavía hoy colaboro con otros tantos. Me publicaron un par de libros de Japonés con Yumiko (aunque me marearon, no me pagaron y entonces supe lo que eran los ataques de ansiedad y me costó superar las pocas ganas de escribir).A día de hoy, sigo formándome e integrando en mi vida el coaching, el reiki, la meditación, la inteligencia emocional, la PNL, las constelaciones familiares o todo aquello que me beneficie en mi constante desarrollo personal.Por cierto, Chibi deriva de una de las primeras palabras que aprendemos en japonés: chiisai, que significa “pequeñ@/s”. Cuando empecé a estudiar en la EOI de Barcelona, me llamaban la “pequeña jugadora de voleibol” y claro, cuando la gente me ve lo entiende al comprobar mis apenas metro y medio de estatura.Después mis compis empezaron a llamarme Chiisai, y al chatear por internet, simplemente Chii y todo lo que empecé a organizar eran chibi jornadas, chibi día, chibi tours, chibi guía, chibi viajeros. Los “chibis” son también esos dibujos japoneses más pequeños y cabezones. Podemos ver una muestra de cómo lo hemos importado con todo lo de Harry Potter de Primark. Me parecen adorables.Así que en “mi mundo” me conocen por mi “apodo”, pero cuando me di cuenta que también incluye la palabra “chi”, energía, lo extendí al resto de gente. Tengo mi nombre más occidental, guerrero y yang junto al que es más oriental, relajado y yin. Aless o Chii. ¿Cómo prefieres llamarme? CROWFUNDING o CHIBI MECENAZGOCHIBI GUÍA, DIARIO Y AGENDA PORTAL JAPON¿Para qué usar una plataforma de crowdfunding?
Para llegar a cuanta más gente posible la información que recopilo de Japón en la versión alfa de la chibi guía, diario y agenda. Desde 10 de marzo 2020.
Ofrezco, a cambio, lo que yo puedo a nivel personal e individual, con mis 20 años de experiencia, organización y saber. A modo de recompensa por tu aportación.
Así podría dar un paso más y hacer una versión beta o ya definitiva de la guía para junio 2020, con fotos, mapas y demás ya que necesitaría ayuda externa para ello para tema maquetación, por ejemplo. Según lo que hayas aportado, cada uno de los que me leéis, podré hacer más o más y más y más y mucho más.
Para chibis (si eres chibi veteran@ y ya hayas viajado conmigo) siempre tendrás una hora, sesión o noche extra… y alguna cosilla más, como sabes. ^____^
 10 euros: Envío de algunas páginas de la chibi guía, diario y/o agenda solo en pdf, mapas, más actualizaciones. 15 euros: Envío de algunas páginas de la chibi guía, diario y/o agenda solo en pdf, mapas, más actualizaciones. Más la chibi guía en papel, versión alfa. Entrega en mano o más gastos según lugar de envío. 50 euros: 
de algunas páginas de la chibi guía, diario y/o agenda solo en pdf, mapas, más actualizaciones. Más la chibi guía en papel, versión alfa. Entrega en mano o envío a España.
Y una hora o día o noche a elegir:

Una hora de asesoramiento online vía skype, whatsapp o presencial para tu viaje a Japón.
Una excursión en Japón de mediodía o una de día completo, más gastos de entradas, transporte y dietas.*
Una sesión de reiki, preferentemente presencial.
Una noche, por persona, en uno de nuestros chibi pisos en Tokio.
 100 euros: 
de algunas páginas de la chibi guía, diario y/o agenda solo en pdf, mapas, más actualizaciones. Más la chibi guía en papel, versión alfa. Entrega en mano o envío a España.
Y dos horas o excursiones o noches a elegir:

Dos horas de asesoramiento online vía skype, whatsapp o presencial para tu viaje a Japón.
Dos excursiones en Japón de mediodía o una de día completo o una de mediodía para dos personas, más gastos de entradas, transporte y dietas.*
Dos sesiones de reiki, preferentemente presencial.
Dos noches para una persona o una para dos personas, en uno de nuestros chibi pisos en Tokio.
O se puede combinar una hora de asesoramiento más una excursión o una noche, etcétera.
 200 euros: 
de algunas páginas de la chibi guía, diario y/o agenda solo en pdf, mapas, más actualizaciones. Más la chibi guía en papel, versión alfa. Entrega en mano o envío a España.
Y cuatro horas o excursiones o noches a elegir:

Cuatro horas de asesoramiento online vía skype, whatsapp o presencial para tu viaje a Japón.
Cuatro excursiones en Japón de mediodía o dos de día completo o dos de mediodía para dos personas, más gastos de entradas, transporte y dietas.*
Cuatro sesiones de reiki, preferentemente presencial.
Cuatro noches para una persona o dos para dos personas, en uno de nuestros chibi pisos en Tokio.
O se puede combinar, por ejemplo, una hora de asesoramiento más una excursión más una sesión de reiki o una noche.
 
Posibles horarios de asesoramiento online o reiki: cuando a los dos nos convenga.
Para las noches en los chibi pisos de Tokio según fecha deseada y disponibilidad en el momento de la petición.
Posibles fechas para excursiones más gastos de entradas, transporte y dietas: entre 17 de marzo a 13 de abril, 1 de julio a 15 de septiembre y 5 a 25 de noviembre 2020 y otras fechas a negociar, a priori, hasta finales de 2023.
Se puede pedir:
en el aeropuerto y traslado en el transporte elegido.
por Tokio, Kioto, alrededores, zonas de interior.

story:
Our idea is to build a fabulous Triumph TR7 V8 specifically for the legendary  race the  CARRERA PANAMERICANA  2016 in Mexico.

 see the official website of the Panamericana

 http://www.lacarrerapanamericana.com.mx/?lang=en

See some videos of the fabulous Carrera Panamericana race 2015:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LfY0aHnM804

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L3CQ2fqhZZs

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nL28WaQGS3E

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ioa-ludm3Q

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M0B0L6IJ8eQ


Clearly, there is a synergy between the mythical TRIUMPH TR7 V8 and this race and there is no doubt that partaking in this race is the ultimate dream of any driver and team.

A project of this large scale is extremely expensive and donor support is essential.

So we made the decision to give away this fabulous TRIUMPH TR7 V8 to one of our lucky contributors which will be done in a drawn at the end of the race. 

 BEHIND THE CURTAIN

 The pilot of the TR7 V8

François LETHIER: His acquired experience since long years in Rally Raid (pilot with the Schlesser Team, twice victorious in The Dakar) then the historic racing lead him participate in others myticals events including the most prestigious : Rallye Historique du Maroc,  Rallye du Sénégal and East African Safari Classic Rally.

In 2012, he creates the FYL Racing Team, reconstruct two  Peugeot 504  coupé V6  Group 5, intended for the Safari Kenya.
In 2013, the team wins the Rallye Historique du Maroc then in May 2015 the third place to the overall classification of this event.


THE DREAM TEAM

Co-driver: Arnaud Debron, 60-year-old . He has over 20  Paris - Dakar races to his credit as co-driver with the greatest drivers, Luc Alphand, Kenzo Shinozuka, Thierry Magnaldi or Jean Louis Schlesser

Driver management : Jean Montagny, the father of Franck (Formula One Driver and  24  hours Le Mans endurance), friend of François Lethier, he is in charge of the supervision of drivers and co-drivers.

Press and Media: Patrick Mannoury, after a career with The Automobile Club of Monaco as Press officer, he has joined the Fyl Racing Team, to manage the Communication Department, which is assisted by Gilles Gaignault, a long time FIA Communication Director. 

Webmaster and social networks: Valérie Closier, she manages the activity of the website,  social networks and  information forums. She is our community manager.She also has  10 years of  co-driving experience in VHC rallies. 

Team and sponsor Coordinator:  Emmanuel Caltagirone called "the Doc" an atypical career in marketing and business, he is our "Jack of all trades " 

Construction of the car and mechanics : Marc Dell Agnello, he was a foreman of the  Schlesser team, he constructs the new chassisTriumph TR7 V8 Team. Our  "head Honcho " for the chassis and roll cage . 

Romain DELIMBEUF is another of our mechanic and he  has a long experience in maintaining and monitoring the  historic racing cars.

Pascal VIZZONE  another of our mechanic, he is our specialist in modern racing cars, and is responsible for evolutions and  wiring kits.


MONEY TALKS



WHY THE TRIUMPH TR7 V8?

* Chassis

The chassis of the Fyl Racing Team TR7 V8 is developed and reinforced by a steel roll cage 25CD4S. Its chassis  is studied to be the most efficient for large and long motor racing.

* Engine

According to the FIA regulations, the engine is developed on the basis of the 3.5L Rover. The parts such as rockers, camshaft, pistons, connecting rods, oil pump result from the lastest generation of modern technology. It's equipped with 4 WEBER carburetors double body and a specific stainless steel exhaust  allowing to increases the engine torque to over 45 m /kg for a total of 350 horsepower.

* Wheel sets, brakes and suspensions

Specifics wheel sets, brakes and suspensions are developed according FIA regulations.


WHERE, WHEN and HOW

 step 1 :  Plans and  developments of the car - in progress

 step 2 :  Roll cage manufacturing - in progress

 step 3 : Engine preparation  - in progress

step 4 : preparation of the V8 - 3.5L engine, 350 horsepower - February /  March 2016

 step 5 : development suspensions - February / March 2016

step 6 : wheel set - April / May 2016

 step 7 : wiring kit - April 2016

step 8 : finishing assembles car - june 2016 

 step 9: first tests - end of June 2016

 step 10 : tests, setting, validation - from June to August 2016

step 11 : September, departure of the race car and service vehicles for Mexico 

 step 12 : October 21th- starting of the 2016 Carrera Panamericana race.


COMPENSATIONS TO THE CONTRIBUTORS

This is the first time that anyone even given away a race car through a drawn at the end of the race and  make one of our lucky contributor  the winner of  the Triumph TR7 V8 of the race. 

For only a 20$ contribution you receive a ticket, then more you contribute and more chance you have of winning the car!

 You also get free ticket when you contribute 60$ or more and of course you receive GIFTS ( see below the contribution PACKS )

They allow to participate in the drawing lots (under supervision of a accredited notary) which will take place in the headquater of the FYL RACING TEAM after the race.

PERKS

* $20 - one ticket for the drawing lots " WIN THE 2016 PANAMERICANA TRIUMPH TR7 V8 of the FYL Racing Team". 

* $60 -the official cap of the FYL Racing Team and 4 tickets for the drawing lots“TO WIN 2016 PANAMERICANA TRIUMPH TR7 V8 of the FYLRacing Team". 


* $120 - The polo shirt + the official cap + 8 tickets for the drawing lots " TO WIN THE 2016 PANAMERICANA TRIUMPH TR7 V8 of the FYL Racing Team". 

* $240 - The FYL Racing Team Panamericana roller pen limited edition of 1000 pens numbered  including a toy Triumph TR7 and the exclusive gift box +  the official cap + 16 tickets  for the drawing lots " TO WIN THE 2016 PANAMERICANA TRIUMPH TR7 V8 of the FYL Racing Team". 


* $500 - The FYL Racing Team  super jacket  +  the official cap + 32 tickets  for the drawing lots "WIN THE 2016 PANAMERICANA TRIUMPH TR7 V8 of the FYL Racing Team".


* $3000 - The  FYL Racing Team super jacket +  the polo shirt + the official pen box+ the official cap + 150 tickets for the drawing lots "WIN THE 2016 PANAMERICANA TRIUMPH TR7 V8 of the FYL Racing Team".


* $5000 - The race suit replica of the driver+ the FYL Racing Team super jacket + the polo shirt +the official cap + 250 tickets for the drawing lots "WIN THE 2016 PANAMERICANA TRIUMPH TR7 V8 of the FYL Racing Team". 



* $20000 -  500 tickets for the drawing lots "WIN THE 2016 PANAMERICANA TRIUMPH TR7 V8 of the FYL Racing Team", and NO STORIES you 'll be full part of the team during the race (polo shirt, super jacket, cap, VIP pass included). We take care of all your expenses from the departure to the end of the race. 

 

HOW DOES IT WORK AND RULES?

When you  contribute to our adventure you will receive an e-mail after the campaign that tell you how to proceed to get your tickets via our website : http://www.fylracingteam.com

We plan that the tickets will be available online end of September 2016

Tickets allow you to participate in the drawing lots (under supervision of a accredited notary) which will take place in the headquater of the FYL RACING TEAM after the race, estimate date December 2016

Of course, we will organise a media reception for the event and all contributors will be warmly invited to the reception.

Four lots will be drawn :

Lot number 1 : the Triumph TR7 V8 of the race.

Lot number 2 : original suit of the pilot.

Lot number 3 : helmet of the pilot.

Lot number 4 : gloves of the pilot.

RULES OF THE CONTEST

 The Triumph TR7 V8 is to be won,  when it finishes the race regardless of its condition and whatever the result. The transport of the car to the nearest harbor of the winner's residence or delivered  by road (if possible) will be paid by FYL Racing Team. The FYL Racing Team will not pay for local custom duties or fees, taxes or  paperwork  that may result of the sending of the car .

The other lots (2-3-4) will be delivered by UPS and paid by FYL Racing Team. The FYL Racing Team will not pay for local custom duties or fees, taxes or  paperwork that may result of the sending of the lot (2-3-4) .

story:
However, up until now many mosquito repellents are made out of harsh chemicals which come with a lot of disadvantages: Potential health risks, unknown ingredients, and most of all a bad smell! You probably know what we are talking about. 

We are the opinion that something needs to be changed! You should be free to explore our planet and live a life full of adventures. 

MOSQUI is the first Insect Repellent which is made to combat nature with nature. Natural Ingredients fused with optimum and practical design. Functional for all outdoors activities you have ever dreamed of. It´s  DEET free. It´s save. For you and our planet.

Enjoying an outdoor lifestyle comes with many benefits but Mosquitos are not one of them! From hiking in the deep woods to lounging in the backyard, MOSQUI is an effective and safe solution that uses an extremely effective mixture of four essential oils. 

MOSQUI’s design goes hand in hand with its purpose.The portable bottle has been designed to keep the liquid at its place and can be easily tucked away, conveniently fitting into pockets, purses and packs.

Our goal is to make it easy for you to naturally protect yourself from bugs. We are the opinion that Nature can do its best... that’s why we bring together Natures most powerful healing plants. MOSQUI consists to 100% of natural essential aromatic oils!

Say Hello to The Mosquito Team: We are Jorge and Valentina from Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Our biggest goal is to help you stay naturally mosquito free. We need your support to make our dream of an all natural mosquito repellent come true :-)!
story_txt: However, up until now many mosquito repellents are made out of harsh chemicals which come with a lot of disadvantages: Potential health risks, unknown ingredients, and most of all a bad smell! You probably know what we are talking about. We are the opinion that something needs to be changed! You should be free to explore our planet and live a life full of adventures. MOSQUI is the first Insect Repellent which is made to combat nature with nature. Natural Ingredients fused with optimum and practical design. Functional for all outdoors activities you have ever dreamed of. It´s  DEET free. It´s save. For you and our planet.Enjoying an outdoor lifestyle comes with many benefits but Mosquitos are not one of them! From hiking in the deep woods to lounging in the backyard, MOSQUI is an effective and safe solution that uses an extremely effective mixture of four essential oils. MOSQUI’s design goes hand in hand with its purpose.The portable bottle has been designed to keep the liquid at its place and can be easily tucked away, conveniently fitting into pockets, purses and packs.Our goal is to make it easy for you to naturally protect yourself from bugs. We are the opinion that Nature can do its best... that’s why we bring together Natures most powerful healing plants. MOSQUI consists to 100% of natural essential aromatic oils!Say Hello to The Mosquito Team: We are Jorge and Valentina from Fort Lauderdale, Florida. Our biggest goal is to help you stay naturally mosquito free. We need your support to make our dream of an all natural mosquito repellent come true :-)!

story:
The images of STAT used throughout this campaign are based on a photo-realistic interpretation of the patented design which is subject to change, based on any engineering necessities and/or requirements.


How STAT Came To Be

Words by David Koenes:

The initial idea for the Smart Truck Assembly Tool (STAT) came to me in September of 2015. As I was setting up a new skateboard deck, I thought to myself, "What if there was a tool out there that could screw and unscrew all of the hardware bolts on each truck at once?" I immediately began thinking through how this tool might work and I eventually came up with a basic concept of the top and bottom piece. At that point, however, the tool's only real functionality was that it could very quickly tighten or loosen the hardware. Despite my excitement about this new idea, I recognized that other universal skate tools had a lot more functionality than my concept. This reality caused me to simply "shelve" the idea and move on with living my life.

Then, two months later, I experienced a light bulb moment. I realized I could actually incorporate the wrenches necessary for all-encompassing skateboard set up into the bottom piece of the tool! Fast forward several months past various legalities and further development and I find myself here, surrounded by an amazing team ready to help me share this concept with you and the rest of world! 


The STAT Prototype


"Sounds like a great idea, but is it actually possible to screw and unscrew all four hardware bolts at once?" Yes, it absolutely is! The engineering firm we've been working with recently built a prototype for us to prove out our concept. Check out the video above to see this proof with your own eyes!

Did you watch the prototype demonstration video? Awesome! We can feel your excitement growing already! As we continue to move forward with this tool, we plan to make it sleek and compact, similar to the animated interpretation seen in our first video on the page. Of course, we need your help to do this so please continue reading to learn more about STAT.


Interactive 3D STAT

For an up-close-and-personal look at STAT, we encourage you to play around with this interactive 3D model of the product. Simply click and hold the left mouse button inside the interactive screen and you'll be able to look at the design from every possible angle!


Individual Screwdriver/Wrench

"But what if I just want to tighten or loosen an individual piece of hardware?" Not to worry! If one of your pieces of hardware gets loose or even breaks off, simply pop out three of the screwdriver bits and use the fourth as an individual Phillips/Allen head screwdriver!

Additionally, if you prefer to tighten/loosen your hardware from the bottom, the hardware bolt holders located closest to the arch of the tool will have a great turning radius! This will allow them to be used just like any other individual wrench.


Budget

As a team, we believe it's important to be open and transparent about how we intend to utilize the money raised through this crowdfunding campaign. Therefore, we are happy to share with you the following budget which showcases the expenses that we expect to incur throughout this journey:

We have done extensive research to obtain a thorough understanding of the costs involved and we are confident that the above budget will allow us to deliver this exciting new product to you!


Risks & Challenges

As with any new business venture, there are certainly some risks and challenges. We've done our best to minimize these risks and challenges by doing as much leg work as possible prior to launching this campaign. So far, we've pitched this idea to several members of our local skateboarding community and these individuals have expressed an overwhelming amount of interest and excitement. Furthermore, as shown earlier, we've had a local engineering firm create a STAT prototype which proves the feasibility of our design. The engineers are now confident that they can bring STAT to life, if we are able to move forward!

As a backer, your risk is even smaller because we've chosen to launch a "fixed funding" campaign! This means that, if we do not meet the $79,500 goal needed to actually produce STAT, you will receive a full refund at the end of the campaign. In other words, your contribution will either help us bring STAT to market if the goal is reached or you will get your money back if the goal is not reached. There's really no downside to contributing!


Our Team

At this point, we're positive that you're as stoked on STAT as we are! However, the STAT design is not the only thing we bring to the table. We also have an all-star team of exceptional individuals who hold unique skills and credentials which will ensure the success of STAT once you help us achieve the funding needed to bring this product to market! Without further ado, please read on to learn more about the Smart Truck Assembly team members:

Without further ado, please read on to learn more about the Smart Truck Assembly team members:

story:
Short Summary

 

Mass Domes is an event and retreat center made of 9 geodesic domes that also serves as a center for storage & shelter for local people in times of natural disasters like earthquakes, hurricanes, and storms. The name Mass Domes was carefully chosen as it has two meanings. The first means masses of people, the public in general. The second is Music, Arts, Spirituality, and Sustainability. The mission of Mass Domes is to empower people to live a happy, healthy and peaceful life by hosting events that would indulge them in music, arts, spirituality, yoga, and the celebration of life on a day to day basis.

 

This magnificent humanitarian project is Initiated by a prudent team of highly accomplished, bold and creative MBA professionals from California State University. Mass Domes aims to create a better life for people by indulging them in Music, Arts, Spirituality & Sustainability related events throughout the year while providing them organic food, natural views, beautiful hikes and overnight stays in glamping (read glamorous camping) dome tents.
 

Quick A-Z about the team:

Ardavon Mohtashamnia: Electrical Engineer, Accounting certificate, Masters in Business Administration, Operations Supervisor.

Tom Nash: Bachelors in Business Administration, Executive Recruiter, Father of a 3 Months Old Boy, Electric Bassist - 'Hammersmyth', Masters in Business Administration, Sales & Operations Expert.  

Vania Marfo: Bachelors in Business Management, Finance Specialist, Human Rights Activist, Masters in Business Administration

Varun Ish Nanda: Author, Computer Engineer, FilmMaker, Masters in Media & Communications, Masters in Business Administration, Marketing Director, Product Development Expert, Realtor, Spiritual Director, Yogi.

 

Do you know?

Some key facts according to the World Health Organization:

“Depression is a common mental disorder.”

“Globally, more than 300 million people of all ages suffer from depression.”

“Depression is the leading cause of disability worldwide, and is a major contributor to the overall global burden of disease.”

“At its worst, depression can lead to suicide.”

 

Serving as a venue for a variety of concerts and other music events is the primary way that Mass Domes fulfills its mission. Music events at Mass Domes will consist of electronic dance music, international live music performance, live jazz music, music lessons, open mike nights and popular music concerts with a full band. In addition to music, Mass Domes will execute its mission by hosting various other arts events. The arts events include dance classes, martial arts, live painting events, talent shows and theatre arts. In addition to this, others events will take place at Mass Domes with a spiritual focus. These include guest speaker events, meditation camps, spiritual teachings camps, team building events, share-your-journey events and yoga sessions.

 

Through this campaign, the contributors will not only be creating an event and retreat center for themselves, but also for their future generations to come. Since these Geodesic domes are very strong in structure and strength, these domes can withstand earthquakes up to 8 Richter scale, hurricanes and storms up to 180 miles / hours. Due to their enormous strength and energy efficiency, these are self-sustainable, almost indestructible structures that would live on forever. The contributors of this campaign will become a part of the History for generations to come- a commonplace for music, arts, spirituality and sustainability that also serves as a storage and shelter for mankind in times of great natural disasters, created by the masses, for the masses.

 

The structure’s design is inspired from the works of an architect Buckminster Fuller, who created the concept of Geodesic Domes and promoted their superior strength. Compared to regular box-shaped homes, Mass Domes are 30% more energy efficient and cost effective to build. (Buckminster Fuller Institute, 2018) Mass Domes offer various small and big scale events for people of all ages.

 

The events that will be held in the Mass Domes are:

Electronic Dance Music Events

International Live Music Performances

Live Jazz Events

Music Teaching Sessions/ Lessons

Open Mike Night

Popular Music Concerts with a Full Band

Dance Classes

Live Painting Events

Martial Arts

Painting Classes

Talent Shows

Theatre Arts

Guest Speaker Events (Focusing on Knowledge)

Meditation Camps (Focusing on Mind)

Spiritual Teaching Camps (Focusing on Spirit)

Share Your Journey Events (Focusing on Heart)

Team Building Events (Focusing on Trust)

Yoga Camps (Focusing on Body)

Emergency Storage Camps

Free Medical Emergency Camps

Greenhouse Events

Marriage / Private Events

Trade Shows / Events

Virtual Reality Events

 

What We Need & What You Get

What We Need:

Mass Domes will consist of one big dome and eight smaller geodesic domes and the estimated cost of constructing the event center are outlined below:

Main Dome: Approx Cost $100,000

8 Domess: $50,000/ dome = Approx $400,000

Land Improvement = Approx $100,000

Land= Approx $1,000,000 (Max)

Operational cost= $400,000

Total Cost = $2,000,000

 

The funds raised from this campaign will be used to first purchase land in a strategic location where there are more chances of a natural disaster. Once the land is bought (Glad we have a Realtor in our Team!), we will then start building out the structures. Please note that our $1M budget for the land is considering a popular place like Ojai to serve as the first center, but that doesn’t mean that we will not be opening it anywhere else if in case our objectives to raise $2M in total is not reached. If we don’t reach our entire goal of the funds, we will find another location (Texas is our second choice) to buy the land and create Mass Domes there.

 

Basically, we have decided to build Mass Domes wherever there is a human population in need of cultural camaraderie, human interaction, music, peace, love, happiness, sustainability, safety & security and make their life feel fulfilled and meaningful.

 

What You Get:

A place that could actually become your second home (or should we say dome?)

A place where you can visit alone or as a family and indulge in all the different experiences that we offer.

A place where you know you will be safe in times of great natural calamities, now and forever.

A place that will be visited by people of all generations and those of the next generations as well.

A place where you can learn more about natural living, self-healing and self-sustaining.

 

The Impact

 

This campaign was built keeping in mind the need for humans today to live a more peaceful, safe and secure life that is constantly immersed in music, arts, spirituality, and at the same time promotes sustainability.

Each and every dollar that you contribute to this campaign will turn around to become a blessing for generations to come.

With a team of over 20 MBA professionals by our side and access to a lot of industry experts and consultants/mentors in specific fields such as Entertainment & Sustainability, we are sure to make Mass Domes a great success and are eagerly waiting to begin our work.

The 3D renderings and motion graphics that you see in the video and the images are created by an Australian architect for us and she is as excited as we are in making this mission a successful one.

We are confident that this project will not be the only one of its kind after it is funded and it’s operations begin. We know that Mass Domes will create a new way of living life and very soon the world will start witnessing Mass Domes in every city, every state, and every country.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

We are all Masters in Business Administration and no business model is created before a detailed SWOT analysis of the business and its environment is done. For the past couple of months, we have been diligently diving in deeper details of the entire business model and have come to a conclusion that this will not just turn around to be a profit-making business from the 3rd year onwards in its operations, but will also pave way for several more such event centers to be created in other cities like New Orleans, Texas, Puerto Rico, etc. 

 

Strengths

  • Versatile event space can be utilized by a variety of lucrative markets including Fortune 500 companies, weddings, and live music events which are all strong industries.
  • A strong brand which includes inspiring and encouraging people to live a happy, healthy and peaceful life.
  • Architecture is three times more efficient for many reasons. Its decreased surface area requires less building materials. Exposure to cold in the winter and heat in the summer is decreased because, being spherical, there is the least surface area per unit of volume per structure. (Buckminster Fuller Institute, 2018)
  • Provides emergency shelter especially for earthquakes. Its dome shape, the lack of a need for posts and beams in construction, and it's extremely lightweight the domes are highly earthquake resistant. (Real Estate Japan Inc., 2016)
  • Not lots of competitors
  • Creates employment opportunities
  • Promotes local talent- Acts as Platform for everybody to showcase their talent.

Weaknesses

  • A requirement of a large amount land
  • A requirement for extensive permitting and licensing from local, state, and federal agencies
  • Budget: Large capital investment needed. The time frame to raise $2,000,000 is hard to predict.
  • Labor intensive and low availability of workers. The unemployment rate is currently in Ventura County was 3.6% in March 2018. (Bureau of Labor Statistics, 2018)
  • Location of the event center poses a challenge since it is not close to the city (Los Angeles).

Opportunities

  • It may grow quick locally and internationally
  • Brand support from Fortune 500 companies. By offering our space to large corporations, the Mass Domes brand will be very well known which will help drive business to other events such as weddings and concerts.
  • Incorporating clean energy technology. For example, Dome-Tech could collaborate and be partnered with Mass Domes to build on-site renewable and clean power systems and delivers hands-on energy conservation services for Mass Domes. (Connell Foley, 2012)

Threats

  • The land hasn’t been purchased yet and there is low inventory. This could create a bottleneck.
    • Solution: Buy a lesser expensive land in a different location.
  • Security because of the isolated location. Live music events can be targets for violence. 58 people were murdered in a Las Vegas concert on October 1st, 2018. (Brean, 2018) A live event can be risky and dangerous in terms of security concerns.
    • Solution: Create security checkpoints at all entries and exits with metal detectors.
       

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can not contribute in cash, we urge you to contribute in kind.

  • Please spread the word out, you can use all these amazing Indiegogo tools and share this Indiegogo page and ask your friends and families to know about us and contribute. Spread it like a wildfire!
  • Like our Facebook Page and share it on your timeline, and Follow us on Instagram.
  • If there is any other way you think you can help us, please feel free to contact us.
 

Thanks and see you in Mass Domes.

www.MassDomes.com

story:
FAR2LOW.COM Dreams to Go

    IT’S UP AND RUNNING!

The lowest online prices for hotel, villa, and apartment accommodation.

The highest payments & benefits for hotel owners. 

FAR2LOW.COM is revolutionising the hotel booking industry, by selling hotel rooms for the lowest online price anywhere. 

We’ve created the FAR2LOW formula to be very different to other online hotel booking websites, by selling FAR2LOW nights with a long use by date and changing the commission structure. This means customers purchase FAR2LOW nights online from FAR2LOW, and then book their FAR2LOW nights directly with the hotel within the use by date we’ve negotiated.

Confirmation is immediate and you’re ready to go!

OUR New Commission formula is just this. No Greed, Just Growth! 

We want to be known worldwide for offering the cheapest hotel accommodation and for our customers to be able to buy FAR2LOW nights at hotels anywhere in the world. 

At the same time, our intention is to improve the online hotel sales experience and to help hotels with our no commission, no fees, and free advertising model. 

Let’s explain how hotels get a better deal and make more money with FAR2LOW. 

Most hotel booking sites, expect a big percentage of the room rate in order to make money from sending business their way. We’ve made our service totally free. 

FAR2LOW will be offering our hotels free advertising, no commission, and no fees to get them to sign up with us. Yes, we did say no commission.               

We will ask the hotel that with the savings they make by using our service, for example, the commission and fees they lose to pay the hotel booking sites, we ask them to take this off their room price and let us advertise the room for the amount they receive after their commission and fees are paid.

This means the hotel gets the same amount and we make 12% on every night sold online by charging the customer, not the hotel. Doing this means we can sell nights at the lowest price anywhere online and create the same profit for the hotels, and save customers up to 50% and more on prices currently available online. 

FAR2LOW has even more unique benefits to offer the hotels compared to other booking sites. We give the hotels 100% upfront payment for every night sold so the hotels don’t have to wait until the customers stay at their accommodation for the money.

Some of the biggest complaints we hear from hotel owners are about cancellations and having to wait until the customer stays at their accommodation to receive payment. FAR2LOW solves this problem by having a no cancellation policy and upfront payment to the hotel from the moment the customer purchases online.

To protect the hotels from current contracts and price wars, we have included in our contract a clause to protect them from any contract they currently have. This unique clause guarantees the hotels will not be penalised by other booking sites for them advertising a lower price with us. 

Our purpose and mission is to help people and improve the future. So, we’re sharing our big idea.

JOIN US FOR OUR NEW CAMPAIGN! 

Over the last few months, we have shared our vision for FAR2LOW.COM. And we are overwhelmed with the response. Our team of professionals have come together to get this up and running, we’re proving to everyone that this is a winning formula and is making a positive change in the hotel accommodation and travel industry.

New enquiries and positive feedback are flowing in everyday and these have generated new opportunities for us to see how much further FAR2LOW can reach. This is our first Indigogo campaign and first new goal. Scroll down to see all the details!

New things are happening with online Hotel Booking!

We’re up and running and we’ve identified how much we need to raise to take our idea to the next stage. Sure, we still hope we raise as much as we can, but by creating a smaller goal we can upscale faster and maintain the flexibility we need to grow at the right pace. So, we’re launching this crowd funding with a smaller incremental starting goal of $25,000. 

Reaching our goal of $25,000 allows us to complete our marketing strategy for promoting our site throughout the whole of Indonesia. This will complete our first phase.

And we are looking to grow fast; just capturing 1% of the available market shows great returns. We are currently in Bali, and soon to be expanding throughout the whole of Indonesia – hotel market 3.5 million rooms per night. Our first year goal is to be adding at least 10 hotels per month, so 120 new hotel signings a year.  By 2022 we will be expanding into other Asian markets, and in 2023 we’ll be taking our brand worldwide… imagine the potential.  We ask hotels to guarantee us a minimum 100 FAR2LOW nights per year, but most long term deals will be for 1000 nights or more, you do the maths on those figures but we think they are pretty impressive.

We're excited that this first step is very achievable. But we still need your help to reach that goal. We have some benefits and perks for anyone who backs our Indigogo campaign. 

If this is your first time backing a new idea; Welcome and thank you!  We need your help.

We are offering investors some attractive deals for backing us.

For $20 and less we’ll keep you updated with news and progress on your investment. For $100 we’ll be offering you 1 free room night to the value of $40 when you book on the website, that’s for every $100 you donate. If you donate $1000 or more, we’ll be offering even more.

We are also creating this concept so that nights sold on FAR2LOW will benefit families and children in need.

We’re automatically donating 2% to charity for each booking made. We are currently working with BALI 2020 AID, and we’ll be signing up other charities as we expand. By simply choosing to purchase through FAR2LOW.COM it will positively impact hundreds and possibly thousands of lives, changing these lives as we sleep soundly.

FAR2LOW.COM IS COMMITTED TO PEOPLE.

Build something that changes lives 

We can build something that changes lives and redefines booking accommodation. What will we be remembered for? We can leave a legacy of purpose, hope and freedom. 

The fuel behind it all will be you - those who unite around the idea that a better way is possible. 

And it’s going to be SO, MUCH, FUN!

FAR2LOW.COM will generate jobs and transform opportunities for people who need it most, it will create income for businesses that need it most, throughout this uncertain period and beyond, it will help businesses and people to stay alive...

By playing your part, you’ll be helping make it all possible. 

So thank you.
story_txt:
FAR2LOW.COM Dreams to Go
    IT’S UP AND RUNNING!
The lowest online prices for hotel, villa, and apartment accommodation.
The highest payments & benefits for hotel owners. 
FAR2LOW.COM is revolutionising the hotel booking industry, by selling hotel rooms for the lowest online price anywhere. 
We’ve created the FAR2LOW formula to be very different to other online hotel booking websites, by selling FAR2LOW nights with a long use by date and changing the commission structure. This means customers purchase FAR2LOW nights online from FAR2LOW, and then book their FAR2LOW nights directly with the hotel within the use by date we’ve negotiated.
Confirmation is immediate and you’re ready to go!
