story:
SHIPPING NOW!

 

 

VEOM is an exciting innovation in sustainable leggings, designed for leisure use as well as performance. With a wide selection of unique prints, our Europe made eco-friendly leggings are beautifully designed, comfortable and durable. They are ethically made using premium quality Italian fabric sourced from recycled plastic

 

 

Much like you, we care about the environment and we have created ethically manufactured leggings and sport bras that combine functionality and comfort so you will love to wear them! There’s no compromise on style, performance or sustainability

 

 

Our inspiration is the beauty of nature; it’s also about owning up and taking responsibility for the planet by using the materials available to us in a responsible manner.  We are creative environmentalists that love fashion but firmly believe in recycling, renovating and pure living.  VEOM involves up-to-the-minute fabulously unique prints that are exciting and eye-catching.  Our designs reflect our beliefs and what’s in-style too – a remarkable combination that really reflects the world we live in today

 

UNIQUE HANDMADE PRINTS

 

You’ll love our fit too. Our leggings are created with every body shape and style in mind because we are an inclusive brand. Our leggings don’t fall-down, they feature a high waist, a useful waist pocket and they’re obviously premium quality.  You should expect perfect fit along with excellent stretch with a specially designed gusset so you don’t even need to wear underwear (we won’t tell if you won’t!).  They’re super-comfortable to wear too because of their amazing stretchiness, breathability and athletic flat seam, so nothing gets in the way of powerful performance

 

We know you want the very best and that’s what VEOM delivers. Our fabric is designed to perform, so you can use our leggings for sports purposes or for leisure

 

 

Our fabric is breathable – which means it whips sweat away from your body so you’re always comfortable

 

The fabric is entirely ethical because it’s made from recycled plastic that comes from the ocean. It’s also vegan-friendly. So, not only do you feel remarkable comfort, you are doing your little bit extra to help save the planet

 

 

VEOM is suitable for athletic use because the fabric is constructed in such a way that it supports your muscles. It also features specialist technology that memorizes your body shape – your leggings become bespoke to your body!

 

 

As well as being made out of environmentally sustainable fabric, our leggings are suitable for cold water washing and come out as good as new. That means we help to reduce wastage of natural resources, such as water and electricity

 

 

Use VEOM leggings at any time, they’re perfect for yoga practice, running, aerobics, the gym, outdoor activities or just to relax in comfort

 

 

Great looking, performance clothing doesn’t have to be manufactured at the expense of the planet we live in.  VEOM cares about nature and sustainability so we created our leggings out of the highest possible quality sustainable Italian recycled polyester. The material involved is crafted from used plastic bottles and fishing nets, responsibly collected from the Atlantic Ocean.  So, by wearing our leggings and bras, you are helping to preserve marine life and save the planet  

 

 

Our aim is to bring you outstanding comfort, high performance and a guilt-free conscience!

 

 

Together, we can encourage fabric manufacturers across the globe to harness recyclable materials and develop sustainable fabric to protect the world we live in for future generations

 

 

It began in 2018 so not too long ago. The team behind VEOM had long been searching for the perfect pair of leggings, leggings with all the features they wanted. Some leggings looked great, uber-stylish and funky but they weren’t eco-friendly. Some leggings were excellent for performance-wear, breathable and odor-free but they didn’t inspire with fun prints or exciting designs

This left us with a dilemma. We had no leggings that ticked all our boxes!  So we thought we’d make our own… and here we are today

 

 

We strongly believe that the only way to conduct business in modern times is in an ethical manner.  We also believe that the whole supply chain must be sustainable, from initial design right through to shipment and even beyond.  Supply chain is more than just about using recycled fabric; it is about understanding the very creation of the product so that sustainability is firmly integrated into all stages of the product’s lifestyle.  When it comes to VEOM, rest-assured that we take into account every single process and material used at each stage of our leggings’ lifestyle. We can safely say that we minimize environmental impact on the planet

The result is a collection of outstanding performance leggings that look great and are completely environmentally friendly! 

 

Our design process is a combination of advanced technology with inspiration taken from traditional arts

 

 

All the unique prints utilize handmade watercolor painting techniques.  We transfer them onto the fabric in a sustainable manner using sublimation printing technology which is entirely eco-friendly

 

 

To make our current collection, we worked together with professional athletes to select patterns and create prototypes.  Then, we tested our leggings extensively, collected feedback and used the information to further improve them so they deliver outstanding performance

Our sublime comfort comes from a unique method that we use to determine the best fit. To do so, we use a 3D modelling process involving simulation of pressure distribution from the leggings to the body.  The result is outstanding comfort and brilliant fit so you achieve the ultimate performance you desire 

 

 

Our fabric really is the best possible sustainable polyester and we know this because we tested numerous different types of fabric made out of recycled yarn. We selected the very best available option.  It’s recycled polyester and elastane, vegan-friendly – entirely environmentally friendly!

 

We are a dream team – we like to work hard and play hard but more importantly, everyone at VEOM shares similar values and cares about the world that we live in. Want to meet us? 

 

 

Pauline (Co-founder) is award-winning fashion designer with her own successful underwear brand, Ligentlerie.  Pauline has extensive experience in garment creation for cinema, theatres and well-known fashion brands

Alex (Co-founder) is an entrepreneur with previous experience working for a global management consultancy firm as well as other international corporations.  He has significant experience in manufacturing

Anna (Co-founder) has extensive professional expertise in marketing operations, media relations and customer relationship management

Dennis is a creative production professional, responsible for providing unique content for filmmakers, publishers and international brands

Lev is a video and photo production professional with an impressive portfolio.  He’s worked with major international brands creating high-quality content. (Instagram: @levefimov_official)

Take advantage of our special offers for backers!

Pre-order now and save up to 38% of the expected leggings retail price $89 and bra price $69

We offer FREE shipping to the US, UK and EU and a reduced rate shipping cost to other international destinations

Once the campaign has finished, you will receive a survey detailing how you can chose your style, size and we will ask you for your delivery address

 

There will be following sizes available and you can be 100% sure that VEOM leggings will suite you perfectly well as they have excellent stretch. If you still not sure then just take smaller size, as you’ll find that the leggings feel better the more you wear them because they adjust to your body

 

Leggings sizes:

 

Sport Bra sizes: 

 

VEOM is an environmentally responsible brand so we make sure our high ethical standards are always met, throughout the process from choosing our fabric producers through to delivery to your doorstep so your leggings arrive in environmentally friendly packaging, using sustainable fulfillment and distribution

We found manufacturers that don’t use child labor and protect their workers with proper health & safety regulations.  Our manufacturing partners are based in Europe and pay a fair wage. We respect a work/life balance so our partners’ workers conduct a normal working day with reasonable hours and they don’t discriminated against race, sexual orientation, beliefs, disabilities or gender

 

 

We really need your help to produce the first batch of VEOM leggings.  By supporting our project, together we can make a real difference to the world we live in. Please get behind us so we can create innovative, environmentally friendly, ethically manufactured leggings

 

 See what we do on Social Media…

Our website - www.veomactive.com

 

Join now!

 

We’re happy to answer any questions you have, please email us at veom@veomactive.com and we will get back to you as quickly as we can!

story:
Most tents are designed to be used in one way. Mollusc is different. It is a completely new, versatile design of tent that can be used in at least 6 different ways.

All we've done is take the simple open and close functionality from a babies pramhood and put it into a tent. When you think about it that way, its amazing that no one has done it before because it gives the camper an array of benefits that ordinary, static tents simply don't have.

But don't take our word for it, check out what everyone else is saying. With 15 million video views and counting, crowd intelligence suggests the concept could be disruptive.

  "Good tent or best tent?" 

    "revolutionary new design"

    "one of a kind shelter, great for car camping"

"panoramic views while  camping"

    "The most revolutionary tent ever" 

           "your new camping essential"    

         "the perfect tent to get you through the festival season"

           " I love this thing!"   

           "will change the way you go camping"

            "exceptionally cool"     

        "could shake up camping industry"                                               

       

      Advantages of the Mollusc Design

      1. Effortless temperature control.

      Ordinary tents are a nightmare in the sun. They are mini greenhouses which you can't stay in when its warm - a shame really, as 95% of all camping is done in the summer! If your Nano gets too hot, just unzip, pull back the canopy and breathe in the fresh air by the lungful. You can have your breakfast in there, sunbathe or just hang out.  If it starts raining or the clouds come in, simply draw the canopy back over, zip up and snuggle down - simple but effective.

       

      2. Incredible versatility.

      You can have the tent fully open or closed but also fix it pretty much anywhere in between. This means you can morph the tent shape to the particular environmental conditions or the purpose you want. These are the six main configurations or go here to see them full screen

      Fully open for sunbathing, star-gazing or just hanging out

      (Double click all images to enlarge)

      Picnic setting, a perfect windbreak for the lake or beach

      Parasol for when you need a little shade from the sun

      Clamshell - enjoy the outside world from inside your space

      Closed - use like an ordinary tent. Just roomier and racier

      Storm setting - pinned down hard for high wind

       

      3. Spacious, rugged, storm proof

      With over 9 square metres of floor space, there is plenty of room for 3 big adults and even 4 if you're good friends. It weighs in at 10.3Kgs so its not a backpackers tent (unless a group of you are sharing the load) but with that weight comes a lot of strength and durability. In bad weather the canopy is fully drawn over and the perimeter arc frame is pegged down directly giving limpet-like adhesion. If that isn't enough, 7 storm guys can be fixed to the frame at different points depending on the wind direction. Its unique tubular exoskeleton means that in hard ground it can be pitched totally without any pegging at all! (There is an optional perk of 8 sand bags for people who want to put it up at the beach where pegs wouldn't hold).

      No-peg pitching - use rocks or sandbags

       

      4. Enjoy the outside world from your inside space

      With standard tents you are either inside or outside. With the Nano that no longer applies. in its 'Clamshell' setting you can enjoy that panoramic view whilst keeping out the weather.

      5. Easy setup

       1 person - 15 minutes, With a bit of practise, 2 can do it in 10. We'll email all backers the download link for our mobile-friendly guided, step-by-step set up PowerPoint - you can put it in on your phone and use it in the field.

             Watch me do it in 48 secs

       
      6. Integrated solar light string (optional)
      50 cool white LEDs hung from underside of peak arc and external micro panel with mount. Its obviously not a floodlight but on a days charge it will give good ambient light all night and enable you to find that torch. IP68 rated (can submerge) and unaffected by opening/closing. (Light unit ships separately).
                                                
       

       

       

       

       

      7. Lockable rear door with fly screen

      Optional lightweight combination lock (no key to lose) secures the tent from an opportunist thief when you're not around. Door is double zipped so can be locked from the inside as well. Fly screen independently zipped.

      8. Packs up small

       

       

       

       

       

        

      9. Everything you need

                                   (Click through image to see all components labelled)

      10. Eleven trees planted in Kenya to compensate for the resource and delivery footprint

      GPS co-ordinates of trees emailed after planting so in time they will be viewable on Google Earth. It doesn't make the tent sustainable - just better than doing nothing

       

      Product Specification

      Full material specs here

      Full dimension specs here

      Development Timeline

      June '11 - Have the idea

      July '12 - Draw first sketches

      '13-'14 - Make first tent (it was a monster)

      Sept. '15 - Make Nano prototype

      Dec. '15 - Kickstarter success

      '16 - Work with Chinese manufacturers to refine product

      March '17 - Kickstarter fail (too expensive, insufficient exposure)

      April '17 - Mollusc goes viral on social media

      May '17 - Refine and start initial production run (200 units)

      12th May - Indiegogo campaign launch

      5th June - Indiegogo campaign finish

      15-20th June '17 - Complete production and ship

      Late June '17 - You get your tent.

      Post June '17 - Further production runs if possible.

       

      Media pack?

      Get all our best images and films here on

      Social media?

      Perks

      We've kept the rewards super simple.

      1. Get one Mollusc Nano tent for £279 with £30 shipping to all the major destinations. Selected other countries extra.

      2. Get a Mollusc T shirt for £25 + £8 worldwide shipping

      3. Get a solar light string for your tent £22 + £10 worldwide shipping

      4. Get a set of 8 sandbags to enable pitching without pegs at the beach for £25 + £8 worldwide shipping

      5. Get a lightweight door lock for your tent £8 + £6 worldwide shipping

       

      Challenges

      The best laid plans can and do go wrong. All we can say is that we have solved a lot of problems on this project over the last 6 years and we will continue with a positive, transparent approach in the future. We've done serious testing in the Cambrian Mountains of Wales (its pretty wet around there) and the Sierra Nevada of Spain and we have some jungle testing coming up in Tropical Africa soon but that is not the same as giving 200 tents out to to 200 people and seeing what happens. This is a totally new design of tent - we cant tell you yet how it will perform in sub-zero conditions, up at 18,000ft or under 3ft of snow. We can't promise that there wont be a single problem with delivery, manufacturing schedule or quality control. All we can say is that we will deal with any problems honestly and promptly as they arise and will be 100% transparent with our backers - We have a growing community of 2500 followers on social media which we can't afford to alienate. These supporters are already shaping the design with their feedback and we need that to continue.

      Background info

      Ru Hartwell has been building mobile tented structures for a long time and the Nano 2 is the result of years of trial and error experimentation. Here at Mollusc we're obviously totally biased but everybody who has tried it, loves it and things don't go viral on the net without reason.  The hype is a blast and because of its evident advantages, we think this design could become genuinely disruptive but we are here for the long term. We want to make a solid product that people come back to well after the social media frenzy has died down. The first production run (200 units) is being manufactured ahead of time as you read this. Experienced international shippers are commissioned and ready to handle worldwide airmail delivery. All we need now is your support and we can change camping for ever.

      Hug a Mollusc Today - Join the Snail Revolution!
story_txt:
Most tents are designed to be used in one way. Mollusc is different. It is a completely new, versatile design of tent that can be used in at least 6 different ways.
All we've done is take the simple open and close functionality from a babies pramhood and put it into a tent. When you think about it that way, its amazing that no one has done it before because it gives the camper an array of benefits that ordinary, static tents simply don't have.
But don't take our word for it, check out what everyone else is saying. With 15 million video views and counting, crowd intelligence suggests the concept could be disruptive.
  "Good tent or best tent?"  
     "revolutionary new design"
    "one of a kind shelter, great for car camping"
"panoramic views while  camping"
    "The most revolutionary tent ever" 

       "your new camping essential"    
     "the perfect tent to get you through the festival season"

     " I love this thing!"   
     "will change the way you go camping"
      "exceptionally cool"     
   "could shake up camping industry"                                               
 
Advantages of the Mollusc Design
1. Effortless temperature control.
Ordinary tents are a nightmare in the sun. They are mini greenhouses which you can't stay in when its warm - a shame really, as 95% of all camping is done in the summer! If your Nano gets too hot, just unzip, pull back the canopy and breathe in the fresh air by the lungful. You can have your breakfast in there, sunbathe or just hang out.  If it starts raining or the clouds come in, simply draw the canopy back over, zip up and snuggle down - simple but effective.

 
2. Incredible versatility.
You can have the tent fully open or closed but also fix it pretty much anywhere in between. This means you can morph the tent shape to the particular environmental conditions or the purpose you want. These are the six main configurations or go here to see them full screen
Fully open for sunbathing, star-gazing or just hanging out

(Double click all images to enlarge)
Picnic setting, a perfect windbreak for the lake or beach

Parasol for when you need a little shade from the sun

Clamshell - enjoy the outside world from inside your space

Closed - use like an ordinary tent. Just roomier and racier

Storm setting - pinned down hard for high wind

 
3. Spacious, rugged, storm proof
With over 9 square metres of floor space, there is plenty of room for 3 big adults and even 4 if you're good friends. It weighs in at 10.3Kgs so its not a backpackers tent (unless a group of you are sharing the load) but with that weight comes a lot of strength and durability. In bad weather the canopy is fully drawn over and the perimeter arc frame is pegged down directly giving limpet-like adhesion. If that isn't enough, 7 storm guys can be fixed to the frame at different points depending on the wind direction. Its unique tubular exoskeleton means that in hard ground it can be pitched totally without any pegging at all! (There is an optional perk of 8 sand bags for people who want to put it up at the beach where pegs wouldn't hold).
No-peg pitching - use rocks or sandbags

 
4. Enjoy the outside world from your inside space
With standard tents you are either inside or outside. With the Nano that no longer applies. in its 'Clamshell' setting you can enjoy that panoramic view whilst keeping out the weather.

5. Easy setup
 1 person - 15 minutes, With a bit of practise, 2 can do it in 10. We'll email all backers the download link for our mobile-friendly guided, step-by-step set up PowerPoint - you can put it in on your phone and use it in the field.
       Watch me do it in 48 secs

 
6. Integrated solar light string (optional)
50 cool white LEDs hung from underside of peak arc and external micro panel with mount. Its obviously not a floodlight but on a days charge it will give good ambient light all night and enable you to find that torch. IP68 rated (can submerge) and unaffected by opening/closing. (Light unit ships separately).

                                          
 
 
 
 
 
7. Lockable rear door with fly screen
Optional lightweight combination lock (no key to lose) secures the tent from an opportunist thief when you're not around. Door is double zipped so can be locked from the inside as well. Fly screen independently zipped.

8. Packs up small

 
 
 
 
 
   
9. Everything you need 

                             (Click through image to see all components labelled)
10. Eleven trees planted in Kenya to compensate for the resource and delivery footprint
GPS co-ordinates of trees emailed after planting so in time they will be viewable on Google Earth. It doesn't make the tent sustainable - just better than doing nothing
 
Product Specification
Full material specs here
Full dimension specs here

July '12 - Draw first sketches
'13-'14 - Make first tent (it was a monster)
Sept. '15 - Make Nano prototype
Dec. '15 - Kickstarter success
'16 - Work with Chinese manufacturers to refine product
March '17 - Kickstarter fail (too expensive, insufficient exposure)
April '17 - Mollusc goes viral on social media
May '17 - Refine and start initial production run (200 units)
12th May - Indiegogo campaign launch
5th June - Indiegogo campaign finish
15-20th June '17 - Complete production and ship
Late June '17 - You get your tent.
Post June '17 - Further production runs if possible.

All we can say is that we have solved a lot of problems on this project over the last 6 years and we will continue with a positive, transparent approach in the future. We've done serious testing in the Cambrian Mountains of Wales (its pretty wet around there) and the Sierra Nevada of Spain and we have some jungle testing coming up in Tropical Africa soon but that is not the same as giving 200 tents out to to 200 people and seeing what happens. This is a totally new design of tent - we cant tell you yet how it will perform in sub-zero conditions, up at 18,000ft or under 3ft of snow. We can't promise that there wont be a single problem with delivery, manufacturing schedule or quality control. All we can say is that we will deal with any problems honestly and promptly as they arise and will be 100% transparent with our backers - We have a growing community of 2500 followers on social media which we can't afford to alienate. These supporters are already shaping the design with their feedback and we need that to continue.

story:
Navigatio was born with the purpose of making travelling experiences more personalized and unique. The project’s aim is to connect potential customers that are looking for quality tourist activities with companies that offer such services from a simple principle: easy access to tourism content. For this reason, our website presents an organized and intuitive structure that eases the user’s search and provides a better visibility to companies.

 

Yep! We are Pau and Guillem, two friends and university studies from Barcelona hunger of new challenges. The world is changing at full speed and we didn’t want to lose the chance to make our own contribution. How? Through one of our passions, travelling. Navigatio is for those who want to discover without getting lost among thousands of Internet pages, for those who doesn’t want to lose a second discovering new experiences.
 

Navigatio is born to approach those companies that offer different and quality tourist activities that go unnoticed for the general public. From Navigatio we believe that the future of tourism is directed towards less crowded activities that allow travelers to enjoy destinations in a more personalized way.
The digital revolution has shaken the tourism sector, however, the customer still has to travel the Net to find a specific activity at the risk of not finding what they are looking for.
Navigatio gives companies the possibility to advertise on the web and gain greater visibility at cost 0. Our positioning system classifies the tourist options according to the opinion of the users registered in the portal. Advertisers publish their own offers on the web according to defined requirements that ensure visibility. The main objective is to promote the dissemination of advertisers on the Internet.
Navigatio does not appear as an object of competition for companies in the tourism sector, but as a resource that allows the expansion and growth of advertisers.

The Navigatio website allows you to find your ideal activity due to its organized and intuitive structure. Our purpose is that the users have easy access to the tourist content of Catalonia.

In our website you will find the activities organized by categories and destinations. You will also be able to search among the best valued activities by our users or those that are fashionable among the Navigatio community.

The positioning of advertisers on the Navigatio website is based on users' opinions about the activities. Those companies or brands with better ratings will be the first to appear on the web. Thus, Navigatio's community is responsible for regulating what is promoted on the web. Our goal with this positioning policy is to promote those companies that offer quality that go unnoticed in the immensity of the Net.

The arrival of the Internet has changed our way of traveling, as well as our concept of tourism. New technologies have allowed us to personalize our holidays. One of Navigatio's mottos is: your trip, your rules. For this, the Navigatio project integrates several options that will allow the user to make their trip perfectly tailor-made.

- Easy Choice. This tool helps you create unique activity packs for you. The option allows, through a form indicating your preferences and your destination, the creation of a pack of activities unique to you.

- I'm in! This tool is another of the innovations that you will find in Navigatio for those who do not want to miss anything. I'm in! Allows users to create lists or groups in different activities. In this way, Navigatio allows direct contact between users and companies.

- Geotag. This tool allows you to search for activities by geolocation. Select from the best activities available near you from anywhere.

Our current funding is purely crowdfunding and we have started this campaign to launch our project. For the development of Navigatio we need to have a logistic support to help us in the final design of the website. The main part of what we collect will go to touch up and improve the website. What we want with the IndieGoGo campaign is to create a structure of Navigatio on the Net that allow us to shape all of our proposals to the web portal.

Another of the investment aspects will be the initiation of a campaign of marketing in social networks and Internet. We are aware of the importance of a good publicity and marketing campaign for the promotion of the brand, so we want to destine a portion of what we collect to Navigatio advertising on Facebook, Instragram and other social networks.

Finally, another part of the crowdfunding will go to the active maintenance of the web page, managements derived from the project correct working or as a reserve fund for possible contingencies that may arise during the growth of Navigatio.

Any little contribution to our campaign will help us greatly in the development of Navigatio. The objective of posting the project in IndieGoGo is to receive financial aid through this crowdfunding campaign, however, any other contribution either in disseminating the Navigatio project or in advertising the IndieGoGo brand or campaign through social networks. From the page of Navigatio we will start different promotional actions and campaigns to make us known in Catalonia first, and expand through the Spanish territory later. Thus, our goal in IndieGoGo is to boost the project financially through the donations we receive in crowdfunding, however, any contribution to Navigatio will be well received. With this we want to point out that the monetary contributions are as important as the actions of diffusion of the project in both IndieGoGo and social networks.

- Is it free to register at Navigatio?

The Navigatio Services for the users is 100% free, you can book as many activities as you want without any cost.

- What future ideas does Navigatio have?

At the moment we start with Catalonia, but we have the objective to finish working in all the Spanish territory, and in the future we will expand as much as possible. Also in the future we want to expand to all platforms.

- How will Navigatio earn money in the future?

Navigatio will be left with a small part of the profits obtained with the sale of each activity published on the web, that is why, if our method does not favor the growth of your activities you will not spend nor a euro.

- What activity can I choose if I win the draw?

The list of activities is the same for the draw either for the reward of 1 or 2 activities. The list will be made public in the updates section.

- Can I choose an activity other than in Catalonia?

The Navigatio Work area is Catalonia, and that is why we can not offer activities outside Catalonia.

- With the perk Taste the city what activity will I have?

With this reward you will get an activity to visit the best tapas bars in Barcelona, ​​so you can learn about their customs and traditions from another point of view.

- With the Lovely Navigatio reward, what activity will I have? With this reward you can also choose an activity from a list that will be published later in the updates section.

story:
Who Did This and Why?

Luke Erlebach and his father, Dave Erlebach, have become leading advocates for botany everywhere. If a tree falls in the woods not only is there now a sound, but a voice. The voice is the Erlebach men and it can be heard across our great country. They know every person should feel clean and comfortable no matter the situation. They also know no one wants to carry around an entire roll of TP or search for hours for a leaf that hopefully won't leave your backend in an unsightly rash. That’s why they invented toilet paper kits for the backcountry. Now you can feel the comforts of home no matter how far away you are. All contents are 100% biodegradable and come in a resealable package that fits in your pocket. With our contributors help, we can make millions of Americans who enjoy the outdoors feel fresh and clean, and enjoy the outdoors a little longer.

What We Need From You?

We have a prototype, we are in production, and we estimate that we'll be shipping in September. We want you, our backers, to have the opportunity to try the product out first. If you love it as much as we, and the leaves, do - help us spread the word!

story:
Meet the Millers

Flory and Scott want you want to experience the only beach in the Western Hemisphere where people live longer and happier, with less stress and a lot more joy. A sense of calm and peace that is unmistakable... and unforgettable.

Flory, fluent in Spanish and English, was born just a few miles from where her little hotel will be built. Scott just happens to have years in the hotel business learning under a very successful hotelier.

They love people and together they form a hospitable team ready to welcome friends, new and old, to the most unforgettable beach in Costa Rica.

Flory's Dream

Flory Loria Segura was born in Costa Rica with a dream to share the magnificent natural beauty of her country by building a beautiful little boutique hotel on the beach. A place where people could come to relax, unwind and enjoy romantic nights following a breathtaking sunset. 

Twenty years ago Flory bought land so close to the beach that you can hear the ocean, and for twenty years the only occupants have been the monkeys in the trees. It's time to make Flory's dream come true.

Have you ever dreamed of taking an unforgettable vacation without having to get a second mortgage? Let's help each other. Become one of our backers. To make your dream come true we need to build Flory's little hotel.

What We Need & What You Get

We already own the land and we've drawn up all the plans. We know how long the project will take to construct and we have the contractors already lined up to build Flory's little hotel. In addition to the money we've already spent, and the money we have in the bank, we need an additional $50,000 to build four rooms. 

Even though most of our perks are designed to give you years of amazing vacations we designed them so you get more than your money's worth if you only stay with us one time.

For example, our $297 perk includes 10 nights over two years, including two bonus nights. All rooms are double occupancy with king sized beds and air conditioning. By the way, king size beds and air conditioning is rare in Santa Teresa and Playa Hermosa.

A comparable room in our area would cost about $150. Let's say you stay for 6 nights. You'd normally pay $900, but since you are one of our backers you saved more than $600. And you have another 4 nights for next year.

Give Your Nights Away or Sell Them

Know anybody who'd love to take an extraordinary vacation? You may gift your nights to anyone or you can sell them one time. (Special thanks to Gabrielle for coming up with this idea.) 

Let's say you choose the $497 perk which includes 5 nights a year for 3 years plus 5 bonus nights. You come and spend 7 nights your first year. (5 nights plus 2 of your bonus nights.)

You have a friend who gets married or somebody you know is celebrating an anniversary and you want to do something special for them. You could give them your 5 nights and your 3 remaining bonus nights. That's 7 nights for you, 8 nights in Costa Rica for your friends and you still have 5 nights left for you the next year!

You get all of that for only $497 one time.

With our $997 perk you could spend 7 nights a year in our little boutique hotel for 6 years and you could give somebody 14 nights. (Gift your 7 nights and your 7 bonus nights.)

No Blackout Dates and No Restrictions

You want a vacation you will cherish forever, we want to build our hotel.

With that in mind we're doing something a little different from all the other hotels in the area. When demand is high some hotel owners raise their rates considerably. They just consider that good business.

But it wouldn't be right to take your money and not give you, the most desirable dates. So here's our promise to you, our backers: you can choose any nights you want to stay with us, and if a room is available it's yours! 

It's as simple as that. There are no blackout dates for you... ever.

Sounds Too Good To Be True?

Our biggest challenge is "It sounds too good to be true." Why are we offering so many nights for so little money? This has been Flory's dream for 20 years and we are going to do everything we can to see her dream come true. It's really as simple as that. 

We want to build Flory's little hotel.

Some people have asked us this question, "How do I know you'll even be in business 3 years from now?" Great question. When we successfully raise $50,000 we will build our little hotel with no debt. All businesses that fail do so because they run out of money. Our little boutique hotel will generate cash every week, and with no debt it'll be easy to pay the bills.

This is where we are going to live for the rest of our lives. It's a fundamental lifestyle decision, and passion.

Please remember that when you back our project you will receive a 100% refund if we fail to reach our goal. When we succeed, however, you can stay with your friends in paradise for the number of nights that you choose!

Come stay with us one time and you'll be coming back for years to come.

You may use the share buttons as often as you like to improve your chance to win one of the 3 prizes. 

You do not need to back our little boutique hotel to participate in our referral contest.

Winner will be determined by the actual amount of money collected not the number of people who back our project based on your referrals.

In the event of a tie a drawing will be held to determine the winner.

Prize will only be awarded if our campaign reaches the goal of $50,000 in which case we will build our hotel. You will have two years from the date we open Flor De Playa to claim your prize.

Prize is not transferable.

We already own the land and we've drawn up all the plans. We know how long the project will take to construct and we have the contractors already lined up to build Flory's little hotel. In addition to the money we've already spent, and the money we have in the bank, we need an additional $50,000 to build four rooms. 
Even though most of our perks are designed to give you years of amazing vacations we designed them so you get more than your money's worth if you only stay with us one time.
For example, our $297 perk includes 10 nights over two years, including two bonus nights. All rooms are double occupancy with king sized beds and air conditioning. By the way, king size beds and air conditioning is rare in Santa Teresa and Playa Hermosa.
A comparable room in our area would cost about $150. Let's say you stay for 6 nights. You'd normally pay $900, but since you are one of our backers you saved more than $600. And you have another 4 nights for next year.

Give Your Nights Away or Sell Them
Know anybody who'd love to take an extraordinary vacation? You may gift your nights to anyone or you can sell them one time. (Special thanks to Gabrielle for coming up with this idea.) 
Let's say you choose the $497 perk which includes 5 nights a year for 3 years plus 5 bonus nights. You come and spend 7 nights your first year. (5 nights plus 2 of your bonus nights.)
You have a friend who gets married or somebody you know is celebrating an anniversary and you want to do something special for them. You could give them your 5 nights and your 3 remaining bonus nights. That's 7 nights for you, 8 nights in Costa Rica for your friends and you still have 5 nights left for you the next year!
You get all of that for only $497 one time.
With our $997 perk you could spend 7 nights a year in our little boutique hotel for 6 years and you could give somebody 14 nights. (Gift your 7 nights and your 7 bonus nights.)


No Blackout Dates and No Restrictions
You want a vacation you will cherish forever, we want to build our hotel.
With that in mind we're doing something a little different from all the other hotels in the area. When demand is high some hotel owners raise their rates considerably. They just consider that good business.
But it wouldn't be right to take your money and not give you, the most desirable dates. So here's our promise to you, our backers: you can choose any nights you want to stay with us, and if a room is available it's yours! 
It's as simple as that. There are no blackout dates for you... ever.


Sounds Too Good To Be True?
Our biggest challenge is "It sounds too good to be true." Why are we offering so many nights for so little money? This has been Flory's dream for 20 years and we are going to do everything we can to see her dream come true. It's really as simple as that. 
We want to build Flory's little hotel.
Some people have asked us this question, "How do I know you'll even be in business 3 years from now?" Great question. When we successfully raise $50,000 we will build our little hotel with no debt. All businesses that fail do so because they run out of money. Our little boutique hotel will generate cash every week, and with no debt it'll be easy to pay the bills.
This is where we are going to live for the rest of our lives. It's a fundamental lifestyle decision, and passion.
Please remember that when you back our project you will receive a 100% refund if we fail to reach our goal. When we succeed, however, you can stay with your friends in paradise for the number of nights that you choose!
Come stay with us one time and you'll be coming back for years to come.






You may use the share buttons as often as you like to improve your chance to win one of the 3 prizes. 
You do not need to back our little boutique hotel to participate in our referral contest.
Winner will be determined by the actual amount of money collected not the number of people who back our project based on your referrals.
In the event of a tie a drawing will be held to determine the winner.
Prize will only be awarded if our campaign reaches the goal of $50,000 in which case we will build our hotel. You will have two years from the date we open Flor De Playa to claim your prize.
Prize is not transferable.

story:
Short Summary

  • The main goal is to continue 8000 years of ancient Qvevri winemaking tradition which contributes romantic ideal that celebrates the Georgia’s history and to preserve the tradition for future generations.

Qvevri winemaking tradition - Georgia is generally considered the ‘cradle of wine’, as archaeologists have traced the world’s first known wine creation back to the people of the South Caucasus in 6,000 BC. On the territory of the country during various excavations ancient jugs called “Qvevri” with the remnants of grape seeds and skins were found, indicating that the people who lived in these lands, had knowledge of the cultivation of the grape and making wine long  before our era. The wine-making process involves pressing the grapes and then pouring the juice, grape skins, stalks and pips into the Qvevri, which is sealed and buried in the ground so that the wine can ferment for five to six months before being drunk. In 2013 Georgia’s traditional winemaking method of fermenting grapes in earthenware, egg-shaped vessels has been added to the world heritage list of the United Nations educational, scientific and cultural organization (UNESCO). This means, that qvevri winemaking method is part of the Intangible Heritage of Humanity.

Winemakers use kvevris of various sizes, from 20 to 5000 liters, while currently the most popular are those with a capacity of 1-2 thousand litres.  Kvevris are produced   from sticky clay using only hands without a potter's wheel and fired to dry out in a special ceramic furnace.  This is a very labour-intensive and hard job, requiring precision, skills and patience, and today only a few potters throughout Georgia continue such production. Good quality kvevri can be used to make the wine for a hundred years and more, without losing its flavor.
 

 

 

The wine-making process involves pressing the grapes and then pouring the juice, grape skins, stalks and pips into the Qvevri, which is sealed and buried in the ground so that the wine can ferment for five to six months before being drunk.

                       

 

After six month the wine can be replaced to other Qvevri and save for many years

      

 

We are startup enterpreneurs with great enthusiasm and knowledge to support the tradition in most famous winemaking part of Georgia in Kakheti region (Kvareli municipality) where we built a vintage style wine cellar, with underground floor for wine storage and ground floor with kitchen.  We already start to buy some old things that we can use after the building will be done.  The wine also  will be made in Georgian traditional way.

The total investment we have already undertaken is approximately 80,000 Euros (30,000 land, 40,000 buildings and 10,000 grape plants) and at this point 50% of the work is done. We will harvest the first grapes in the fall of 2020. The underground cellar floor is also complete which was about 60% of the total cost of the building.

Since we have already purchased several qvevri wines we will be able to produce our first 4500 liters of qvevri wine this year. But we will need one more year to finalize all the necessary items (Cellar, house interior, outdoor interior, garden, etc.).

We are planning to start receiving guests in our cellar next year. Guests will be able to experience a real wine making tradition and enjoy Georgian hospitality.

In order to make all this happen we need contributors who will help raise 25,000 Euros. This amount will give us an opportunity to finalize the remaining work, produce high quality wine and start receiving guests.

 

 

 

 

  

 

         

 

         

 

  • What we offer?

After we receive the requested amount we will be able to offer our contributors 2 types of vouchers in the amount of 50 Euros and 200 Euros.  For a 50 Euro voucher, we will provide our stakeholders with 10 bottles of two types of wine - Kisi and Saperavi.  Every year we will make one bottle of red wine and one bottle of white wine. The bottles will be labeled with the name of the voucher owner. We will produce these two bottles every year for a five year time period. The bottles will be placed in the underground cellar. After five years the voucher owner will have 10 bottles of wine, which the owner can claim when he/she visits Georgia.  In case the owner arrives earlier than the given five year time period, we will offer them the bottles that were produced up to that point and continue with the remained to reach the 10 bottle total. The 200 Euro voucher will have a similar offering as the 50 Euro one, with the addition of a stay for 2 people at our home.  Besides we will make one Qvevri with the name all contributors.  Qvevri will stay for many years and someone in centuries later can find those names inscribed on Qvevri.  Probably this will be big issue how them, to find out how those names from different countries appeared in this place.  

Aged wine and inscribed Qvevri should be look like this:

     

 

From 5€ onward founders will be named in the List of supporters

No matter how much money will be collect we will finish the project.  This mean that even we will have one contributor we can fulfill our promises and he can receive all benefits the we mentioned above.  So you can support the project and same time you can part of the history.

This is a case when you do not loose something and you stay satisfied in any case.

story: Good afternoon friends!  My name is Olha.  I am a mother and grandmother live in Italy.  The idea with a picnic basket came to me a very long time ago, but I could not realize my ideas.  Now, when the children grew up and the grandchildren grew up, I had more time and plus my family supported me. In the modern world, we more and more often want to get out into the countryside with friends, family.  Our model of a thermo picnic bag will help you pack a delicious and hot lunch with you.  The compact and roomy bag has a thermo compartment, there are also plates and appliances for two and four persons.  The bag itself is made of environmentally friendly material.  My family helped me in the project, and developers were also involved.  I am sure you will like my product. I wish my product is available worldwide.  For sponsors there will be benefits for the purchase of the product.  Money is required to start the production of bags from vines in a large volume.  Bag weaving itself is handmade from grapevines, which is very much appreciated in the modern world.  Thank you all for your attention and interest in my product.

story:
Short Summary

Hello, world! We are a team of young professionals willing to decrease the negative effect of human activity on our planet. We are multilingual and multinational, have absolutely various backgrounds in social and professional life. We are Olga from California, Alex from Russia, Andrei from Estonia and Hanna from Belarus. A little more details on who we are can be found further on or you can visit our website http://carbonfreetravel.com/. Now let us introduce you to our project.

 

THE PROBLEM  

 

 

We all know how great of a problem global warming is. Global temperatures keep increasing, mainly because of CO2 emissions from human activities. 

 

 

 

Aviation is one of the most harmful means of transportation for the environment. We all travel by plane from time to time, and huge amounts of CO2 are emitted. 

 

THE SOLUTION 

Our free app provides an opportunity to neutralize – or offset – those emissions. Every time you travel by plane a considerable amount of CO2 is emitted into the atmosphere. Using our app you can both offset these emissions and invest  into green energy projects – solar, wind or small hydro – around the world. 

 

 

 

Your modest contribution into these projects will prevent CO2 emissions in the future that are equal to CO2 emissions from your flight.BINGO – your carbon footprint from the flight is completely neutralized.  

THE EFFECT

By using our app you are not only offsetting your CO2 emissions, you help to create green jobs in developing countries, improve power supply and level of life locally.

 

 

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Timeline

In 3 months-iOS platform 

in 6 months Android platform  

in 12 months 100K users

Budget   10 000$

Design and development of an APP on iOS platform

30%

Design and creation of a website integrated with the APP

10%

Testing

10%

Marketing, Sales and Promotion

40%

Juridical

5%

Server, hosting, administrative

5%

Total

100%
For our backers we offer:

Everyone who donates regardless the sum of money would have the opportunity to try our App among the first users in the world and would have a unique version of it! 

As well, we shall mention each and every one of you our website among our sponsors. 

We shall send personalized postcards to everyone as well as give you great 1-100 tons of CO2 emissions offset certificates (on average every person produces around 5 tons of CO2 annually)    

If we manage to reach the goal, that would be the first step to help the whole project be a success, however if we don't manage to collect the necessary amount, we still would go on with the project, trying to get funds from all possible sources and get involved as many people as possible into this network. All the perks and pledges would still be provided to the backers.

    The Impact

    If just 5% of air travelers will use our app, we’ll be able to achieve amazing results:

    -  That would offset 45 million tons of CO2 a year. Is it much or little?

    -  1,8 billion trees absorb this much CO2 a year!

    -  200 million people would breathe entire year to exhale this much CO2!

    -  12 million cars off the road – that’s the effect (total number of cars in the state of New-York, or half of all vehicles in a huge country like Canada!)

    That much CO2 is emitted by such economically developed countries as Finland, Sweden or Norway. 

    HOW IT WORKS

    We have to confess that what we have done so far was made exclusively by ourselves, hence there are no design specialists or developers in our team the following images are rather an explanation of the features than a finished prototype.  (THESE ARE ONLY A FEW IMAGES, THE APP IS MORE COMPLEX SOLUTION, HOWEVER INTUITIVELY EASY TO USE)

    The app allows you to choose from the list the airport you depart from and the airport of your arrival, automatically calculating the total distance. One may also need to fill in the number of passengers as well as cabin class and press “Offset”. Done. It’s that easy! 

    Now all you have to do is to choose between types of renewable energy projects and continue. The app would show you how much it would cost to completely offset CO2 emissions from your flight which usually does not exceed a couple of bucks and take you to payment page. Just a few clicks – and a great job of reducing greenhouse effect is done! And think about it – it costs peanuts.

     

    We are going to make the process for you as easy and as fun as possible.
    One of the features is global ranking or ranking by country. As well, all stats would be at hand with elements of gamification. You can always buy certificate for more CO2 or buy a gift certificate thus involving more people in our network!
    Hard to think of something as easy as pie and as awesome possum! 

    IN A NUTSHELL

    The Product: An innovative and unique tool that gives a possibility for every individual to take real action to reduce carbon emissions.

    A step in the right direction to solving global warming problem and investing into green renewable technology.

    Goals:

    1.To Expand and develop our current prototype app and a website.

    2.To involve in the process as many ecological organizations and influencers as possible but not only them, we plan to get commitment of tertiary sector too.  3.Reach 1% of air travelers using our app within 3 years period!

    What your financial support will do:

    1.Enable the development of our prototype app, realizing it's full potential of being a comprehensive tool for offsetting carbon footprint of your air travels.

    2.Marketing the completed product to individuals, funds, companies and anyone who can get involved.

    3.Popularization of “green thinking” and “green doing” and making it a habit for many rather than a way of thinking for just a few. 

     

    Some more hints our team:

     

     

    Andrei Fiadotau is an entrepreneur who has built one of the largest wholesale companies in the sphere of industrial pipeline systems in his country, and recently launched one the first pipes production line in the country. Experience in establishing successful internet TV project. He has an MBA in Business Administration from Tallinn University of Technology, Estonia. Andrei will cover the business development, financial part of the project and sales.

     

    Alex Kozhura worked in Russia’s largest high-tech company called Yandex as a Key Account Manager.  He has a BA in Business Administration from Tallinn University of Technology and Master in International Management from University of Trento, Italy. Alex has lots of international experiences and extensive knowledge of Marketing, he has working experience in 7 different countries. Alex will cover the product development and marketing part of the project.

     

    Olga Suk – has over 10 years of experience in Marketing field working for international blue-chip companies. She holds  MBA in Marketing from Fairleigh Dickinson University, attended professional programs at Stanford and Northwestern Universities. Olga will be overlooking Marketing and PR side of our project.

     

    Hanna Baranouskaya has LL.M degree from the Lund university (Sweden), graduated from the Estonian School of Diplomacy and Law Faculty of the Belarusian State University. Hanna has undertaken a number of international jobs and participated in various research projects. Spheres of competences: international law, project management and informational security. Hanna will be responsible for legal issues and accounting.

    + many more, our families, colleagues and friends...

      Risks & Challenges

      We have analysed the potential risks and believe that literally all of them can be minimized. 
      One of the possible challenges is the transparency of investments' proper utilization. However we see how to deal with this risk to make all projects come to life. 
      Firstly, all of the projects have been certified by either of the two most respected third-party standards in the world – United Nations’ CDM Standard and the Gold Standard (which are intensively audited on regular basis). 
      Secondly, we plan to provide opportunity for anyone to implement constant control by means of access to live streaming video through our website.

      You Can Help!

      We are thinking globally but acting locally, so your investment may help not only to offset carbon emissions but also influence millions of peoples’ lives in different regions of the world. 

      We shall still be really grateful, if you spread the information about this project out and let your friends know about our campaign. It's easy to do with Indiegogo share tools!

story:
A*LIVE: Calls for help even if you can't.

Prevents serious complications in rescue efforts caused by deadzones or disability to notify search and rescue teams 

Did you know that every year more than 20.000 people die in outdoor sports and on the open sea, just because nobody got aware early enough that there is a person in trouble? Only 10% of the planet are covered by cellular network! What if you need help but you are in a dead zone? We made this experience - not a nice one! We want to stop that. And that's why we have developed A*LIVE... for all these outdoor activities and more:

 

WHY WE DEVELOPED THE A*LIVE: THINGS WE MISSED IN RESCUE SYSTEMS

In 2003 we started the development of safety solutions for watersports. For decades there were no professional safety systems for surfers or kiter at all, although it can get life-threatening rapidly when they adrift.

However, apart from very expensive, complicated and heavy expedition gear with satellite-only connection, a water resistant device that keeps a permanent connection to the land didn’t exist yet. That's where we started. These key points are solved by the A*LIVE SmartSafety tool:

  • Dependency on mobile network
  • High costs for satellite-only devices
  • Missing or unreliable 2-way-communication
  • Unreliable waterproofness
  • Missing automatic SOS, self-awareness, no dead-man-switch
  • No connectivity to external triggers like pulse meters or avalanche airbags

  • High monthly or yearly subscription fees

 

SMALL PIECE OF TECHNOLOGY - GREAT IMPROVEMENT FOR PERSONAL SAFETY

 

Intended Measurements: 12 x 8 x 4 cm, approx. 200 g
 

NEW SMART SAFETY FEATURES REDUCE RESCUE RESPONSE TIME BY UP TO 90%

 

100% connected globally – life saving for people in trouble

The essential SmartSafety function is the connection to someone who can help you when you have a problem. Cell phones are not reliable enough to provide a safe connection, because of dead zones in GSM (2G/3G/4G) networks, sensitivity to cold, heat and moisture, or a limited, temperature depending battery time.

A*LIVE automatically keeps the connection to the world even in dead zones up to four days in a row without charging. Everywhere and anytime on a global scale. You can communicate whenever you want to – or whenever you need to!

A*LIVE automatically chooses the least cost network: GSM, 3G/4G or Iridium Satellite. This secures 100% coverage at a fixed low cost rate. No roaming hassle, independent of any local network, power supply or the internet. A*LIVE also works on the sea or on mountains. In case of an emergency you or your partner does not have to run and search for a connection. You can stay together wherever you are.

 

THE A*LIVE SMART SAFETY CORE SYSTEM

 

 

100% automatic lifeline – no room for mistakes

Automatic dead-man-switch:

A*LIVE is the first safety device with a dead-man-switch. It automatically warns your friends or rescue facility about possibly dangerous situations in case you are not able to do this on your own anymore.

There are several automatic alarm-schemes predefined:

  • Hard impact alarm and not moving
  • Wrong area (geofence)
  • Unusual speed/movement
  • External trigger
  • Dynamic Roaming Geofences for Teams

For certain activities predefined profiles can be chosen: Mountainbiking, Paragliding, Windsurfing, Kitesurfing, Sailing, Climbing, Mountaineering, Trekking, Skiing/Snowboarding and a very special scenario for kidnapping (additional manual dead-man switch).

You can also cancel the warning anytime, as the device signals all kind of manual and automatic alarms. 

If A*LIVE is connected to a pulse sensor it gives alarm if the pulse rate changes critically. A*LIVE can also be connected to avalanche AirBags and other rescue systems. External data is transmitted via Bluethooth LE.

 

Example: You crash your bike and don't move for 5 Minutes - A*LIVE sends a warning

 

Example: You pull your avalanche backpack - A*LIVE sends a warning

 

Example: You leave the safe zone - A*LIVE sends a warning

 

Example: Your tracking profile shows unusual speed or movement - A*LIVE sends a warning

 

Automatic SOS call to the closest 24/7 professional rescue facility:

In case of an emergency your SOS call is send to the closest professional rescue facility automatically. Just press one button three times (S-O-S). No time is lost and there is no room for mistakes. They automatically receive your exact GPS position and can start the rescue at once even on the sea, by night or in difficult environment.
We use GEOS for global rescue coordination, but you can also use local SAR facilities.
You can also setup automatic 2-step-escalations for the automatic alerts to make sure that always somebody reacts.

 

Short distance safety alert

In case of an emergency A*LIVE sends strong optical signals. A*LIVE also sends a Bluetooth-Ping every second. With the A*LIVE App (iOS/Android) people can find you even if they have no A*LIVE device within a range of approximately ten meters.


Dynamic Roaming Geofences for Teams

Adjust your geofence only once to your team-leader, and it will automatically move with the masterdevice, keeping the team alongside. Perfect also for Vessels and Tender-Tracking.

 

A*LIVE SMART SAFETY KEY FEATURES

 

100% GLOBAL GATEWAY FOR COMMUNICATION AND TRACKING

 

The A*LIVE App – Keep in touch with the world

A*LIVE also is a global gateway for your emails and SMS. You can use it as a satellite modem for text messages everywhere anytime. A*LIVE is connected to your cell phone via Bluetooth LE. When you start your trip you choose your SmartSafety profile in the App. You can see your track data and those of your friends using an A*LIVE. The A*LIVE App connects you to your team members, friends and family. In terms of near-field SOS location you can use the A*LIVE App to find someone within a range of ten meters through the Bluetooth-Ping signal as an avalanche transceiver.

 

Choose your safety profile at the A*LIVE App

 

Real-Time Tracking for Safety, Competition and Fun

Your A*Live comes with a private tracking website. You can share this link with your team, friends and family. They can see your position anytime. A*LIVE provides high accuracy 3D-localization showing also the altitude within a range of ten meters. There is an API for sharing your track data on Facebook automatically – if you wish to. With the TeamView function you can see your team online - even if you are far outside. Authorized persons can also "ping" your position on the A*LIVE when your tracking is not active.

See the prototypes at work:


Current functional prototype

Comparison between old (above)  and new version of IRIDIUM SBD chips
 
Various testing and prototype devices
 

Screenshot of personal tracking website - friends, team and family can see where you are


Screenshots from the SmartSafety Web App.

 

A*LIVE COMMUNICATION KEY FEATURES

 

E-mail, SMS, telegram, weather forecast, see and share track information, team tracking

 

100% WATERPROOF AND STRONG BATTERY

Inductive charging (QI Standard). 2.4Ah, up to 120 hours of battery life at maximal activity rate. The more time is spent in 4G/3G/GSM network areas the longer the battery lasts.

 

100% FLEXIBILITY AT FIXED RATES IN ONE DATA CONTRACT WORLDWIDE

A*LIVE is a product of ProteGear Global Tracking Safety Solutions. ProteGear provides the only system that works with one data plan at fixed rates globally. A*LIVE automatically chooses the least cost network GSM, 3G/4G or iridium satellite. You can choose between pay-by-day, pay-by-week, pay-by-month or premium options in yearly contracts. Pay-by-day is the most flexible way to use the A*LIVE starting at 3 Euro per activated day or Eur 19 per month.

 

ProteGear rescue system - regional or global perspective

Within your ProteGear dataplan you can individually assign to a local/regional or global rescue facility. Local means that you are added to a team or to friends. In case the A*LIVE sends a warning those people are contacted at first. When you choose a regional (for example the European) or the global rescue facility (the GEOS system) your SOS call is directly send to one of those professional 24/7 ones. This is independent of your data plan.

 

OUR EXPERIENCE WITH GLOBAL TRACKING SAFETY SOLUTIONS

More than 25 organizations and hundreds of individual clients are already using the ProteGear safety. We have more than ten years of experience in combining different devices like GSM and Iridium trackers and their original software with our own system. We now need your support to bring our vision of establishing an easy and affordable new standard in personal safety into reality .

Find more information at the ProteGear website https://www.protegear.de/english/

 

RISKS

The SmartSafety Service is already working and operating on various places around the world since 2014, with different hardware (trackers) from third parties (operating in Europe, Brazil, Morocco, Egypt, Antarctica, Mauritius etc).

As these trackers always had some limitations (range, detection of crash, reliability of connection, costs etc) in 2015 we decided to start the development of our own hardware which combines GSM (2G), UMTS (3G) or LTE (4G) and Iridium connectivity in one device. This is the A*LIVE.

There are already concepts and working prototypes available with 95% of the functionality we need, but not in the casing we have designed. It has been checked and tested by several very experienced outdoor sportsmen. All found the concept and functionality great.

The next major steps are to match the electronic design with the casing to get it 100% waterproof as well as get the accompanied iOS & Android APP ready. We already have the waterproof standard of IP67 but we strive for IP68. We did our homework, checked, re-checked, tested and got everything ready to start the production of the first series of A*LIVE tools.

3G/LTE features depend on availability of networks and hybrid modules for LTE-M1 or LTE-NB1 by late summer 2017

So it is only a question of your support and time to get all parts fixed. Help us to reach a new level in personal safety standard! A perfect personal safety solution should not remain a privilege for specialists!

story: My name Charlie Horrell and I would like to tell you a little about myself and the reason I wanted to make the Ozark Quick Grill.  First, my dad, being an avid outdoors man invented one of the first portable charcoal grills in the mid 60's when I was still in high school and I believe that is where I got my innovation.   The outdoors has always been my favorite place to be, even as a young boy I loved to fish, hunt, camp and canoe.  As I got older, I started thinking about how great it would be to have a camp fire grill that was easy and quick to put up, portable, functional and one that would last.  Now you may can get some grills that are quick to put up, but are not very functional and definitely not durable.  This design is one I have worked on for several years and I believe that now I have the grill that fits all the criteria.  Why build it now?  As I was reading in the Arkansas Wildlife magazine, it seemed to me that I was not the only one in need of a portable grill, there were others looking for the same thing, so I went to work to make the Ozark Quick Grill as durable as possible, portable, and with all the conveniences such as a Sheppard's hook for your stew pot, and shelf for your coffee pot, while still having the whole bottom grill for steaks, hot dogs, breakfast etc.  The Ozark Quick Grill even has a rotisserie for chicken all while fitting into a 12" x 24" x 1" portable box with weight a little less than a case of sodas.  It is very simple to set-up and can be done in 15 seconds.  Take a look at the pictures and I believe you will find that the Ozark Quick Grill would be a great investment since it has life time guarantee and patent pending.  Thank you for your consideration!

story:
Thank you for taking a look at The Rhat Bike campaign. Against all odds and challenges I have been able to bring the Rhat Bike to this point presenting to you asking for your support to take it to the next stage of development. Please feel free to reach out to me if you have any specific questions, I live and breathe Rhat Bike and I want to make sure this project becomes commercially viable and gets in the hands of people as soon as humanly possible.

The Rhat Bike is a versatile multi purpose bike that can be folded and stored easily. Inspired by military functionality the Rhat Bike can be an ATV, UTV, and much more. Please watch our video to learn more about the functionality of the Rhat Bike and the plan to turn it into a commercial product for everyone to enjoy!

Functionality Speed Up Video! Enjoy!

Even if you can't back the campaign right now you can still help create the Rhat Bike by sharing our campaign on your social media profiles.

Share on Facebook!

Share on Twitter!

Share on Linkedin!

Sharing Link: https://igg.me/at/rhat-bike-foldable-motorcycle

 

Even with a small budget a patent was filed successfully which I see as one of the major successes of the Rhat Bike project overall. You can take a look at the patent by clicking the link below or studying the images above.

Patent #: US8757651B1

Link: https://patents.google.com/patent/US8757651B1/
