story:
Miss Mayfly Waders Are SO Wonderful that Even Men Want to Wear Them!

Bobbie Turner, a fly angler from British Columbia, states:

“What Miss Mayfly has created is something really wonderful. Now my husband and his friends are complaining “Hey we don’t have that”! “Too bad” says Bobbie.

 

 

As female anglers, the Miss Mayfly team struggled to find gear that fit, performed & looked flattering 

To solve this problem, Miss Mayfly created a line of color-coordinating fishing gear products made exclusively for women. The Miss Mayfly Wader entered the market in 2018 and has swiftly gained popularity with it’s reputation of exceptional fit, performance, durability and flattering design, with a special emphasis on appropriate sizing for curvy, full and plus sizes. 

 

 

Women's Fishing Gear- An Under Served Market

Women are one of the fastest growing demographics in the outdoor space making up 32% of all anglers, totaling 9.8 million women and yet they are still an under-served market, often forcing them to either wear ill-fitting men’s gear or pay up to $900 for custom made waders. There are many women who simply can not enjoy the sport fully because the competitors gear does not meet the majority of women’s sizing and performance needs. Miss Mayfly's mission is to raise the industry standards for women by creating gear that empowers women to enjoy the sport.  

 Women Anglers Struggle with Gear Barriers

Typically, women's wader sizing is created in a mirrored system of the men's scale, but as we all know, women's bodies are very different than men's. Fitting many body sizes and foot sizes together into appropriate fitting gear, while maintaining low SKU's and shelf space, is quite hard to accomplish, but Miss Mayfly has figured it out! To solve this dilemma Miss Mayfly has created an innovative sizing system that fits women up to 61" width in just 12 sizes, while the leading brands only fit up to 45-48".                     

                                                                                                            Gear is a common barrier that women face when entering the sport. Usually waders are scaled by height, coming in standard, petite, tall and then they might throw in a plus size. The problem this creates is that the sizes scale along with a foot size so that the bigger the wader, the bigger the bootie is. This doesn't account for women with full bodies and small feet, women with small bodies and large feet, or any of the women in-between.

     

The Same fit and sizing problems persist throughout most women's gear products. Adding a 'girly" color to a man's product doesn't improve it's performance for women. Tackle bags are big, bulky and heavy. The straps don't allow for freedom of movement or consider a woman's curves. Wading boots are over-sized to accommodate the over-sized booties. The shirts don't consider coverage for the in-between stops along a fishing journey and they definitely do not consider that women come in various shapes and sizes.  

 

Miss Mayfly Designs Products that Women Anglers Need

​Miss Mayfly's innovative wader sizing system breaks the sizing barriers by creating 4 body types for each bootie size range. So now no matter what body type a woman has, there is a bootie to fit. The tailored fit of our plush neoprene bootie, allows for an expanded  bootie size range, fitting sizes from 6 to 11.  The body types are offered in Slim, Curvy, Full and Plus, with the largest sizes fitting up to 61" in hip widths, making Miss Mayfly the largest women's sizing option on the market. 

                                                                                                                                                                                        No one knows a woman anglers needs as well as a woman angler.  100% of our products are designed by female anglers who know exactly what works and what doesn't work, what women want and what women don't want. How do we know better than the big competitors? Because we  listen to our sister anglers needs and focus all of our time and resources to developing gear solutions just for them.  

Miss Mayfly utilizes lightweight fabrics, streamlined designs with superb functionality, and are sized to optimize a woman's freedom of movement. 

 

Kim Ranalla, founder and designer at Miss Mayfly, explains: “As an angler myself,  I am very passionate about women's diversity within the fishing industry. I have set out on a mission to make sure all women are accounted for by developing solutions for women’s common gear problems that often interfere with their ability to fully enjoy the sport. The key to our  wader sizing solution is our Polyflex fabric which is flexible, lightweight and moves comfortably with a woman’s body. Our customers rave about how easily they can move, bend and sit in them while they state that they feel like they are wearing their favorite pair of jeans. Miss Mayfly has put the same women-focused thought into all of our product designs and we are extremely proud to introduce these fabulous products that so many women need"!

 

PRODUCT DETAILS

 

Breathable Chest Wader Features:

  • Innovative Fabric- The Polyflex fabric is a medium weight, waterproof, breathable, flexible, polyester fabric which is suitable for all temperatures and conditions, with appropriate under-layers. The smooth laying fabric creates a flattering and comfortable fit, while optimizing performance.
  • Innovative Sizing:  Miss Mayfly waders come in three (3) bootie sizes: 6/7, 8/9 & 10/11. Each bootie size comes in 4 body types, slim, curvy, full and plus. So now no matter which bootie size you wear, there is a body type to match.
  • Optimized Performance: Miss Mayfly Waders will not weigh you down or restrict your movements allowing for optimal performance. Features include a fleece lined hand warmer, two (2) zippered pockets, two (2) tippet pockets, contoured buckles, adjustable bust drawstring, plush neoprene booties and double layering in the lower legs with air venting.
  • Flattering Design: Miss Mayfly’s color-coordinating products are created with subtle feminine color combinations. Colored pop stitching highlights the wader body seams and embroidered logos. As a touch of fun, the logos are finished with two small crystal accents on the chest and one on the lower leg.
  • Incredible Durability: The Polyflex fabric resists abrasions & tears while the flex in the fabric reduces stress on the seams.  

The first production of the wader was completed in late 2018. The wader has been sold throughout the US, Canada, England, Ireland and in the Netherlands, quickly growing a popular brand identity and a loyal consumer base.  We have nearly sold out of our inventory. This campaign will help us increase production to meet demand. 

Delivery is expected October- November 2019.

 

HER Fishing Performance Shirts: Miss Mayfly HER Fishing Shirts feature fun & fabulous fishing artwork by the artist Andrey and are designed with long coverage to compliment leggings/under-layers, for those in-between fishing stops. Now you can feel 'dressed" in and out of the water! The shirts are stain resistant and offer UV protection. Available in fleece or breathable versions in sizes small to 3X which are sized to correspond with our wader sizes. Prototype stage near completion. Delivery in October- November 2019

 

Miss Mayfly Wading Boots- The color-coordinating Missoula boot is waterproof, lightweight and provides high ankle support. Strong and sturdy, the solid wrapped sticky rubber soles won’t peel and can be studded. Available in sizes 6-11 but can fit up to a 12 with a thinner sock.. Prototype and testing stage complete & ready for production. Delivery in October-November 2019

 

Miss Mayfly Naiad Sling Pack - Designed and sized to work with a woman’s curves for ultimate comfort. The Naiad offers many storage features including a main working station and a mini working station on the chest strap. This Pack has a rod-rest holder, net slot, fly pad, and a waterproof phone/key compartment with key clip, while the large main compartment has a center divider and an inside pocket. The pack is made of lightweight, waterproof nylon.  Straps can be trimmed to fit. One Size fits up to 62" girth. Prototype stage near completion. Delivery in October-November, 2019   

                        

CHOOSING A SIZE

Our team will contact you after the campaign ends to confirm sizing choices. The Size chosen can be changed after the campaign ends. If you need help, please email us and we can tell you exactly which size would be the best fit for you.

Taking Body Measurements:  The most important measurement is the hip, followed by the others. The least important is height . When taking measurements, take them while wearing the thickest layers you would wear with your wader, such as winter layers. Do not stretch the measuring tape tight, let it lay naturally. If you do not have a fabric measuring tape, you can use a belt, rope, string etc, mark it and measure it out with a ruler.

Hip: Take your hip measurement around the fullest part of rear at hip joint.

Waist: Take your waist measurement at or 1 inch above the navel.

Bust: This is not your bra size. Take the measurement around fullest part of bust

Inseam: Waders only extend to the mid inside ankle, not to the floor. Take this measurement from center crotch to center inside ankle. 

Bootie: Is equal to your standard US shoe size. 

Recommended Height: Although we have a recommended height range for best fit, we do so to simply help you decide which size will give you the "best" fit, so if you picked the best size and are an inch or two over or under in height, it will still fit you. Just trust us.

6/7: 5'2-5'6

7/8: 5'5-5'8

10/11: 5'7-5'11

Choosing the best size: To choose a size, find the correct bootie size and then pick out a corresponding body type.

Bootie/Body Match: We have designed our sizes so you can scale up and down the bootie size by 1 shoe size. If you fall into an odd sizing combination, find the body that fits you first and choose the bootie size that is closest. The tapered booties will still fit well even if they are a size or two off. 

ASSISTANCE: For direct sizing assistance, email your measurements to customerservices@missmayfly.com 

 

How Your Support Will Impact Women Across the World

Miss Mayfly hopes to raise $75,000 to bring flattering and well fitting performance gear to the widespread women’s market

By supporting our campaign you will help fund the manufacturing of additional wader inventory and bring the Missoula Wading Boots, Naiad Sling Packs, and our fabulous artist rendered performance shirts to the fast growing women's consumer market. More importantly, you will help women across the world to get outside and comfortably enjoy the sport of fishing in gear that they can look AND feel good in! 

Early Contributors will receive the deepest discounts on single products and combined packages. This is a great opportunity to not just support our mission but to try the products and experience why Miss Mayfly is so loved by it's consumers.

 

If You Want to Support Our Campaign but Can't Donate, Here is What You Can Do:

 Sharing Our Campaign with Others Would be the Greatest Thing You Can Do to Help Support Our Mission and ALL The Women Anglers Who NEED Our Fabulous Gear!!!!!

DELIVERY

Delivery time is estimated at 3-4 months after the campaign ends to allow for manufacturing and shipping time. Some products may be ready earlier than others. If you purchase a package we will wait until all of the products are complete and ship them all together. Single items may be delivered earlier than the suggested time.  We have excellent factories waiting to start production. Our designer will be on-site at the factories to oversee the quality control and manufacturing process to limit any production errors and ensure the highest standards of quality. 

 

WARRANTY AND EXCHANGES

Quality Assurance: To date, we have only had two minor flaws and zero reports of tears or abrasions because the manufacturing facilities we have selected provide impeccable construction and hold themselves to the highest of quality standards in the industry. We stand by our products with great pride and insist that our customers must have only the best performing products. We will go above & beyond to ensure that our sister anglers are happily fishing. 

Breathable Chest Wader

Sizing Exchanges are accepted within 60 days but we will approve exchanges for extended periods of time on unused products under special circumstances on a case by case basis. ​Return shipping paid by customer.

Returns and Refunds: Refund requests will only be granted within 30 days of delivery or in the case that we do not have inventory to exchange your product within 30 days of request. Products must be returned in unused condition in original packaging. Shipping is not refundable.

Factory Defects: We warranty our waders for 1 year against manufacturer defects.  We provide minor repairs such as small patches, seam weld replacements, repair minor loose stitching, adjust straps, etc. In the case that the wader has a major defect that we can not fix, we will replace your wader free of charge up to one (1) year. Return shipping paid by customer.

Consumer Damage, Improper Care, Expired Warranty: If damage is caused by consumer, or the one (1) year warranty expires, a small fee of $25.00 may be charged for repairs. For damages that are not repairable we will replace your wader for a $100 fee for up to two (2) years.  Does not cover normal wear, aging or stains. Return shipping paid by customer.

Upcoming Size Trade-In Program- Because women often fluctuate in size, we will soon be initiating an exchange program where you can trade your wader for another size, once per year- up to two years for a $100 fee. The used wader will be reconditioned and either sold  at a discounted price to women who are just entering the sport or donated to a women's fishing organization as a charitable contribution.

Missoula Wading Boots

Sizing Exchanges are accepted within 60 days but we will approve exchanges for unused products under special circumstances. Return shipping paid by customer.

Returns and Refunds: Refund requests will only be granted within 30 days of delivery or in the case that we do not have inventory to exchange your product within 30 days of request. Products must be returned in unused condition in original packaging. Shipping is not refundable.

Factory Defects: We warranty our boots for one (1) year against manufacturer defects. We can perform minor repairs but in the case that the boots have a major defect that we can not fix, we will replace them free of charge up to one (1)  year. Return shipping paid by customer.

Consumer Damage, Improper Care, Expired Warranty: If damage is caused by consumer, improper care or the one (1) year warranty expires, a small repair fee of $40.00 may be charged for repairs. For damages that are not repairable, we will replace your boots for a $75.00 fee for up to two (2) years. Does not cover normal wear, aging or stains. Return shipping paid by customer.

Naiad Sling Pack

Factory Defects: We warranty our Sling Pack for one (1) year against manufacturer defects. We provide minor repairs but in the case that the pack has a major defect that we can not fix, we will replace it free of charge up to one (1) year. Return shipping paid by customer.

Returns and Refunds: Refund requests will only be granted within 30 days of delivery or in the case that we do not have inventory to exchange your product within 30 days of request. Products must be returned in unused condition in original packaging. Shipping is not refundable.

Consumer Damage, Improper Care, Expired Warranty: If damage is caused by consumer, improper care or the one (1) year warranty expires, a small repair fee of $25.00 may be charged or for repairs. For damages that are not repairable, we will replace your pack for a $35.00 fee for up to two (2) years. Does not cover normal wear, aging or stains. Return shipping paid by customer.

HER Fishing Shirt

Sizing Exchanges are accepted within 60 days but we will approve exchanges for unused products under special circumstances. Return shipping paid by customer.

Returns and Refunds: Refund requests will only be granted within 30 days of delivery or in the case that we do not have inventory to exchange your product within 30 days of request. Products must be returned in unused condition in original packaging. Shipping is not refundable.

Factory Defects: We warranty our shirts for six (6) months against manufacturer defects. We can perform minor repairs but in the case that the shirt has a defect that we can not fix, we will replace it free of charge up to 6 months. Return shipping paid by customer.

Consumer Damage, Improper Care, Expired Warranty: If damage is caused by consumer, improper care or the six (6) month warranty expires we will not repair or replace the shirt. The warranty does not cover normal wear, aging or abnormal stains.

 

SHIPPING FEES

 

WHAT HAPPENS IF WE DO NOT REACH OUR GOAL?

BACK UP PLAN

In the case that we do not reach our goal, we have secured a line of credit to ensure that we are able to manufacture the products and deliver your perks. However, the line of credit is expensive so the campaign funds will be used to offset the cost of production while we seek an equity investor to fund our future operational, sales and marketing costs. If you have any questions or comments please email us at customerservices@missmayfly.com

 

​​

For Supporting Women Anglers!!!
story_txt:
Miss Mayfly Waders Are SO Wonderful that Even Men Want to Wear Them!
Bobbie Turner, a fly angler from British Columbia, states:
“What Miss Mayfly has created is something really wonderful. Now my husband and his friends are complaining “Hey we don’t have that”! “Too bad” says Bobbie.
 

 
As female anglers, the Miss Mayfly team struggled to find gear that fit, performed & looked flattering 
To solve this problem, Miss Mayfly created a line of color-coordinating fishing gear products made exclusively for women. The Miss Mayfly Wader entered the market in 2018 and has swiftly gained popularity with it’s reputation of exceptional fit, performance, durability and flattering design, with a special emphasis on appropriate sizing for curvy, full and plus sizes. 
 

 
Women's Fishing Gear- An Under Served Market
Women are one of the fastest growing demographics in the outdoor space making up 32% of all anglers, totaling 9.8 million women and yet they are still an under-served market, often forcing them to either wear ill-fitting men’s gear or pay up to $900 for custom made waders. There are many women who simply can not enjoy the sport fully because the competitors gear does not meet the majority of women’s sizing and performance needs. Miss Mayfly's mission is to raise the industry standards for women by creating gear that empowers women to enjoy the sport.  




 Women Anglers Struggle with Gear Barriers
Typically, women's wader sizing is created in a mirrored system of the men's scale, but as we all know, women's bodies are very different than men's. Fitting many body sizes and foot sizes together into appropriate fitting gear, while maintaining low SKU's and shelf space, is quite hard to accomplish, but Miss Mayfly has figured it out! To solve this dilemma Miss Mayfly has created an innovative sizing system that fits women up to 61" width in just 12 sizes, while the leading brands only fit up to 45-48".                     
                                                                                                            Gear is a common barrier that women face when entering the sport. Usually waders are scaled by height, coming in standard, petite, tall and then they might throw in a plus size. The problem this creates is that the sizes scale along with a foot size so that the bigger the wader, the bigger the bootie is. This doesn't account for women with full bodies and small feet, women with small bodies and large feet, or any of the women in-between.
     
The Same fit and sizing problems persist throughout most women's gear products. Adding a 'girly" color to a man's product doesn't improve it's performance for women. Tackle bags are big, bulky and heavy. The straps don't allow for freedom of movement or consider a woman's curves. Wading boots are over-sized to accommodate the over-sized booties. The shirts don't consider coverage for the in-between stops along a fishing journey and they definitely do not consider that women come in various shapes and sizes.  
 
Miss Mayfly Designs Products that Women Anglers Need
​Miss Mayfly's innovative wader sizing system breaks the sizing barriers by creating 4 body types for each bootie size range. So now no matter what body type a woman has, there is a bootie to fit. The tailored fit of our plush neoprene bootie, allows for an expanded  bootie size range, fitting sizes from 6 to 11.  The body types are offered in Slim, Curvy, Full and Plus, with the largest sizes fitting up to 61" in hip widths, making Miss Mayfly the largest women's sizing option on the market. 

                                                                                                                                                                                        No one knows a woman anglers needs as well as a woman angler.  100% of our products are designed by female anglers who know exactly what works and what doesn't work, what women want and what women don't want. How do we know better than the big competitors? Because we  listen to our sister anglers needs and focus all of our time and resources to developing gear solutions just for them.  
Miss Mayfly utilizes lightweight fabrics, streamlined designs with superb functionality, and are sized to optimize a woman's freedom of movement. 
 
Kim Ranalla, founder and designer at Miss Mayfly, explains: “As an angler myself,  I am very passionate about women's diversity within the fishing industry. I have set out on a mission to make sure all women are accounted for by developing solutions for women’s common gear problems that often interfere with their ability to fully enjoy the sport. The key to our  wader sizing solution is our Polyflex fabric which is flexible, lightweight and moves comfortably with a woman’s body. Our customers rave about how easily they can move, bend and sit in them while they state that they feel like they are wearing their favorite pair of jeans. Miss Mayfly has put the same women-focused thought into all of our product designs and we are extremely proud to introduce these fabulous products that so many women need"!

 
PRODUCT DETAILS
 
Breathable Chest Wader Features:


Innovative Fabric- The Polyflex fabric is a medium weight, waterproof, breathable, flexible, polyester fabric which is suitable for all temperatures and conditions, with appropriate under-layers. The smooth laying fabric creates a flattering and comfortable fit, while optimizing performance.
Innovative Sizing:  Miss Mayfly waders come in three (3) bootie sizes: 6/7, 8/9 & 10/11. Each bootie size comes in 4 body types, slim, curvy, full and plus. So now no matter which bootie size you wear, there is a body type to match.

Optimized Performance: Miss Mayfly Waders will not weigh you down or restrict your movements allowing for optimal performance. Features include a fleece lined hand warmer, two (2) zippered pockets, two (2) tippet pockets, contoured buckles, adjustable bust drawstring, plush neoprene booties and double layering in the lower legs with air venting.

Flattering Design: Miss Mayfly’s color-coordinating products are created with subtle feminine color combinations. Colored pop stitching highlights the wader body seams and embroidered logos. As a touch of fun, the logos are finished with two small crystal accents on the chest and one on the lower leg.

Incredible Durability: The Polyflex fabric resists abrasions & tears while the flex in the fabric reduces stress on the seams.  

The first production of the wader was completed in late 2018. The wader has been sold throughout the US, Canada, England, Ireland and in the Netherlands, quickly growing a popular brand identity and a loyal consumer base.  We have nearly sold out of our inventory. This campaign will help us increase production to meet demand.  
Delivery is expected October- November 2019.

Miss Mayfly Naiad Sling Pack - Designed and sized to work with a woman’s curves for ultimate comfort. If you fall into an odd sizing combination, find the body that fits you first and choose the bootie size that is closest. The tapered booties will still fit well even if they are a size or two off.

story:
“Authentic opportunities to create a safer world for our children and grandchildren are rare these days.  This is one of them.” -Das Labs Founder

The project before us presents an opportunity to do good for our families and others on an unprecedented scale.
Unfortunately, an average of over 1,000 people drown daily worldwide, the majority being children.

“Design is a solution to a problem.” -John Maeda

Our team decided to bring this project opportunity directly to the public with Indiegogo to include your participation in it's launching and success.

“SandFrogs™,” a first-of-it’s-kind all terrain beach and pool side sandal engineered to increase a user’s swimming ability when in a body of water.

This unprecedented innovation combines all:

  • Protection
  • Support
  • Comfort
  • Performance

features of all current and available footwear a user would wear in and out of water with the awesome ability to acclimate between the two environments.

SandFrogs™ look awesome and will protect a user’s feet from:

  • Sharp rocks
  • Broken glass
  • Scorching sand

When walking over sand this innovative beach sandal performs in the manner of a snow shoe.  This cool feature becomes rather important when the sand is scorching hot. 

Great times and places to wear SandFrogs™:

  • at the beach
  • while surfing
  • at the lake
  • when boating
  • at the pool
  • when dune climbing
  • when jet skiing 
  • to the mall or out and about

Our Vision for Markets, Pricing, and Distribution of SandFrogs™:

Children's-

Online Shopping

Standard-est. ($15) / Designer-est. ($29)

Retail Shopping (With the likes of Dollar General)
Standard-est. ($15)

Charitable (With the likes of Salvation Army)
Standard-gifted

Teen's and Adult's-

Online Shopping

Standard-est, ($29) / Designer-est. ($55)

Retail Shopping  

Standard-est. ($29) / Designer-est. ($55)

Charitable (With the likes of Salvation Army)

Standard-gifted

Our Background

Our current manufacturing operation produces molded products from all manner of plastics.  These products relate to the landscape and building products industry.  Our team has successfully prototyped and manufactured several original product concepts to earn national market status.  

Our Mission Statement:

"To make SandFrogs™ swim aid sandals accessible and available to as many children and communities as quickly as possible."

Das Labs is committed to share the intellectual property and tooling for SandFrogs™ in the future with capable manufacturers across the world and to build relationships with outreach organizations to maximize the distribution of their all-terrain (swim-aid) beach sandals into impoverished and high risk communities while manufacturing a state-of-the-art product and earning a stellar brand - SandFrogs™.

The Inspiration for SandFrogs™:

I believe that God supernaturally bestowed this product concept on me while grieving for the family of a ten year old boy that drowned near my home.  I understood at that moment that He is the source of all of our creativity, empathy, and good work.

Every contributor will receive a promo code for access to the premiere release of our product.

To celebrate our work together as sponsors and creators of SandFrogs™, we will be offering a one-time release of an exclusive 2020 commemorative t-shirt.

Other Ways You Can Help Our Project:

Please share our campaign with your friends and family.  Help spread the word and build anticipation and excitement for the success and completion of our mission!

Thank you if your organization has made a contribution. We will be honoring your organization's participation on our website and Facebook page.
story_txt:
“Authentic opportunities to create a safer world for our children and grandchildren are rare these days.  This is one of them.” -Das Labs FounderThe project before us presents an opportunity to do good for our families and others on an unprecedented scale.Unfortunately, an average of over 1,000 people drown daily worldwide, the majority being children.“Design is a solution to a problem.” -John MaedaOur team decided to bring this project opportunity directly to the public with Indiegogo to include your participation in it's launching and success.“SandFrogs™,” a first-of-it’s-kind all terrain beach and pool side sandal engineered to increase a user’s swimming ability when in a body of water.This unprecedented innovation combines all:
Protection
Support
Comfort
Performance
features of all current and available footwear a user would wear in and out of water with the awesome ability to acclimate between the two environments.SandFrogs™ look awesome and will protect a user’s feet from:
Sharp rocks
Broken glass
Scorching sand
When walking over sand this innovative beach sandal performs in the manner of a snow shoe.  This cool feature becomes rather important when the sand is scorching hot. Great times and places to wear SandFrogs™:
at the beach
while surfing
at the lake
when boating
at the pool
when dune climbing
when jet skiing 
to the mall or out and about
Our Vision for Markets, Pricing, and Distribution of SandFrogs™:Children's-Online ShoppingStandard-est. ($15) / Designer-est. ($29)Retail Shopping (With the likes of Dollar General)Standard-est. ($15)Charitable (With the likes of Salvation Army)Standard-giftedTeen's and Adult's-Online ShoppingStandard-est, ($29) / Designer-est. ($55)Retail Shopping  Standard-est. ($29) / Designer-est. ($55)Charitable (With the likes of Salvation Army)Standard-giftedOur BackgroundOur current manufacturing operation produces molded products from all manner of plastics.  These products relate to the landscape and building products industry.  Our team has successfully prototyped and manufactured several original product concepts to earn national market status.  Our Mission Statement:"To make SandFrogs™ swim aid sandals accessible and available to as many children and communities as quickly as possible."Das Labs is committed to share the intellectual property and tooling for SandFrogs™ in the future with capable manufacturers across the world and to build relationships with outreach organizations to maximize the distribution of their all-terrain (swim-aid) beach sandals into impoverished and high risk communities while manufacturing a state-of-the-art product and earning a stellar brand - SandFrogs™.The Inspiration for SandFrogs™:I believe that God supernaturally bestowed this product concept on me while grieving for the family of a ten year old boy that drowned near my home.  I understood at that moment that He is the source of all of our creativity, empathy, and good work.Every contributor will receive a promo code for access to the premiere release of our product.To celebrate our work together as sponsors and creators of SandFrogs™, we will be offering a one-time release of an exclusive 2020 commemorative t-shirt.Other Ways You Can Help Our Project:Please share our campaign with your friends and family.  Help spread the word and build anticipation and excitement for the success and completion of our mission!Thank you if your organization has made a contribution. We will be honoring your organization's participation on our website and Facebook page.

story:
You are not convinced yet then go ahead and read on.

 

Word from the CEO of the Limo Pass

Demand is there:

According to Chicago Tribune, "Whether it be for business or pleasure, visitors poured into Chicago at record-breaking levels last year 2018, with 57.6 million visitors — a 4.3 percent jump over 2017’s record of 55.2 million. There is definitely lost of people getting around.

Successful Market Research

Our market research was very successful and everyone loved the idea and ready to back our campaign. We are confident we will sell out fast.

Question was not about demand but about our price point. We are priced at our break even point, a bare minimum, lowest price. Starting at $10, you get one full day limo pass of city of Chicago. You get unlimited pickup and drop off between 10:30am-4:30pm everyday, 7 days a week.

Do you speak Mongolian? check out here...

 

What we need and what you get?

We need to reach our minimum goal of $120k . This funds go to pay for the drivers, gas and cover financing of 5 limousine payments for 120 days or 4 months. It is bare minimum, where we break even without including overhead costs, taxes or any other expenses. 

Starting at $10 per person, you will get unlimited pickup and drop off for one full day, from attraction to attraction, any points on the preset routes. Like Double deck bus or free trolly, or boat, or segway tour, they all go around a preset route.

There are many perks to choose from at different support levels. 

If we do not reach our goal any contribution or pledge you have made... you will get full credit 100% toward any limousine service you use through our other limousine services like airport pickup or drop and anything you may desire and your credit will never expire. It is also transferable to anyone you choose,  you will never use any of your money. Just hold on to your receipt or proof of payment.

You will get unlimited pickup and drop off for all day from attraction to attraction, or to your hotel, restaurant or any place in downtown Chicago in limousine for only $18. Hold on to your wallet yet. I know it is a awesome deal but wait a little bit for us to explain in details. I promise, you will get your chance to purchase our offer. 

Not only you will help us launch this project but help create a wonderful memory for other people.  Just looking at a limousine or being inside one gives you that excitement and different state of mind and emotion. It might recall your memory of high school prom or, birthday, or wedding, your first date or special event.

The Impact

The impact your are creating is that late model limousines will be a part of everyday Chicago experience. It will be only such limousine service offered, in action in the world. Tours will love Chicago even more and help bring more tourist to the city.

Risks & Challenges

Anything you do in life there is always risk and challenges.  I want you to understand that you are not only one making commitment here. We actually have much bigger commitment than you are. Minimum support from one person is about $18 yet you will get full credit toward using our other limousine services in case this project does not reach our goal or launch. 

Because of the initial purchase cost of a new or newer limousine, we need to have this project go on for at least next three years. Why? Let's say we purchased new limo at $85k and need to pay it off in three years. That is where you get minimum three years.

We can't purchase new limo and use it only for 4-5 months and have no business after that. The biggest challenge on our end would not be financing of a however many limousine we need for the project but find and hiring good limousine drivers. To drive these limousine in the city of Chicago one must have chauffeurs license. 

We have a great company behind us, American Coach limousine will  do our all the limousine pickups not related to Chicago limousine tour. They have over 200 cars including sedans, SUVs and party buses. 

AutoCab will do our software side of the business and it will be similar to shared ride apps like Uber and Lyft. Customers be able to see where limousines are and when they are arriving as well as be able to make a reservations. 

We have few companies to do financing side of this project. They will do the financing and we will lease or purchase limousine from them for this project.

Everyone can make this project a success even though you may be in a different part of the world and not visiting Chicago any times soon, but just getting the words out there will help your friends, relatives, someone be able to experience Chicago in this unique way, riding a limousine

.

Let's help Chicago known for its limousine tour and experience. Thank you for your time and support.

AutoCab will do our software side of the business and it will be similar to shared ride apps like Uber and Lyft. Customers be able to see where limousines are and when they are arriving as well as be able to make a reservations. 
We have few companies to do financing side of this project. They will do the financing and we will lease or purchase limousine from them for this project.
Everyone can make this project a success even though you may be in a different part of the world and not visiting Chicago any times soon, but just getting the words out there will help your friends, relatives, someone be able to experience Chicago in this unique way, riding a limousine
.
Let's help Chicago known for its limousine tour and experience. Thank you for your time and support.

story:
About us and action against Corona virus effects

We are The Walking Parrot, a fast-growing tour operator in Warsaw, Porto and Lisbon. We offer different types of amazing tour services such as Walking Tours, Food Tours, Private Tours, Team buildings, Event Organisation, Pub Crawls and many others to our customers. With the goal of a rapid expansion among all the most important cities in the world, we are quickly becoming a recognised brand for our top quality and reliability. Making sure that our guests and partners are happy with what we provide and always looking to improve, in order to achieve better quality and results!

Just like the whole tourism industry, we are affected by the measures to stop Corona virus and we are doing our best to decrease the damage.

In order to do that, we redirected our efforts to create new products to adapt to this new and never before experienced times. With that said, we are betting on two main directions and now, with the work done, we need the cash flow to make this possible and it is here that we need your help. In return we are giving you back much more than you are donating, while at the same time you will also be contributing together with us to help people in need due to the consequences of the COVID-19 crisis.

The two main directions are:

  • We created new virus-risk free tours for you and your family, in nature rich locations where contact with other people is limited to the minimum and the prevention measures are being taken to the highest levels.
  • We created a new segment on our tour business, where while we understand the social awareness of the population regarding causes in need and the simultaneous desire to enjoy life to the fullest, we organised combo Solidarity/Vacation trips for many different causes to find the closest to your heart, while being able to enjoy your vacations during the same period/trip. The goal is to allow you to have an active participation on charity while still living your dream vacations, increasing your personal satisfaction and decreasing your overall costs.

You can check our previously ready services at www.thewalkingparrot.com

 

 

What you will get

We are not begging for donation, we are giving you back more than the totality of your support on our services and more, so you can enjoy all these benefits from us for your support.

For every donation, you will get a voucher in the same amount plus 30%, you can use it in our services of your choice up to two years after your donation (this includes all other services that we already had available). You will also get extra exclusive perks that are described on the different levels of donation.

20% of your donation will go to a charity fighting the impacts of the COVID-19 crisis.

 

 

OUR NEW SOLIDARITY TOURISM PROJECT

The emergency we are facing now reminds us of what are the priorities in life, we understand that only with collaboration we can overcome such an obstacle and find solutions for this and other problems that the world faces.

Here each one of us can do their part by trying to help the less fortunate, who do not have the appropriate tools to deal with their situation.

You don't have to be a doctor or a scientist to make a difference, each of us can contribute to making other people's lives better, leaving a mark of ourselves, helping to make the world a better place.

We now created Travel/Trips/Tours to some of the poorest parts of the world, in safety, that combine the incredible experience of volunteering, helping people in need in many different ways, contributing to a child's smile and the development of his or her education, or contributing to eradication of a disease, the life conditions of a family (or several) among many other options, so that we can make the world a better place and motivating people to do the same, while on the same Trip, we organise your vacations, relaxing or exploring that region, getting the benefits of regular travel with the incomparable satisfaction of helping others!

Join the Solidarity Tourism project and let us take care of your traveling plans, where we will make sure that you have a rewarding experience helping others while also exploring the best that destination has to offer, in safety, without having to worry about the planning of it all.

Below you will find some of our different proposals for solidarity projects, so that you can start to get an idea and understand what the best experience for you may be. Our solidarity tours are divided into three categories, depending on the objective to be achieved and the type of help required in that location, as well as the one you identify with the most. We have solidarity tours focused on social field, education and conservation of flora and fauna. While you are volunteering, we will take care of the organisation of your trip, so you can concentrate on helping others, as well as enjoying your time in amazing places of the world, so don't worry, we will take care of everything for you! Remember that each tour will be customised according to your requests and we will do everything we can to meet your needs to build the tailor-made trip for you!

 

Panama, Panama City - Education and Social field

       
 

Where to volunteer? Operating in the Historic Centre of Panama City. The goal is to help local women with series of workshops focusing on life skills and career development, as well as after-school performing arts courses for children. More than 750 women have already been graduated from this project and most of them been hired in local businesses. Volunteers will participate in lessons as part of their program, which provides training and personal development for women at risk. Volunteers who are able to speak Spanish can also help with administrative work.


Where to stay? The Walking Parrot guarantees for every location a high-class accommodation. During your whole stay we will pay attention to your requirements and can offer a perfectly organized service at any time.

Where else to go? To connect your volunteer experience with unforgettable vacation, we offer a range of opportunities which provide our customers the best possible service and meet their specific wishes. Some of the available opportunities are listed below:

  • Visit of Panama City
  • Boots tour on the Panama Canal
  • Exploring the paradise islands San Blas or Bocas del Toro
  • Hiking in Darien, Coiba or Chargres national park

 

Brazil, Rio de Janeiro - Education field

 

Where to volunteer? You will volunteer where you will live the daily life of Favela. The main tasks concern the education of children, which has many shortcomings, in fact there are children who cannot read or write.

Where to stay? The Walking Parrot guarantees for every location a high-class accommodation. During your whole stay we will pay attention to your requirements and can offer a perfectly organized service at any time.

Where else to go?

  • Tour to the tribes of Brazil
  • Paradise beaches, Copacabana beach, and Ipanema beach
  • Visiting Christ the Redeemer and Possibility to see a football match at the Maracanã stadium for the most passionate fans.
  • Visit the amazing region of Angra dos Reis by boat
  • Sightseeing Amazon forest

 

 

Thailand, Kanchanaburi - Conservation of flora and fauna

 

Where to volunteer? You will help local staff and long-term volunteers take care of the elephants, including preparing food for the elephant and feed them. Food preparation can include sowing and harvesting food on local plantations, as well as making sticky rice balls and fruit baskets. Volunteers can also help take elephants to the river for a swim at the end of the day.

Where to stay? The Walking Parrot guarantees for every location a high-class accommodation. During your whole stay we will pay attention to your requirements and can offer a perfectly organized service at any time.

Where else to go?

  • River tours
  • Thailand Buhrmann railway
  • Trip to the Erawan-National Park
  • ½ day in Bangkok (flights to and from Bangkok) with Asian food experience and other activities.

 

 

Would you like to see more options? At the bottom of this page you will find links to some more of our Solidarity Tourism opportunities.

 

OUR NEW EXCLUSIVE TOURS

The safety of our customers is a priority for us, that is why we have prepared new tour packages where you can enjoy and relax in touristic places around Porto and Warsaw without worrying about high populated areas and their risks, while still visiting incredible places that these destinations have to offer.

Our new tour in Portugal, Porto:

 

Tired of the routine? Do you feel like pulling the plug? Come and discover the natural parks with us to live a 360° experience in contact with nature, to discover the beauty that this land has to offer. This tour consists of visiting the land of Douro's Valley wines, where you can taste and visit several vineyards, each with its own wine and then reach the characteristic village of Pinhão, the jewel of the region. Afterwards, you will be immersed in nature to admire the beauty that the parks have to offer: from Arouca, with its amazing wooden staircase, which will allow you to explore all the surrounding green valley. You will pass to Penada-Gerês national park that will enchant you with its landscapes and its breath-taking waterfalls, where you can enjoy a thermal bath to relax. Finally, you will reach Alvão national park, dedicated to the observation of animals, where you can admire the beauty of the landscapes and architecture of two small villages Lamas and Olo.

 

Our new tour in Poland, Warsaw:

 

Are you tired of crowded and noisy cities? Are you thirsty for history, culture and beautiful nature? Then check out our exclusive tour around Warsaw. Join us to see historically rich Spala and Inowladz. In the Inowladz you will see a magnificent 11th century Byzantine Church and 650 years old Inowladz castle. You will learn more about the historical site of these structures, while walking in the ancient castle.

The next destination is Nazi Bunker in Konewka. This place was used by Nazi Germany for ammunition depot and bunker for hiding their trains from bombardment. You will see different types of exhibits from WW2 such as artillery, cars, guns and accommodation of the Nazi soldiers' rooms.

On the way, we will stop on the Church of our Lady Queen of the Crown of Poland. This church is built in the Podhale style, of pine wood. Inside the temple stands a historic oak alter showing the conversion scene of Saint. Above the altar is the work of Ludwik Konarzewki depicting the crowning of the Mother of God with the Queen of Poland.

Then we will visit a small open-air museum Pilicia River Skansen and the famous natural reserve of Poland Blue Spring.

Our last destination will be Groty Nagorzyckie (Cave) where you will learn history and facts about it.  

 

 

Please check some more of our other solidarity tours below:

https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383127/oxl9ovu49025m9n0xi6v.png

https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383214/ki5gime9pfrdahyztjc6.png

https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383240/znkdolqsh5atr5pxphog.png

https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383867/pwlvbgtqh9j6cqhzf79r.png

https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383897/dcbfsqf9zct4hbbtdsgf.png

https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383940/uoiyngrqowa03fzcail3.png

https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383969/r4b9twm3lvaqfk4domg4.png

https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383995/gpzug1kx0redl3mpcqnw.png

Other Ways You Can Help

We realize not everyone can help financially, or perhaps you can but want to do more! Here are some suggestions:

  • Share this crowdfunding link with your friends and social media!
  • Spread the word about our company and services

Need an answer to your question that is not in our FAQ? Send us an email to: geral@thewalkingparrot.com or contact us by our website www.thewalkingparrot.com

Do you feel like pulling the plug? Come and discover the natural parks with us to live a 360° experience in contact with nature, to discover the beauty that this land has to offer. This tour consists of visiting the land of Douro's Valley wines, where you can taste and visit several vineyards, each with its own wine and then reach the characteristic village of Pinhão, the jewel of the region. Afterwards, you will be immersed in nature to admire the beauty that the parks have to offer: from Arouca, with its amazing wooden staircase, which will allow you to explore all the surrounding green valley. You will pass to Penada-Gerês national park that will enchant you with its landscapes and its breath-taking waterfalls, where you can enjoy a thermal bath to relax. Finally, you will reach Alvão national park, dedicated to the observation of animals, where you can admire the beauty of the landscapes and architecture of two small villages Lamas and Olo. Our new tour in Poland, Warsaw: Are you tired of crowded and noisy cities? Are you thirsty for history, culture and beautiful nature? Then check out our exclusive tour around Warsaw. Join us to see historically rich Spala and Inowladz. In the Inowladz you will see a magnificent 11th century Byzantine Church and 650 years old Inowladz castle. You will learn more about the historical site of these structures, while walking in the ancient castle.The next destination is Nazi Bunker in Konewka. This place was used by Nazi Germany for ammunition depot and bunker for hiding their trains from bombardment. You will see different types of exhibits from WW2 such as artillery, cars, guns and accommodation of the Nazi soldiers' rooms.On the way, we will stop on the Church of our Lady Queen of the Crown of Poland. This church is built in the Podhale style, of pine wood. Inside the temple stands a historic oak alter showing the conversion scene of Saint. Above the altar is the work of Ludwik Konarzewki depicting the crowning of the Mother of God with the Queen of Poland.Then we will visit a small open-air museum Pilicia River Skansen and the famous natural reserve of Poland Blue Spring.Our last destination will be Groty Nagorzyckie (Cave) where you will learn history and facts about it.    Please check some more of our other solidarity tours below:https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383127/oxl9ovu49025m9n0xi6v.pnghttps://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383214/ki5gime9pfrdahyztjc6.pnghttps://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383240/znkdolqsh5atr5pxphog.pnghttps://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383867/pwlvbgtqh9j6cqhzf79r.pnghttps://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383897/dcbfsqf9zct4hbbtdsgf.pnghttps://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383940/uoiyngrqowa03fzcail3.pnghttps://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383969/r4b9twm3lvaqfk4domg4.pnghttps://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1587383995/gpzug1kx0redl3mpcqnw.pngOther Ways You Can HelpWe realize not everyone can help financially, or perhaps you can but want to do more! Here are some suggestions:
Share this crowdfunding link with your friends and social media!
Spread the word about our company and services
Need an answer to your question that is not in our FAQ? Send us an email to: geral@thewalkingparrot.com or contact us by our website www.thewalkingparrot.com

story:
Meet the Coolio, the lightweight cooler for everyday adventurers.  

Nobody likes lugging a bulky cooler to the beach, on trips, or on the trail. We designed a versatile, slim, discreet cooler made from recycled materials so you can Make Everyday Count with frosty cold drinks, fresh food, and clean ice.

 

A Lighter, Simpler Cooler

For Better Everyday Adventures

 

Hi, I’m Audrey.

I’m a mother, surfer, lawyer, and entrepreneur.

After years of surf travel and spending nearly every single day at the beach, it all came down to a hot day in July as I crossed the US/Mexico border with a car seat on my head and a boxy, non-collapsible cooler weighing me down.

After that, I looked everywhere but I couldn't find a soft cooler that was lightweight, packable, but not made from cheap plastic or super ugly.

 

Why The Coolio? 

Last year, during COVID, life became all about micro-adventures.  My family and I couldn't travel to far-flung surf destinations, but we could enjoy our local beaches, parks, and hikes with a picnic and a cold beverage.  COVID taught me that I couldn't count my blessings, that's how the slogan "Make Everyday Count" came about.  The Coolio is exactly what you need to carry supplies on your everyday adventures and not miss a chance to celebrate, no matter what life throws your way.  

That's why I built the Coolio. 

 

Everything You Need, Nothing You Don't

In our experience, when it comes to coolers, less is definitely more.  Coolers with too many bells and whistles break easily, are rarely used, and when they do, they get trashed.  At Everyday Makai, we believe in simple design that works.  

Perfect for a Sunset Session

Holds 3 Bottles of Wine, 10 Cans + Snacks and Separate Ice 

 

3 Comfortable Ways to Carry

By reinforced handles, throw over your shoulder, sling cross-body

 

Leakproof, For Reals

Waterproof Exterior, Water-Tight Interior, Badass Zipper

 

Easy to Clean

Simply wipe down with a damp cloth

 

The Coolio is meant to go with you... Everywhere.  Life is too short, we don't want you to miss a thing because you don't have a snack or a drink. 

 

The Perfect Travel Companion

We got sick and tired of cooler-woes while traveling,  The choice between buying a cheap styrofoam or crappy plastic cooler when we arrived at our destination or lugging a bulky, non-collapsible soft cooler all over the world just plain sucked.

Because You Love Pockets...

 Easy organization to stash things away but not out of reach. Plus, a safe home for your clean ice for drinks or easily squished fruit.  

Get to Know the Coolio

Everyday Makai is committed to building quality minimalist products that last from sustainable materials because we don't want you to buy another product that ends up in the landfill.  

Tyvek® exterior is a unique non-woven material that lightweight, durable, and breathable, yet resistant to water, abrasion, bacterial penetration, and aging and is ultimately recyclable. 

All of our zippers are heavy-duty and meant to keep moisture in its place and nowhere else. 

Custom-designed non-corrosive aluminum bottle opener zipper pull so you never have to use a lighter again. 

Wear the Coolio cross-body for extra comfort and free hands.  Don't worry, the shoulder strap is padded and adjustable so you can save your strength for fun things like catching waves, climbing rocks, and pouring drinks. 

Traditional hard and soft coolers are made from toxic plastic materials that take 1,000s of years to decompose.

Additionally, most people do not carry a cooler on everyday adventures or while traveling because the cooler they have at home is bulky, non-collapsible, or heavy.

This results in further plastic waste as people are forced to purchase takeaway food wrapped in plastic.  Others buy cheap plastic or styrofoam coolers at their destination and throw them away when they leave.

The Coolio is not only made from recycled materials but it allows people to #BYOEverything, thus avoiding unnecessary plastic waste generated by poor quality coolers and resorting to take-away.

Made from Sustainable Materials to Facilitate Sustainable Choices 

Partnered with the Changing Tides Foundation to Empower Women to Protect the Planet

Everyday Makai is partnering with the Changing Tides Foundation and 1% for the Planet to make sure every Coolio sold gives back to the oceans and natural environment we love so much.  The Changing Tides Foundation's mission is to empower women to protect the planet through initiatives like the Plastic Swear Jar campaign aimed at curbing single-use plastics. 

Everyday Makai’s guiding principles:

  • Protecting our ocean and natural environment
  • Less wasteful living
  • Simple things that last
  • Healthy eating & bringing your own food
  • Responsible celebration
  • Making Everyday Count

story:
Is an antimicrobial toiletry bag REALLY worth it?

Well, you can’t put a price on healthy, glowy skin!!!

Not only that, but we've also sourced with sustainability and ethics in mind.

Our materials are high-quality, upcyclable/recyclable, and sustainably dyed to ensure that traveling in style doesn't compromise the environment.

And our amazing production partner with over 40 years of experience has shown us how they put people over profits when it comes to their health and safety during these times!

Besides, maintaining your skincare and beauty routine while you travel is difficult.

You make the decision to leave your things behind by telling yourself that your sister has great stuff you can use…

Or, maybe you’ve tried to “pack light” and only bring a few things, thinking that it would be less of a headache to deal with on vacation.

But, anything that’s not YOUR complete routine will break you out and your healthy, glowy skin is broken out, unhappy, and irritated...

And it can take MONTHS to recover after what was supposed to be your "relax and restoration" period . . .

Spring Green will be available when we meet our first stretch goal of $10K!

The On-the-Go Organizer is a MAJOR upgrade over most toiletry and cosmetics bags!

It organizes and can store even the most sizable, complicated skincare and beauty routine in a totally antimicrobial space that is chic and compact.

Whether you’re in Manhattan or Milan, you’ll have no excuses but to keep up with your regimen!

Because our mission is to make sure you feel beautiful inside and out no matter where you are in the world.

And you know, our skincare and beauty products need to travel with us more than we realize!

We're always on the move, not just when we're on vacation — so, we've sourced the best materials to ensure On-the-Go will stand up to the amazing adventures you'll go on.

As Seen In . . . (Download our Press Kit HERE)

Become an affiliate during our campaign:

What others are saying about On-the-Go:

This is the SAME bag holding ALL this stuff.

Keep everything inside and accessible.

Clear pockets are perfect for smaller items (also antimicrobial)

Traditional hanging toiletry bags are just focused on being containers of stuff.

On top of being made of absorbent and difficult to clean (and keep clean) fabrics, there’s no organization or segmentation of your shower products, morning makeup, or night routine.

And I hated the idea of having to sprawl out all my stuff across the bathroom counter or shower of a hotel!

Truth be told, I’m a bit of a germaphobe...

So, all I can think about is how your stuff harbors all those germs and bacteria, which make their way onto your hands and face and eventually onto your clothes...

And if you’re staying at a hotel, then you know that the cleaning staff typically has 30 minutes to clean your entire suite due to daily quotas.

There's no way that they can do a thorough clean!

The market was missing an antimicrobial toiletry bag that you could use WITHOUT taking everything out while still being able to find what you need easily!

So, I got to work on my dream beauty travel case that would address all my concerns as a skincare and beauty lover!

That's me, Diane! (Learn a little more about me here)

I’m Diane Chang, the founder and Creative Director of Akushio, a sustainable specialty brand for skincare and beauty lovers, and I’ve struggled with acne since I was eleven years old.

In my quest for clear skin, I became more and more interested in skincare and makeup as tools for self-care and creativity — not something I had to do for validation of my self-worth.

As I came out of my shell, I found a love for traveling! But, packing was always something I struggled with, especially in the toiletries and cosmetics department.

Not only is the size of my collection daunting and overwhelming to sort through, but I’m also not the most organized!

And if you’ve tried to use your skincare savvy friend’s stuff or cut things out of your own routine like myself, then you understand the frustration of breaking out while you’re supposed to be enjoying your time off...

So, I started designing what would be the perfect solution to a major beauty girl's sensitive skin and her disgust for germs and bacteria in the dirtiest room of any hotel: the bathroom.

The very first concept sketch!

Official concept sketch:

1. Grab On-the-Go to have one of the two compartments facing you.

2. Open said compartment (easy enough yet?)

We recommend filling the mesh pockets first with smaller items that don't stand up on their own (psst... the mesh pockets on the side are perfect for droppers).

3. Fill the center with all your must-haves!

4. Place smaller items, like your toothbrush, tweezers, or even cosmetics in the clear pockets.

Easy to clean and see where all your things are!

Easily accessible when the On-the-Go Organizer is fully open.

Or half way closed — making it super easy to place on top of the bathroom counter!

Zipper at the top means you don't have to fidget around for your stuff!

Whether you keep On-the-Go fully open or closed, you have access to everything.

TIP: Have something that requires you to take the cap off, but not sure where to put it?

Mesh pocket over the clear one is a CAP HOLDER. Never place a thing on the gross bathroom counter!

You have the mesh cap pocket to hold it on the bathroom counter or hanging in the shower!

It's also treated with SILVADUR™ and GreenShield® Stain Protection, so it's just as easy to clean and keep clean — thanks to the antimicrobial and water-and-oil resistant properties.

See how easy it is to grab what you need?

Forgot something in the clear pockets, but don't want to open everything back up? Fret not! Your items are still accessible even when the bag is fully closed.

5. When you're headed into the shower, pull out the hanging hook in the hidden compartment!

Final product will have a swivel brass hanger!

Slip pocket is perfect to stow away discretely!

 

Manufactured in Japan by a US and UK-based company, this polyurethane (PU) leather is infused with silver-ion technology that makes maintenance low and hassle-free!

Water-resistant and durable, this PU leather won't crack or wear down like real leather.

And what's great is that the manufacturing process does not include PVC and plasticizers, reuses the silver-ions and water (a huge issue in the fashion industry), and is certified by SCS Global Services for Air Quality.

You won't have to worry about the bacteria and germs from your hotel bathroom since it is easy to wipe clean of stains and not worry about bacteria and germs making their way to you — compare all of those requirements to the porous and absorbent materials of other toiletry bags!

Luxuriously soft, yet incredibly resilient against tough stains.

Simply wipe clean with alcohol!

Not only does this off-gold color look so chic against our Navy Blue and Spring Green faux leather, but it's also naturally antimicrobial thanks to the copper, which also makes it one of the easier metal alloys to maintain against water stains!

NOTE: Final Product will have a swiveling brass hanger!!

These treatments make taking care of your On-the-Go Organizer easy, effective, and hassle-free!

SILVADUR™ maintains the freshness of the recycled polyester and nylon fabrics. Silver ions are meant to disrupt the replication process of bacteria and germs, so you never have to worry about unwanted things growing where they shouldn't be!

And best of all, the application process recycles and reuses all materials, saving both water and energy :)

GreenShield® Stain Protection is a low fluorocarbon nanoparticle-based water and stain repellent finish, inspired by a plant leaf and how it allows water and oil droplets to roll right off.

Using up to ten times less fluorocarbons and a third of the chemicals, this finish is the preferred moisture and stain-resistant finish amongst the natural, eco-friendly community!

Look at the suspended water droplets! This works on oils and helps stains come right out.

In order to maintain On-the-Go’s chic and luxury aesthetic, we wanted to keep the interior monochromatic. But, because we wanted to utilize recycled materials without harsh chemical dyes, we had to seek out different methods and suppliers in order to deliver the perfect product…

And we did it!

Navy Blue will be paired with Beige. Spring Green will be paired with Silver.

On-the-Go’s lining is made of recycled polyester, is easy to clean and remove stains, and dyed via a waterless, heat-based coloring process by a leading fabric printing company in Los Angeles’ fashion district.

This allowed us to better control the tone and saturation while still being environmentally-conscious!

The mesh fabric is made of recycled nylon and dyed with all-natural ingredients by an artisanal master in New York City.

We were able to successfully get lavish and rich colors in ecru and silver that were even in tone!

No need to worry about germs and bacteria growing from the water of your showers!

The perfect place for your toothbrush because the pockets are easy to clean and won't allow bacteria and germs to breed!

Why Indiegogo?

The tricky thing is the innovative design with sustainable materials utilizing cutting-edge technology, which makes our toiletry bag so special, is what also makes the initial production costs high.

With your pledge, you can support us and our mission to help you get On-the-Go ready while keeping production and manufacturing domestic to the United States.

This will allow the most control over our products as a company to ensure we bring you the best!

After all, a well-designed, high quality product will last longer and yield greater use per dollar spent.

We will use the funds to grow our business to offer more colors and new products, so we won’t be able to keep these offers available forever!

Let's stop packing, unpacking, and repacking when it comes to your beauty routine and just zip up and go.

Thank you so much for your support. We really couldn't be here without YOU!

What will you keep On-the-Go ready? Get yours today!

Spring Green will be paired with Silver.On-the-Go’s lining is made of recycled polyester, is easy to clean and remove stains, and dyed via a waterless, heat-based coloring process by a leading fabric printing company in Los Angeles’ fashion district.This allowed us to better control the tone and saturation while still being environmentally-conscious!The mesh fabric is made of recycled nylon and dyed with all-natural ingredients by an artisanal master in New York City.We were able to successfully get lavish and rich colors in ecru and silver that were even in tone!No need to worry about germs and bacteria growing from the water of your showers!The perfect place for your toothbrush because the pockets are easy to clean and won't allow bacteria and germs to breed!Why Indiegogo?The tricky thing is the innovative design with sustainable materials utilizing cutting-edge technology, which makes our toiletry bag so special, is what also makes the initial production costs high.With your pledge, you can support us and our mission to help you get On-the-Go ready while keeping production and manufacturing domestic to the United States.This will allow the most control over our products as a company to ensure we bring you the best!After all, a well-designed, high quality product will last longer and yield greater use per dollar spent.We will use the funds to grow our business to offer more colors and new products, so we won’t be able to keep these offers available forever!Let's stop packing, unpacking, and repacking when it comes to your beauty routine and just zip up and go.Thank you so much for your support. We really couldn't be here without YOU!What will you keep On-the-Go ready? Get yours today!

story:
What is Trailblazer Survival Kit?

Trailblazer Survival Kit is your best friend in any kind of emergency situation...being stranded in the wild, lost in the forest or being a witness of a natural or man-made disaster (flood, earthquake, fire,...). In these situations you must rely only on your own skills and possessions you currently have with you. With Trailblazer Survival Kit, your odds of being safe and sound are much higher. You will have tools & gadgets that will help you stay warm, build shelter, find & hunt small animals & fish, purify water and protect yourself from the elements. Even a GPS tracker is a part of the package so your friends and loved ones can keep track of your whereabouts. This is a survival kit that any nature lover, hiker, camper or outdoorsman should have by his side. And, on top of it all, it is all packed in a high-quality waterproof backpack that you`ll know is always ready for whatever adventure lies in front of you.

How to get one?

It is simple, just become a backer of this project. Click on the perk that you want and wait for the Survival Kit to come to your adress (estimated in April  2017.). There are 2 editions of the Trailblazer Survival Kit. One is a basic version (Hiker Edition) with 20 most essential survival tools & gadgets and the other one is a full edition (Survivor Edition). You can compare the contents in the picture below.

Product versions

Help us spread the word

We`d like to ask you to spread the word and help us to reach our goal. The funding that you provide will help us with the production costs . Share it...It`s easy, just click on one of the links below.

Trailblazer Survival Kit in detail

The contents of the Trailblazer Survival Kit in detail...here we go:

 

Word from the Trailblazer Survival Kit designer

My name is Damir Zupanovic and I am a passionate angler and nature lover. During my fishing trips I often have to conquer uninhabited and sometimes harsh environment, especially during the winter fishing season. You can never predict what can happen in the wilds, and, after a few "incidents" I decided to make my weekend fishing trips safer and the idea of Trailblazer Survival Kit was born. It is funny how we sometimes don`t think about our own safety until one day we find ourselves in a life-threatening situation! After the research and after getting advice from survival experts, the contents of the survival kit was completed. I also want to make this kit available to everyone because I cannot emphasize enough the importance of being safe, warm, with shelter over your head and with food & water supply when you are stranded deep, alone in the unknown territory, with only your personal belongings, skills and luck by your side. Trailblazer Survival Kit turns the odds in your favor in these situations and really becomes your best friend in emergency situations. It is also a kit you can keep and store in your home, knowing you`ll be ready if any disaster strikes.

Stay safe, wherever your path may lead you!

 

 

FAQ:

1. Does Trailblazer Survival Kit has all that I really need?
Trailblazer Survival Kit contains tools & gadgets essential for your survival. It does not contain bottled water, canned food, energy bars, warm clothes, underwear and things like that. You should add those things to the backpack yourself.

2. Is it all too heavy to carry on your back?
When you look at the list of stuff you get with the Trailblazer Survival Kit, it is easy to imagine you need a pack mule to carry it for you. But, in fact, all the tools and gadgets were carefully selected and the weight of each tool was extremely important so that the whole kit is easy to carry on your back. Hiker Edition weighs only 2.5 kg (88 oz) and the Survivor Edition weighs 5.1 kg (180 oz). The backpack itself weighs only 600-700 grams (approx. 24 oz). So, you don`t need to be afraid that it will be heavy or that it will slow you down - it is easy enough for anyone to carry.

3. Is the backpack too big for a girl?
No, the backpack is the ideal size for men and women. It is the perfect size and, more important, perfect width. We strongly encourage not to put stuff on the outside of the backpack that will make the backpack wider. When you face the narrow corridor, any thing you have on your backpack that is wider than your body will present an obstacle and it could be harder for you to get through.

4. How can I charge my phone or other gadget while I`m in the wilds?
Yes, you can use our handcrank / solar radio/flashlight/charger to charge your phone, waterproof LED headlamp, GPS tracker or any other device that operates on 5V or uses micro USB connection.

5. How does the Life Straw Water Purifier work?
Life Straw has a 2-stage filtration process. The activated carbon filter removes some chemicals like chlorine and the hollowfiber micro filter removes 99.9999% of bacteria and 99.9% of protozoa. It also reduces turbidity, filtering down to 0.2 microns. The activated carbon filter removes some chemicals (like chlorine) and some pesticides and fertilizers.

6. How can I start the fire with Fresnel Lens?
Move the fresnel lens closer and farther from what you’re trying to light (dry leaves, tinder,...) until the focused light spot is smallest. Then flex the sheet to make the light spot as small as you can get it. The smaller the focused light is, the higher the density of light there is, so the hotter it will get. You’d want to have your kindling and the rest of your wood close by so it could catch before the leaves go out. In some cases, you’ll want to move the light around a bit to catch more of the leaves on fire, especially if you have clouds coming.

If you have more questions, please ask, we will be more than happy to answer them :)
