story:
Hover Mini UAV is The World's First Smallest Barometric Altimeter Drone, the 14g super mini drone for everyone.

Hover Mini UAV is an Mini UAV which can specify the height to hover with atmospheric pressure sensor and other sensors, it is a young man's toy of high-end technology.

 It is a Mini UAV with rich texture and rich features.



For beautiful appearance and increase the body strength of the mini UAV, we used carbon fiber texture to cover the body, thus hover Mini UAV obtained a better performance and texture.

 Hover Mini UAV is really small and precision, we use a large number of lightweight ABS materials and carbon fiber texture coated materials and precision mini electronic components to kake its weight only 14 grams.

It has high precision pressure sensor, acceleration sensor and advanced intelligent artificial algorithm, you only need to press the “take off” key, Hover Mini UAV can automatically record and detect the altitude of the UAV when taking off, and automatically take off to a certain height of the semi air to stay suspended for you to control it, let every customer can get started very quickly.


According to our pre implantation procedures and algorithms of the Hover Mini UAV, it has function of three shifts for speed adjustment, it is divided into novice mode, master mode and PK mode.

We send the anticollision ring can effectively prevent the damage of unmanned aerial vehicle (uav)



You can use it to transport an engagement ring to your beloved woman. You can also use it to transport other things.

If you are a tech geek,We also provide wireless charging module within it.You can modify the UAV yourself,To make it with wireless charging function.


Our partnered manufacturer which is ISO 9001 certified has over 12 years' experience in the related field. With advanced SMT machine shop, well-organized assembly room and experienced operators, the manufacturer has already built 120 units of Orbits for trial production.
How We Make Mini Hover UAV?



Share our Campagin to get extra  4 x propellers for free!!!

Just share this page by click the "share bottom" beside the video and post comments with your shared link, you will get extra 4 x propellers for free!



Hover Mini UAV was established in early 2014, we are a team love technology, focusing on product experience and advocating flying dream. We want to make every consumer enjoy the benefits of the latest scientific and technological achievements. We believe that you will definitely love a MAV of your own deeply. We have made some achievements in the field of MAV, with the number of R & D team has been constantly growing to fifty at present, just for providing consumers with products of more excellent performance.

CEO:XIANGYANG LI

LI heads the team forward, with a keen business sense and mature thinking. Several products developed under his guidance sell good, bringing us the latest scientific and technological achievements to serve us all.  

CTO:CHENG LIU

LIU has amazing technical capabilities and many years of experience in product development has become his powerful technical background. He has obtained a total of 37 patents, and he is the technical director of the project.

COO:RONGSHENG HE

HE has many years of experience in product marketing, and he is the main person responsible for our sales team. He graduated from the Department of Finance, Beijing Technology and Business University, a former executive of Chinese insurance company.

CMO:CHUNTAO CUI

CUI's vision and inspiration on the product lead us to achieve excellent results in the competition in the industry. He has unique vision on the product positioning and functional requirements. He is a former well-known editor in chief of a science and technology website.

Chief Mechanical Architect:YEKANG CHEN

CHEN has many years of experience in the design of industrial products, graduated from the industrial design specialty of Beijing Institute of Technology. The products he designed and went into operation were amounted to more than one hundred, and he has a unique product design philosophy. His design won the Red Dot Award and design awards of other renowned industries.

Chief Industrial Designer:GUOHAO MENG

MENG worked in a state-owned mechanical design and research institute for many years, and has many experience on the basic mechanical design. The mechanical products he designed won many mechanical design awards, and the products put into production were countless and entered millions of households.

Risks and challenges

Our team have researched and developed Mini UAV( Mini Unmanned Aerial Vehicle) for many years with multiple mass production for Mini UAV. Previously, we met problem that the suppliers of components and parts could not deliver the goods on time during the process of producing others model of Mini UAV. Therefore, it lead to delays in the production of Mini UAV. After all these yeas’ screening, we have settled many superior suppliers providing components and parts and taking the charge of production. To a large extent , we can ensure the production schedule and timely shipment .

story:
DRAGONFLY BIKEPACKING SYSTEM

 

Large Saddlebag (22 liters | 500g)

Huge saddlebag with about 22 liters capacity. It can be enlarged by unfolding the top lid to store there a sleeping mat, tent poles etc.

 

 

Fixing options: on top - saddle loops (e.g. Brooks) or Dragonfly QR Adapter. The bag can be also attached to the seatpost (using a seatpost strap) or to the traditional rack (using a bottom strap with a buckle).

 

 

Made of durable fabrics: Cordura 500D PU coated and waterproof Nylon Rip-Stop. Glued seams for best waterproofness!

 

 

 

Medium Saddlebag (12 liters | 300g)

Smaller, ultralight saddlebag with capacity of about 12 liters. Fixing options: on top - saddle loops (e.g. Brooks). The bottom of it can be attached to the seatpost. No need for any additional support.

Weight: 300 g (10.5 oz).
 

 

 

A pair of QR Cargo Cages (7 liters | 200 g each)

Front fork cage for lightweight but bulky luggage. Quick Release mounting system makes it easily transferable between bikes.  The 7 liters waterproof bags are included, they are available in 6 colours. You can choose black or gray straps.

 

With a proper adapter cargo cage can be used both with a suspension front fork or with an eyeleted front fork (standard bottle cage 68-70 mm pattern).

 

The adapter for a suspension fork is attached using two adjustable stainlees steel clamps. The other adapter for eyeleted fork should be attached with two bolts. One can use a single bolt and cable ties in bicycles used for road cycling only.

 

Additional Accesories

 

  • Quick Release Saddle Rails Adapter

 

 

Dragonfly Quick Release Saddle Rails Adapter solves the problem of attaching the bags to saddles without loops. It allows to attach a saddlebag to nearly every railed saddle. The rod can be easily detached without unbuckling the saddlebag and then it can be used as a handle.

 

  • Inner Pocket

 

 

Small inner pocket for a phone or a wallet with YKK zipper enclosing, fixed inside the bag. Made of Waterproof Nylon Rip-Stop.

 

  • Shoulder strap for Dragonfly Saddlebags

 

 

Shoulder strap which can be easily attached to rings on the sides of Dragonfly Saddlebags.

Red for red bags and black for other colours.

Available Colours

 

You can choose both Large Saddlebag and Medium Saddlebag in one of four colour schemes

 

You can get the pair of Cargo Cages with waterproof bags in one of five colours and choose either gray (upper row) or black (bottom row) straps. 

Colours may vary due to light conditions, monitor differences and supplied fabrics. Some changes such as adding logo and minor upgrades are possible. 

 

When will I get my bags??

 

If you contribute first, you will get your perk first!

 

More at www.dragonfly-gear.com​

story:
What is SOLO? 

The World's most convenient Solar Powered Charging Solution for travel and on the go. 

Problem?

Even with today’s technology, the battery on our mobile devices doesn’t last more than a few hours. And since we’re always on the go, it’s hard to find a quick and portable charging solution.

Solution!

SOLO is an innovative solar charging solution for any mobile device. With SOLO, you never have to worry about running out of battery because where there is light, SOLO will be there to provide the charge! With SOLO's small and portable size, you can use SOLO anywhere!

Easily sticks on glass surfaces:

Place it anywhere where there is sunlight, and let your SOLO charge your device!

 

Completely Portable!

Where can I use it?

Solo is perfect for anyone on go. As long as there is sunlight, you will always have a charge with SOLO.

 

Compatibility 

Solo uses a usb outlet to charge pretty much any mobile device. 

SOLO can be charged up in two ways:

Charge SOLO using natural sunlight.

Or charge solo using a regular wall outlet.

Charging Capabilities:

  • SOLO can charge your device up to two full times on a single charge
  • SOLO can be fully charged in 8-10 hours using sunlight
  • SOLO can be fully charged in 3-4 hours using the provided micro usb cable

Specifications:

  • Size: 4.6 in X 4.6 in .7 in
  • Weight: 250 grams
  • Output: 5V 1A
  • Input: Micro USB 5V/1A
  • Socket Type: Micro USB
  • Battery Type: Lithium Polymer Battery
  • Certification: CE ROHS FCC
  • Material: Environment friendly ABS
  • Battery Capacity: 5200mah

How do I use Solo?

About Me:

My name is Dmitriy and I love bringing products to the market that help solve solutions. I work in a variety of different industries that I am passionate in. 

  • My background is in software testing, product manufacturing, and brand building. 
  • I decided to bring this campaign to indiegogo because I am always working on the go and I need to charge my mobile devices multiple times per day. The SOLO charger has been absolutely a life-saver for keeping my devices charged on a daily basis. I see a huge need for this awesome product and I am excited to bring it to indiegogo. 
  • Your pledge will help towards mass producing and manufacturing this product. I will use the funding to further drive this brand and introduce many more problem solving products to the market. Thank you for all of your help!

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need to receive enough funding in order to mass produce SOLO. Our manufacturers and shipping facilities are in place. As soon as we receive the funding, production will begin. Thank you so much for your support!

 

Risks & Challenges

The product is ready for mass production. There are always small risks in timely delivery, but I've worked on multiple successful crowdfunding campaigns and we always make sure our customers are satisfied. We have shipping facilities in place and ready to deliver your products shortly after the campaign. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love our product, please share our link with your friends and family. We appreciate all of your support!

International Backers

If you're buying this product outside the U.S, please be aware of extra import taxes that may be added by your country customs. We do not include any of these taxes in the price you pay on indiegogo. All countries are different in terms of charging customs costs.

Weight: 250 grams

Output: 5V 1A

Input: Micro USB 5V/1A

Socket Type: Micro USB

Battery Type: Lithium Polymer Battery

Certification: CE ROHS FCC

Material: Environment friendly ABS

Battery Capacity: 5200mah


How do I use Solo?




About Me:
My name is Dmitriy and I love bringing products to the market that help solve solutions. I work in a variety of different industries that I am passionate in. 

My background is in software testing, product manufacturing, and brand building. 
I decided to bring this campaign to indiegogo because I am always working on the go and I need to charge my mobile devices multiple times per day. The SOLO charger has been absolutely a life-saver for keeping my devices charged on a daily basis. I see a huge need for this awesome product and I am excited to bring it to indiegogo. 
Your pledge will help towards mass producing and manufacturing this product. I will use the funding to further drive this brand and introduce many more problem solving products to the market. Thank you for all of your help!


What We Need & What You Get
We need to receive enough funding in order to mass produce SOLO. Our manufacturers and shipping facilities are in place. As soon as we receive the funding, production will begin. Thank you so much for your support!
 
Risks & Challenges
The product is ready for mass production. There are always small risks in timely delivery, but I've worked on multiple successful crowdfunding campaigns and we always make sure our customers are satisfied. We have shipping facilities in place and ready to deliver your products shortly after the campaign. 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you love our product, please share our link with your friends and family. We appreciate all of your support!
International Backers
If you're buying this product outside the U.S, please be aware of extra import taxes that may be added by your country customs. We do not include any of these taxes in the price you pay on indiegogo. All countries are different in terms of charging customs costs.

story:
Note:    If some one claim more than 1 perks, only one shipping fee will be charged, all other shipping fee will be refunded after review.

 

                                                      ONE PUSH TO PACK UP
                                                   PALM SIZED PORTABILITY

                               It’s the perfect sturdy, comfortable, portable Umbrella

 

HAVE THE BEST UMBRELLA IN JUST

2 SECONDS

 

  • [UPF50 SUN PROTECTION] - Canopy with a new black layer inner coating which filters out almost 99% direct UV and reflect it away. The black inner lining works best than any other colors in absorbing indirect UV rather than concentrating it onto your head and face. This umbrella will keep the heat out even when standing in the sun.
  • [BUILT STRONG TO FIGHT THE WIND] - The latest high-tech components and materials to create a professional grade umbrella that is styled for men and women and is built to last. An upgraded 8 rib, retractable wind-tech frame system combines strength and flexibility to deliver superior wind resistance in a lightweight, highly portable design.
  • [QUALITY WORKMANSHIP] - Designed with a black metal shaft, and strong metal frame to allow for greater stability in high winds. The ergonomic, slip-proof, and rubberized grip handle with wrist strap allow for easy carrying. A protective travel sleeve is included. Perfect for men, women, teens and kids.
  • [PERFECT TRAVEL SIZE] - folding telescopic shaft is collapsible to a small 7" in length yet opens to form a large 37" canopy. Also comes with a travel sleeve to keep your bag dry. Small and tiny enough to fit in your purse, backpack, luggage, car, briefcase and more. mini, portable and foldable design is perfect for men, women, teens, and kids.
  • [100% GUARANTE] – Smith Tech is committed to providing all people with high-quality safety retractable golf umbrella.

Easiest set up. Comfort and convenience when out and about. From Sunshade to rain shade, now you can always have a sturdy Umbrella when you need it.

 

 

                                                        STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED!

 

A PALMY UMBRELLA with a STEAMER LID will ship with each UMBRELLA pre-ordered! 

 

 

MADE TO TAKE AND STORE ANYWHERE

Lightweight and packs ultra-small. Bring 1 in a bag or carry one easily on your own pocket.  No excuses to forget the Umbrella.

LASTS FOR A LIFETIME OF ADVENTURES

Designed by an expert engineering team and built in the Hi-tech facility using premium materials, PALMY UMBRELLA is your comfort companion for life. Its patented design has been tested extensively to deliver great performance in all conditions.

 

DESIGNED WITH YOUR COMFORT IN MIND

The perfect low profile, lightweight umbrella for travelling, the beach, outdoor concerts, sporting events and much more.

 

MAKE A STATEMENT WITH COLOR

Available in 7 bold shades, with either black or sheer mesh, stand out from the crowd with color. 

 

 

Choose the color combination of each GO UMBRELLA after the campaign ends when we send out the survey. 

SELECT THE GO UMBRELLAPACK
THAT’S BEST FOR YOU

 

IT PAYS TO SHARE!
 

Click to earn cash rewards for pledges from your very own referral link.

 

GO UMBRELLA IN PRODUCTION

We've set up industry, tooling completed and supplies inventory all on hand at our  facility, where man power is cheaper there.

 

SHIPPING

We are able to ship to the U.S, Canada, Mexico, UK, European Union, Australia, China, Singapore, Japan and others. VAT and GST charges are not included. 

We plan to ship the product in February 2019*. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

Our Palmy Umbrella are already incredibly affordable. By buying now, you're getting access to even LARGER discounts that we'll never offer like this again. You're also helping us build a company with a vision to change the way we all think about portable palm size Umbrella and make these your go to for a lifetime of adventures.


SHARE #PALMY UMBRELLA WITH FRIENDS

Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this! We can't do this without you.

 

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

PRODUCT

What is PALMY UMBRELLA? //Who created it? //What colors do you offer? //Where is it manufactured? //How much does it weigh? //

SET UP & MAINTENANCE

How do I set it up? //What is the care and cleaning of it? //

SAFETY & REGULATION

What are the recommend ages? //Where can I use it? //How durable and secure is it? //

CUSTOMER SERVICE

Is there a warranty? //Do you ship worldwide? //What is your return / exchange policy? //Why do I have to wait longer than usual? //If I have other questions, who should I contact? //

 

Looking for more information or have a question?  Contact Us by email.

story:
Now explore the world with Flyzzo Holidays, 

Flyzzo is providing cheapest holiday packages, we are not trying to compete with any company but we want to emerge as the helper, as a community, as a company, as a consultant, so that we can help people who want to explore and roam around the world, it is  always hard to find a Holiday destination or a place where you want to go, once you have decided to go on a trip then you might be struggling with the tour operator who might charge you almost double of the cost of the actual price,

Now you can customize a holiday and pay in installments, price are too cheaper than any other service provider.

Like Omg this is amazing Italy


Germany is all set to see you at its soil, the moment you enter to this awesome place you will feel like you are floating on water and never want to look back.


Norway is a Scandinavian country encompassing mountains, glaciers and deep coastal fjords. Oslo, the capital, is a city of green spaces and museums, including the Edvard Munch Museum and the Norsk Folkemuseum, a collection of open-air historic buildings. You will enjoy the place and people too.


DDubai is a city in the United Arab Emirates known for luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture and a lively nightlife scene. Burj Khalifa, an 830m-tall tower, dominates the skyscraper-filled skyline. At its foot lies Dubai Fountain, with jets and lights choreographed to music. On man-made islands just offshore is Atlantis, the Palm, a resort with water and marine-animal parks. (C WIK)


The Maldives is a tropical nation in the Indian Ocean composed of 26 coral atolls, which are made up of hundreds of islands. It’s known for its beaches, blue lagoons and extensive reefs. The capital, Malé, has a busy fish market, restaurants and shops on Majeedhee Magu and 17th-century Hukuru Miskiy (also known as Old Friday Mosque) made of coral stone. (C WIK)


Finland is a Northern European nation that is covering mountains and ethos, now its your turn to go to Finland with Flyzzo, if you are not looking at the price then can we go ahead :) Of course we are taking you to this place.



We need your support to make people love these place after seeing them, so that they can feel what we are blessed with, every single penny anyone donate us will be entitled a gift,  we are trying to make it possible to take everyone to the most go places in the world.


The deals we are providing no one else can provide as we have the best deals in the market and we are also raising funds to promote our company as one of the greatest travel company in the world, for that we are creating feature deals for you, so that we can attract you for fund raising and we can deliver what we have committed :)


If we talk about Norway or Finland, India or Maldives, then we are talking about peace, relax, and rest, you are going to feel that you were born to come to these places and capture these moments in your memory.


Flyzzo Holidays is being created to redefine the leisure trips from the scratch, we help people going to the new destinations and book holidays for later payments options, they can pay in few months, along with the new cheapest holiday booking platform, as of now we have proof of concept and we are going great, people are talking about us offline, but when it comes online people need more trust to find it suitable for their fits.

If we talk about perks then it should be all about perks nothing else, so here we are rewarding our backers with the greatest perks ever.


Dubai Trip, This trip will be awarded to 10 luckiest people, who want to be a part of our flyzzo family. there will be no hidden charges and $2000 can be availed as full worth once you desire to explore Dubai (Given time period mentioned in the perks details).

You are gonna wear awesome T-shirts along with surprised gifts, worth $20 - $50.
T-shirts fabric is awesome and if you wish we can deliver a t-shirt without our logo and printing. (300 backers are going to wear this, details in perks section).

This awesome travel bag with branding of Flyzzo will be given to our 70 backers, you can get the perk before the expected date.


This kit will be awarded to our 100 backers, whom we love as much as we love other backers. Well! our suggestion is, just grab the perk :) this will come with Flyzzo logo, that will be an awesome feeling to see the company growing you just backed.

Going to Thailand? well we are there too, we would love to make a cheapest and special package for you and would also give you extra discount on $250, this is not all, if you wish we will also pay the same amount if you could find a cheaper package than our.

India is a place with all weather on earth, at a same time you can see raining, and snow, when it comes to desert you can explore that too, well not more but we can bring smile on 50 faces by rewarding them a trip to India with a discount of $1000, if you can find a cheaper package than ours then we would love by that package for you by paying them $1000 and rest will be paid by you :)

Maldives beaches are the beauty on earth, who does not want to admire the beaches of Maldives ? well we are pledged to reward you $1500 discount or a full package, there will be no hidden charges in the package, and you know what is the best thing? we would pay your $1500 bill if you could find a package cheaper than ours :) so this is so nice and adorable, isnt it :)

 Q. 1. When can i avail these perks rewards?
A. We have give a time period after which we will notify you about your eligibility for the perk so that you can be ready to avail these perks :)
Q.2. How many perks can i claim at a time?
A. Only one perk can be claimed by one backer?
Q.3. Are these perks transferable ?
A. commercial use of these is strictly prohibited, and these are not transferable perks?
Q.4. When will your project be complete?
A. As soon as we get your support we will finish our work on the project and we thank you for that in advance :)
Q.5. Will you also provide discounting services apart from these perks to your backers and supporters?
A. Yes we respect the people who support us and back us, we would give them special privilege account :) 
Q.6. What are the inclusions and exclusions in the perks and packages?A. We will send you emails and let you know about this as we have shown our perks for a little bit late periods because we do not want to be missed on the commitment, So don`t worry we would not let your shoulders be heavy. :) 

Well! we welcome you on flyzzo, and want to thank you for your support and your interest you have shown in us, let us do something for you, now we want to say that we love you all, yeah all of you who have supported us and who have admired us for this better product.

story:
About

My name is Ervin and I'm a freelance journalist and editor from Pécs, Hungary. I created the Pécs City Guide project two years ago to connect international students and the city. The initial goal was to give information about new venues, events and stories and just everything about Pécs. To give useful information that used to be available only in Hungarian.

I've started a crowdfunding campaign that failed but with the help of a publisher we could start a free print magazine. I used to be the editor, photographer and designer. I hope a lot of you already knew about Pécs City Guide magazine. I loved making it, thanks to the great feedback I got.

Publishing was fun and I hope you liked all the fifteen issues. If you missed them you can check out all of them on the website.  

But I had to quit and if you want to learn more about the background of my decision there is a short statement on the Facebook page of Pécs City Guide.

What's next?

I've started this crowdfunding campaign to keep the project alive. To continue the work I've started in 2014.

Collecting enough money will allow to have new post almost every day and I plan to make a monthly digital magazine with exclusive content. More stories, better design available on all platforms. If the campaign can reach it's goal then the expenses of publishing new articles for one year and 8 digital magazines would be covered.

But I really need your help now. If you agree with my goals and think that Pécs - and actually you - do need a website in English about the city then please support this project.

The project will kept alive only if we reach the goal of this campaign.

How to help?

You can help me in two ways:

  • First: By donating some money. As little as the price of a beer or a cup of coffee could help succeeding.
  • Second: Sharing is caring, so please share this project on Facebook or email with your friends.

If you have questions or ideas about the project please feel free to contact me anytime.

Thanks,

Ervin

story:
My wife, kids and I love road trips, and we’ve tackled routes all over the southwest, midwest and northeast.

So this is a blog post idea I love and have personally searched for (and written about) over the years.

This is also a great blog post category because of the number of variations you can include in your itineraries.

A road trip with kids in the southwest, for example, looks a lot different than an romantic outdoorsy road trip in the Pacific Northwest.

You can also throw in all sorts of helpful content, including where to stay, what to eat and the best times to plan your road trip.

  3. Weekend trips  

Living in Phoenix, we’re also big on weekend trips – anywhere to get out of the heat during the summer.

Weekend trip posts are great because you can string together a few places together, or focus on one city or destination.

Example: The best weekend getaways from NYC

  4. Scenic drives  

Like road trips, scenic drives are a great topic because of the endless variation and customization you can add to your content.

Just about every region or state gets searches related to scenic drives, so this is an easy one to cover wherever you live or travel.

Example: Famous Roads for Great Drives in California

  5. Train rides   

Train rides have a romantic throwback vibe that make them a timeless classic in the world of travel blogging.

You can review a specific route, or curate a list of the best train rides in a region.

Example: 7 of the Best Train Trips in Canada and What You’ll See Along the Way

  6. Dog-friendly trips  

Traveling with four-legged friends isn’t always easy, so many travelers find it helpful to look up things to do and places to stay with their dogs.

For more ideas on traveling with pets, check out BringFrido, a directory for travelers with dogs.

Example: 19 Texas Attractions You Won’t Believe Are Dog-Friendly

  7. Public transportation options  

In big cities or foreign countries, travelers like to know which public transportation options are best.

You can also write about places where it’s best to get a rental car, or where you’ll want to rely heavily on subways, taxis or walking.

This can be part of a larger “what to do” article, but if you find a place that has enough options and content, it can work as a standalone article.

Example: Tips for Getting Around in Rome

Things to Do (or Not!)

  8. Things to do with kids  

Traveling with kids – especially babies and toddlers – brings a whole new level of research and prep work to the table, even for quick weekend trips.

The first few trips my wife and I took with our baby twins were a real wake-up call compared to the casual, jam-packed trips we normally took as a couple.

Fortunately for blogger, this means lots of content opportunities for travelers with kids.

In addition to things to do, you can also look at where to eat with kids or which places are kid-appropriate.

Example: 100 Things To Do in NYC with Kids Before They Grow Up

  9. Things to do at night  

Most travel destinations have laundry lists of things to do, but things to do at night is a different story.

These might by more nightlife-based attractions, but it also may include tours and places to see that are best at nighttime.

This particular article is great for big cities with a lot going on – think New York City, Barcelona, Los Angeles.

Example: Things to Do at Night in Barcelona

  10. Things to do alone  

Solo travelers need ideas too, and this is a great way to niche down into a unique “things to do article.”

These articles can include places to visit, where to eat and where to stay if you’re traveling solo.

Example: NYC Solo Travel: 22 Things To Do Alone In NYC

  11. Things to do in specific seasons  

Travel attractions vary by place and season – what you do in NYC during the summer is a lot different than what you do there in the winter.

By covering one specific season, you’re able to make a useful, unique list of things to do that’s more helpful than a generic checklist that might not apply throughout the whole year.

Example: Beat the winter blues by visiting these Chicago attractions

  12. Romantic things to do  

There are a few variations here, but the idea with these articles is to write about things to do for couples.

Of course, there are more romantic places than others, but you’d be surprised to learn how many people are looking up stuff like “romantic things to do in Prescott,” which means you can write these types of posts for just about anywhere.

Example: Featured Itinerary: 48 Hours of Romance in Sedona

  13. Non-touristy things to do  

Here’s where this type of post gets really interesting: the tourist looking to do non-touristy things.

They’re tired of the same old attractions and want something off the beaten path. So give it to them!

If you’re relying just on research, this article can be difficult to write, but if you have firsthand knowledge of a place where you’ve explored non-touristy attractions, it’s a great way to differentiate your content.

It’s also a great topic to keep in mind for future travels – when you hit a new city, see if you can find under-the-radar attractions and places that would work well for this type of travel post.
story_txt:
My wife, kids and I love road trips, and we’ve tackled routes all over the southwest, midwest and northeast.
So this is a blog post idea I love and have personally searched for (and written about) over the years.
This is also a great blog post category because of the number of variations you can include in your itineraries.
A road trip with kids in the southwest, for example, looks a lot different than an romantic outdoorsy road trip in the Pacific Northwest.
You can also throw in all sorts of helpful content, including where to stay, what to eat and the best times to plan your road trip.
  3. Weekend trips  
Living in Phoenix, we’re also big on weekend trips – anywhere to get out of the heat during the summer.
Weekend trip posts are great because you can string together a few places together, or focus on one city or destination.
Example: The best weekend getaways from NYC
  4. Scenic drives  
Like road trips, scenic drives are a great topic because of the endless variation and customization you can add to your content.
Just about every region or state gets searches related to scenic drives, so this is an easy one to cover wherever you live or travel.
Example: Famous Roads for Great Drives in California
  5. Train rides   
Train rides have a romantic throwback vibe that make them a timeless classic in the world of travel blogging.
You can review a specific route, or curate a list of the best train rides in a region.
Example: 7 of the Best Train Trips in Canada and What You’ll See Along the Way
  6. Dog-friendly trips  
Traveling with four-legged friends isn’t always easy, so many travelers find it helpful to look up things to do and places to stay with their dogs.
For more ideas on traveling with pets, check out BringFrido, a directory for travelers with dogs.
Example: 19 Texas Attractions You Won’t Believe Are Dog-Friendly
  7. Public transportation options  
In big cities or foreign countries, travelers like to know which public transportation options are best.
You can also write about places where it’s best to get a rental car, or where you’ll want to rely heavily on subways, taxis or walking.
This can be part of a larger “what to do” article, but if you find a place that has enough options and content, it can work as a standalone article.
Example: Tips for Getting Around in Rome
Things to Do (or Not!)
  8. Things to do with kids  
Traveling with kids – especially babies and toddlers – brings a whole new level of research and prep work to the table, even for quick weekend trips.
The first few trips my wife and I took with our baby twins were a real wake-up call compared to the casual, jam-packed trips we normally took as a couple.
Fortunately for blogger, this means lots of content opportunities for travelers with kids.
In addition to things to do, you can also look at where to eat with kids or which places are kid-appropriate.
Example: 100 Things To Do in NYC with Kids Before They Grow Up
  9. Things to do at night  
Most travel destinations have laundry lists of things to do, but things to do at night is a different story.
These might by more nightlife-based attractions, but it also may include tours and places to see that are best at nighttime.
This particular article is great for big cities with a lot going on – think New York City, Barcelona, Los Angeles.
Example: Things to Do at Night in Barcelona
  10. Things to do alone  
Solo travelers need ideas too, and this is a great way to niche down into a unique “things to do article.”
These articles can include places to visit, where to eat and where to stay if you’re traveling solo.
Example: NYC Solo Travel: 22 Things To Do Alone In NYC

Of course, there are more romantic places than others, but you’d be surprised to learn how many people are looking up stuff like “romantic things to do in Prescott,” which means you can write these types of posts for just about anywhere.

story:
Short Summary

Find the Coin is a treasure hunt to find the sixpence spliced into the first ever transatlantic communications cable, which transformed the way the world communicated forever.

Our mission is to find the coin, and in the process reclaim a central section of the cable. Join us as we make history.

We've found a boat, assembled the expedition team - all that's missing is you. 

 

The Pitch

Few people realise that, over 150 years ago, before the American Civil War had even started, the first near instantaneous global communications were being born. The original, working transatlantic subsea communications cable was laid in 1858.

Cyrus West Field, a visionary entrepreneur, changed the way the world communicated forever by laying a cable from Eastern Newfoundland, to Western Ireland. For good luck, Cyrus welded a sixpence into a joint in the cable somewhere in the mid-Atlantic.

At the time, the fastest ships would take two weeks to send a message, this cable meant a full message could be relayed in hours. Its impact was immediate and revolutionary.

For the first time, the Old World was directly connected to the New World.

At the time, the event was celebrated on both sides of the Atlantic, with the Smithsonian Museum and others collecting and displaying much of the excess cable and Tiffany’s turning the cable into souvenir items, such as letter openers, paperweights, and walking cane handles.

The original cable has remained etched in the history of finance as well, introducing same day exchange rates and leading to the invention of the ticker. In fact, to this day USD/GBP currency pairing is still called “The Cable”.

People are often surprised to hear that over 99% of global communications still take place via the 3 million+ miles of undersea cables. The internet and related technologies we enjoy wouldn’t exist if it wasn’t for the early pioneers like Cyrus West Field.

This is the cable that changed the world, and you can be a part of the next chapter of its history.

 

The Team

Sebastian Stephens

Sebastian spent 17 years in the undersea communications industry and left with one remaining mission to complete.... Recovering that coin!

He co-built Wisper – Europe's then-largest private data network – before selling it to Cable & Wireless in 1999.

In 2000 he moved to the Caribbean, where he spent 8 years building the Southern Caribbean Fibre Network. In 2009 he co-founded SubSea Environmental Services, a recycling business buying, collecting and processing our service undersea cable on a continuous basis, which he led until 2015.

Russell Parsons

Russell is the other co-founder of Subsea Environmental Services and Wisper. Once a director of several international property development companies, he was the Finance Director of JFP – a property fund and specialist BES management business, which managed over 200 firms with £1.7bn of property assets. 

Russell is also the founder and principal shareholder of Profusion Media – a data science, business intelligence and digital marketing agency based in London.

Richard Wills

Richard is a team member and advisor for the project, working closely with the team to bring it to life. He is also the Governor and Trustee of an independent school called Rendcomb College and has been farming organically for the last 20 years, as well as developing renewable energy projects and renovating buildings.

Joe Wheatley

Joe is the videographer on the project who will be filming the documentary. He has been working closely with Sebastian so far to build the story and is in some exciting talks already regarding the film.

 

The Rewards

From owning a small piece of the cable, to having your name on the boat as we go on our adventure, we have plenty of awards available that you can claim when backing our project.

Arguably the most exciting reward we have to offer is the unique piece of artwork, which we will be commissioning later on in the year once we reach our stretch goal. The artwork will depict the historic map of the 2 continents that were connected by the transatlantic telecommunications cable back in 1858 by Cyrus West Field. The artwork will feature elements of the cable’s material, and be a completely unique and valuable piece of history. It would also look great as a statement piece in a reception, or in your home/library.

We're working on the piece with the artists and will be able to share more details with you soon.

 

Our Stretch Goals

We’d like to keep our adventure going for as long as possible to increase the chances of finding the coin, so here is what we will be able to do if we manage to exceed our initial goal.

 

Risks & Challenges

The team behind this are founders of a successful subsea cable extraction company that has deep expertise in this specialist field. We don’t know if the coin is still there – that’s what makes it a treasure hunt!

However, we are very confident we’ll find the original cable and bring a significant section of it back. GPS coordinates were understandably unreliable in 1858, but we have a fair estimation of where the cable is. When we find it we will flip a coin and either go East or West and leave it up to fate. If not, we'll have to turn around and try again.

There is of course a possibility that someone else has already found it. But the fact we need to organise an exhibition like this demonstrates how difficult that would be to do under the radar.

We've already leased a boat for a short period in the summer, and your contribution will allow us to extend that lease and continue our treasure hunt for longer, giving us a better chance of finding the coin. 

We’re confident of getting the cable, hopeful that we’ll find the coin, and are certainly the most experienced team possible to organise this treasure hunt!

 

Still want to help?

Can't afford to contribute to the project but want to show your support? Help us get the word out about the project and share this page on social media!

story: Hey guys and gals, friends classmates and teachers. My girlfriend and I finally plan on returning to Canada!!! Hooray! I know right! Well we plan on visiting friends in Vancouver, then go to the Niagara Falls (my Gf always wanted to go there) , and on the way we'll drop by Toronto to meet up with you guys. Can't wait to introduce her to everyone. After our stay in Toronto we'll return to Vancouver and settle there for good with a down-payment Bros and gals, traveling is expensive lol, and Im broke haha. So hope ya'll can pitch in :) BTW the donations cover the flight tickets, hotel fees, food and the big down payment. Thank you guys for chippin in

story:
ABOUT

As old stagers in the tourism branch and people with a great passion for travel we are very familiar with price comparisons of hotel rates and we can say: we have been on both sides of the coin.

As consultants we were involved in the development and optimization of many travel companies. We had to realize, that all travel agencies and portals are basically the same.

We have been working in the corporate tourism industry for decades and we have seen it all – especially the ruthless fight for clients by the big travel platforms and the enormous profit margin each travel platform makes, just by selling you a hotel room. Upon our research and the collected experiences, we discovered that each travel platform is making their profit the same way.

Adding a percentage on each booking to maximize their profit and promoting it to you as the ultimate deal. All online travel platforms get more or less the same rates from the hotels, the wholesale price or in other words, the cost price. They just add whatever they feel the consumer will pay.

Making a profit is positive as long as it is FAIR to the customer, wholesaler and as we think, is eco-friendly and gives something back to the global community.

 

 

When we founded this company we had one goal in mind, that nobody else considered possible: to cut off the many middle men in hotel reservation! You wouldn’t believe how many of them are involved in your bookings!

We want to put the customer back in focus and change the unfair rules in tourism.

 

OUR VISION

One thing was crystal clear right from the start: we needed to stir things up from the bottom. We wanted a gentle revolution.

We wanted to make sure the traveler is back center stage, the main focus of our company. Your travel dream, your compassion to dive deep into an adventure, to explore a new country, it’s people, culture and beauty should become our most important goal.

Our motto: keep it simple, keep it cheap and keep it fair!

Our hotel booking portal is revolutionary and innovative - with us everything is about the customer.

We want the big players to announce the fight and for this we need your help!

When we founded globhob in 2016 we had two things in mind: fairness and simplicity,
We at globhob are taking on the big players by slowly and simply eliminating their power. Because the big platforms are nothing but the middle men who are collecting the big bucks - your money.

Our vision is to provide you with the wholesale price, the real prices the hotels put out. We are simply passing on these hotel rates to you.

We do not profit from any of your bookings - we do not earn one cent of your bookings!

With a 3, 6 or 12 months package you pay a fair one-time fee and you can make unlimited online hotel bookings - worldwide.

The best thing is: per booking you may book for up to 10 rooms. All of your friends, family members and associates receive the same conditions like you!

One pays the fee – many will profit!

Your globhob package usually pays off with the first booking.

Imagine how much you overpaid in the last years and how much you can save in 3 months, 6 months or even annually.

You join us and become one of us - a globhober.
Your love for globhob will be forever, your package will expire automatically. So there is no rip-off with automatic renewal if you forgot to cancel on time! If you want to stay, just buy a new package.

The advantages of globhob at a glance:

  • You do not pay any commissions or extra charges, so you save money with every booking!
  • We do not earn a cent on your bookings!
  • You book all hotels to prices, only travel agencies normally get!
  • Book as often as you like for up to 10 rooms each. All travelers will pay your price. Only one pays the fee – many will profit!
  • Your membership expires automatically. There is no automatic renewal!
  • All prices shown are final prices!
  • On our hotel portal you already have access to over 75,000 hotels in more than 180 countries worldwide.
  • Real-time booking and instant confirmation for all hotels!
  • Booking also without credit card!
  • You can cancel hotel bookings yourself at any time.

 

WHAT IS THE MONEY FOR?

Your input to globhob will be used to make this gentle revolution against the big players a movement that is beneficial for travelers and the environment.

Actually our website is available only in German. Since we want all global travelers to have access to our webpage we need to provide the platform in many languages (for example English and Spanish). The goal is to go live with an english version in september 2017.

Please visit us on www.globhob.com!

We also want to acquire new hotels, negotiate fair conditions and expand for the globhob community.

We want to continuously invest in our unique platform to provide globhobers with fair hotel rates and the quality you seek. The acquisition and integration of new hotels is, of course, costly.

You can be part of a growing community by simply donate or try us for a limited time with one of our packages and immediately have access to our database of 75,000 hotels worldwide.

Of course, our idea only applies if as many people as possible want to become part of the globhob community.

If our idea is not interesting for you, it would be great if you would tell others about it anyway.

We would love to have your support. Please visit us on Facebook and share on www.facebook.com/globhobcom.

 

OUR RESPONSIBILITY

We are environmentally conscious and take responsibility.

As a traveler you leave a carbon footprint. Travel can harm the climate. We want to give back and donate 2% of our profit to a project in need.
We support the reforestation in central Borneo and ' The Borneo Orangutan
Survival Foundation'. These forests are viable for the climate and serve as one of the largest Orangutan Sanctuaries worldwide.

story:
Who we are

Casas Worldwide is a new vacation Club with the goal of making quality accommodations affordable and in the reach of most households.We do this by investing in quality condos in hot and up and coming vacation spots and then passing those savings on to our members. Our indiegogo campaign will help us acquire quality vacation spots in incredible locations. 

In 2018 we plan to have accommodations available in Costa Rica's Pacific Coast, near Mexico's Awesome white sand beaches, In the gorgeous Dominican Republic and on the Caribbean Coast of Colombia. As our business grows we expect to expand our operations in The Caribbean, Central and South America, Europe and South East Asia.

We focus on warm weather tropical destinations perfect for getaways throughout the year.

 

Whats in it for you!

Our accommodations will always include at least 1 bed/ 1 bath condos (however we plan most will be two bedrooms or larger as we want to accomodate traveling families) fully furnished, with all utilities, Cable TV and Internet included. All you need is a plane ticket and a suitcae to start enjoying a wonderful vacation.

Joining our club is easy. There are no sales meetings or long promotional meetings. No up sales. No hassles. Pay Your membership fee and it gurantees you accommodations for the given number of nights at the location you chose (Calendar will open Jan 1, 2018) and at a minimum you membership fee gets you TWO vacations. One in 2018 and 2019. You can chose packages that include 1 vacation a year for up to 4 years for a pay once and forget it price. 

If you don't use a vacation in a given year it will roll over to the following year at no charge. Never will you lose your pre-paid vacation time. 

Please come see the world with Casas Worldwide.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute Please:

  • Share this with your friends so they can get in on this great Opportunity
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Joining our club is easy. There are no sales meetings or long promotional meetings. No up sales. No hassles. Pay Your membership fee and it gurantees you accommodations for the given number of nights at the location you chose (Calendar will open Jan 1, 2018) and at a minimum you membership fee gets you TWO vacations. One in 2018 and 2019. You can chose packages that include 1 vacation a year for up to 4 years for a pay once and forget it price. 
If you don't use a vacation in a given year it will roll over to the following year at no charge. Never will you lose your pre-paid vacation time. 
Please come see the world with Casas Worldwide.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute Please:

Share this with your friends so they can get in on this great Opportunity
Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
About this project

*NOTE* Nespresso is a registered trade mark owned by Société des Produits Nestlé SA. "Our brand SIPPY is not connected or associated in any way to Nestle S.A. or Nespresso"

Coffee Aficionados Rejoice! For Sippy is here to save your day. 

Start the day with a coffee to get your active lifestyle going. Whether you're out and about on foot, bike, car, train, or any other transportation, Sippy can brew you an instant espresso with a press of a button. Sippy - the espresso maker on the go from Fikra Design brews a full bodied espresso whatever the situation, every time. A fab addition to any occasion, whether it be a full packed day out of the office, a camping trip, group hike or whenever you fancy getting your caffeine / decaf fix! The beauty of Sippy is that it is completely mechanical and does not have any electronic or moving parts, therefore the use of a battery or charging is not needed ever!

The perfect travel companion, which can be carried in any handbag, backpack or suitcase.

 

 

No espresso machine in site? Well, Sippy can now become your best buddy on any trip out of the office or home.

Brew an instant espresso with a press of a button and even mix it up by adding milk to make your favourite latte / cappuccino.

In less than 1 minute, you will have yourself a full bodied aromatic espresso with a delicious, rich velvety 'creme' top.

All you need is hot water, a CO2 cartridge and your favourite espresso capsule (compatible with Nespresso capsules).

Sippy will be sure to make heads turn as you brew your coffee in undiscovered locations.

Looks great in any setting and can feature at home or at the office.

 

Carrying Sippy looks good and is a breeze due to its light and compact body.

Having a sleek pen like profile allows the water to flow through the body, under compressed CO2 gas to maximise the aromatic flavour of your espresso and in turn creating a rich velvety 'creme' top.

A red anodised line indicates that a CO2 cartridge is loaded and in use.

Easy open / close screw top body gives quick access to the CO2 chamber (holds 1 x 12g CO2 Cartridge, enough for 5-6 espressos).

A Small and discreet release valve is located below.

Can't leave home without my Sippy!!

In our workshop:

Compatible coffee capsules for Sippy:

Nespresso Capsules or other coffee pods.

Compatible CO2 Cartridges for Sippy:

Sippy takes 1 cartridge at a time - 12gram non threaded CO2 cartridge which can be purchased online or through your local supermarket / DIY store.

1 cartridge is enough for approximately 7 - 8 espressos sized between 25 to 35ml.

 

TIMELINE,

APR, MAY, JUN - indiegogo campaign.

JUL- Order raw materials.

AUG - Drawings to be drafted for manufacturing.

NOV - Production.

JAN 2018 - Sippy to be shipped to all indiegogo backers.

We are seeking the help of the indiegogo community to bring Sippy into your hands. We need funding to purchase tooling for mass production, which will drive costs down for each Sippy manufactured and make it affordable for consumers.

Thanks so much for your support and generosity.

Risks and challenges

We have tried to keep the project as simple as can be. Designing Sippy has been fairly interesting and didn't unfold without it's challanges. The risks and challenges for the project are fairly low as we have already gone through the stages of motion for production and ironed out any problems with the product.

When going through the full production run, we will need to keep on top of quality control, which I will be overseeing personally, to ensure that every Sippy is up to the highest quality standards and meets every backers expectation.

story:
What is Indiegogo?

Indiegogo is a crowdfunding website, where you can pitch your ideas to the public with a goal of raising funds to bring the product to life. People can donate to the mission where you can help bring the product to market and get a reward in return, pretty much a win, win! Your feedback and contribution will help shape this product!

 

Fixed Funding?

We are a fixed funding campaign, and what that means is when you donate money, we will only receive it if we meet our goal of $28.000, if we do not reach our goal then you get a FULL REFUND so that you don’t have to take on all the risk!

 

How the Game Works

All players will be circled around the arena. Inside, it contains the weapons and gear they will need to survive against the competition. Once the countdown begins, players will have 60 seconds to formulate a plan. When the alarm sounds, all players will run to the center to grab a weapon and backpack. There will be a 3-minute grace period with no eliminations. A second alarm will sound to indicate the 3-minute grace period is over, and the eliminations will begin. Now, players must decide to either engage in combat, or run for the woods.

At this point, you are alone. You must survive as long as you can. You may decide to play solo to stay hidden and safe, but you might be at your weakest. Making alliances with others is dangerous. You will have strength in numbers, but risk being stabbed in the back the moment you turn it. Remember, there is only one winner; it's up to you to survive. You’ll have to make tough decisions, but making it to the end and claiming the title of Last Man Standing is the highest achievement one can attain.

 

Challenges

 

We want our players to feel the urgency and danger of being in the Arena. To keep players active and engaged we will require certain tasks be completed. These challenges will consist of finding objects scattered around the map, completing puzzles, or visiting named sites. If you manage to survive long enough to complete all challenges, this will be your entry into the final battle. Those who get eliminated before, or don't complete every challenge, will be left behind...

 

 

Rules of Combat

We want the rules in the game to be extremely easy to follow - so easy you don't even notice you're following them! The core of the combat system is treating it as if it were real life. If you get hit in the arm, you can no longer use that arm. If you get hit in the leg, you can no longer use that leg. The rules in regards to combat are as follows:

If you get hit in 2 separate limbs, that results in an elimination.

If you get hit in the chest, that results in an elimination.

If you get hit in the hand , that is not treated as losing your arm.

If you get hit in the head, that does NOT result in an elimination unless the weapon is ranged or projectile.

 

 

Safety

Safety is one of our top priorities. We have taken special care in designing safe weapons that will not cause you physical harm. Every weapon is constructed with a polyvinyl core, surrounded with polyethylene foam and an elastane sleeve. This ensures a soft hit, but the strength to handle many fights. We have extensively tested every weapon, and we are confident in both their design and function.

We also want to ensure that our players have the proper equipment to stay safe while alone in the woods. We plan on providing every single player with enough water to stay hydrated all day long, a map of the area, a storm whistle, a compass, and a digital watch for them to wear on their person.

 

 

Community

Nothing makes a game like its community. In our game, we will poll changes every month put forward by the players.  We hope to build a community where we can discuss future game updates and help create the best Battle Royale experience ever! 

We will be releasing major content updates every month, which will include new weapons, challenges, gear and more. However, not every update will be about items... There's more to fear in the Arena than just players... 

 

 

 Your Investment

 

There is much preliminary work that goes into hosting these games such as acquiring land, making that land suitable for play, purchasing and maintaining safety equipment, and making sure our players are properly insured and geared up for an all-day event in the woods. This is where we plan to direct your funding:

  • Land Acquisition and Preparation: We need to purchase or lease suitable land and the equipment to make the land safe for play. That will include roping off the boundaries, creating paths, building structures and clearing out grasslands for the Arena.
  • Briefing Room:  We will be constructing a building to hold 50 people.  This is where everyone gets briefed on the rules and safety before heading out to the Arena.
  • Helmets and Pads: We want our players to be safe, so we are going to provide 50+ helmets, elbow pads and knee pads.
  • Weapon Construction: We put great care into each weapon we create to ensure they are safe for action.  All 250+ weapons will be handmade by us, and requires the purchase of proper materials. 
  • Arena Construction: We will be building 50 podiums and the centerpiece that will hold all the weapons at the start of the game.
  • Safety Gear: To ensure that people will have the proper safety equipment, everyone will be given a map, compass, and storm whistle to signal in case of injury.
  • Insurance: Players will be covered by a general group insurance policy in case of accident. 
  • Supply Crates: We have to build and paint 30 supply crates.
